Ai
==

The greatest Alchemist of the Monster Race a peerless genius that only appears once every tens of thousands of years and probably the strongest Alchemist in the Heavenly Martial Realm.

History

He challenged the human race to Alchemy competitions and made them suffer a crushing defeat until Gu Feiyang showed up and managed to beat him using tricks.

He first appeared in the Western Region's Ancient Land in the battle at Five Cloud Mountain, where he supported the Monster Race in opening the seal of Five Cloud Mountain to free their sealed Clansmen. In the battle, he fought on par with the
Holy Region's
 High Elder
Tian Zhao Zi
, a human race Peak 9th Tier Alchemist. Ultimately winning due to his younger age, which resulted in him having more stamina in a battle of souls.

Plot

Five Cloud Mountains

During his journey to the Five Cloud Mountains with Huang, the current Monster Emperor, Ai tries several times to undo the seal of the Five Cloud Mountains under
Huang
 orders, which becomes possible with a formula passed down by the Master of the Fuyao Sacred Sect. She remains neutral, trying to appease the hostility between
Huang
,
Mo
 and
Shang
 Faction throughout the war, and engages in a fight with Tian Zhao Zi, leaving him alive out of respect for the senior of the Dao of Alchemy, and becoming desperate after the death and destruction of so many Monsters during the battle.

Martial Flame City

After the battle against Supreme Gui Xu in the Monster territory (Illusory Realm of Stars and Moon), the entire territory is destroyed and the surviving Monsters take refuge in
Yanwu City
. Concerned about the possibility of Mo becoming the Monster Emperor after Huang death and Shang disappearance, in addition to the current state of the Monster Race, Ai proposes an Alchemy match with
Li Yunxiao
 in exchange for some terms that benefit whichever side wins. With this, Ai demonstrates his Supreme perfection in Alchemy by creating a non-Maha Character that condenses the Laws of the World after understanding and consolidating the structure of all things, equal to creation from Noah Ark, but in order to create a Character that contains the Laws of the World that is not an Ancient Maha Character, obviously, this Character was not on the same level as the Ancient Maha Character, but it was similar. After the fight she assumes defeat, as Li Yunxiao not only saved her creation after creating a
Heavenly Supreme Artifact
 (Sword that Will Rise and Fall), focusing the forces of the World on destroying the Sword, as he also broke the Chains of Law, something that simply shocked the minds of everyone present, with this he grants his creation to Li Yunxiao for the purpose of establishing a good relationship.

References

Ancestral Elder
===============

The Ancestral Elder of the Mo family in Black Iron City is the family's spiritual pillar, holding a status even higher than the sect masters of the seven superpowers. His strength is so profound that not even the experts of the Sanctuary or the leaders of the seven superpowers dare to claim they can defeat him.

Appearance

A Sage-like figure, He held a piece of Jade in his hand, and every step he took contained the laws of heaven and earth. It was as if he was the embodiment of the laws of heaven and earth, and his every move was a martial Dao.

Background

For many years, even the six Grand Supreme Elders have not seen his true body, only knowing that he cultivates in Black Iron City without knowing his exact location. To most of the Mo family's younger generation, the Ancestral Elder is a distant legend—many have never even seen his clone, let alone his real form. His rare appearance causes great excitement and awe among the Mo family disciples.

Plot

In the past, the Ancestral Elder had a brief confrontation with
Gu Feiyang
 when he arrived in Black Iron City to fulfill the promise
Mo Douchen
 had made. However, since Mo Douchen had already passed away, the Ancestral Elder offered to fight in his place. They exchanged a few moves, and even the Ancestral Elder had to admit that Gu Feiyang was more talented than Mo Douchen, the most gifted member of the Mo family. He also acknowledged that in a few years, he would no longer be a match for Gu Feiyang.

Later, the Ancestral Elder supported Mo Xiaochuan’s decision to become Gu Feiyang’s disciple and even requested a favor from Gu Feiyang regarding Mo Xiaochuan’s deceased father.

People who lived 100,000 years ago, when the Divine Realm Laws were still present. They participated in the Demon Sealing War, dividing up the
Demon Emperor
 and also sealed his other half

There were four people at the
Hundred Tribulation World King Realm
. One of them was the possessor of the
World God Monument
, they call him World God/ Universe God.

Ancient Maha Characters
=======================

SPOILER ALERT!

Appearance





Ancient Maha Characters


Tadpole-like golden Characters, they are the embodiment of laws, condensed from the power of heaven and earth.

History

The
Ancient Maha God
 wrote a scripture, which contained all his comprehension about the heaven laws, the
Maha Ancient Scripture
. In the end the Scripture was rejected by the natural order and got destroyed by the heavens sending Brahma Thunder (Realm Power) for three months into it, turning the Scripture into countless fragments. Those fragments were sent to all the corners of the world.

Many experts gathered the fragments of the Scripture and created
3000 Maha Ancient Characters
. Through combining the Maha Ancient Characters many Divine Techniques were created. The four strongest, which are also closest to the original Scripture, are:

Godly Evolution Technique

Godly Realm Technique

Sun Sutra

Absolute Beginning Sutra

360 Primary

Characters
 of the
Maha Ancient Scripture
 are contained in these four Divine Techniques. The remaining
2640
 are
Secondary

Characters
 (total of
3000 Characters
).

Ancient Treasure Trove
======================

List Known Items

Divine Fire Mirror: Shaped like a bronze mirror, capable of spewing true Phoenix Fire. Forged from pure Geng metal and tempered with Heavenly Phoenix Fire.

Hidden Dragon Talisman: Made from the horn of a single dragon in the Earthly Sea. It can evade the power of the five elements and disperse the Supreme Dragon’s might.

Heavenly Spirit Leaf: Shaped like a leaf, a treasure for invisibility. Only one leaf remains.

Ice Silkworm: Formed by the Yin Ice Qi in the Wind Cave, shaped like a jade silkworm.

True Dragon Sword.

Demonic Dragon Armor.

Dragon Crystal.

Hidden Dragon Talisman.

Universe Light Plate.

Void Technique—Wheel of Death

Red Dragon Staff

Cosmic Light Disc

Among the 1,773 treasures recorded in the appendix, more than thirty were supreme treasures.

Ao Chang Kong
=============

Ao Chang Kong
 (傲长空), the
Tyrant Heaven Martial Sovereign
 (霸天武帝), recognized as the foremost among the
Ten Martial Sovereigns
. He is one of the two
Young Patriarchs
 of the
Ao Family
, a
Hidden Family
 who is specialized in physical cultivation methods, hailed as the number one under heaven.

Background

Back then, as a ranking battle of the Heaven & Earth power chart. The
Tyrant Heaven Martial Sovereign
 and the
Vanquisher Martial Sovereign
 fought for many days and nights, shattering the
Heaven & Earth
, and even causing the entire
Holy City
 to nearly collapse. In the end, Because
Tyrant's Physique
 was so strong that he can resist
Vanquisher's Primordial Qi
, and his advantage grew greater as the battle approached the end,
Vanquisher
 was forced to admit defeat.

Plot

He first appears in
New Yan city
, the newly established center of the
Merchant Union
 after the destruction of
Songyue Yan City
. He made a promise with
Wan Yiqian
,
Ten Thousand Treasures Store
 president, to help him kill
Ling Baiyi
.
Changkong
 makes one move that almost killed
Ling Baiyi
, unfortunately
Zhuo Qingfan
 appears in the last moment and blocks Changkong's fist.

Five Cloud Mountain

In the war against
Monster Race
.

Techniques

Great Illusion Fist

The
Great Illusion Fist
 is an ultimate martial technique that distorts reality, time, and space with a single punch. It is not merely an attack but a force that transcends the limits of existence.

Tyrant Body Tempering Art

Trivia

Besides
Ao Wuxin
, he is the only one who cultivated the complete
Tyrant Body Tempering Art
.

Ao Family
=========

General Information

One of the most powerful hidden families, known for their high proficiency in physical body cultivation.

Background

The
Ao Family
 is one of the
hidden reclusive families
 that have remained outside of mainstream power struggles for centuries. While they are not as openly influential as the
Seven Great Forces or the Sanctuary
, they possess
immense strength
, particularly in
physical combat and body-refining techniques
.

The
Ao clan specialized in powerful physical techniques
, making them ideal candidates for inheriting the
Tyrant Body Tempering Technique
.
Wan Yiqian
 sought them out, and they sent
Ao Changkong
—a young but incredibly talented warrior—to test his compatibility with the inheritance.

Structure

Young Masters

The only two members of the Ao Family who successfully mastered the complete
Tyrant Body Tempering Art
.

Ao Changkong

Ao Wuxin

Servants

Seen accompanying Ao Changkong and Ao Wuxin on their journeys, both have high combat powers at the peak of 9 Star Martial Sovereign.

Fat Dhuta

Thin Dhuta

Ao Wuxin
========

The youngest genius of the AO Family After
Ao Chang Kong
, he was the one who inherited the
Heavenly Tyrant Body Tempering Technique
. He first me
Li Yunxiao
 during the Hidden Family
Martial arts competitions
 organised my
Natural Moat Order
.

Appearance

Young man with a golden body.

Power

His body had already opened six gates.

Array Device
============

Description

Array Device. It contains Many Extremely Rare Soul Training Arrays they can bless the soul power of refiners. Further more, Its effective Range is 1 Kilometer. All Array device were left behind by Ancient Powers Not even Gu feiyang can refine something like this, They are extremely rare.

Known Owner

Li Yunxiao

Bai Mou
=======

Bai Mou, is the
mysterious and elusive commander of the State Guardian’s third unit
, an elite force responsible for intelligence gathering, covert operations, and safeguarding the internal stability of
Tianshui State
. Unlike other commanders known for their military prowess, Bai Mou's reputation stems from her
uncanny ability to read faces, foresee destinies, and manipulate fate itself.

Background

Bai Mou is not just a loyal servant to
Prince Qin Yue
 she is
his guide and his advisor.
 It was she who prophesied that Qin Yue would meet the "benefactor of his life" on that fateful night, a prophecy that led him to
Li Yunxiao.

Bai Xiaoyue
===========

Appearance

A woman in white came, she was very elegant and graceful, with a light and ethereal aura.

Bai Zhansheng
=============

Plot

Land Of No Return

Bai Zhansheng, leader of the Thousand Mountains Prefecture, faces accusations from Great Elder Mao Haokong, who claims Bai is colluding with the demon race to break the seal of Five Cloud Mountain. Mao brings two dark agents from the Holy Region, Fei Cheng and Tai Yuan, as witnesses. They demand Bai surrender the seal’s key, claiming demons have infiltrated the prefecture. Bai refuses without an official decree from the Holy Region's council, suspecting foul play.

Bai Zimo
========

Bai Zimo is  a disciple participating in the
Big Dipper Sect
 tournament.

Appearance

He was a big fat that carried a big hammer and walked up to the ring in a funny way, which caused a burst of laughter.

Plot

In his First fight Bai Zimo, attempted a surprise attack on Cheng Yu by launching his massive hammer. However, Cheng Yu effortlessly countered with a single punch, crushing the weapon and sending it hurtling back. With a final strike, he amplified the impact, launching Bai Zimo
hundreds of meters into the valley
, ending the fight in an instant.

Baili Fu
========

Plot

Baili Fu from God Wind Valley looked down on
Wu Dacheng
, believing him to be weaker. Confident after landing a few initial blows, he launched a flurry of kicks aimed at Wu Dacheng’s vital spots, injuring him severely. However, Wu Dacheng relied on his mysterious movement technique, effortlessly dodging every attack while waiting for the perfect moment.

When the opportunity arose, he struck with a single precise punch, disrupting Baili Fu’s internal energy and causing his body to collapse from within. Seizing the advantage, Wu Dacheng unleashed a relentless barrage of attacks, leaving Baili Fu coughing up blood. Seeing no way to turn the tide, the Holy Wind Sect’s leader admitted defeat, leaving Baili Fu humiliated and resentful.

Baili Gongjin
=============

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Baili Gongjin
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

He is a renowned Six-Tier Emperor Alchemist and the president of the
Duskflame Empire
's Alchemist Association. As a High Tier Alchemist, he is a god-like existence in Shangyang City, and no one dare to make a conflict with him, not even the Four Great Families and the Xin Imperial Family could.

Plot

The Zhou Great Family Crisis

During the confrontation between Yunxiao and the Zhou family, an old man named Baili Gongjin, who was a renowned Six-Tier Emperor Alchemist and the president of the
Duskflame Empire
's Alchemist Association, appeared. Baili Gongjin expressed shock and complex emotions upon seeing Yunxiao and confirmed that the pill given by the Zhou family was indeed poisonous. This revelation caused panic among the onlookers and raised suspicions about the Zhou family's intentions.

Zhou Yangbiao
, the leader of the Zhou family, requested Baili Gongjin to verify the pill and prove its innocence. However, Baili Gongjin confirmed that the pill was indeed toxic. The situation intensified when one of the Zhou family elders, Zhou Bo, voluntarily tested the pill and tragically died from its effects. This shocked everyone present, as Zhou Bo was a Peak Nine-Star Martial Grandmaster and considered invulnerable to most poisons.

Amid the chaos, Baili Gongjin's suspicion shifted toward Yunxiao, who was accused of poisoning Zhou Bo. However,
Xin Pi
, a member of the Xin Imperial Family, expressed doubts about Yunxiao's involvement and suggested that Baili Gongjin might be the one responsible. The true nature of the poison and the culprit remained unclear, leading to a tense and uncertain atmosphere.

Yunxiao expressed gratitude towards Baili Gongjin,
Wang Chen
,
Cheng Feng
,
Mo Zhai
 for their care and support. This surprised and shocked the onlookers, including Wang Chen, Cheng Feng, Mo Zhai, and
Zhou Changfa
.

Zhou Changfa demanded an explanation from Baili Gongjin regarding the pill used in the conflict. However, Baili Gongjin defended himself against the accusation and denied any involvement in tampering with the pill. Mo Zhai from the Mo family supported Baili Gongjin, claiming that Yunxiao was attempting to sow discord among them. Later, the angry Baili Gongjin cut all the connections between the Duskflame Alchemist Association and the Zhou Great Family, leaving them without high-quality resources.

The Golden Crow Arena

Baili Gongjin, was observing the competition in the Golden Crow Arena through a water screen projection in a luxurious room at the Alchemist Association. When Li Yunxiao used the Mortal World Seal during the duel. Baili Gongjin recognized the seal as one of the three styles imparted by Gu Feiyang to Yang Di, the Floating Life Seal, Mortal World Seal, and Heaven and Earth Seal. He was shocked and speculated that Li Yunxiao might be the successor of one of Gu Feiyang's disciples.

Baili Gongjin was amazed by the power displayed by Li Yunxiao's seal, and expressed regret that he hadn't stopped the duel if he knew Li Yunxiao possessed the Mortal World Seal. He also discussed this revelation with other experts, including
Yuan Hao
, and they were all stunned by Li Yunxiao's extraordinary abilities and the possible connection to Gu Feiyang's legacy. This revelation put the Zhou family in a difficult situation, as they now faced potential repercussions if Li Yunxiao was indeed connected to Gu Feiyang's lineage.

Bailun Jieyi
============

Appearance

The old man had a head full of silver hair and was wearing a navy blue shirt with a crescent-colored ribbon tied around his waist. His eyes were clear and he looked leisurely and contented.

Background

Bai Lun is a mysterious and little-known figure in the Tianwu Realm, yet his lineage has played a crucial role in shaping major events for hundreds of thousands of years. Unlike prominent sect leaders or martial emperors, Bai Lun operates from the shadows, his influence extending far beyond what most people realize.

His calculations and foresight have guided the course of history, and even the Duanmu family, known for their powerful divination abilities, inherited part of his legacy. In fact, the
Duanmu Family
 divination arts are said to be merely a fragment of Bai Lun’s profound knowledge.

Even more astonishing, the
Eternal World
, one of the most mysterious and sought after places in the Tianwu Realm, was refined by another master at Bai Lun’s suggestion.

Plot

Heaven of Langya

After Yunxiao was severely injured in his battle against the two mighty experts, Zhan Yu and Zhan Bo, who attempted to kidnap Fe Ni, Bai Lun Jieyi appeared just in time to save him from the brink of death.
Not only did he stabilize Yunxiao's injuries, but he also guided Fe Ni, helping her break through her cultivation. Recognizing Yunxiao's destiny as the Master of the World God Monument, Bai Lun Jieyi used his remaining lifespan to impart crucial guidance.
In his final act, he performed a powerful technique, sacrificing what little time he had left to provide Yunxiao with the time and space coordinates that held the key to the war between the two worlds. His actions ensured that Yunxiao could continue his path toward his ultimate fate, carrying the weight of the world's destiny on his shoulders.

As Bai Lun Jieyi neared the end of her life, she remained a key figure in preserving the Taichu lineage and protecting its secrets. Despite being weak, she held on, waiting for three important visitors Duanmu Youyu, Yin Yu, and Feng Yaoli.

First, she entrusted Duanmu Youyu and Duanmu Cang with the Taichu inheritance, passing down knowledge, treasures, and the Jiuyao Xing Staff, ensuring the lineage's survival.

Then, Yin Yu, once trapped for years, arrived demanding the location of an unknown power. However, Bai Lun Jieyi had erased her own memory, making it impossible for him to extract the information. Enraged, Yin Yu prepared to forcibly read her mind, but before he could act, Feng Yaoli appeared.

Feng Yaoli, also seeking the Taichu secrets, confronted Yin Yu, sparking a conflict. Meanwhile, Wei Qing and his group, who had initially allied with Yin Yu, abandoned him, leaving him vulnerable.

Even in her final moments, Bai Lun Jieyi remained composed, ensuring the Taichu legacy was safely passed down while her enemies fought among themselves. Her role was pivotal in preserving the ancient knowledge that would shape the future of the Tianwu Realm.

Power

The Taichu Zhen Jue(Taichu Devine Art) The Taichu Zhen Jue was an ancient divine technique created to control time, allowing its wielder to manipulate its flow and create time domains. However, over generations, the Taichu lineage misused it to peer into fate, bringing them into conflict with the will of heaven. The Taichu Zhen Jue Divided into nine levels, Bai Lun Jieyi, one of the most accomplished practitioners, had reached only the eighth.

Trivia

Bai Lun Jieyi extended his life far beyond normal limits by consuming the Three Life Fruit and sealing himself in the Realm of Eternal Life. However, his fate was ultimately sealed when he attempted to deduce a forbidden place, drawing the punishment of heaven, which directly severed his remaining lifespan.

Ban Bingbai
===========

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Ban Bingbai
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Ban Bingbai is the commander of the City Guards of Yangpu. At first, when confronting Yunxiao’s group, he follows his duty as the commander, attempting to uphold the law by questioning them and preparing to arrest them based on Wu Guang’s orders. However, he quickly realizes that these youths are not ordinary. When Yunxiao fires the Cloud Piercing Arrow an elite military signal Ban Bingbai immediately recognizes its significance and starts sweating. He understands that the people he’s dealing with have a powerful background, far beyond his ability to handle.

As soon as Yunxiao’s two-thousand-strong army arrives, Ban Bingbai is paralyzed with fear. The overwhelming killing intent and the presence of a Martial Lord leave him no choice but to stand down. He quickly realizes that Wu Guang has caused an enormous disaster, and he refrains from taking further action. Instead, he anxiously waits for Wu Guang’s father, City Lord Wu Liantian, to arrive and take control of the situation.

Battle Soul Mountain
====================

Battle Soul Mountain,the lawless land of
Jiangyu City
 is divided into the outer and inner parts. In the outer part, the gravity can be up to a hundred times, while the inner area is constantly changing. Sometimes it is normal gravity, and sometimes it can suddenly increase to hundreds, thousands, or even tens of thousands.

Plot & Event

Ten years ago, the
Devouring Soul Sect
 Sect learned that
Tian Xingzi
 had suffered a severe injury during his training and required a powerful earth-type monster to heal his wounds. Seizing this opportunity, the sect meticulously devised a plan to lure him into a trap. Their leader carefully arranged everything, using the Nine Netherworld Dirty Earth to refine a formidable monster and strategically setting up traps within Battle Soul Mountain. For a decade, they waited patiently, preparing for the moment when Tian Xingzi and the forces of Myriad Stars Valley would walk into their scheme.

However, what they didn't realize was that Tian Xingzi’s so-called "serious injury" from ten years ago was, in fact, a deception—a trap he had set for them. Even Tian himself hadn’t foreseen that
Huangfu Bi
, the Soul Devouring Sect's leader, would be capable of orchestrating such a complex counterattack. As both sides finally moved into position, a confrontation decades in the making was about to erupt, with schemes within schemes unfolding in an unpredictable battle of wits and power.

After the  conflict between the Devouring Soul Sect and Myriad Star Valley, the outer part of Battle Soul Mountain was left in ruins, partially blown apart. Both factions suffered heavy casualties, with countless experts perishing in the brutal battle.

Bei Jinghong
============

He is the King of Western Region. During the Ancient Demon Sealing War 100000 years ago, he snuck inside the seal of Demon Lord PU in hopes of refining his power and become the strongest entity.

Appearance

Old Man with white hair, a youthful face, jade-like skin, and a rosy complexion.

Personality

Bei Jinghong is an arrogant, stubborn, ambitious, and self-righteous individual who firmly believes he is the man of destiny. He has an overwhelming sense of entitlement, insisting that his strength, origins, and contributions to the Tianwu World make him the rightful owner of the World God Monument. His words reveal a deep resentment and desperation, unwilling to accept that someone else could be more worthy.

History

Bei Jinghong survived for 100,000 years by turning himself into a corpse, using an ancient preservation method to resist the passage of time. To minimize the erosion of his lifespan, he could only revive for one hour each year, spending the rest of the time in a death-like state. In total, this means that over 100,000 years, he has only truly "lived" for a little over 20 years.

Plot

Bei Jinghong awakened from his long slumber upon hearing the sound of the Dynasty Bell. Sensing a disturbance, he rushed over and discovered a young man locked in battle with three Overlords, having already severely injured two of them. Recognizing the dire situation, Bei Jinghong intervened to aid the wounded Overlords and soon engaged in conversation with Li Yunxiao.

During their exchange, Bei Jinghong was reunited with his profound artifact,
the Ancient

Dynasty Bell
, which had long been separated from him. Bei Jinghong proposed an alliance to break the ancient formation that had trapped Demon
Lord Pu
 for 100.000 years. He assured Yunxiao that Lord Pu was at his weakest state and, even if freed, would no longer pose a significant threat.

With their objectives aligned, Bei Jinghong, Yunxiao, and Lord Pu decided to work together to dismantle the powerful array formation.

To his surprise, the real reason Lord Pu agreed to the alliance was to deliver Yunxiao to the First Heaven when he was sealed, allowing him to absorb the remaining power of the Demon Emperor’s clone residing in Yunxiao’s body.

After Lord Pu revealed that Yunxiao was the chosen by the
World God Monument
 as owner, Bei Jinghong’s attitude toward Yunxiao changed drastically. Consumed by rage, he attempted to seize the monument and kill Yunxiao. However, Lord Pu reminded him that the monument had chosen Yunxiao, and Bei had no right to claim it. Furious, Bei turned his wrath on Lord Pu, and the two clashed.

The Agama Bone-Cutting Knife clashed against Bei’s Ancient Dynasty Bell, shattering its golden light instantly. The blade's energy tore through the bell, causing a massive explosion and leaving Bei Jinghong severely injured.

In his weakened state,
Ling Mudi
 approached Bei Jinghong and revealed himself as an old acquaintance. He tried to persuade Bei to reveal the location of the Spirit of the World God Monument, but Bei's stubbornness made it impossible. Determined to get the information, Ling Mudi was willing to cripple Bei or even search his soul.

Once again, Bei Jinghong attempted to attack the Formation Spirit, but he was knocked away with a single blow, leaving him severely injured and unconscious.

Seeing this, Ling Mudi instructed Yunxiao to trap Bei Jinghong inside the World God Monument and press him down with Tushita Peak for interrogation to uncover the Spirit’s location within the tablet.

Beifeng Nan
===========

Appearance

Dressed in white robe, he carried an indifferent expression, and his face was like jade and his exquisite facial features were carved into a beautiful face were so striking that even men would envy his beauty.

History

Beiming Nan, along with three thousand warriors, had perished sealing the demon at Two World Mountain a hundred thousand years ago—even his lord had fallen, leaving him as nothing more than a remnant soul. Yet, none of them had ever complained. Life and death had long lost their meaning. He willingly became a rotting corpse, standing guard for an eternity. Now, with little soul power remaining, his existence was fading—he wouldn’t be able to hold on for much longer.

Plot

Beiming Nan, having lived for 100,000 years, was resigned to his inevitable demise. With no Godly State experts left under the sky, he intended to entrust his Eternal Imperial Sword to Yunxiao, ensuring it wouldn’t be lost or fall into unworthy hands. However, Yunxiao refused and instead offered a way to suppress his injuries using the Divine Realm Tablet and a soul cultivation technique. Though initially doubtful, Beiming Nan couldn’t ignore his lingering will to live and agreed to seek permission from the technique’s original owner within the tablet. After Ling Mudi, his master, was taken into the Divine Realm Tablet by Yunxiao, Beiming Nan followed as well and chose to aid Yunxiao on his journey.

Five Cloud Mountain

After witnessing
Meng Bai
 large-scale attack, Yunxiao and
Beifeng Nan
 try to combined the Thunder Realm with the Seven Illusions Green Nightmare, creating the devastating technique "
Crazy and Cool Spinning Yo-Yo for Eternity
." The attack unleashed a deadly world of thunder and poison, instantly turning four thousand elite Monster to dust.
Shang’s Armillary Sphere and Heaven-Sealing Seal lessened the destruction, but the move still reversed the battle's tide and became legendary. However, the attack's backlash severely injured Yunxiao and Beifang Nan, forcing both of them to endure internal damage despite their powerful body techniques.

Power & Technique

Back then, Beifeng Nan directly refined the Seven Illusions Green Damask and fused it with his Heaven and Earth Venomous Body. Through this process, he forcibly opened the Eight Gates and sanctified his body, achieving a complete physical transformation without relying on the power of the Ten Rules. However, his actions led to deep regret his once perfect body deteriorated into a rotting corpse, leaving him in a state neither human nor ghost, cursed to exist for 100,000 years.

The seven Illusion Green damask of the major five poisons of extinction. His Seven Illusion Green Nightmares are actually wood poisons. And focus on single attack.

One controls the world for eternity, eight diamonds reflect the shadow, the mind becomes the sword. A green poison appeared, and within it, thousands of swords appeared, slashing down one after another.

Beifeng can summon countless corpse puppets from his shattered poisonous sword. Each puppet's body glows with a faint green hue.

After seeing Meng bai use his eight charm Vermillion saliva (one of the 5 major poisons) and combining it with the Rudra Mystic Water (a mutated water element), Yunxiao suggested doing the same with his thunder world and Beifeng nan's poison, because the seven Illusion Green damask of the major five poisons correlates to wood, the move isn't all powerful but it was able to spread to a very wide range, which attracted world destroying divine lightning of Shangqing Zifu. Move is called "cool and alluring spinning yo-yo".

Trivia

He once slew a Ghost King at its peak strength.

Like Meng Bai, Beifeng Nan possessed the Heaven and Earth Venomous Body, a rare divine constitution. Reaching great completion meant opening all eight gates and achieving a sanctified body. which was why he was still alive after a hundred thousand years.

Beiming Dark Palace
===================

This page is a

.

 your

 and

 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

other translations: Beiming Palace

General Information

One of the
7 major forces
 of the Tianwu continent. Located in
Northern Region
.

They have three styles which are improved and passed down each generation:

Outer Sky Three Styles, First Style - Who Else But Me

Outer Sky Three Styles, Second Style - Graceful as a Swan

Outer Sky Three Styles, Third Style - My Dao is Boundless

Plot

Li Yunxiao learns of a mysterious dark stone from outer space, which could help demons break through to the Holy Demon Realm. Determined to prevent disaster, he heads to Beiming Xuan Palace to secure the stone. However, the Beiming family is reluctant to cooperate. When negotiations fail, Li Yunxiao confronts Bei Ming Duan Jue and Mu He, overpowering them with ease.

Their last hope lies in Bei Ming Zhan Guan, an ancestor, who confronts Li Yunxiao. Despite the tension, Zhan Guan offers to negotiate, but refuses to surrender the Xuanming Stone. Li Yunxiao reveals the stone’s demonic origin, warning that its misuse could cause catastrophe.

As the discussion intensifies, a mysterious figure Zhan Guan's brother and a powerful demon cultivator emerges.

After Li Yunxiao's offer and negotiations are rejected by both Bei Ming ancestors, he confronts the Bei Ming family to seize the Heavenly Mysterious Dark Stone. In a fierce battle, Yunxiao transforms into a powerful being with three heads and six arms. He creates a golden vortex to absorb spiritual energy and unleashes the devastating "Xingxuan Explodes" move. Bei Ming Du Jian counters with his black giant sword, but Yunxiao's immense power overwhelms him. Although injured, Du Jian survives but is visibly shaken.

In Second move Yunxiao summons a massive thundercloud, forming a giant hammer that transforms into a dragon, symbolizing unstoppable power. Du Jian, refusing to yield, uses his ultimate move, "Who Else but Me," embodying the pride and strength of the Bei Ming lineage. The colossal clash destroys the entire Bei Ming Xuan Palace, leaving a massive crater. Though defeated, Du Jian survives.

Seeing his brother fall, Bei Ming Zhan Suan attempts to intervene but is blocked by the Six Dings and Six Jias formation. Taking advantage of the chaos, Mo ambushes and fatally wounds Zhan Suan. Meanwhile, Bei Ming Duan Jue tries to escape but is intercepted by Wei Qing, who captures him using the Yin-Yang Qi Bottle—a treasure capable of storing both people and objects.

Wei Qing then captures the severely injured Bei Ming ancestors and other surviving Bei Ming members, ensuring their complete defeat.

Structure

Elders

Beiming Duanjue
===============

Appearance

He was dressed in a white silk robe, and her hair was tied up with a Jade hairpin.

Personality

He is indecisive and unscrupulous in order to achieve her goals.

Plot

While Li Yunxiao was busy fighting Han Junting and other members of the Heavenly Night Palace, who had ambushed him, Duan Jue suddenly appeared and launched a sneak attack.

Using the
Green Lotus Emerald Screen
, which could block all divine senses, she successfully delivered two fatal blows to Li Yunxiao, seriously injuring him.

Power

Black Yin true Qi

Beiming Dujian
==============

Personality

Bei Ming Du Jian has a paranoid personality, he is not a bad person.

Background

Bei Ming Du Jian was once a top expert of the Beiming family, cultivating to the late Heaven Control Realm alongside his brother, Bei Ming Zhan Guan. In their pursuit of greater power and immortality, the two brothers parted ways
Beiming Zhanguan
 entered the Realm of Eternal Life, while Du Jian ventured into the cracks between worlds and eventually arrived in the Demon Realm. There, he survived for over 60,000 years, adapting to its laws and gaining immense power, transforming into a high-level Demon King.

His demonic powers fully adapted to both the Demon and Tianwu Realms. Unlike other Demon Kings who were suppressed in the Tianwu Realm, Du Jian could unleash his true power.

Plot

When he finally returned to the Tianwu Realm, he sought the Xuan Ming Stone from outer space, believing it was the key to breaking through to the Creation Realm, However, Li Yunxiao, fearing that the stone could fall into the hands of demons and lead to disaster, demanded it for safekeeping. Du Jian, however, refused, believing his strength sufficient to safeguard it. This led to a fierce conflict between them.

Big Dipper Sect
===============

The Big Dipper sect was one of the most powerful local forces in Southfire city and occupied the best Feng Shui lines. Moreover, there were traces of fire element in the spiritual energy. It was obvious that this area of the earth vein contained fire golden crystals, which were a great wealth of resources.

General Information

After
Zhang Linghua
 confirmed as a Martial Sovereign of the Nine Heavens, the Big Dipper Sect's prestige soared. The news spread rapidly, solidifying its status as the strongest force in Southfire City.

History

The Big Dipper Sect and the Sky Scorpion Sect were once part of the same powerful family, dominating the Eastern Region. Over time, internal conflicts split them into two factions. The root of the conflict was an elusive treasure hidden by the first sect master of the Northern Scorpion Sect, a powerful figure who controlled the Southern Fire Golden Crystal Mountain range. On his deathbed, he foresaw the sect's potential decline and buried all of its wealth to be discovered by future disciples when they were strong enough to protect it.

Centuries later, the Northern Scorpion Sect began to weaken. Their enemies, growing more powerful, saw this as an opportunity to destroy the sect. In a major assault, hundreds of Martial Emperor-level warriors were mobilized in an attempt to wipe out the Northern Scorpion Sect once and for all. To survive, the sect's leader at the time accessed a portion of the founder’s treasure, allowing them to repel their enemies. However, this marked the start of the sect’s decline.

Although the North Scorpion sect had declined at that time, it was still an existence that was not weaker than the seven superpowers now. Its enemies failed in the end and eventually sought refuge with another force in the Eastern Region, which is the Jiang family of the current
Crimson Crescent City
.

Over the years, the North Scorpion Sect weakened, eventually splitting into the
Big Dipper Sect
 and the
Sky Scorpion Sect
. Despite their separation, they remained dominant forces in
Southfire City
.

Later, the
Thunderwind Chamber of Commerce
 intervened in the region’s conflicts, nearly wiping out both sects. However, the two sects unexpectedly fought back, leading many to believe they had once again accessed the legendary treasure.

Structure

Sect Leader

Zhang Linghua

Lu

Yin Nian

Technique

Lightning transformation
 divine skill

Imitation Transformation Technique
 is a powerful disguise technique that allows the user to take on the appearance of another person with astonishing accuracy. When disguised, the resemblance is so precise that it becomes nearly impossible to distinguish between the impersonator and the original, making detection extremely difficult.

Bigwheel Island
===============

Bigwheel Island is the largest teleportation hub for the
Hidden Families
. serving as a crucial transit point between various secret sects and remote locations. It operates like a massive interdimensional gateway, connecting numerous hidden realms and influential factions.

Background

The island is home to thousands of teleportation arrays, allowing individuals and factions to travel across different regions, including hidden sects and isolated lands. The teleportation arrays are strictly managed and require fees based on distance, energy consumption, and special access requests. The island’s main income comes from teleportation fees, making it one of the wealthiest locations in the world.

Trivia

There were thousands of arrays scattered on the island.

Bigwheel Island is extremely busy, with hundreds of thousands of people traveling through it at any given time.The island is heavily protected by natural moat ocean experts.

Factions can rent land on the island to waive teleportation fees, but they still need to pay for other costs like energy consumption, array maintenance, construction fees, and special passageway access.

The
Mu Family
  has rented a private landing zone for three billion mid-grade primordial stones per year, ensuring priority access to teleportation arrays.

Plot

True Spirit Fire Phoenix

The True Spirited Fire Phoenix and the Blackfire Fiend clashed in a battle that shook the heavens. The phoenix’s graceful agility and True Flames met the fiend’s corrosive black gas and raw destruction, tearing the sky apart and creating endless void rifts. For seven days and nights, their struggle raged, until both were left gravely wounded.

In the end, the Blackfire Fiend could fight no longer, retreating into the Tiandang Mountains, allowing Primordial Qi to flow back. But victory came at a cost—the phoenix, fatally wounded, flew away, its life force fading.

Bloodline Opening Standard
==========================

Bloodline opening, as defined by
Wei Qing
 latest research, is a process that awakens the latent True Spirit power within children under the age of fifteen. According to his method, a special powder—made from Linya Stone and a poisonous inner elixir—is applied to specific acupoints (Qizheng, Taihu, and Shenting). If the powder darkens upon application, it indicates that the child possesses the necessary potential in their bloodline. This test qualifies them as candidates to eventually transform into Ghost Asura,

Great Elder thag spent all their time in seclusion and never made contact with anyone.

Blue Jewel Academy
==================

Blue Jewel (Jialan Academy) is the most prestigious martial institution in Tianshui, governed by its own strict rules, which even the emperor must respect. Led by
Zhong Lishan
, the strongest man in the state, the academy enforces absolute discipline any violation results in severe punishment, as seen when a powerful family was destroyed for seeking revenge on a student.

Despite its strict order, the academy encourages strength-based competition, allowing students to fight freely. It is both a proving ground and a battlefield, where only the strong can survive and rise in power.

Minor Power Chart

Minor Power Chart as a ranking list created by the academy, which was reset once a year through a competition.

Location

Maple Grove
 was one of Jialan Academy's most beautiful landscapes and a popular cultivation spot during the day. However, at night, it became a favored meeting place for secret trysts, especially in the cool, moonless season. Since most students shared dormitories with several others, Maple Grove served as a private retreat for those seeking solitude or intimacy.

Bo Long
=======

Plot

Bo Long has descended with a borrowed body and took possession of Narcissus' injured body, healing it before turning his focus to sealing the Demon Master,
Lord Pu
. Using his divine ability to borrow the power of the world, he harnessed the Lock of Realm Power and the Chains of Law, summoning 12 projections of the chains to bind Lord Pu. With the aid of 12 experts, they held the chains in place. Bo Long even channeled the power of the Heavenly Dao through the Lotus Platform, which contained a trace of the eye of heavenly Dao, usable only by its true owner. However, as he unleashed this immense force, his vitality drained rapidly, and he aged by decades in an instant.

Trivia

He cherishes his wife and daughter very much.

Bo Mu
=====

Ancestors of bo family.

History

In the past Qiu had encountered a crisis: his
Dharmakaya (true body)
 had become a liability, and he needed it to be sealed away temporarily. He turned to Bo Mu, entrusting him with this task. As a sign of gratitude and faith, Qiu Nu gifted him the
True Sun Mantra
, a profound technique imbued with the power of the dragons. a highly valuable technique that later became an inherited secret within Bo Mu’s family.

However, the tides of fate turned cruel. At some point after the sealing of Qiu Nu’s Dharmakaya,
Bo Mu was captured by the Demon Master
, enslaved through a forbidden technique, and forced to serve under demonic influence. The once-proud Sea God became a mere tool, shackled to the will of the demons.

Qiu Nu, witnessing this, was faced with a difficult choice. He could risk his own power to free Bo Mu or let fate take its course. In the end,
he chose betrayal over loyalty
. Rather than helping his former ally, He ambushed Bo Mu instead, ensuring that their past contract was rendered meaningless. The act severed the last remnants of trust between them.

Plot

Qiu Nu demands the return of his sealed body, but Bo Mu offers him an alternative swearing loyalty to
Li Yunxiao
 for 500 years. Qiu Nu refuses, calling it an insult to his status as a
Dragon
. Facing no other choice, he bargains: he will submit, but only if Yunxiao kill
Yin Yu
.

Initially refusing to submit, he is forced to reconsider when Bo Mu offers him a way out swearing loyalty to Li Yunxiao for 500 years. Qiu's pride prevents him from accepting, but as his forces are defeated and he got corner by
Pan Yi
, he desperately tries to negotiate.

However, Yunxiao refuses his surrender, ordering his execution. In the ensuing battle, Qiu is severely injured and attempts to flee. His loyal follower, Da Nu, sacrifices herself to buy him time, but Yunxiao's forces relentlessly pursue him. Overwhelmed and humiliated, Qiu realizes he has lost everything.

As chaos erupts, reinforcements from the Four Seas arrive, revealing a deeper conspiracy. With the appearance of the
Abyss Master, Nine Abyss
, the battlefield shifts once again, leaving Qiu’s fate uncertain amidst greater forces at play.

Bo Yuqing
=========

Appearance

A man in a long green robe The man’s face was cold and his facial features were exquisite, had an exquisite sword at his waist and his left hand was holding the hilt. He looked like a Jade tree in the wind.

Plot

Back then
Lu Congzi
 arrived in a hurry and informed Bo Yuqing that something had happened to their master
Yu Shengfeng
. Without hesitation, Bo Yuqing followed him and helped break through the array, unaware that he was being deceived. Yu Shengfeng had already been bewitched by the Aegirine Neon Stone, and taking advantage of the situation, Lu Congzi manipulated Bo Yuqing into joining forces with him to kill Yu Shengfeng. Fortunately, though Yu Shengfeng was severely injured, his soul managed to escape.

After obtaining the aegirine stone, Bo Yuqing sought to refine it in hopes of achieving an Extreme Yin Body. Lu Congzi then taught him the forbidden art of "Death Sacrifice." Ignorant of its true nature, Bo Yuqing failed to realize that the only way to refine the stone was to sacrifice himself—using his own death as the catalyst. As a result, he wasted ten years without making any progress. Had he not stopped practicing in time, he would have died long ago.

What Bo Yuqing never realized was that Yu Shengfeng had deliberately fallen into the trap, believing he could turn the situation in his favor. However, he never expected Lu Congzi to conceal his true strength so deeply that even he failed to detect it. At the critical moment, Yu Shengfeng miscalculated, leading to a near-fatal mistake one he almost regretted for the rest of his life. Yet, what disappointed him the most was not just his own failure, but the fact that Bo Yuqing had ultimately chosen to strike alongside Lu Congzi.

Technique

Wailing sword rain wind-evil tune, The entire space seemed to have turned into a huge black hole, with only countless white feathers floating inside, giving off an endless sense of desolation The cold sword cut through the darkness, creating countless sword shadows. It was accompanied by an unusually strong spiritual power, and white feathers flew.

The Death Sacrifice technique is the only method to refine the aegirine stone, requiring the refiner to sacrifice their own soul. Among all the past generations of demonic servants, only Grandmaster Yu Yixian had successfully cultivated this forbidden art. His mastery of Death Sacrifice became a legacy, a so-called blessing for future generations, though its true nature remained a double-edged sword—offering immense power at the cost of one's own existence.

Trivia

After he know the truth behind
Lu Congzi
 betrayal his actions were understandable.

Breathing Earth
===============

The Mutant Earth element raw material closest to the Earth Origin, formed after absorbing a certain amount of Supreme Mystical Qi. It can technically exert infinite gravity that can continuously increase over time, during
Li Yunxiao
 first use of this function after completing the Four Territories of the
World God Monument
, he was able to easily pressure
Cao Yaxing
, who was a rare genius who had reached the
Martial Sovereign Realm
 after being demonized by
Di Ye

Demonic Qi
.

According to Li Yunxiao musings, it might be a perfect source of pressure to be used in training to temper one's physique. It is said in incredibly ancient records that the
Tianwu Continent
 was created from the dilution of a large piece of Breathing Earth.

Cai Linhai
==========

Cai Linhai was the
eldest son of the wealthy Cai family from the Western Region
. Despite coming from wealth, he was a genuine martial prodigy, having
defeated many skilled fighters
 in recent years. His talent had earned him a reputation, and many considered him
one of the greatest geniuses the Western Region had seen in a thousand years
. It was even rumored that his strength surpassed
Cheng Haomiao
, the leader of the
Five Heroes of the Western Region
. However, unlike other disciplined warriors, Cai Linhai had an
inflated sense of self-importance
 and often
sought attention rather than true battle glory
.

Appearance

Cai Linhai was a
young, handsome swordsman
 with a
suave demeanor
. He dressed in
white robes
, exuding the air of a free-spirited wanderer.

Personality

He seemed to
revel in the attention of others
 and enjoyed making dramatic entrances. However, his arrogance was unmatched. He viewed himself as a
rising star
 in the Heavenly Martial Realm, destined to shake the world. His words and actions often made him seem more like a boastful showoff than a true martial experts.

Plot

Cai Linhai attended the execution event of
Dongmen Yuan
, seeking recognition rather than involvement. His arrogant display annoyed Wan Yiqian and his subordinates, with some suggesting killing him outright, though Han Junting argued against it.

Before any action was taken, a
ninth-rank demonic scorpion
 descended from a black hole, exuding immense power. The beast
targeted Cai Linhai
, who, despite his reputation, was
paralyzed with fear
. He tried to block with his sword but was easily overpowered.

As the
scorpion unleashed its Heavenstring Poison Light
, Cai Linhai
desperately attempted to escape
, creating countless afterimages. However, the scorpion’s
deadly tail strike
 pierced through them all,
impaling his heart
 with terrifying accuracy

Cang Liqun
==========

This page is a

.

 your

 and

 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme

 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Cang Liqun is a two-star Martial Lord and a high-ranking general in the Golden Lion Army that lead at least hundreds of thousands of soldiers. Cang Liqun led the
Golden Lion Army
 to
Yangpu
 under the pretense of tracking down those who had robbed the
City Lord Mansion
. However, his true intentions  to eliminate Yunxiao and his allies with the help of
Li Yi
 and his party.

Plot

Despite his overwhelming numbers, Cang Liqun found himself in trouble when Yunxiao and his allies Heaven Core launched a desperate counterattack. A terrifying
dark purple finger
 manifested, killing Yu Yuanwen, one of his strongest warriors, in an instant. This display of power shattered the morale of his army. Soon after,
Chen Dashen
 reinforcements arrived, further tilting the battle in Yunxiao’s favor. as the Golden Lion Army, already demoralized. Ji Meng, under Yunxiao’s orders, brutally beat Cang Liqun to the point of severe injury, Realizing he was at their mercy, Cang Liqun desperately pleaded for his life, even offering his loyalty in exchange for survival. However, Yunxiao coldly dismissed him, declaring that Martial Lords were insignificant in his eyes and that Cang Liqun’s fate was already sealed.

Ultimately, Yunxiao ordered his execution. Ji Meng delivered the killing blow, slitting Cang Liqun’s throat and ending his life on the battlefield.

Cang Xiong
==========

Cang Xiong, Branch Manager of the Light Song Forest's Four Extremes Sect.

Cangwu Qiong
============

Cangwu Qiong was one of the five rule
Holy Region.
 he is one of the people indirectly responsible for
Gu Feiyang
 death and Hua Qianshu learning demonic techniques.

Appearance

A simple man in a gray robe.

History

Back then, He along with
Ren Ximin,
 sought to break through the limitations of martial arts by practicing demonic techniques. Both of them believed that since the Tianwu Realm lacked complete rules, the Demon Realm, which had intact laws, could provide a way to surpass martial limits.

To achieve this, they used the Tiandang Mountains, a bridge between the two realms, as their experimental ground. However, demonic cultivation was highly dangerous, so they needed test subjects "guinea pigs" to refine their methods. One of their unfortunate victims was
Hua Qianshu
, whom they manipulated.

Hua Qianshu’s involvement eventually drew in his master,
Gu Feiyang
, unknowingly dragging him into their scheme. This not only led to the failure of their plan but also resulted in the downfall of one of the top Titled Martial Sovereigns, Gu Feiyang.

Plot

When visiting the Holy Region Yunxiao tries to take his life. Cangwu Qiong unwilling to get killed used the Universe Light Plate to commit suicide and also self-destructs the 10th grade Xuan Artifact to drag Yunxiao down with him, but ultimately couldn't even scratch him.

References

Cao Yaxing
==========

Plot

Mount Meru

Cao Yaxing was one of the individuals involved in the confrontation with
Di Jia
, a powerful cultivator who had been sealed for a long time. Cao Yaxing, along with his companions, tried to resist Di Jia's overwhelming strength, but their efforts proved futile against the black demonic power he possessed.

During the battle, Cao Yaxing and his allies utilized their most potent treasures and techniques, including Seven Rank Xuan Weapons and powerful Eight-Rank talisman, to confront Di Jia. However, Di Jia's black demonic claw effortlessly destroyed their defenses and shattered their Xuan Weapons. Their attempts to resist him were in vain.

As the battle intensified, Cao Yaxing and his companions witnessed the overwhelming power of Di Jia's demonic technique, leading to fear and desperation among them. They were unable to find a way to overcome the immense strength displayed by their adversary.

Eventually, Di Jia unleashed a devastating attack using a demonic technique, causing chaos in the inner hall of the Xumi Temple. In the ensuing chaos,
Geng Qiu
, tragically lost his life, succumbing to the deadly effects of the Black Demon Qi.

As the situation became more dire, Cao Yaxing and the others found themselves in a desperate struggle to survive.
Lu Daozi
, a powerful Martial Sovereign, descend to confront Di Jia with his divine consciousness, but even that proved to be futile against the black demonic power.

In the end, Lu Daozi creates a hole through his powerful attack, allowing them to flee from Di Jia overwhelming strength.

After Li Yunxiao escaped the disaster in Songyue Yang City, he fell into the domains surrounding the Cemetery, the territory dominated by the Blood God Palace, something that leaves Cao Yaxing frustrated, as he would imagine that he was now incomparable. After killing two Martial Supreme Elders of the Blood God Palace, Li Yunxiao goes to the Palace in search of the piece of
Breathing Earth
 that Cao Yaxing mentioned.

After a battle between the dozens of Martial Supreme Elders against Li Yunxiao, some Martial Sovereigns intrude into the battle and Li Yunxiao flees with the Palace Master Blood God Beast. Later, Cao Yaxing enters into a battle with Li Yunxiao over the Demon Flower of
Di Ye
, after being infected and demonized by Demonic Qi, reaching the Martial Sovereign Realm, and dying in battle.

Li Yunxiao
.

Chang 'an
=========

Chang 'an was leader of the ugly monster clan one of the eight monster tribes.

Appearance

He had a handsome face, On his forehead, three small round arrays were carved, and they were crossed by a horizontal line. but his body was in a demon form.

Plot

Disguising himself as
Teng Guang
, he ambushed and trap
Li Yunxiao,

Qiu Mujie
,
Luo Qingyun
,
Ning Keyun
,
Han Junting
 and other expert using the Heaven-Destroying Hundred Beasts Formation, a deadly array left behind by Li. With support from Teng Guang’s Illusory Array, it summoned a hundred peak nine-star/nine-stars Martial Emperor fierce beasts creatures that existed in a blurred state between reality and illusion, drawing power from the Great Illusionary Land.

Power

True undying body, the innate divine ability of our ugly demon clan. This power allows him to regenerate completely even after being cut in half, his severed lower body transformed into a new, complete person/Clone.

Trivia

He easliy subdued by
Beifeng Nan
 with Green Poison and half his body instantly rotted away.

Che Xuyao
=========

He is a renowned Martial Sovereign from the
Myriad Stars Valley
. In his first appearance, he and
Feng Yi
 were shasing after the Five Elements Rat Kings in the Demon Origin Plains.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

He and
Feng Yi
 corner the Water Rat King in the illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror.
Little Qing
 proposes a plan to protect the rat population and halt attacks on experts,
The Rat Emperor
 reluctantly agrees to the plan. The Water Rat King is captured by Feng Yi and Che Xuyao, who attempt to refine the Five Elements Beast Taming Ring by the Five Rat Kings. But
Yu Yangzhou
, from the
Ten Thousand Treasures Store
, arrival disrupts the refining process. Yu Yangzhou's strength astonishes them, prompting a decision to complete the Five Elements Beast Taming Ring.

In the Domain of Spring, Che Xuyao and Feng Yi also witnessed the changes in the illusion caused by
Li
, realizing that the mountain is the legendary Four Seasons Immortal Mountain, a Peak 9th Rank Profound Artifact of Lord
Throne
.

Che You
=======

He is descendant of both a True Dragon and a Monster, he lived thousands of years guarding the Heaven Soaring Divine Palace in the
Mount Meru
.

General Information

Originally
Gu Feiyang
's sword spirit. After Gu Feiyang's death, he was trapped again in the
Sumero Mountain
 Secret Realm. Later, Yunxiao discovered him there and convinced him to once again become his sword spirit, promising to refine him a body when he returns to his peak.

Appearance

Personality

Che You is confident, sharp-tongued, and a bit arrogant, always carrying a carefree attitude. He enjoys teasing others but has a strong sense of pride and refuses to be taken advantage of. Despite his blunt words, he is loyal and reliable, stepping in to help when needed. His immense talent allows him to grow rapidly in strength, making him both a formidable fighter and an unpredictable ally.

Plot

After Li Yunxiao used the Grade Nine Sword materials that served as a vessel for the Monster Dragon, he recommends using the
Soul Devourer Sect
 Spirit Fusion Technique, which establishes a connection between both and allows them to benefit from each other.

Later, Li Yunxiao acquires the
Starlight Soul Refining Technique
 and both of them begin to practice it. After winning the Alchemy Competition in
Songyue Yang City
 and reaching the Ninth Floor of the Alchemy Pagoda, Li Yunxiao obtains a
Divine Realm
 Dragon Horn, containing 3 Soul Attack
Ancient Maha Characters
.

After analyzing the Ancient Maha Characters, Li Yunxiao bestows the Horn on Che You, which helps you a lot in your Cultivation. Later, after Li Yunxiao kills
Yu
, he carries his body and crosses the Void with the
Divine Realm Tablet
, saving Li Yunxiao, as well as later saving him by implanting the Heavenly Taiyi Qi Trace, given by the
Kunwu Divine Tree
, to save Che You life after the fight with
Tian Si
.

After many opportunities and increases in strength, Li Yunxiao and Che You arrive at the Land of Rain, a place that benefits the Monster Dragon drastically, almost completely recovering his Soul Power.

Shortly after, Li Yunxiao, who had reached the
Ninth Level of Soul
, decided to create a new body for Che You with his greatest materials. In the middle of the process, he uses
Run Xiang
 blood, which affects the negative feelings of the Monster Dragon, who after hearing Li Yunxiao call him “Old Dragon” again, expresses extreme hatred.

With that, Li Yunxiao apologizes and asks what his name is, to which the Demonic Dragon replies as “Che You”. With this, Che You begins to fight with Li Yunxiao on the Divine Realm Tablet, even opening the Tablet with his new power in a body of a
Peak Nine Star Martial Sovereign Realm
.

During the battle,
Yuan Gaohan
 goes to the
Holy Region
 library and uses a Mind Clearing Spell to calm Che You, but is unable to complete the Spell before Che You escapes.

Power

the Xumi anatta/The Xumi Wuwo Sword.It was on of the divine sword of the leader of all living beings, the true dragon, A divine sword passed down from the ancient true dragon. According to the legend, in the flow of time, the Sword of the Dragon was fought over by countless strong cultivators. In the end, it was split into four and disappeared under the realm of heavenly martial arts.

The Demon-Slaying Sword Art is a powerful and devastating sword technique that harnesses immense sword force to cut down even the strongest foes. When unleashed, it manifests an overwhelming aura, forming sword talismans that shape into Mount Meru.This technique doesn’t just rely on sheer strength—it suppresses enemies by locking down space itself, making escape nearly impossible. The sword force integrates with the power of the Dragon Realm, enhancing its destructive capabilities. When fully executed, the world of swords descends, tearing through the heavens and shattering everything in its path, leaving opponents with no room to retreat.

The
God-Slaying Sword Technique
 is an ultimate sword art infused with the power of a
true dragon
, unleashing
unstoppable, divine-slaying destruction
. When executed, it summons
two True Dragon Swords
 that intertwine, radiating immense power that shakes the heavens and earth. This technique is not just a physical attack—it
instills primal fear
 in all who witness it, causing even powerful warriors to lose control of their blood and qi. The sheer force of the sword slashes
breaks seals, shatters domains
, and
destroys illusions
, proving its supremacy. When fully unleashed, the
sword energy takes the form of twin dragons
, tearing through space itself. The attack’s power distorts the sky, forming a massive vortex that absorbs all surrounding spiritual energy, making the battlefield feel otherworldly. At its peak, the
God-Slaying Sword
 can shake entire mountain ranges, causing celestial phenomena as if
ripping apart the heavens
. The wielder, infused with dragon essence, approaches a state of
true dragon transformation
, standing above all beings with overwhelming might.

Trivia

Che you body was made up of a Dragon secret treasure, a true spirit body. Even swords and blades could be blocked by it.

Chen Chuanjiu
=============

He is the leader of the
Storm Mercenary Group
 of the
Light Song Forest
 in the
Western Region
 of the
Tianwu Continent
. He considered the strongest Mercenary King, but he is lacking of the heavens and earth laws understanding.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

Chen Chuanjiu, along side with
Zheng Yunfeng
 and
Ouyang Qi
, observes
Young Emperor Hao Lian
 in the Demon Plain. Recognizing Hao Lian's deep connection with nature, Chen, and his companions plan a surprise attack. Chen initiates a powerful martial technique, but Hao Lian remains unperturbed, displaying a calm demeanor. Instead of defending himself, Hao Lian approaches a Demon Snake and retrieves a half-eaten Five-Elements Spirit Devouring Rat from its mouth, showing compassion for the creatures.

In a subsequent encounter, Young Emperor Hao Lian protects the Demon Snake and Spirit Rat from harm using a green battle armor, which shatters under Chen Chuanjiu and his companions' combined attack. Believing Hao Lian to be injured or dead, they enter a passage he opens. However, Hao Lian has hidden inside a pit, and when Chen and Zheng Yunfeng enter the passage, he surprises them by reemerging, killing Ouyang Qi, and leaving a warning.

Chen Chuanjiu and Zheng Yunfeng face attacks from a swarm of Five Elements Spirit Devouring Rats summoned by Hao Lian. After defeating the rats, they discover Hao Lian has escaped again. Tracking the thickening Spiritual Qi, they attempt to pursue him.

Meanwhile, a lavishly dressed man contemplates whether to save Young Emperor Hao Lian using a flower-petal counting method. Ultimately, he decides against it, leaving a trail of intriguing thoughts as he departs.

Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

Amidst the illusionary landscape,
Young Emperor Hao Lian
 and his pursuers, Chen Chuanjiu and
Zheng Yunfeng
, find themselves trapped and disoriented. The environment shifts between scenes of a tranquil green mountain and clear waters and a deadly ambush of flying squirrels. Despite realizing the illusion, Hao Lian is intrigued by its authenticity and presses on, while Chen Chuanjiu uses his formidable power to break through.

Young Emperor Hao Lian, while trying to comprehend the Power of Rules within a unique space, encounters
Zheng Yunfeng
, unleashes purplish-gray miasma to attack him. However, Hao Lian successfully resists the attack using his spring-themed powers and a new technique he learned, fusing the four seasons into his fist.
Chen Chuanjiu
, intervenes with a massive sword strike aimed at defeating Hao Lian and taking the Immortal Mountain for himself.

The confrontation results in a cataclysmic clash of powers that shatters the space, creates a devouring black hole, and ultimately triggers the activation of the Immortal Mountain's power ahead of schedule. As the Immortal Mountain's power activates, the entire Four Seasons Boundary, which is connected to
Xiao Qing
's body, starts to change, and the four seasons begin to rotate.

Chen Dashen
===========

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Chen Dashen
.
Please help by
contributing

 and

 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme

improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Chen Dasheng was
Li Chunyang
 sworn brother and a once-formidable warrior of
Tianshui Kingdom
. He suffered severe injuries during the
Ranking Battle
 against Baizhan State, where he replaced
Li Chunyang
 in a crucial fight. The cold poison he contracted left him bedridden for 5 years, relying on
Li Chunyang’s energy and alchemical treatments
 to survive.

History

Five years ago,
King of Tianshui
Qin Zheng
 deliberately sent him to participate in the
Ranking Battle
, intending to weaken
Li Chunyang
 influence by eliminating those close to him. Though Chen Dasheng barely survived the battle, he was ambushed upon his return to the capital. If not for
Li Chunyang’s intervention
, he would have perished that very night.

To protect him,
Li Chunyang faked his death
, using a death row prisoner as a decoy while secretly tending to his injuries in a hidden chamber within his residence. However,
Dasheng was severely wounded by Yi Xiaoshan’s ice energy
, which seeped into his body, making his condition deteriorate over the years despite continuous treatment.

Plot

Chen Dasheng had been paralyzed for five years due to extreme cold poison, with previous treatments only easing symptoms but not curing him. Yunxiao used a Mysterious Fire Pill and pure Yang energy to expel the poison completely. As a result, Chen Dasheng regained feeling in his legs and was able to stand again, bringing great joy to him and Li Chunyang.

After
Li Yunxiao
 cured
chen Dasheng
 of his illness, he was given no time to rest.
Li Chunyang
 and Yunxiao urgently sought his help to repel an enemy army that had infiltrated
Tianshui Kingdom
. Recognizing the gravity of the situation,
Chen Dasheng
 was appointed as the
Commander-in-Chief
 of the mission, leading the effort to drive out the invaders.

Chen Yunyu
==========

Personality

Chen Yunyu is impulsive and quick to anger, often acting without much thought. His naivety sometimes puts him at a disadvantage, but despite these flaws, he is fiercely loyal

Background

He once-in-ten-thousand-years genius. Unfortunately, he was so conceited that he was beaten up by someone before the battle of wind and cloud. As a result, he felt that he was too ashamed to participate in the battle of wind and cloud. Otherwise, he could have made a name for himself after many years have passed, he just broke through to peak nine-star.

, order Chen Yunyu to follow
Li Yunxiao
