Cheng Xiaolan
=============

She is a member of the Cheng Great Family and the top young talent of the family.

Plot

The Golden Crow Arena

She attends the banquet, where
Li Yunxiao
 and
Zhou Yushan
 are about to have a duel. Unlike
Wang Chen
 and
Mo Ziqian
, Cheng Xiaolan refrains from placing any bets on the duel. She is cautious in her actions and prefers not to pass judgment hastily. Cheng Xiaolan does not participate in the betting activity, but observes the events unfold, expressing her admiration for Li Yunxiao's unexpected strength. She is also among the group that mocks and shows no sympathy for Zhou Yushan's death and
Zhou Yangbiao
's punishment and demise at the end of the duel.

Cheng Yu
========

Cheng Yu, the number one disciple among the young disciples
Big Dipper Sect
.

Plot

Mei Dong'er and Cheng Yu face off in an Tournament battle, with Cheng Yu believing his raw strength can overpower any technique. Mei Dong'er, calm and composed, channels the water elements around her and counters his powerful
Dao Qing Finger
 with a graceful yet overwhelming palm technique. Just when it seems she has the upper hand, Cheng Yu consumes a
Demon Transformation Pill
, turning into a mighty
Earth Bear
, drastically increasing his power.

As he launches a devastating
Earth Bear Fist
, Mei Dong'er appears exhausted and unable to continue. Just as defeat seems inevitable,
Li Yunxiao
 suddenly intervenes, effortlessly blocking Cheng Yu’s attack with his mysterious
Demonic Sky Armor
. His unexpected appearance shocks the audience, including powerful elders and rival sect members.

Undeterred, Cheng Yu refuses to accept defeat and strikes with all his might. However, Yunxiao counters with a simple but terrifyingly powerful punch, shattering Cheng Yu’s arm and breaking his demonic transformation. The overwhelming force of Yunxiao's attack sends Cheng Yu flying into the valley below, his meridians shattered, leaving his cultivation permanently damaged.{{r}543}}

Chu Lang
========

Plot

when he struck Li Yunxiao, he awakened something far worse—Demon Lord Pu. Furious at being wounded, Demon Lord Pu shattered Kun Lang’s sword with a single glare. Dark runes surged, trapping Kun Lang in an instant. Before he could react, his body and soul were obliterated, erased without a trace.

Power

Kun Lang, a legendary master of the Soul Devouring Sect, wielded the Soul Flow Sword, a technique that turned his very soul into a lethal weapon. Unlike physical blades, this sword bypassed all defenses, striking directly at an opponent’s soul. Having spent centuries absorbing countless spirits, Kun Lang’s blade was nearly unstoppable—capable of instantly killing even ninth-tier Great Art masters.

When Li Yunxiao faced him, he quickly realized that physical attacks were useless against the intangible weapon. Kun Lang mocked his resistance, warning that his blade did not just cut—it erased existence itself. Even Huangfu Bi admitted that Battle Soul Mountain, a graveyard of heroes, was the perfect place for Li Yunxiao to perish.

Chu Mei
=======

Appearance

A girl in a pink chiffon Palace dress appeared. She looked somewhat similar to Na Lei.

Chu Yu
======

Plot

Qionghua Island

He was having a conversation with
Xin Pi
 and
Huo Sen
 in a temporary building by Mingxin Lake. They discussed the rumor of a young genius named
Li Yunxiao
, who supposedly killed a Martial Grandmaster at the age of 15. Chu Yu expressed doubts about the rumor, but Xin Pi revealed that Li Yunxiao did fight a Martial Grandmaster expert and exchange one blow.

When Li Yunxiao arrived with the Tiger King Chariot, Chu Yu's guards tried to stop him, leading to a confrontation. Li Yunxiao displayed his strength and even caused the Tiger King Chariot to explode, leading to tensions between Chu Yu and Li Yunxiao. Chu Yu and Xin Pi also exchanged hostile words, with Chu Yu showing anger towards Li Yunxiao's disrespect.

Chu Yu was secretly approached by the Zhou Family from the
Fire Crow Empire
, who offered a large bargaining chip to have Li Yunxiao killed during the competition. Chu Yu considered adding a mysterious disciple named
Luo Qingyun
 to participate in the competition, believing that Luo Qingyun will defeat Li Yunxiao. However, he also sensed the dangerous situation that might arise due to his decision.

Chu Zhiming
===========

Chu Zhiming, The sect leader of the northern scorpion sect.

Ci
==

Ci aka Demon temple was the high priest of the demon race a transcendent Sage expert and the leader of the nine-lives clan, the strongest clan of the nine-headed demon clan.

Plot

Five Cloud Mountain

High Priest Ci and Li appeared at Five Cloud Mountain to stop Huang and Ai, advising against breaking the seal. They warned that releasing the monsters before the monster race was united would lead to greater chaos. However, due to their differing views, Huang attempted to eliminate them. As Huang attacked, Ci and Li tried to retreat.  Although they managed to escape, Ci's true energy was damaged by Huang's countless Silver Snakes attack.

In the all out war between monsters and humans, the arrival of human reinforcements turned the tide of the battle in human favor. Shang and Mo suggested a strategic retreat, but Huang saw this as betrayal. Revealing his breakthrough to the Void Extreme Divine Realm, Huang confronted Shang but was stopped by Ci. After giving Ci a final chance to side with him only to be refused once again, Huang executed Ci without mercy.

Technique

Spiritual Light Reversal is a technique that summons a long snake with silver-brown ghost patterns capable of causing dizziness at first glance. These Ghost-Patterned Silver Dragons were cultivated over decades by Ai, who feared that
Yu Shengfeng
 soul possession technique would threaten the Demon Race. Devoting half her life, she created this divine ability to restrain him, designed to bite souls and exploit the weaknesses of the Six Obstacles Removal Art—making it the perfect counter to Yu Shengfeng’s technique. If the
Ghost King
 hadn't fought with the eight
Ghost Asura
 and killed all the ghost snakes and silver dragons with his terrifying power, Yu Shengfeng would have been killed. (Novel Ch 1470)

Trivia

As the high priest of the monster race, his biggest wish in life was to lead the monster race to prosperity. Shang’s appearance had undoubtedly brought him a ray of light.

Conferred Martial Sovereigns
============================

SPOILER ALERT!

The
Heavenly Martial World
 once held a
Martial Arts Conference
, where the
Ten Strongest Martial Artists
 were given titles. They are called the
Top Ten Martial Sovereigns
, representing the pinnacle of martial power in
The Heavenly Martial World
. The one recognized as the strongest among them is the
Tyrant Heaven Martial Sovereign
.

Ranking of Titled Martial Sovereigns

Tyrant Heaven
 (霸天) —⁣
Ao Changkong

Void
 (虚空) —⁣
Zhuo Qingfan

Vanquisher
 (破军) —⁣
Gu Feiyang

Night Shadow
 (夜影) —⁣
Ling Baiyi

Heavenly Zither
 (天琴) —⁣
Li Huachi

Throne
 (王座) —
Teng Guang

Divine Control
 (神控) —
Yao Jinliang

Red Lotus
 (红莲) —
Liu Feiyan

Heavenly Evolution
 (天衍) —
Duanmu Yuyu

Silver Moon
 (银月) —
Xuan Hua

In-depth Information

The
Ten Martial Sovereigns
 didn't only represent the peak of the
Heavenly Martial World
, but their name was also like a shining star, majestic and intimidating. The so-called
Titled Martial Sovereigns
 were only ranked on the
Heaven and Earth Wind and Cloud List
 of the
Holy Region
. There are still many experts who didn't participate in this competition.

For example, the Leaders of the
Seven Superpowers
. Everyone of them has the cultivation of
Divine Transcendence
 - making them possible prospects to become a
Titled Martial Sovereign
. To not lose their reputation or cause an imbalance between the
Seven Superpowers
, which keep each other in check, they decided not to participate.

In addition to the
Titled Martial Sovereigns
 and the
Seven Superpowers
, there are many other peerless experts. The
Bo Imperial Family
 and the
Four Royal Families
 of the
Four Seas
, the
Tyrannic Monsters
 of the
Illusory Realm of Stars and Moons
, the
Three Great Saints
 and the
Five Rulers
 of the
Holy Region
, the
Overlords
 of some
Forbidden Lands
. As well as Leaders of some
Hidden Families and Sects
, they all possess the peak strength of the
Heavenly Martial World
.

Trivia

The Masters of the Seven Major Sects have the cultivation of
Divine Transcendence
.

Some of the people in the top 20 were only
Nine-Star Martial Sovereigns
.

It has been almost thirty years since the
Martial Arts Conference
 being held by
Holy Region
.

Constellation Old Monster
=========================

SPOILER ALERT!

He is the Sect Master of the
Star Mansion Sect
 from the
Eastern Region
. As a Nine Heavens Martial Sovereign and a 500 years old cultivator, he is considered a well known existence in the Eastern Region and the entire
Tianwu Continent
.

Background

He has a peculiar fondness for girls around the age of
thirteen
 or
fourteen
. The Star Constellation Sect even specially built a palace to raise these girls for that old eccentric's "enjoyment."

The girls who are liked by him are kept as servants after deflowering them, while those that are not, are personally killed by him.

During the major power chart ranking, the old monster refused to participate because of the lacking of his skills.

Plot

Martial Flame City Crisis

After the fall of the Mount Meru, rummors accusing
Li Yunxiao
 as the culprit behind the destruction of Star Constellation Sect's Heavenscent Empire branch began to appear across the continent.

Taking advantage of such rummors, the Old Monster denounced that Li Yunxiao was the culprit behind the destruction of the sect’s branch and had even stolen the Star Mansion battleship. Personally travelled to Yanwu City to seek revenge.

Everything as a ruse to get control over the newly enriched land of the city.

He demanded that Li Yunxiao revealed himself. But nobody showed in front of him. Because of it, the Old Monster threatened to kill everyone in the city.

Li Yunxiao responded arrogantly from the City Lord's Mansion, insulting and challenging the Old Monster.

Infuriated, the Old Monster unleashed a powerful attack, which Li Yunxiao valiantly attempted to defend against using a series of powerful defensive arrays, Xuan artifacts and techniques.

Despite Li Yunxiao's efforts, the attacks's overwhelming power proved too much for him, and he was ultimately knocked into the ground, leaving the city in awe of the Old Monster's might. However, Li Yunxiao's resilience proved to be greater than the old monsters attack and resisted it.

After being shocked by Li Yunxiao's survival and his display of techniques to withstand the Martial Sovereign's punch, Constellation Old Monster, enraged by the mockery of Yunxiao, was about to strike again when
Li Huachi
, also known as Heavenly Zither Martial Sovereign, appeared on the scene.

Constellation Old Monster was taken aback and retreated in fear. Li Huachi instilled a sense of protection over Yanwu City, surprising everyone who thought he had come to seize the city.

Li Huachi explained that he owed someone a favor and had come to repay it by protecting Yanwu City. This revelation left everyone shocked, wondering about the significance of Yanwu City that could invite a Titled Martial Sovereign's protection.

Constellation Old Monster found himself in a difficult situation with the presence of Li Huachi, but also felt embarrassed and tried to save face by boasting about his improved Stormy Waves Technique. However, his arrogance only led to Li Yunxiao to mock him again, causing Old Monster to become further enraged.

With indifference for his attitude, Li Huachi promised the old monster that if he could resist a single attack from him, he would no longer  meddle in his affairs. The old monster, convinced in the ease of the task, accepted.

He unleashed his Raging Waves Technique to attack Li Huachi. In response, Li Huachi used his zither to play the Divine Charm, a segment of an ancient divine music, and created a sound wave that effortlessly neutralized the attack and took the old monster's life.

Corpse Fiend Sect
=================

The Corpse Fiend Sect is one of the
Hidden Families,
 a secretive and formidable faction that specializes in corpse refinement and control. According to the Sea Race, the sect's base is located within this vast sea region, carried by a massive undead turtle known as the
Immovable Forest
. This ancient creature, once buried in the deep sea, was refined into a colossal floating island by the sect's necromantic arts.

The sect's cultivation techniques bear some resemblance to Qiu Mujie's corpse-controlling methods, but they are far more refined and advanced. The
Immovable Forest
 can submerge deep underwater, remain hidden beneath the ocean floor, or rise to the surface like a drifting landmass, making the sect's stronghold nearly impossible to track. This ability to evade detection has allowed the Corpse Fiend Sect to operate in secrecy, perfecting their dark arts without interference from the outside world.

Background

The Corpse Fiend Sect was an immensely powerful and enigmatic force, one that had long maintained a strained relationship with the
Mu Family
. Like many of the hidden aristocratic families, the sect operated independently, rarely forming alliances with others. However, in recent times, various hidden sects had begun visiting one another, forging unexpected connections.

At the heart of the sect’s floating stronghold lay
Jing Qi’s Palace
, a grim and foreboding structure dominated by a massive stone coffin. As masters of corpse refinement, the sect had transformed the island into a macabre workshop, littered with the dried remains of sea beasts and an array of stone and jade coffins. The air was thick with corpse fiend energy, an oppressive aura that would cause great discomfort—if not outright horror—to ordinary individuals.

Structure

Sect Leader

Jing Qi

Vice sect Leader

Jiu Guang

Others

Diao Wu

Crazy and Cool Spinning Yo-Yo for Eternity
==========================================

Yunxiao and Bei Fengnan combined their powers by merging the Thunder Realm with the Seven Illusions Green Nightmare. Yunxiao named this devastating technique the "Crazy and Cool Spinning Yo-Yo for Eternity."

Their combined attack created a vast world of thunder and poison, spreading across the endless sky. Wherever the green light passed, everything withered, and the world lost its color and sound. Those caught within the Thunder Realm were stunned and gradually turned to dust without resistance.

This powerful move reversed the tide of battle, securing the human race's fortune for thousands of years. The technique became legendary, known as one of the most terrifying large-scale attacks in history. In a single strike, four thousand elite demons were reduced to ashes, with half of them killed or severely injured.

Creation Link Formation
=======================

Description

A Formation That can Directly absorb soul Qi from Worldly treasures and convert it into our true Qi. It is an ancient Formation It was forgotten due to rarity of Worldly Treasures.

Known Users

Li Yunxiao

Crimson Crescent City
=====================

General Information

One of the
7 major forces
. Located in Eastern Region.

History

Ever since
Li Yunxiao
 caused chaos in Red Moon City, the once-powerful Ruan family, once one of the city's three major families, has been steadily declining. They can no longer compare to the dominant Ning and Jiang families. Although Red Moon City remains one of the seven major forces in the Eastern Region, it now occupies one of the weakest positions. The city is home to many complex factions, with the Ning and Jiang families holding the most power. Decades ago, the Ruan family was a major force, but after most of their masters were killed by Gu Feiyang, their influence diminished, and they lost the prestige they once held.

later After experiencing the fall of Jiang Churan, the invasion of Tang Qing, the continuous internal strife, the external resistance against the sea tribe, and a series of major events that hurt the bones, the Redmoon city had long fallen to the bottom of the seven major forces, and even not on the same level.

Plot

The grand wedding in Red Moon City, meant to unite the Tang and Jiang families, turned into a battlefield the moment Li Yunxiao appeared. Chaos erupted as countless forces clashed for their own interests, turning the city into a scene of devastation.

Top experts from across the realm gathered—peak nine-star powerhouses, divine transcendence experts, sect masters, titled martial sovereigns, leaders of the Holy Lands, the terrifying Ghost King, the unknown Demonic Lord, and even the Sea Emperor, who had arrived in a borrowed body. Yet, in this blood-soaked battleground, once-mighty figures were reduced to mere pawns. Even Saint weapons, unseen for tens of thousands of years, became as common as street goods.

Amid the chaos, Tang Qing and his son perished, leading to the complete collapse of the Tang family’s influence. When the dust settled, Red Moon City fell under the control of the Sanctum, with Luo Qingyun appointed as City Lord and Li Yi as Vice City Lord.

Structure

(former)

Trivia

After what happened in the red moon City.
Li Yunxiao
 been listed as the most wanted person. Next are Ye Fan and che you.

other translations: Red Moon City

General Information

Its attacks are very powerful, especially when it temporarily borrows the powers of the phoenix flame. It's almost impossible to defeat, since its body is made up of wind and can be rebuilt every time.

History

Originally the Guardian of the Ancient Pagoda, where the fragment
Di Jun
 of the Demon Emperor was sealed. It's an artificial true spirit formed by the immemorial astral wind. Later subdued by Di Jun and used to fight his enemies. It got split in half during Di Jun's fight against
Ding Shan
.
Li Yunxiao
 obtained one half of the crocodile and used it to fight his enemies.

Cui Bo
======

Appearance

A man in a black brocade robe with an ancient fragrance.

Background

Cui Bo, the vice leader of the Ten Thousand Treasures Store, he led the Merchant Union Young Talents Martial Arts and Alchemy Competition. Cui Bo was also responsible for putting the
Blade Sect
 expert under control, imposing Merchant Union dominance.

Divine Transcendence Realm

Peak of Perfection Realm

Void Prime Realm

Divine Transcendence, Peak of Perfection, Void Prime Realms

Due to the
absence of Rank 10

Laws,
 one cannot reach the Divine Realm in the Heavenly Martial Realm. Which means their Primordial Qi can't be transformed into Spirit Qi and their Dantian won't be transformed either. Hence, after surpassing the Peak 9 Star Martial Sovereign, one reaches "Pseudo-Realms".

The first one after surpassing 9 Star Martial Sovereign is the Divine Transcendence Realm.

After enough accumulation in the Divine Transcendence Realm, one reaches the “Peak of Perfection” Realm. Very few people managed to even surpass that Realm and reach the “Void Prime Realm”.

Later when the Rank 10 Rules return those Realms are no longer relevant, because as long as one is able to comprehend the 10th rank rules, they can convert their Primordial Qi to Spirit Qi as well as change their Dantian to become a true Divine Realm Expert.

Still, they have the same strength as the first Three Minor Realms of the Ten Directions Realm, but the Dantian of a True Divine Realm Expert is more than ten times larger and they use Spirit Qi instead of Primordial Qi, which is superior to the former.

Divine Transcendence Realm = Return to Truth Realm

Peak of Perfection Realm = Heavenly Mastery Realm

Void Prime Realm = Void Extreme Realm

Due to the fact that “
Demi-Martial Gods
” cannot utilize
Spiritual Qi
, their strength is drastically lower, Only a
Peak of Perfection
 expert can go head-to-head with a
Martial God
 at the
Return to Truth Realm
.

Eternal Supreme
(万古至尊)

A pinnacle cultivation in the Universe (the Heavenly Martial Realm and Demon Realm in which the story takes place are just minor worlds). Unknown number of Realms between 'Lord of Thousand Worlds Realm' and 'Eternal Supreme'.

Divisions in Realms and Stars

Progress in Martial
Realms

1 – 3 Stars = Low-Rank

4 – 6 Stars = Mid-Rank

7 – 9 Stars = High-Rank

Example: Mid-Rank Martial Supreme. (Can be anything from 4 to 6 Stars)

Progress in
Stars

Early

Mid

Peak

Relevant in
Nine Heavens

Martial Sovereign
 Realm, For Example: Mid-Stage Nine-Star Martial Sovereign. It's the accumulation of the stage, after reaching the peak one can prepare to break through to the next star or Realm, given they have the needed understanding.

Nine-Star Martial Sovereign

Li Yunxiao
 makes three breakthroughs as a Nine-Star Martial Sovereigns. Namely, his
promotion to Nine-Star
, breaking through
Mid-Stage Nine-Star
 and finally breaking through
Peak Nine-Star
.

Pinnacle of Martial Dao

After reaching the Peak of the
Nine Stars Peak Stage
 of the
Nine Heavens Martial Sovereign Realm
, it is possible to see the
Pinnacle of Martial Dao
, understanding the principles of “Man”, it is possible to understand the essence of the Dao that all
Martial Artists
 follow. The
Martial Dao
 is controlled by the
Heavenly Dao
, just as
Man
 is controlled by the
Heavens
, therefore they are linked.

Upon reaching the
Peak of Martial Dao
, it is possible to become one with the Dao that dwells within the
Martial Heart
, thereby following the footsteps of the
Heavenly Dao
 and entering into synchrony with
Heaven
. It is a huge step that raises the strength of
Martial Dao
 experts to their peak.

Realm Break

Upon reaching the
Pinnacle of Martial Dao
, it is possible to break and pierce through a World, as long as it is not stronger than the user's abilities.

Realm Well

After reaching the
Thousand World Lord Realm
, it is possible to cause an open wound in a World that has developed its own
Heavenly Dao
, and bears the
Laws of Ten Directions
.

This
Well of the Realm
 is a passage to the
Chaotic Cosmos
 and the
Land of Reincarnation
, being such a dangerous place that even
Martial Gods
 at the
Creation Realm
 tend to be afraid of it.

Cultivation Abilities

Qi Cultivation

Martial Warrior

Upon reaching this Realm, Cultivators can embark on the mystical journey of the Dao, comprehending the Origin of the forces of Heaven and Earth and developing their Qi.

Martial Master

Great Martial Master

Martial Lord

Understanding of phenomena of the Four Quadrants (Four Seasons)

Martial King

Understanding of five elements.

Upon reaching this Realm, cultivators can't be drunk (there are exceptions).

Martial Grandmaster

Upon reaching this Realm, cultivators can fly.

Martial Emperor

Can hide in the Void.

Martial Supreme

Domain can suppress everyone below the
Eight Desolates Realm
.

There are rare variations of
Domain
 capable of interacting much more deeply with the Dao and the World, are called
Mutant Domains
.

Invocation of Laws
: After reaching the
Eight Desolates Supreme Martial Realm
 or higher
Cultivation Realms
, it is possible to invoke the Laws of Heaven and Earth to rebuild the physical body or help consolidate the understanding of Heaven and Earth. This tends to always occur when an individual reaches the Pinnacle of Martial Dao and comes into sync with Heaven and Earth.

Martial Sovereign

Sovereign Qi
 can suppress everyone below the
Nine Heavens Realm
, control of
Law Force
 and can tear Space.

Martial God

Spiritual Qi
 holds a natural suppressive force over all things related to the
Martial Dao
, because it is produced by a higher Dao. Spiritual Qi, as a form of sentient energy, can recover on its own and confront the corrosive nature of Demonic Qi.

World King

It can control the Rules of the World as it contains ultimate understanding of the
Laws of Heaven and Earth
 of a World.

Lord of a Thousand Worlds

Disconnects from the reins of a
World's Heavenly Dao
 and can wander through the derived
Universe
.

Soul Cultivation

Apprentice Alchemist

1th tier Alchemist

2th tier Alchemist

3th tier Alchemist

4th tier Alchemist

They can shape the Void and create sub-spaces. Example: Space Ring, used to store items.

5th tier alchemist

Can use techniques to manipulate the strength of the heavens and use lightning.

6th tier Alchemist

7th tier Alchemist

8th tier Alchemist

They can bend, seal or pull Space.

9th tier Alchemist

Can refine Sovereign Qi and assimilate the Laws of Heaven and Earth into equipment and artifacts.

10th tier Alchemy God

Can completely conceal his presence in front of everyone below the 10th tier.

Physical Cultivation

Benefits of a Physical Body

Upon reaching the Virtual Light, the body is immortal and doesn't die of old age like the bodies of Qi Cultivators. But, due to the Five Decays of Heaven and Earth, they still have a limited lifespan.

Extremely high self-regenerative powers. Even with heavy injuries, they heal in a very short period of time.

Dao Fruit
=========

Eating a Dao fruit allows the cultivator to comprehend the Dao Intent according to the grade of the fruit and greatly enhances their Yuan Qi. Dao Fruits exist from the 1st to 9th grade, with 1st grade containing First Origin Realm Dao Intent and 9th grade the Martial Sovereign Dao Intent. They are primarily used for the comprehension of the Martial Dao and rarely to enhance a cultivators Yuan Qi.

i.e.

Seven Constellation Dao Fruit allows comprehension of the Martial Emperors Dao Laws, which means after consuming it they only need to increase their Yuan Qi to reach the peak of Martial Emperor Realm and no longer need to worry about the comprehension of the Dao.

Dark Division
=============

Trivia

The only ones who could mobilize the Dark Division to take action were the five rulers of the Holy Land.

The Dark Division never acts on its own initiative. It must be an order from above and do things that the sanctuary can't do in public.

Dark Thunder
============

This page is a
Stub
.

Dark Thunder
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Plot

In the DuskFlame Empire, the Dark Thunder beast that was originally tamed by
Xu-Hongping
 was now Li-Yunxio 'pet'. Oringally Xu-Hongping and Dark thunder was ordered to stop and kill whoever that had passed the Soaring Phoenix town. Which was infested with dangerous bugs.

Li Yunxiao was accompanied by Ji-Meng, and ordered
Ji-Meng
 to keep
Xu-Hongping
 busy while he tames the Dark Thunder Beast.

While Ji-Meng was keeping Xu-Hongping at bay, Li Yunxaio took his time and played a calming-sweet tune to capture the beast. But the Thunder Beast was full of disgust but not knowing
Li-Yunxiao
, his eye technique,  was able to scare the Thunder Beast into submission. After that he was treated as if it was a dog gladly loving the pets given. So Thunder Beast happily made it's mind, seeing Li Yunxiao as it's owner.

Power

All demon beasts were savage and had mighty physical strength. Relying on the bloodthirsty power and mighty flesh, demon beasts were much stronger than human beings of the same level. But, their only weakness was that their divine sense was extremely weak, and they did not have intelligence.

Demon Emperor
=============

SPOILER ALERT!

The ultimate cultivator and ruler of the
Demon Realm
. In ancient times, he launched a full offensive against the whole
Heavenly Martial Realm
 while leading his armies. After passing  a long period of time within the Martial Realm, the Demon Emperor got influenced by the energies of the Realm, forcing his body and personality to split, giving birth to
Lord Pu
. Later on the emperor was defeated and split into
several parts
 by
Ancient Almighty Experts
, which were sealed in various places on the Heavenly Martial Continent and other secret locations.

Those parts can be divided into
5
 portions of
Devil Essence
,
5
 pieces
Neon Rainbow Stone
. The stones split into Yin and Yang parts, which resulted in
5 Neon Stones
 (Yin Parts) and
5 Rainbow Stones
 (Yang Part).
Lord Pu
 was not split up, but completely sealed in the Southern Region, depleting its spiritual energy in the process and taking the 10th rank rules of the entire Heavenly Martial Realm away.

Background

A
Demon Emperor
 is a supreme existence in the
Devil World
, far above ordinary
Devil Lords
. The title is not merely a rank but a recognition of absolute authority and power. To become a
one
, one must not only reach the
World King Realm
 but also refine a
Six Paths Devil Weapon. 100.000 thousand years ago even with four world Kings,  if the Demon Emperor hadn't suddenly split into two, the outcome of the battle would still be unknown.

Devil Essence fragments

The five fragments turned into five individuals with their own personalities:

Di Jia
 - Sealed in
Mount Meru

Di Jun
 - Sealed in
Outer Space

Di Ye
 - Sealed in
Burial Grounds

Unnamed East Sea
 - Sealed in the
East Sea Palace

Di Ga
 - Sealed within a secret realm of the
Holy Land

Demon Emperors Body

Dual Polarity Divine Body/ Divine Body of Two Extremes (supreme physique). Complete body was able to produce the Ice Fiend Heart Flame (also known as Void flame, heart demon flame, sighing flame) which is a divine flame that can burn all things. The 5 original pieces of his body split into extreme yin (aegirine) and extreme yang (rainbow stone) respectively.

Extreme Yang Divine Body

Special natural body constitution of pure Yang energy. A person is capable of artificially getting this body constitution by successfully refining a
Rainbow stone
.

Gu Qingqing
 from
Heavenly Night Palace
, who possessed the
Nine Yang Divine Body,
 was the first person capable of successfully refining a rainbow stone and gain the Extreme Yang Divine Body.

Extreme Yin Divine Body

Special natural body constitution of pure Yin energy. A person is capable of artificially getting this body constitution by successfully refining an
Neon Stone
.

Yu Yixian
 was the first person capable of successfully refining a Neon Stone and gain the Extreme Yin Divine Body at the expense of his life.
Later it's revealed that he only partially refined it, leaving behind his soul in the stone to wait for a sacrifice to complete the refinement.
Yu Shengfeng
, his successor, possessed Yu Yixian's body with the intention of getting an Exreme Yin Divine Body.

Conscious Body

After exposing a Rainbow Stone to massive amounts of Yin Energy, combined with its natural properties of Yang Energy, the stone gained its own conscience, giving birth to:
Xiao Hong

Trivia

the Demon Lord, only one can be born in a world. Because that is the choice of the six demon soldiers, just like the choice of the master of the world monument, there can only be one master.
References

Demon Realm
===========

General Information

The Demon Realm is adjacent to the
Heavenly Martial Realm
. On several places those two Realms are colliding and slowly merging, which are: Tiandang Mountains (where Gu Feiyang died), at the border of the Sea of Soul Formation.

One of the native objects to the Demon Realm are the
Neon Rainbow Stones
, untainted and unrefined they are called Origin Stones.

The inhabitants of the Demon Realm are called Demons or Devils. When those Demon creatures get injured they decompose into lower level demon creatures, until they turn into demon qi at one point. Which is also the reason why it's so difficult to kill them.

For example a Demon Lord turns into a Ten Direction Evil Spirit, when killed. If further cut down it turns into an Evil Spirt, which after getting cut down again finally turns into pure Demon Qi.

Demons

Demons
 are formed either by yin-yang intertwining or when pure Demon Qi concentrated in a place.  At the start, there are a total of 8
Demon Sovereigns
 discovered in the current Demon Realm all located in the
Central Continent
 Followed by 2
nd
 Tier Demon Lord, 1
st
 Tier Demon Lord, Half-Step Demon Lord, Ten Direction Evil Spirit, Evil Spirit along with many different Demon monsters.

Demon Supremes

Man

Yan

Gong

Yuan

Lan

Hou

Ji

Zheng

Demon Lords

Xing
 (2nd Tier Demon Lord)

Yue
 (2nd Tier Demon Lord & Tier 9 Alchemist)

Mi (2nd Tier Demon Lord)

Yi (2nd Tier Demon Lord)

Shi (2nd Tier Demon Lord)

Dan (2nd Tier Demon Lord)

Cong (2nd Tier Demon Lord)

Zai (1st Tier Demon Lord)

Zhu (Holy Demon Envoy)

Domain

There are 3 domains/Regions in the demon realm.

Central Continent

Mostly divided into 8 territories each are ruled and controlled by 8 Demon Sovereigns. There are many unexplored regions, Although they exist more, they are not located in this Central Continent, either they are not known or they are hidden. Among the 3 domains Central Continent is consider safest and most well-regulated land.

The Central Continent is multiple times larger than the Tianwu Continent(For example In order to participate in the Material Exchange of the Zheng tribe the seven demon lords from the Northwest tribe had to travel for almost 2 years).

But because of the lack of alchemist only the main cities of each territories have Super scale Teleportation Formation. Other Large Cities only have Medium size Teleportation Formation.

Ancient Desolate Vicious Domain

The vast space outside of the Central Continent, Because there is no rules to speak of in this region. It was a land where the strong devours the weak. However there are 17 or more powerful aristocratic families or hidden families that dominates the region. The strongest among the Demon Commanders of the Sacred Families are the Eight Ancestors, all of them possess the strength of a Peak Demon Commander, the strongest among them are Bai Shu and He, who have shown signs of ascending to the Holy Demon Realm.

Yuan County

Yuan County is a territory inferior to the Eight Central Regions, they have three major factions under their command, three families led by Peak Second Grade Demon Lords. Famous for its Transforming Qilin Demon Bones, the Buddha Corridor is a mysterious place that emerged countless years ago, he is the source of the Transforming Qilin Demon Bones, a place filled with dangers, It is said that the chance of death when entering the central location of the Buddha Corridor is extremely high even for experts, but by purchasing a Buddha Map, one can Yuan County is located in the Ice Region, which has two Demon Commanders ruling over it. safely enter the central location. Yuan County is located between the Eight Central Regions and the Archaeus Region.

Archaeus Region

The source of the attacks on the Heavenly Martial Realm is a mysterious force that has appeared out of nowhere in the Demon Realm. Even many Demon Commanders only vaguely knew this place, Only the 8 demon Sovereigns visited the Archaeus Region. Any demon lord that came from Archaeus Region are called Holy Envoy, with Holy Demons at its command, they have control over all Eight Regions.

Environment and Inhabitants

Just like the Heavenly Martial Realm, the Demon Realm has many different inhabitants and special environments.

Yin-Yang Intertwining

Yin and Yang are present in all things and beings in the Universe, therefore, Demons are no exception and have genders, Woman and Man. After a Man and a Woman with Demonic Qi present in their body copulate, the Yin and Yang will intertwine and evolve, potentially forming a life form like a child.
These Demons that arise through sex are normally weaker than common Demons, but they have common intelligence and do not need to consume other Demons to evolve their intellect. They are very common among all Tribes.

Demonic Fog Light

Appears in many places in the Demon Realm. Suppresses the six senses, can be broken with the power of the five elements.

Mammoth Wizdom Lizard

A monster from the Demon Realm. It's strength is equal to a 2nd Tier Demon Lord.

Head Abalone

A flying monster.

Nether Nine Abalone

It has weak attack, high defense and flying speed. Usually used by demons as an aircraft. It's a Minor Demon.
Minor Demons are a special life form, which are produced after the demon qi of a deceased demon attaches itself to a physical body. Most of them don't have intelligence except a few cases.

World Devouring Demon

An incredibly rare creature in the Demon Realm, it has six degrees of evolution, equivalent to the Realms of the Demon Realm. World-Devouring Demons are considerably superior to Demons in power, for example, if a Demon who has just reached the Demon Commander state has the strength of an expert in the Middle Stage Good Fortune Realm, then a World Devouring Demon who has just reached the Fifth Grade will have the strength of a Peak Stage Good Fortune expert.
These Demons were named this way because they have the incomprehensible ability to devour World Power, are incredibly great tonics for Demonic Cultivators, and can strengthen the bond of any individual who absorbs them with the Heavenly Dao and the Heaven and Earth elements of the Demon Realm, lessening the suppression of the Realm's Power in outside beings, and bringing their existences closer to the superior quality of demonic beings.

Holy Magic Stone

Also called “Boundary Crystal”. It's equivalent to the Heavenly Martial Realms Dragon Crystal. After a Holy Demon dies, its body slowly crystallizes over billions of years which turns into the Holy Individuals of the Heavenly Martial Realm who are infected by Demonic Qi and suffer Qi Deviation adapt a more aggressive consciousness, This can happen either through Demonic Qi or through the assimilation of Neon Stones. An individual's Cultivation tends to increase after demonization due to the superior nature of Demonic Qi.

Jade Demon Pearl

This priceless Pearl  is born after the death of a Holy Demon by the effects of the Five Decrepit Phenomena, that is, it requires the Holy Demon to survive for at least tens or hundreds of thousands of years. A Sovereign Demon's Body is formed by the Rainbow Stone, so is a Holy Demon, but the Demon Jade Pearl is like a Mutant Rainbow Stone.
This object is similar to the Outerworld Dark Stone, but has a different hue.

Sacred Ice Jade

The Yuan County Region has an unknown material that has spread throughout the elements of Buddha Corridor, called Sacred Ice Jade, an individual who has absorbed traces of Demonic Qi in Buddha Corridor, absorbs this Yin Qi and after dying, will develop a Transforming Qilin Demon Bone, a Bone that contains remnants of the deceased individual Understanding of the Rules and Demonic Qi.

Demonization

Individuals infected by Demonic Qi or Neon Stones who have suffered Qi deviations are demonized, adopting a more aggressive consciousness. Cultivation tends to increase due to Demonic Qi infection, as the nature of the Demonic Realm is superior to the Heavenly Martial Realm. Individuals who can find a correct and suitable path for their minds can escape the erosion of thoughts by Demonic Qi, even if only partially, and manage to remain with their mindsets.

Primordial Era

Ancient times where varied and possibly physical species inhabited the Demon Realm. Demonic Apes are an extinct species that dominated the Demon Realm for millions of years, It is said that when they reach adulthood they can enter the Demon Sovereign Realm without interruption, therefore, they ran wild as the rulers of the World.

Ancient Demon Realm

After a World collapses, a World Emblem is formed, it can be used to condense the space of a Saint Artifact into a true World under the control of the creator, This occurred millions or billions of years ago in the Demon Realm, resulting in the formation of one of the Six Paths Demon Artifacts, the Avici Scroll. The Book contains numerous lost techniques from the Ancient World, as well as extinct creatures, as the Chaos Fire Demon Dragon, a creature formed by the Power of the Realm and which holds a strength greater than a Holy Demon, similar to the True Spirits or True Dragon of the Heavenly Martial Realm, he was one of the first or the first creature of the Demonic Realm.

References

Demon Sealing War
=================

Trivia

the disappearance of the Ten Rules 100,000 years ago was linked to the Demon-Sealing War.

Beifeng Nan
 revealed that the Ten Rules had already vanished before the war even began. Their absence may have contributed to the chaos that followed.

Devouring Soul Sect
===================

General Information

The Devouring Soul Clan was an extremely unique existence among the
Seven Major Forces
, and also the most mysterious. They had very limited interactions with the outside world, giving off a somewhat reclusive feeling. However, they held great power and ruled over the Western Region alongside the
Myriad Stars Valley
.

Within the breadth of influence and the number of experts, perhaps the Myriad Stars Valley had the upper hand. But when it came to sheer terror, the martial practitioners of the Heavenly Martial Realm would rather face ten experts from the Myriad Stars Valley than a single member of the Devouring Soul Clan. Because this bizarre race practiced a secret technique that involved extracting souls.

Originally, such a malicious and evil sect should have aroused public outrage and been eradicated long ago. A Holy Land had indeed launched numerous attacks against the Devouring Soul Clan over tens of thousands of years, especially a large-scale campaign several thousand years ago that nearly wiped out the entire Devouring Soul Clan. However, a powerful member of the Devouring Soul Clan emerged later, leading the remnants to counterattack and plunging the entire continent into chaos and bloodshed.

Particularly at that time, the leader of the Holy Land and his sect were completely wiped out, disappearing from the continent. The place where the Devouring Soul Clan now resided was the spiritual mountain and river of that sect from back then. It was after that incident that the Devouring Soul Clan began to moderate their behavior, even in their soul extraction practices, so as not to provoke excessive anger on the continent. They also became more discreet in their actions and had very limited contact with external sects.

Structure

Sect Master

Huangfu Bi

Vice-Sect Masters

Xi Yulun

You Mi

Nine Elders

Chu Lang

High-Ranking Members

Zhang Shaotian

(Nine-Star Martial Supreme)

Disciples

Lu Feng

Important Information

In the Soul Devouring Sect, there were only three kinds of people who could be promoted to the position of an elder and enjoy all kinds of worship:

The first was that their cultivation had advanced to the level of Martial Sovereign.

The second was that their Soul Devouring Gonfalon had advanced to the Ninth-Grade.

The third was that they had completely refined a Ninth-Grade Profound Artifact.

Two Great Fighting Techniques

The members of the Soul Devouring Sect usually cultivate one of the two techniques.

Soul Devouring Banner

Used by most people of the Sect. It's a Xuan Artifact used to imprison the souls of humans, monsters, and other living beings. The main soul of the Banner, the Soul Slave, is divided into different grades from weak to strong: Yellow, Black, Earth, Heaven. The more souls and soul power the soul slave is fed, the higher its rank becomes. Sect Elders typically have an earth or heaven rank Soul Slave.

The Sect Master's Soul Banner and Soul Slave is different from the rest, it transcended the Heaven grade and is passed down from one generation of Sect Masters to the next. It's called "
Golden Speaker
", resides in the "
Pangu Banner
" and can either fight alongside the Sect Master or fuse with him and greatly enhance his offensive and defensive capabilities.

Soul Battle Technique

The minority of Sect Members use Soul Battle Techniques because of the higher difficulty. In the early stage, a beast's soul is fused with the host and grows together with them. In battles, they temporarily fuse with the host and greatly enhance his Soul Power. They live in a symbiotic relationship, with the host profiting from each other's soul power to grow stronger. Once fused with a soul, it's said to be incredibly difficult to separate them again.

Huangfu Bi
, the Sect Master, uses the "
Great Soul Derivation Technique
". It's a Soul Technique derived after his ancestors partially comprehended the
Great Expansion Divine Technique
.

Trivia

Back then, the first masterThe Golden speaker's was fortunate enough to witness the great expansion divine technique once. However, he was unable to fully master it. He could only rely on his own talent to forcefully memorize the divine technique. After that, he modified it through various techniques and created the great expansion soul refining technique of the soul Devourer sect.

Di Jia
======

SPOILER ALERT!

As one of the
devil fragments
, he has been sealed in the secret Realm of
Mount Meru
 in the Southern Region of the
Heavenly Martial Continent
, for around 100,000 years.

Plot

Mount Meru

He gets freed when Yunxiao and other cultivators remove the
Xuan Artifacts
, which are set up in an array that sealed him waiting for it to be opened. He confronts Li Yunxiao and his companions inside the palace and engages in a tense battle with them.

During the confrontation, Di Jia displays incredible power, easily countering attacks from
Cao Yaxing
 and the other High-Rank Martial Grandmasters. He reveals his intention to possess Li Yunxiao's body or
Luo Qingyun
' body, considering them worthy vessels. Di Jia also shows the ability to manipulate the Black Demon Qi and utilizes various powerful demonic techniques to overwhelm the group.

Despite their efforts to defeat him, Li Yunxiao and Luo Qingyun are unable to match Di Jia's strength, and they are severely injured in the battle. Di Jia's power proves to be overwhelming, and the group struggles to find a way to overcome him.

In the end, after a devastating attack from Di Jia, the group manages to escape through a hole created by
Lu Daozi
's powerful attack, leaving Di Jia weakened and frustrated at his inability to prevent their escape. However, Di Jia remains a formidable and unpredictable foe, and his motives and origins remain shrouded in mystery.

Heaven of Langya

In Langya, Dijia disguised himself as a young man with
Ren Ximin
 as his master. While exploring with
Nanqiu Yu
 group, he encountered Li Yunxiao and an injured Xiaohong, who had just fought the Heavy Equipment Tower's puppets.

Seizing the opportunity, Dijia planned to devour
Xiao Hong
, using
Ren Ximin
 to handle another opponent. However, Yunxiao intervened he Realizing Yunxiao’s group was too strong, Dijia had no choice but to back down but warned Yunxiao not to interfere again.

References

Di Jun
======

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Di Jun
.

 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

History

After the
Demon Emperor
 got split into five portions of devil essence, each portion became an individual being. Di Jun was originally sealed in the outer space in the Ancient Pagoda and an array of seven chunks of northern heaven cold star iron. An artificial true spirit, the "
crocodile
" (which is created by the immemorial astral wind, an element close the the origin of the wind element), served as the guardian of that formation.

Yunxiao travelled to the outer space, with the intention of obtaining the immemorial astral wind to open the wind territory in his divine realm tablet. Upon collecting it he gets sucked into the dimension where the sealing formation is located. He and the Starlight Soul body of Yuan Gaohan, a 9th tier alchemist, destroy the formation to obtain the northern heaven cold star iron, which leads to the release of Di Jun.

While Yunxiao and Yuang Gaohan flee from Di Jun, the latter fights with the guardian of the formation the crocodile. With the help of the Ancient Pagoda, called the Ancient Gods Battlefield by Di Jun, which is actually a part of a destroyed supreme grade weapon, he manages to subdue the crocodile.

Later Di Jun travels to the Heavenly Martial Continent in the Northern Region to Songyue Yan City where the competition of the Merchant Union takes place. At that time the entire city and most inhabitants have already been annihilated by the Demon Shang and his followers. What remains are only a few high ranking members of the Merchant Union. After fighting with Ding Shan the crocodile gets split in two parts. Di Jun flees after that.

At the boneyard near Blood God Palace, where another piece of the Demon Emperor is sealed Di Jun appears again and fights Di Jia who is also after the piece "
Di Ye
" which is sealed there.

Di Ye
=====

History

Another fragment of the devil essence, which turned into Di Ye. Originally sealed in the burial ground / boneyard near Blood God Palace. It was thought the sealing place contains the secrets to ascend to the Divine Realm, because of descendants of servants from the demon emperor who manipulated records in the Sea of Soul Formation. In reality it just sealed the Devils Fragment. Because of those records from the 7 original seals on that place 6 have already been removed.

Yunxiao obtained his Ancient Saber (a peak 9th grade weapon) from that place, as well as a dragons tear and water close to the origin of water to activate the last area in his Divine Realm Tablet. The last sealing part, a dragons shell, got almost completely destroyed in the fight between Zhuo Qingfan (2nd on the List of Titled Martial Sovereigns) and Di Ye. The latter escaped during that fight.

Diao Wu
=======

Plot

Diao Wu first encounters Yunxiao when the latter accidentally activates a barrier tied to the Corpse Qi when try to enter
Corpse Fiend Sect
. Later, Diao Wu sneaked up on Yunxiao, who was trying to enter the Gluttonous Snake's domain, and they exchanged a blow that nearly shattered the bones in his arm.

Ding Feizhi
===========

Ding Feizhi, the ruler of the Holy Land hundreds of years ago came from the Dark Division and was Shangchen's master.

Plot

After his death, his corpse was turned into a corpse puppet and used by Yi Xi.

Ding Ling'er
============

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Ding Ling'er
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Ding Ling'er is the head of
Tianyun Merchant Guild
 and one of the eight executive members of the Merchant Union. Appointed by her
Father
, she was entrusted with the mission to strengthen and expand the company.

Appearance

A charming young lady in her twenties, she has a delicate and graceful figure.

Background

Ding Ling'er was a rare talent in the business world, possessing both keen intellect and unwavering determination. Entrusted with the leadership of Tianyuan Trading Company at a young age, she worked tirelessly to uphold her father’s legacy. Under her guidance, the company endured fierce competition and external pressures, proving her capability as a leader. Though lacking the support of the guild’s elite forces, Golden Edge and Silver Light, she navigated treacherous business rivalries with sheer resourcefulness and strategic acumen.

Her ability to turn adversity into opportunity set her apart. She possessed sharp insight, recognizing market shifts and potential alliances before others did. Beyond business acumen, she was a formidable martial artist, a rare combination that made her both respected and feared. However, her greatest strength lay in her unwavering commitment—she bore the weight of Tianyuan Trading Company on her shoulders, driven by a sense of duty rather than personal ambition.

Plot

Song Yueyang City
,

New Yan city

Ding Ling’er reveals to Yunxiao the existence of the
Nine Yin Nine Yang Pill

Breaking Crisis Pill
, a legendary pill rumored to grant godhood upon consumption. Though Yunxiao is skeptical, she assures him that while the true pill is nearly impossible to create, her father,
Ding Shan
, has been secretly researching a modified version an
Eight Yin Eight Yang pill
 that retains half the power of the original. After years of effort and gathering rare materials, with even
Han Junting

unknowingly aiding in the process
, they are close to success. However, the pill's refinement requires the
power of eighteen Nine-Star Martial Emperors
, each possessing
Nine Yin or Nine Yang attributes
 a near-impossible task. Ding Ling’er reveals that Yunxiao is one of those needed for the process, Yunxiao quickly understands that the pill refinement process involves gathering the Yin and Yang energies of eighteen Nine-Star Martial Emperors, fusing them into medicinal herbs to form multiple pills. However, due to the weakened spiritual energy of the current era, Ding Shan is only confident in refining one pill instead of eighteen despite years of material preparation. Ding Ling’er assures Yunxiao that, regardless of the outcome, her father has promised him one pill, which could help him break through to the intermediate Nine-Star level.

Trivia

She has the same birthmark on her waist that's exactly the same as his brother
Ding Peng
.

Ling'er is the first out of Yunxiao's wives he slept with.
 She also was the one whom  Yunxiao had its second time.

References

Ding Peng
=========

Ding Peng was young master of the
Tianyun Merchant Guild
 and the younger brother
Ding Ling'er
.

Appearance

A young man with an elegant look.

Background

Ding Peng was young master of the
Tianyun Merchant Guild
 He is supposed son of
Ding Shan
, the president of Tianyuan Chamber of Commerce. However, it is later revealed that he is not actually Ding Shan’s biological son. Ding Shan adopted him due to his unique Yin-Yang constitution, which made him an ideal vessel for a crucial alchemical process.

Ding Peng is loyal to Ding Shan and obediently follows his orders, unaware that he has been raised as nothing more than a tool. When the truth is revealed, he is left in shock and disbelief, struggling to accept that his entire life has been manipulated for the sake of his adoptive father’s ambitions.

Trivia

He has the same birthmark on his waist that's exactly the same as his sister
Ding Ling'er
.

Ding Shan
=========

General Information

The leader of Tianyuan Merchant Guild. It seems that he has withdrawn from worldly affairs and handed over the business to his daughter Ding Ling'er.

Appearance

Ding Shan was dressed in silk clothes, with two small white whiskers on his upper lip. He always had a smile on his face. he did have the demeanor of a King.

Personality

Ding Shan is a cunning and ambitious leader, serving as the president of the
Tianyuan Chamber of Commerce
. He is a master manipulator, willing to go to extreme lengths to achieve his goals, even if it means betraying those closest to him. His intelligence and long-term planning skills make him a formidable figure in both the martial world and the political landscape.

History & Plot

He first appears as an elder of
Ten Thousand Treasures Store
 called Xuan Yutang. During the Merchant Competition in Songyue Yan City he kills Gu Feiyang's friend
Yuwen Bo
 (Ch. 648). Yunxiao doesn't know that Ding Shan is the killer. During the whole competition Xuan Yutang seems to be sure that Yunxiao wins, greatly confusing the other Sects Elders.

Later when Songyue Yan City is completely destroyed by the demons Shang and his followers, Xuan Yutang is one of the few remaining survivors. He captures the remaining high ranking merchants and takes them away. Shortly after he has a fight with
Di Jun
 who also appears in the destroyed Songyue Yan City, but can't defeat him and retreats.

After the incident of Songyue Yan City the elder "Xuan Yutang" of Ten Thousand Treasures Store disappears from the world.

It turns out that Ding Shang never handed of over Tianyuan Trading Company to his daughter, but has always been the one in control of everything. Especially the main forces "Golden Edge and Silver Radiance" have always been in his control.

In New Yan City he invites 18 nine-Star Martial Sovereigns to refine a so-called 9-Yin 9-Yang Pill to help him breakthrough to
Divine Transcendence
. Due to Ding Ling'ers pleading he allows Yunxiao to participate in the refinement.

In the end it's revealed that Ding Shang manipulated the array and the refinement is just a disguise to directly extract the 18 nine-Star Martial Sovereigns Qi, allowing him to transcend the 9 Star Martial Sovereign and reaching the
Divine Transcendence Realm
. Yunxiao manages to take advantage of the manipulated array and absorbs, alongside Ding Shang, the Qi of those Cultivators.
Ding Peng
 used as part of the array, because his body possesses a special Yin-Yang constitution, suffers greatly during the process.

It's revealed that Ding Peng and Ding Ling'er are only Ding Shan's adopted children, also proven by Ding Peng through a birthmark on his waist. Ding Shang killed their biological parents and adopted them when they were little kids. Ding Peng was raised only to be used for the Yin Yang Array. Ding Shang kills Ding Peng, who revealed to Yunxiao that Ding Ling'er is his biological sister and is not related to Ding Shang.

Later during the
Ten Thousand Treasure House
's attempted assassination of
Ling Baiyi
, Ding Shang takes over
Mando Chamber of Commerce
 as well as
Thunderwind Commerce Guild
 and absorbs the remnants of
Empyrean One Pavillion
, which took shelter in Yunxiao's World God Monument, making
Tianyuan Trading Company
 the number one Chamber of Commerce on the
Tianwu Continent
.

Yunxiao encounters Ding Shan again in the North Regions Mystic Realm
Langya Heaven
, there they enter the
eternal worlds

emperor pill pavillion
. Out of greed for Ding Shan's lvl 10 Pill he agrees to let him go, only to get tricked by him. Leaving him behind with a lvl 7 Pill and Ding Shan managed to escape unscathed.

Ding Shan agrees to join Li Yi's
Grand Hegemony Alliance
. Unfortunately immediately after the Devils from the Demon World started to invade. Ding Shan got his soul searched and then his body smashed to pieces, which results in his death.

Later it's revealed that he fused with the Immemorial Astral Wind Spirit (one half of the Crocodile), which gave him a Wind Spirit Body, so he survived. To let his son escape from the Devil Lan he tied him down and got killed again.

Power

He is a great alchemist. After several years of dedicated research, his own achievements in the art have already reached the ninth level, which is enough to preside over the alchemy.

Ding Shan, having obtained half of the
Crocodile
, cultivated a secret technique to merge with it and refine the Body of Astral Wind.

References

Dingtian City
=============

Dingtian City is it the place where the demon Lord wreaked havoc and where the city Lord’s mansion was wiped out.  the entire town was completely destroyed. Now, it has become a tiny, isolated island with only a few inhabitants.

Dingtian City has become a crucial passage for those venturing out to sea and is now far more prosperous than before. The Mu family is currently the most powerful ruling family in the city.

Divine Body
===========

SPOILER ALERT!

General Information

Divine Bodys are special constitutions. They give the cultivators, who possess them, special abilitys. Usually people are born with a Divine Body, which means it can't be aquired through training, tho there are special cases.

Known Divine Bodys

Possessors

Gu Qingqing

Luo Yunshang

There are 5 major poisons, corresponding to the 5 elements. The poison body possesses one of those 5 major poisons.

Possessors

Xiaofeng Can

 (mentioned)

Li Yunxiao
 the fourth person to receive the inheritance in the past few thousand years and  the highest cultivation.(aquired)

Abilitys

Originally called "
Light Glass Body
", tho the name got lost in history. It can remove impurities. It's a special case among the Divine Bodys and can be aquired in the Southern Region through luck.

Divine Earth Seal
=================

Description

Life passes like a dream, A swan Step in the snow, Dusted Worlds and Bitter seas, shores and tides beyond, Divine Earth Unbound Six path Reincarnation.
 These seals are splitted in to three stages, The floating seal, The dusted world and the Divine Earth Seal.

Known Users

Li Yunxiao
 A.K.A Gu Feiyang

Yang Di

Divine Purple Gold Bug
======================

Appearance

The worm is an enormous creature, more than two meters wide, with a soft, cotton-like body that yields underfoot. Despite its delicate texture, it embodies the most solid gold spirit in the world. Its appearance is striking, with two golden tentacles extending from its head, each adorned with small, glowing orbs that flicker like lanterns.

Plot

After the battle between the two Five Elements True Spirits, the Nine Netherworlds came into contact with the earth, absorbing nourishment and continuing to evolve, thereby suppressing the Golden Spirit Qi. As a result, for countless years, only divine purple gold insects as small as rice grains were born. Now that the Nine Netherworlds have disappeared from this world, the suppression of the Golden Spirit Qi is gone. The Five Elements are creations of heaven and earth, and although Wufatian has lost the Nine Netherworlds, it has instead gained a new form of Golden Spirit. This shift may bring about an entirely new opportunity.

Power

the Divine Will purple gold worm don't have any special divine abilities. Just their five elements spiritual bodies are enough to look down on other existences.

Dongmen Yuan
============

Dongmen Yuan
 was one of the
Death God's Eight Guardians
, ranked
second
 in strength among them. He was a formidable warrior, loyal and powerful, but met his downfall in
Red Moon City
, where he was captured. Now, he is held by the
Myriad Treasure Tower
, set to be executed in
three days
. His capture is significant because it all but guarantees that
Ling Baiyi
, will come to rescue him.

Appearance

a gloomy-looking old man.

Plot

Dongmen Yuan was captured by the
merchant Union
 and sentenced to execution for his crimes. During his public beheading, a
ninth-rank demonic scorpion
 suddenly appeared and attacked the execution site.

At first, people thought the scorpion had been sent by
Ling Baiyi
 to
rescue Dongmen Yuan
, but instead, it
attacked him directly
. With its massive pincers, the scorpion
slashed through the air
, creating violent tornado-like astral winds. These deadly wind blades struck Dongmen Yuan,
slicing his body into pieces
.

His
head was severed
, flying far away, his face frozen in
unwillingness and resentment
 as he died instantly.

This brutal and unexpected death
shocked everyone
, making them realize that Ling Baiyi was so ruthless that he would
kill his own subordinate
 rather than let him be executed by others.

Duan Yue
========

This page is a
Stub
.

 your

.

Duan Yue

Chronology

Cultivation

Techniques

Relationships

Appearance

Personality

Duan Yue appears to be convinced of his power, but expresses extreme difficulty in understanding
Li Yunxiao
 actions, seeing the young man's talent. He shows extreme sadness over having his Cultivation sealed and is depressed over not being able to keep up with Yunxiao's progress in her adventures.

He regards
Dark Thunder
 as a great companion and communicates with Yunxiao as a beautiful friend.

Background

Duan Yue was a mercenary Martial Emperor who lived in the
Light Song Forest
, until at one point he had a conflict with
Haolian Shaohuang
, subdued him and implanted the Triple Ghost Eyes Seal, which sealed his Cultivation and reduced him to a Seven-Star Martial Grandmaster.

Trivia

Duan Yue meets Li Yunxiao during an Alchemy exhibition by a new appointed Third-Grade Alchemist at the
Duskflame Empire
 Alchemist Association building. He goes with Li Yunxiao to Qinghai Port after discussing some interests, and is called by some Martial Grandmasters to hunt a Nine-Striped Violet Lizard.

Duan Yue and Li Yunxiao are used during the clash and will turn the tide, forcing the Martial Grandmasters to fight head to head with the Martial Emperor-level beast without them. In a moment of frantic struggle,
Heng Yuan
, a Half-step Martial Emperor who commanded part of the Qinghai Star Constellation Sect branch, appears with his subordinates and surrounds everyone.

Heng Yuan personally pursues them and is seriously injured while Duan Yue and Li Yunxiao escape, encountering a mist of rainbow dust that sends them into the territory of the Blaze Fish Tribe who capture them, and after some discussions and an Alchemy competition between Li Yunxiao and the Clan princess,
Tie Ling
, they become allies of the Sea Tribe.

Going to the
Kunwu Divine Tree
, Duan Yue and the others sweep away all the
Yicheng Tribe
 members. After arriving at a place rich in the Kunwu Divine Tree's Vital Energy, Li Yunxiao sets up a Natural Qi absorption array, and with a peek Li Yunxiao notices that Duan Yue is unable to make improvements even after absorbing large amounts of Natural Qi.

After noticing the Triple Ghost Eyes Seal on Duan Yue body, he imparted a technique that could help him undo the seal and return to his peak for an hour a day. Some time later, Li Yunxiao places Haolian Shaohuang on the
Divine Realm Tablet
 and directs him to undo Duan Yue's seal, just before, Duan Yue almost reaches the peak of the Martial Emperor Realm due to his resilient cultivation in the Divine Realm Tablet, and many events later it is shown that he has reached the peak of the Martial Supreme Realm.

Duan Yue

Chronology

Cultivation

Techniques

Relationships

Duanmu Cang
===========

Appearance

A woman’s  with elegance was and refined. She had her own light and spiritual Qi.

Background

Duanmu She, a natural-born spiritual diviner, she and her big brother
Duanmu Yuyu
 possesses the Deity's Mirror, a rare and powerful divination tool passed down through her family. However, the Deity's Mirror is known to be extremely harmful to one's body. Even though it might reveal the secrets of heaven, the user is often powerless to alter the outcome, making its use both a gift and a curse.

Plot

Eternal World

The Duanmu siblings, Duanmu Youyu and Duanmu Cang, arrived at a stone house seeking the legendary Bai Lun Jieyi, their ancestor’s mentor. To their surprise, they found her still alive but aged and weak.

Bai Lun Jieyi confirmed her identity and, seeing their talent, entrusted them with a black jade bracelet containing the remaining 70-80% of their lineage’s inheritance, as well as mystic weapons, elixirs, and jade slips. She also tested their progress in the Taichu Zhen Jue, a nine-level cultivation technique. While Youyu had reached the fifth level and Cang the third, Jieyi assured them they were on the right path.

She then revealed a prophecy concerning Li Yunxiao and the Demonic Tribulation, urging them to observe him closely and assist him if he gained the World God Monument’s recognition. However, she warned them to follow fate and choose their allegiance wisely.

As her time neared its end, she mentioned awaiting two more visitors and dismissed the siblings. Understanding the significance of their meeting, Youyu and Cang bowed nine times in gratitude before leaving the stone house.

Duanmu Family
=============

The Duanmu family, mysterious family,Their actions were always elusive.with their divination skills are unparalleled. Furthermore, they won’t just randomly perform divinations for no reason. There is rumors about them knowing the past and the future, reviving the dead and growing flesh from bones.

Technique

The Duanmu family’s divination techniques are divided into four levels: heaven, earth, black, and yellow.

Duanmu Yuyu
===========

Duanmu Yuyu
 (端木有玉), the
Heavenly Evolution Martial Sovereign
 (天衍武帝), the
Ninth-Ranked Martial Sovereign
 on the
Heaven and Earth Power Chart
.

Appearance

The man was dressed in snow-white silk with profound patterns on his sleeves. His face was like a Jade person, and his charm was transcendent. His eyes were clear and bright as he chanted softly.

Technique

He was the only clairvoyant among the
Ten Martial Sovereigns
. It was said that he could see all the stars in the sky and predict the past and the future. In the eyes of the public, he seemed to be even more mysterious than
Alchemists
.

Deducing the past and future goes against the heavens' law, which results in various punishments such as reduction of one's lifespan, suffering injuries, etc. depending on the severity of the deduction.

Plot

Eternal World

The Duanmu siblings, Duanmu Youyu and Duanmu Cang, arrived at a stone house seeking the legendary Bai Lun Jieyi, their ancestor’s mentor. To their surprise, they found her still alive but aged and weak.

Bai Lun Jieyi confirmed his identity and, seeing their talent, entrusted them with a black jade bracelet containing the remaining 70-80% of their lineage’s inheritance, as well as mystic weapons, elixirs, and jade slips. She also tested their progress in the Taichu Zhen Jue, a nine-level cultivation technique. While Youyu had reached the fifth level and Cang the third, Jieyi assured them they were on the right path.

he then revealed a prophecy concerning Li Yunxiao and the Demonic Tribulation, urging them to observe him closely and assist him if he gained the World God Monument’s recognition. However, she warned them to follow fate and choose their allegiance wisely.

As her time neared its end, she mentioned awaiting two more visitors and dismissed the siblings. Understanding the significance of their meeting, Youyu and Cang bowed nine times in gratitude before leaving the stone house.

Duskflame Empire
================

The Fire Crow Empire is one of the three major empires in the
Southern Region
 of the
Tianwu Continent
. It boasts a total of nine auxiliary kingdoms, divided into the Upper Three Kingdoms, Middle Three Kingdoms, and Lower Three Kingdoms.

If a Martial Grandmaster (Six Zodiacs Realm) or a Fourth-rank Lord-level Alchemist is present in the Kingdom and is willing to stay to safeguard it, then this country will automatically rise to an Upper Kingdom. Each year, the Fire Crow Empire will allocate numerous cultivation resources to those within its territory. If there are not enough Upper Kingdoms (less than three), the remaining positions will be contested by the Middle Kingdoms. This could lead to fierce and brutal wars for supremacy.

Capital City

Shangyang was the capital of the Firecrow Empire, the most prosperous city within ten thousand miles. It was dozens of times the size of Tianshui's capital, with a population of about one hundred million.

Major Powers

It is important to note that the Heavens-Gathering Sect, Emotion-Severing Mountain, and Heavenly Jewel Sect are existences that surpass the empire's power.

Dusty World Seal
================

Description

Life passes like a dream, A swan Step in the snow, Dusted Worlds and Bitter seas, shores and tides beyond.
 These seals are splitted in to three stages, The floating seal, The dusted world and the Divine Earth Seal.

Known Users

Li Yunxiao
 A.K.A Gu Feiyang

Yang Di

ETERNAL SUPREME
===============

Summary

English
Chinese

Previously one of the ten greatest Martial Emperor, Gu Feiyang somehow died near the mountains of Heaven Wave.

Fifteen years later, Gu Feiyang crossed through the cycle of rebirth. He was back! But this time, he was in the body of Li Yunxiao. Since then, Li Yunxiao started a treacherous journey. The world is in turmoil once more!

昔日十大武帝之一的顾飞扬，不知何故陨落在天波山脉附近。

十五年后，顾飞扬轮回重生，归来了！但这一次，他重生在李云霄的身上。自此，李云霄踏上了一条充满险阻的征途。天下再起风云!.

Characters

Li Yunxiao
 – The protagonist who is reincarnated right after his death 15 years later.

For more information, see
ETERNAL SUPREME/Characters

Reception

The webtoon has received praise for its exceptional art and classic cultivation themes, while others criticize its pacing and excessive side events that distract from the main plot. Fans of the genre may enjoy its storytelling, but some find it frustrating due to frequent interruptions in the protagonist’s journey.

. They can be called 10th tier Artifacts.

Eastern Region
==============

General Information

The Qi concentration of the East Region is slightly weaker than the
North Region
's and as dense as the
West Region
's. One of the
Four Regions
.
