Seven Stars of the East

Eight Yin Ancient Star Bird
===========================

Appearance

A strange-looking ancient bird, its eyes were like lightning. A star pattern flashed on its forehead and it pecked down.

Plot

As the clash of immense forces raged on the Shang Chen Ultimate Technique
Tusita Heavenly Peak
 and the
Divine Purple Gold Bug
. As
Shang Chen
 was obliterated, and the overwhelming power of the five elements surged through the battlefield, the very fabric of the
Golden World
 began to unravel, the
Tusita Heavenly Peak
 trembled violently. Suddenly, a ray of
gray light
 surged from within, expanding rapidly. The light twisted and shifted until it took form—a massive, ancient bird with outstretched wings, its body exuding a powerful, otherworldly aura. the two true spirits fighting to the death.

Power

Eight Yin ancient star bird don't have any special divine abilities. Just their five elements spiritual bodies are enough to look down on other existences.

The remnant soul of the eight Yin ancient star bird was residing in the Tusita heavenly peak, like an Artifact Spirit.

Elder
=====

Appearance

He was wrapped in linen clothes and had a face as clear as Jade.

Plot

He challenge Mo Xiaochuan, believing his Emperor Qi and martial arts mastery would easily overpower him. However, Mo Xiaochuan’s profound swordsmanship, wielding the dual-force Qingfeng Sword, overwhelmed Elder Qiu's techniques. Despite unleashing his powerful Thousand Hands Thousand Leaves Fist, Elder Qiu found his domain shattered by Mo Xiaochuan’s Heaven-Destroying Devil-Rinsing Sword. Unable to resist the sheer force, he was consumed by the sword’s might, leaving no trace behind. His arrogance and underestimation of Mo Xiaochuan led to his swift and total annihilation.

Empyrean One Pavillion
======================

General Information

One of the
7 perpetual chambers
 of commerce.

Structure

Leader

Su Lianyi

Elders

Xu Danhe

(Great Elder)

Qiu

Members

Qing Luo

Liang Yuyi

(Young Master)

Disciples

Light Song Forest's Branch

Overseer

Qing Luo

Branch Leader

Shen Li

Members

Hong Yiyi

Plot

After the devastating battle,
New Yan city
 was left in ruins, its vitality severely damaged. The city had suffered massive destruction, with two of its four teleportation formations completely destroyed, limiting movement in and out of the region. The city's infrastructure was in disarray, and the merchant Union, led by
Ding Shan
, immediately took control, ordering a
ten-day lockdown
 for reorganization and recovery.

In the aftermath,
Ding Shan expelled Myriad Treasures Store and Empyrean One Pavilion
 from the merchant Union, effectively forcing them to evacuate. Given the deep foundations these organizations had within the city, it was nearly impossible for them to relocate everything within the short deadline. However, Yunxiao, showing his usual resourcefulness, devised a plan to salvage the situation—
selling off fixed assets at a discount
 to the Star and Moon School and the Money Sect, ensuring they wouldn’t leave behind any valuable resources.

Tensions ran high as
Wan Yiqian

and Su Lianyi
—leaders of the expelled factions—struggled to accept this forced removal. Though they had no choice but to comply, they understood that Myriad Treasures Store and Empyrean One Pavilion were now inseparably linked in their survival outside the merchant Union.

Eternal Evergreen Tree
======================

SPOILER ALERT!

He is one of the two Spirit Trees that were born since the creation of the world tens of thousands of years and was formed from the Yi wood Qi in the world.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

In the midst of a chaotic battle above the Demon Plain, Little Qing, engages in a fierce confrontation with
Shang
 and his companions. Little Qing transforms into lightning and battles Shang, who uses the
Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere
 to create a celestial barrier. Despite Shang's efforts, Little Qing breaks free and launches a devastating attack, creating a chaotic scene of lightning, explosions, and energy clashes.

During the battle,
Ge
 sacrifices his life to block Little Qing's attack, stabilizing the situation momentarily. Little Qing counters with a powerful thunder attack, and the two sides exchange blows. Ge's sacrifice leaves an emotional impact on his old friends.
Li Yunxiao
 rushes to save Little Qing, and the appearance of the Tianyi Chamber of Commerce adds a new layer of complexity to the unfolding events.

As the battle between Shang and Li Yunxiao unfolds, the confrontation leads to a collision between the
Universe God Monument
 and the Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere, cracking the axis of the Armillary sphere and injuring both fighters.

Shang is ultimately defeated and heavily injured by Li Yunxiao's overwhelming palm technique. And Little Qing disappears from the scene, leaving a cryptic message for Shang.

Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

Within the illusion, the
Spirit Devouring Rat Emperor
 and Little Qing strategize to counter
Hao Lian
's pursuers. They manipulate the Four Seasons Enchantment to alter the landscape. While the Water Rat King is cornered by
Che Xuyao
 and
Feng Yi
, and Little Qing warns the Rat Emperor against breaking the enchantment.

Little Qing suggests a risky plan to save the rat population and the Rat Emperor agrees, to this strategy, ordering his subordinates to cease their attack on the experts. As the illusionary landscape shifts and changes, the Water Rat King is eventually captured by Che Xuyao and his companion, who attempt to refine the Five Elements Beast Taming Ring with the Five Rat Kings.

Later, Li Yunxiao's proficiency in harnessing the power of the Four Seasons Boundary stuns even Little Qing, making him realize that his capabilities extend far beyond his expectations. In a tense face-off, Li Yunxiao faces Little Qing, who has manifested the power of the rules of heaven, lightning. Little Qing questions Li Yunxiao's intentions and accuses him of seeking his real body. After a fierce exchange, Li Yunxiao discloses his desire to reach the Ancient Desolate Land, and Little Qing agrees to potentially help him, acknowledging their debt from Li Yunxiao's previous assistance. As Little Qing departs, Li Yunxiao questions him about the location of Noah's Ark, but he offers no further information.

Later,
Yu Yangzhou
's escape astounds Little Qing, who realizes Yangzhou triggered the Virtual Eye and Rain Summoning while heavily injured and managed to escape. Little Qing decides to find Yangzhou and eliminate him, as he suspects Yangzhou might be just hiding.

However, in another place,
Li
's attempt to break the formation triggers catastrophic consequences, Little Qing, who has been observing, warns that disaster is looming. The formation's instability leads to the sudden rise of an enormous ice mountain that engulfs Li, while the surrounding area experiences chaotic shifts between the four seasons.

The mountain's peak undergoes rapid transformations, with spring, summer, autumn, and winter all manifesting at different levels. The mountain's appearance reflects the four seasons, with spring at the midpoint, peach blossoms, withered trees, and snow at the base. Meanwhile, an immense boundary of the four seasons emerges in the distance, revealing the Immortal Mountain of lord
Throne
.

Four Seasons Immortal Mountain

Inside the Immortal Mountain, Little Qing and the Rat Emperor discuss the dire situation. Little Qing explains that the revelation of the true formation's core will activate the Immortal Mountain's power, causing the four seasons to rotate and crush all life within the formation, including themselves. To buy time for Young Emperor Hao Lian's breakthrough, Little Qing plans to stall and strengthen himself. He hopes that once he becomes more powerful, he can break open a sealed space below his main body and retrieve Noah's Ark.

Skills

Pure great void jade green purple mansion Brahma world destroying divine lightning / Great void jade green purple mansion’s Nirvana world-destroying divine Thunder. A power that can destroy the world.

The Ultimate of All Ages/Eternal Supreme
 is a Cultivation Manhua about the protagonist
Gu Feiyang
.
In the past, one of the
Ten Great Martial Sovereigns
, Gu Feiyang, tragically met his end in the
Tiandang Mountains
.
15 years later
Gu Feiyang
 crosses through the cycle of rebirth, into the body of Li Yunxiao of the Tianshui Kingdom and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront against the countless talents of the current generation.

Eternal World
=============

The
Eternal World
 was created
100,000 years ago
 by ancient experts as a sanctuary after the
disappearance of the Ten Rules of Heaven
, the fundamental laws of martial power. Seeking immortality in an era without
Rank 10 Laws
, these experts sealed themselves away, living in seclusion. Entrance to the Eternal World is blocked by
four powerful seals
, maintained by the
Four Pavilions
 in the
Langya Heaven Mystic Realm
. Only when these seals are broken can outsiders enter.The most powerful force within the Eternal World is
Xuanli Island
,

Background

The
Eternal World
 is a sealed, isolated realm located within the
nest of the ancient Heavenly Phoenix
. It was created through the power of the Phoenix’s most
precious feather
, which contains a vast amount of divine energy. This energy grants those inside a state of
immortality
, allowing them to sustain themselves indefinitely with powerful divine abilities.

However, this immortality comes at a cost the Eternal World has been
cut off from the outside world
 for countless years. Over time, the
power of the Heavenly Phoenix
 that sustains it has begun to
weaken
, making it increasingly difficult to maintain eternal life. Those within the realm are forced to enter a
deep sleep
 to preserve themselves, leading to an eerie, death-like atmosphere where communication is rare.

Despite its divine origins, the Eternal World is a
prison as much as a sanctuary
 those inside cannot easily leave, and if they do, their bodies will rapidly
wither and perish
 due to their reliance on the Phoenix’s power. Only using devine technique  like
Gu Qingqing
, being one such inhabitant, has only been able to exist outside by using a
fragment of her divine soul
, while her true form remains dormant inside.

Structure & Creation

The Eternal World is a
vast continent
 bathed in a dim, fiery-red glow, with no sunlight and barren landscapes of rolling mountains and endless rock formations. It was
created using the three True Tail Feathers of the Celestial Phoenix
, making it a place of immense spiritual energy. Over time,
Phoenix Fire Phosphorus Stones
 formed, absorbing the spiritual Qi from the
Phoenix Nest
 and the
Realm of Heavenly Martial Arts
.

To
preserve the Eternal World
, a massive energy-locking structure was designed:

A
Heaven-Protecting River
, stretching for tens of kilometers, prevents spiritual energy from dissipating. The only energy in the eternal world is this Phoenix Fire phosphorus stone. It’s also the source of the power of this heaven-protecting River that is tens of kilometers long. Everyone will find an abundant Phoenix Fire scaly stone mine to cultivate in seclusion.In this heaven protecting River formed by the celestial Phoenix’s true power, one’s divine sense couldn’t be spread out at all

Four Great Pavilions
 act as seals and energy channels, absorbing external spiritual energy and injecting it into the sky. These are:

Jade Book Pavilion

Heavy Equipment Tower

Heavenly Treasure Pavilion

Emperor Pill Tower

These pavilions serve a dual purpose sealing the
true body of the Eternal World
 and ensuring that spiritual energy within the realm remains abundant.

Inhabitants

Bailun Jieyi

Gu Qingqing

Lin

Jing Baimu

Pang Yun

Zhan Yu

Zhan Bo

Xuanli Island

Leader

Ye Qingyu

Four Kings

Ye Nantian

(Heaven King)

Lan Yanzhuo

(Stone King)

Hao Feng

(Saber King)

(Light King)

High Ranking Members

(Guardian of 1 of the 4 Pavilions, the Heavy Weapons Tower)

Members

Meng Zhuo

Zhu Jun

Trivia

The terrain in the eternal world is hard to identify and changes frequently. Even  needle with fixed coordinates has to be used multiple times to avoid going in the wrong direction due to changes in the terrain.

In the eternal world, no one knew how many old monsters there were, but everyone had their own territory. In order to avoid being disturbed, they would leave this mark the seal of the forbidden area  on their territory to tell others that this place was theirs and that they were not to trespass. The consequences of trespassing into someone else’s forbidden area are very serious.

Evil Spirit
===========

Li Yunxiao
 first meets the Evil Spirit while it was trying to possess
Mo Xiaochuan
. After multiple battles, Yunxiao traps them both in the
World God Monument
.

A while later, while trying to deal with the Evil Spirit, Yunxiao starts to torture it. Not yielding, they agreed to help each other. The Evil Spirit would help Yunxiao destroy the Blood God Palaces' beast made of multiple rank 9 Xuan artifacts, while Yunxiao would find a 9 star martial Sovereigns' body for it to possess.

A couple years later in the
East seas
'
Rain Land
, Yunxiao Kills and gives the Evil Spirit the body of an Ancient True Dragon Bloodline of 9 star martial Sovereign cultivation level.

During the Battle in
Crimson Crescent City
, Where
Teng Guang
 tried to sacrifice himself to blow up his own Formation, the Monster Clan led by
Shang
 and
Li
, leave
Chang 'an
 to trap and kill Li Yunxiao. After Killing their way through the trap, Yunxiao Searches his soul and lets the Evil Spirit possess him.

Near the end of the novel, after tracking down the body of
Qiu
, and with only a wisp of spiritual sense in Qiu's body, with the help of
Nine Abyss
 Li Yunxiao and his allies trap him in the
God Monument
. Later with the help of the Monster clan, the Evil Spirit possesses Qiu's
Dharma Body
.

Fang De
=======

Fang De, an Enforcer and Elder from the Heaven-Gathering Sect, played a significant role during the crystal stone competition. He was among the top authorities from the three major forces in the Southern Region, along with
Tu Lei
 and
Huang Xiaolong
.

Plot

Fang De closely monitored the situation on the island, particularly the battle between
Li Yunxiao
 and
Luo Qingyun
. He was shocked by the display of power and talent by both fighters and witnessed the intense clashes between their formidable techniques.

As the battle escalated, Fang De and the others set up a barrier to contain the powerful attacks unleashed by Li Yunxiao and Luo Qingyun. Fang De was also involved in deciding the outcome of the crystal stone competition, with the remaining crystal stones unaccounted for due to the damaged array. Ultimately, he decided to end the competition and activate the teleportation array to send everyone back.

After the competition, He discussed with
Xin Pi
 the upcoming Veiled Desolation event and the entry quotas auction in Flame Martial City, which Li Yunxiao planned to host. Fang De returned to the Heaven-Gathering Sect and reported everything to Sect Master
Qi Feng
.

Fang Tianhe
===========

Fang Tianhe is the president of the Sky Crane Business Council (Merchant Association). He is a key player in the merchant wars, particularly in the battle against the Purple Cloud Trade Union.

Appearence

An old man, He was in high spirits and looked like an immortal.

Plot

fat and thin dhuta, ao changkong appeared in new yan city  to watch the ling baiyi fight againts.

Feather Bees
============

Feather Bees (Winged Hornets) from the Land of Poisonous Wind, are highly dangerous,
poisonous
 creatures that inhabit the
Tiandang Mountains' hurricane belt
. This area is a natural barrier filled with deadly storms and terrifying creatures, making it extremely difficult to traverse.

Appearance & Traits:

Regular
Feather Bees,
 are about
fist-sized
 and have
white, yellow, and black markings
.

The Queen Bee, A
giant, orange-yellow The
Queen Bee, also called a Mayfly
, is a rare and powerful variant that can control vast swarms. When a Queen Bee appears, it often signals the arrival of
countless Feather Bees
, causing mass devastation.

Plot

The Merchant Union's Crisis: During the
Dongmen Yuan
 execution, a spatial tunnel suddenly appeared, releasing an enormous swarm of Feather Bees into the battlefield. Yunxiao, recognizing the danger, destroyed the tunnel with lightning, killing many bees. However, some still survived, and new ones continued appearing out of nowhere—suggesting they were tracking the aura of their dead kin. Faced with this growing crisis, Yunxiao suggests a
drastic but effective plan
: to
Activate the city's defensive formations
 to
seal off all spatial power
, preventing more bees from arriving. and  was to burn all the fallen bees before more arrived, or else they would be overrun.

Wan Yiqian
 immediately takes action, issuing decisive orders, Under this organized and relentless assault, the Feather Bees are swiftly eradicated, their numbers dwindling at a visible rate.

Abilities & Threats

Massive Swarms: If hundreds or thousands of them group together, they can form a terrifying hurricane is hundreds of miles long and wide, that can finished entire city.

Spatial Travel: Winged Hornets can sense the aura of their fallen companions and follow it through space, even after a portal has collapsed.

Uncontrollable Destruction: Even the person who summons them cannot fully control their violent nature, making them a double-edged weapon.

Trivia

in the past
Ning Kewei
 went to Tiandang Mountains, to studied Yuxun bees. wanted to tame them and make them the guardian monsters of Hongyue City, but he is failed. Just because he couldn't find the queen bee.

Fei Ni
======

SPOILER ALERT!

A great cultivation talent and one of the young Masters of the
Heavenly Draconic Family
.  She likes teasing
Yunxiao
 through calling him "My Husband", which initially greatly irritates him.

Appearance

Feini was dressed in red and was exceptionally enchanting. Under her light smile, with Her bright eyes she was more beautiful than a flower. her every frown and smile could move people’s souls.

Background

Fe Ni possesses the Nirvana body of the Heavenly Phoenix, having undergone Nirvana several times. She is likely the first in tens of thousands of years to attain the rare bloodline of the Heavenly Phoenix. This achievement carries unimaginable significance for the Long family, marking her as a figure of immense importance. Her bloodline, intertwined with the legendary power of the dragon and phoenix, brings a mysterious strength that has captured the attention of those around her.

Plot

Originally wanting to rob the Divine Phoenix Fire from Yunxiao, she ended up meeting him in the
Northern Region

Seawood Town
.

After witnessing Yunxiao fight in Seawood Town against
Lei Huo
, a
Peak Nine-Star Martial Sovereign
, at the apex of the Martial Dao, she like the pride that's buried in
Li Yunxiao
 bones, and the way he look down on the world. She realized that Yunxiao was the one destined to change her life, and she abandoned her plans to rob him.

She later decides to support Yunxiao in hope she can do her best to help him reach the top in th world. Over time, she becomes more intimate in her actions towards him, and despite her persistence, Yunxiao eventually falls for her and  kissed her.

Trivia

Fei Ni is the first person Yunxiao kissed

Feini is most beloved disciple of
Long Qianmiao

References

Feng Buping
===========

This page is a
Stub
.

Feng Buping
.

contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Feng Buping, was a
Blue Jewel Academy
 dean of students, with a nicknamed God of Slaughter. The reason why he was called the 'God of Slaughter' by the students was not only because of his strict law enforcement, but also his selflessness and fairness.

Appearance

A middle-aged man, whose hair had stood on their ends.

Feng Yaoli
==========

Feng Yaoli, the king of the fallen country of Little Bingtian in the far north, who used his wife's life to refine weapons.

Appearance

Huo Dou Form Feng Yaoli's body had grown twice in size, and his entire body was a faint blue. A pair of golden and silver horns grew out of his head, and there were two-colored lightning bolts crackling on them.

Plot

Eternal World

Feng Yaoli arrived at
Bailun Jieyi
 stone house, also seeking the secrets of the Taichu Divine Art’s inheritance. There, he confronted
Yin Yu
, who ultimately killed Bai Lun Jieyi and searched his soul and
Wei Wuya
 that try to stoping him to snatch Bailun Jieyi Body from Yin Yu. However, upon doing so, Yin Yu suffered a powerful backlash, severely injuring his soul consciousness. Witnessing this, Feng Yaoli chose to withdraw, opting not to escalate the conflict any further.

Later had once been fooled by Yunxiao and accidentally made a heart oath that he would never attack Duanmu Youyu again. That was why he had formed an alliance with Yin Yu, trying to snatch the nine luminaries star staff from Duanmu Youyu through Yin Yu.

Power

Feng Yaoli was a True God-level being from the past who possessed the Huo Dou Body, granting him the ability to wield both the power of the Huo Dou bloodline and his own true power Cold True Essence. This Cold True Essence was an embodiment of extreme cold energy, similar to the power of the Beiming family, yet fundamentally different. Feng Yaoli’s cold was absolute, an extreme and pure frost, while the Beiming family’s power carried a hint of yin energy, leaning toward the dominance of Extreme Yin Power.

This person's cultivation, profound level weapon, physical body, and magical powers were all extraordinary. Even an empty realm warrior would not be able to suppress him. Only an existence like the Misty Rock Lord would have a certain chance of victory.

Leng Jian Bingshuang (The Cold Sword’s Frosty Blade) is a Divine/Holy Weapon. It was forged through an extraordinary process—a fortune teller and Feng Yaoli refined an entire kingdom’s space into the sword itself. In doing so, they transformed the Snow Country into an independent realm contained within Leng Jian Bingshuang. Within this space, Feng Yaoli reigns as its absolute master, wielding complete control over its domain.

The Tai Chi Sealing Heaven Seal - innate magical power of the Huodou clan. under the Taiji Heaven Sealing Seal, everything in the Three Realms and Five Elements is sealed. this move consumes a lot of energy, will become extremely weak after performing it.

The Taichu Zhen Jue is one of the Four Great Divine Techniques, possessing the power to counter and rival the Devil Lord’s Ice Fiend Heart Flame. In ancient times, two legendary masters the Realm King and the God of Evolution—each cultivated their own supreme techniques: the Great Realm Divine Art and the Great Evolution Divine Art, respectively. The Taichu Zhen Jue stands on equal footing with these divine arts, neither inferior nor lacking in power. The Taichu Divine Art is an ancient and powerful technique originally created to control the power of time. It grants its practitioner the ability to manipulate time flow, accelerate or decelerate time, and even create time domains. However, over generations, the Taichu lineage misused this divine art not for its intended purpose but to peer into the past and future, attempting to uncover the secrets of fate.
 Just like his senior brother
Bailun Jieyi
, one of the most accomplished practitioners, he had reached only the eight level from nine levels.

Trivia

Divine sword, Leng Jian Bing Shuang, later passed to a good friend
Ling Mudi
 it played a significant role in the battle to seal the demons, and is one of the divine objects to seal the demons.

Feng Yi
=======

He is a renowned Martial Sovereign from the
Myriad Stars Valley
, they said that his formation abilities are only under the
Throne Martial Sovereign
. In his first appearance, he and
Che Xuyao
 were shasing after the Five Elements Rat Kings in the Demon Origin Plains.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

He and
Che Xuyao
 corner the Water Rat King in the illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror.
Little Qing
 proposes a plan to protect the rat population and halt attacks on experts,
The Rat Emperor
 reluctantly agrees to the plan. The Water Rat King is captured by Feng Yi and Che Xuyao, who attempt to refine the Five Elements Beast Taming Ring by the Five Rat Kings. But
Yu Yangzhou
, from the
Ten Thousand Treasures Store
, arrival disrupts the refining process. Yu Yangzhou's strength astonishes them, prompting a decision to complete the Five Elements Beast Taming Ring.

In the Domain of Spring, Che Xuyao and Feng Yi also witnessed the changes in the illusion caused by
Li
, realizing that the mountain is the legendary Four Seasons Immortal Mountain, a Peak 9th Rank Profound Artifact of Lord
Throne
.

Feng Zhu
========

Feng Zhu was one of the two Elder  of the Holy Fire Temple under
Ye Fan
 Commands. He, along with other high-ranking members, was on a mission to search for and retrieve their ancestral divine artifact.

Plot

Light Song Forest

Ye Fan
,
Tao Guan
, Feng Zhu, and
Qi Guang
 confront
Li Yunxiao
 in the Light Song Forest. Li Yunxiao cleverly takes Yi Fan hostage to initiate a negotiation. The Sacred Fire Temple seeks the Yang Key and believes it's linked to Noah's Ark. During the discussion, they tentatively agree to cooperate, aiming to rescue Tang Jie, take Yang Key and locate Noah's Ark. However, an explosion disrupts their conversation, leading to speculation about Tang Jie's rescue and the involvement of various factions.

As they observe the chaos,
Zou Chen
 offers his Time-fixing Plate to assist the crowd in tracking auras. Zou Chen uses the Time-fixing Plate to trace a lead to the east of the Demon Plains, where Noah's Ark might be located. Li Yunxiao's group proposes a plan to intercept the Skeleton Mercenary Group, discovering a teleportation array within their headquarters. They activate it and arrive in the Demon Plain, while other factions continue their pursuit of Noah's Ark.

Demon Origin Plains

After teleporting to the Demon Plain, Li Yunxiao's group discusses their encounter with the Skeleton Mercenary Group. The conversation shifts to
Ye Nantian
's notes about breaking through to the Divine Realm. Li Yunxiao seeks to view the notes, leading to a deal: he helps them obtain Noah's Ark in exchange for access to the notes. Tension arises when
Feng Zhu
 challenges Li Yunxiao's skills. Suddenly, the legendary creature "
Wu
" appears behind Li Yunxiao, leaving the group awestruck. The Wu enters its own body and disappears, a rare and enigmatic event that emphasizes the rarity and significance of the encounter.

Continuing their journey, the group finds a preserved corpse of a powerful Martial Supreme killed by
Young Master Hao Lian
. Concerns about Hao Lian's motives arise. Dark clouds gather, signaling the arrival of forces from other territories. Three formidable warships, two Rank 7 Golden Sun Warships and a Rank 8 Netherworld Warship, appear in the sky.  Amidst the warships,
Xuan Bing
 commands an attack from formidable warships, forcing Li Yunxiao's group to narrowly escape. Amidst the battle, the Imperial Bell emerges, withstanding attacks.
Feng Zhu
 and
Qi Guang
 join, using “Holy Skill” techniques to clash with Xuan Bing. The World God Monument appears and causes a warship to sink, leading to chaos.

Li Yunxiao suppresses the Netherworld Warship using the
World God Monument
, causing it to sink irreparably. Xuan Bing and his forces are left in shock and desperation over the loss of the two warships. Interrogating captives, they learn about involvement from the Feather Frost Sect, led by Martial Sovereign. The group continues its quest cautiously, sensing hostile auras ahead. Investigating the strange death of an eighth-rank Soul-shattering Tapir, the possibility of a Peak Martial Sovereign's presence raises concerns, as their pursuit of Noah's Ark could be threatened. Despite the fear and uncertainty, the members of the Sacred Fire Temple reaffirm their determination to continue their quest for Noah's Ark. They are motivated by their ancestral legacy and the opportunity to restore their sect's glory.

Fire Fish Tribe
===============

In the ancient times, the Fire Fish Clan was merely an ordinary sea group. It was precisely in the sea territory that a
True Spirit Phoenix
 was undergoing Nirvana on the
Kunwu Divine Tree
. During that Nirvana, the flames accidentally ignited one of their ancestors.

That ancestor originally thought it was a certain death, but little did they know that not only did they not die, but instead, under the nurturing of the Divine Spirit, their body experienced a significant rebirth. From then on, they not only possessed an extremely keen perception and longing for flames, but their body structure also became highly suitable for cultivation.

Later, this ancestor even stepped into the realm of Martial Sovereign, propelling their sea group to become a dominant presence in the vicinity! This is the gradual decline of the power of bloodline. Initially, the Nirvana Fire of the true spirit Phoenix transformed their ancestor's bloodline, but since then, generation after generation, the bloodline started to thin.

Nowadays, the power of their Fire Fish Clan's bloodline is no longer sufficient to allow them to break through to the Eight Wilderness/Desolates Realm. Moreover, if this continues, even becoming a Seven Constellations Martial Emperor in the future will become increasingly difficult. There is even a possibility, one day their Fire Fish Clan will regress to the level of a sea group once again.

Structure

Leader

Tie Pin

Tie Fan

General Information

Yunxiao can turn his body into lightning, making it almost impossible to injure him. He can also recover injuries like cut-off limbs with it and use strong lighting attacks against his enemys. Yunxiao can summon
World Destroying Sacred Thunder
, which is able to suppress and destroy everything since its condensed by Realm Power (everything else is inferior since its born from Heaven and Earth).

Lightning Cultivation - History

Jiang Family's Lightning Art:

unrivaled below the
Martial Sovereign
 (Martial Sovereign can use Emperor Qi to suppress everything below the Nine Heavens Realm)

no one can attack him (all attacks go through his lightning body, impossible to hit him)

gives high speed (can easily run away and catch up to people with superior cultivation)

Lightning
Maha Ancient Character

Learned from Thunder Hammer Xuan Artifact.

Thunder Art

Obtained in heaven and earth mystic realm, Yunxiao needs to cultivate 5 types of thunder to complete it, superior to
Jiang Family
's Lightning Art, gives high speed.

5 Types of Lightning Qi used:

Lightning Qi from
Thunder Hammer

Thunder Ring from rabbit in
Heaven and Earth Mystic Realm

From Sea Race inhabitant, who was proficient in Lightning Arts

From
Dark Thunder

Alchemy Thunder Art (Tier 9 Alchemy)

5 Elements Spirit Body (Lightning Physique)

Thunder Seed from
Qingzi
 received. Yunxiao's body becomes one of the 5 Elements Spirit Bodys (related to wood element).

obtained Lightning World Skill, after defeating
Lei Huo

although the five-elemental spirit beasts are also true spirits, they’re born from the essence of the five elements in the world. They’re not ordinary true spirits.

Five Line Tripod
================

Description

It is not an normal refinement tripod, But on that completely captures the essence of martial arts in the five elements realms. Even if a fourth tier refiner used this tripod, They Would Still be able to use the power from the Five elements realm. Even one can't become a fifth tier refiner they can still refine something Better than a fourth tier.

Owner/Created by

Gu Feiyang
 A.k.A Li Yunxiao.

Flowery Confusion Fist
======================

the Flowery Confused Fist, which was invented by a Martial Sovereign named
Yuan Shixiao
. A major setback in life had changed this man's temperament, making him a little crazy in everything he did. However, as he was a gifted person with an extraordinary strength, he actually turned away from the norm and invented this fist technique. The secret of this technique lay in the word 'confused', and when used, it would always take the opponent by surprise and be almost impossible to guard against.

Four Extremes Sect
==================

Alternative Names

The Four Realms Gate

General Information

One of the
7 perpetual chambers
 of commerce.

There are many Clans or Families, the largest are: The Tang Family and The Yu Clan

The position of Sect Master had often been contested between the Tang and Yu Clans. For centuries, the Tang Clan had suppressed the Yu Clan mercilessly, leaving no outstanding disciples among the latter's younger generation.

Four Seas
=========

General Information

Due to the immense size of the
Sea Clan
, even the King of the Four Seas finds it difficult to count the exact number. Therefore, based on the strength of each clan, the Sea Clan is divided into ten levels for easier management.

At the pinnacle stands the powerful
Bo Family
, the Co-Lords of the Four Seas, revered as godlike beings and not included in the levels.

Below the Sea Emperor Bo Family, the First-Rate is occupied by the Royal Families of the Four Seas, managed by the four major sea clans. They are the
Guang
,
Qin
,
Shun
, and
Run
 clans, representing superpowers.

In the Second-Rate of the Sea Clan, there must be ten
Martial Sovereign
-level powerhouses or more presiding over it. They are like dominant rulers in their respective regions.

For the Third-Rate of the Sea Clan, a
Martial Sovereign
 powerhouse is required.

The Fourth-Rate of the Sea Clan needs a
Martial Supreme
 powerhouse to govern it.

The Fifth-Rate of the Sea Clan requires the presence of a
Martial Emperor
 powerhouse within the clan.

For the Sixth-Rate of the Sea Clan, having a
Martial Grandmaster
 powerhouse is sufficient, similar to the status of a subordinate nation/kingdom within the
Duskflame Empire
.

As for the Seventh-Rate of the Sea Clan, represented the last-ranked, only a
Martial King
 powerhouse is required for entry.

Apart from these Seven classifications there are numerous Sea Clans beneath them, that are difficult to count. They are not referred to as 'Sea Clan' and are collectively known as the Sea Groups.

The Legendary Sea Alchemists
Ha Shi
,
Xue Lai
 and
An Sen
, who are Ninth-Tier Alchemists, have the same prestige as the Four Great Sea Kings.

Locations

Northern Sea

Southern Sea

Fufen Tribe

(Fourth-Rate — They were the rulers of the tribes near them — Destroyed by
Wei Qing
)

Yicheng Tribe

(Fifth-Rate — Destroyed by a
Li Yunxiao
)

Fire Fish Tribe

(Fifth-Rate — Former Second/Third-Rate Tribe)

Kunwu Divine Tree

Eastern Sea

Guang Clan

(First-Rate — The Royal Clan & the Rulers of the entire Eastern Sea)

Xiankong Island

Rain Land

Yicheng Tribe

(Second-Rate — Destroyed by the Vanquisher Martial Sovereign – ⁣
Gu Feiyang
)

Western Sea

Hidden Families

Rainbow Mist

The Rainbow Mist Sea is a highly unique phenomenon in the open sea. The once tranquil sea surface suddenly becomes covered in a rainbow-like multicolored mist, blanketing everything. Even divine senses struggle to penetrate it for long distances. Once the rainbow mist phenomenon appears, the original sea area becomes unrecognizable; this mist can create spatial channel effects. Those who enter it will simultaneously be transported to an unknown sea area. Therefore, the Rainbow Mist Sea holds immense exploratory value. A chart that marks a fixed Rainbow Mist Sea is a priceless treasure, with immeasurable value. Of course, the risks are also great. If it leads directly to the territory of high-level sea creatures, it would result in complete tragedy.

Sea Creatures/Demonic Beasts

In the sea, sea creatures can exert their unique advantages, while humans can only hunt those of lower realms. Generally speaking, as long as you don't venture into deeper waters, there won't be too much danger. However, precisely because of this, the safe zones have already been hunted out, leading many hunting parties to take risks and venture into deeper waters for higher profits.

Purple-Patterned Nine-Infant Serpents
(Violet Nine-Striped Moths or Purple-Striped Nine Nascent Serpents)

The Purple-Patterned Nine-Infant Serpent is rumored to possess the bloodline of an
Ancient True Dragon
.

In its infancy, it's merely at the Sixth-Rank Demonic Beast.

Upon maturity, it automatically evolves to the Seventh-Rank Demonic Beast.

If it can survive for over 500+ years, it can further evolve to the Eighth-Rank Demonic Beast.

The Purple-Patterned Nine-Infant Serpent with a lifespan of 1000+ years can even break through to the Ninth-Rank Demonic Beast.

Beyond the Ninth-Rank, if it can withstand the tribulation of the heavens, it can transform from a False-Dragon or a Serpent into a True Dragon. Regaining the bloodline of an Ancient True Dragon and advancing into the realm of the Ten-Directions Divine Realm.

Trivia

the royal families of the four Seas were a race that had a more successful inheritance. Although the power of their bloodline was still declining with the passage of time, they were still much stronger than other Dragon descendants.

Notable People

Four Seas Category

Fu
==

SPOILER ALERT!

he is one of the Great Monsters ten thousands years ago, His friends are very important to him.

Appearance

The man was dressed in golden armor, and his eyes were somewhat strange, giving off a ferocious feeling. However, his body was extremely burly and his face was expressionless. He carried the long-handled battle axe on his shoulder, looking majestic and domineering.

Past

In order to comprehend the rules of the
Ten Directions Realm
, he and his close ones sealed themselves in an array for tens of thousands of years, which resulted in a massive drop of their cultivation from a Peak Martial Sovereign (estimated even Divine Transcendence for himself and his friends and Peak of Perfection for Shang) down to the Martial Emperor Realm.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

In the midst of an intense battle above the Demon Plain,
Yi Qing
 faces off against
Fu
, wielding a mighty 9th Rank Battle-Axe. Despite Yi Qing's efforts, he's overpowered, and Shang and his group watch as the battle escalates. Shang reveals his identity as the possessor of the
Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere
 to
Little Qing
. He seeks Little Qing's assistance in restoring the Artifact's power using the Eternal Evergreen Tree's energy, but Little Qing resists.

As the confrontation intensifies, Little Qing transforms into lightning and traps Shang and his companions. Shang utilizes the power of the Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere to create a celestial barrier, attempting to contain Little Qing.

Later,
Ge
 sacrifices himself to block Little Qing's devastating
Void Jade Azure Violet Palace Brahma World Annihilation Divine Thunder
 attack.
Li Yunxiao
 rushes to save Little Qing. Li Yunxiao injures Shang heavily, and Little Qing leaves a cryptic message before disappearing. The Sacred Fire Temple and Tianyi Chamber of Commerce unite against the monsters,
Qing Luo
 leading against Fu.

Li Yunxiao and
Mister Yu
 engage in a fierce confrontation, with Li Yunxiao gaining the upper hand and breaking Mister Yu's arm. Following the intense clashes, the monsters retreat, leaving behind a tense atmosphere.

Later,
Yu
,
Li
,
Shang
, and others are fighting off Spirit Rats repelled by the sound of war drums. Yu's arm is missing, and the group discusses their dire situation. Tang Jie, suggests they join the Four Extremes Sect. Yu, Shang, and others disagreed and tried to recover and discuss finding someone to repair the damaged Supreme Celestial Armillary Sphere.

After a while, Shang submits Tang Jie could help, and the group eventually agrees to join forces with him. Li helps Tang Jie recover but places the Seven Fiend Seal on him, causing intense pain. After Tang Jie's confrontation with
Dan Yangze
 and the events that followed, Tang Jie and his group refocused their efforts on dealing with Li Yunxiao and his allies.

After Tang Jie's failed attempt to bravely face the attacks, he and the other Great Monsters fled when faced with the
World God Monument
's descending strike by Li Yunxiao.
Fu
, attempted to strike the battleship with a powerful ninth-grade Xuan Artifact called the Xuan Flower Axe. To counter this,
Ye Fan
 revealed a Martial Will Pill that was enhanced with Nine Heavens Sovereign Qi, capable of withstanding the Xuan Artifact's impact.

After a fierce battle between
Mister Yu
 against Li Yunxiao and
Gourd Little King Kong
, Yu and Yunxiao heavily injured. Suddenly
Shen Feng
 came in the back of the Rank Eight Demonic Beast, the Nine-winged Spirit Snake Bird, Yu requested Shen Feng's assistance in eliminating Li Yunxiao, to which Shen Feng agreed. However, at the critical moment, a giant flying artifact, the
Money Chamber of Commerce
, intervened.
Qian Wudi
, appeared on the artifact and engaged in a verbal exchange with Li Yunxiao. After Li Yunxiao and Qian Wudi's intense negotiation, Qian Wudi agrees to trade Tianhun Herb, 1.2 billion mid-grade Primordial Stones, and additional resources for a mysterious item Li Yunxiao possesses.

Howevere, Shen Feng, tries to attack Li Yunxiao again, but
Zhang Hanzhe
 intervenes, leading to a standoff. Ultimately, the trade is made, with Li Yunxiao giving Qian Wudi the Seven Constellations Martial Will Fruit in exchange for Tianhun Herb and primordial stones. Tang Jie and his group from the Four Extremes Sect left the scene.

Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

In a frozen landscape, Li's attempt to break the formation triggers catastrophic consequences, Little Qing, who has been observing, warns that disaster is looming. The formation's instability leads to the sudden rise of an enormous ice mountain that engulfs Li, while the surrounding area experiences chaotic shifts between the four seasons.

The mountain's peak undergoes rapid transformations, with spring, summer, autumn, and winter all manifesting at different levels. The mountain's appearance reflects the four seasons, with spring at the midpoint, peach blossoms, withered trees, and snow at the base. Meanwhile, an immense boundary of the four seasons emerges in the distance, revealing the Immortal Mountain of lord
Throne
.

Four Seasons Immortal Mountain

Shang
 and the other Great Monsters, including
Yu
, appeared in the space where
Li Yunxiao
,
Tang Jie
 and the others were. Tang Jie's eagerness for revenge against Li Yunxiao intensifies. Shang orders an attack against Li Yunxiao and his group, including Zhang Shaotian. However, the unique environment suppresses the use of Primordial Qi and Essence, rendering the attackers powerless. Li Yunxiao's true power becomes apparent as he effortlessly defeats Tang Jie despite the restrictions, leaving the group of Great Monsters stunned.

Fu Yichun
=========

Personality

Fu Yichun is a little rotten, he’s still a good person,” ning Kewei said.

Plot

Though forced to submit by
Yu Shengfeng
 and becoming his spy, he felt an unexpected sense of relief even a hint of joy. Ever since
Tang Qing
 took over Red Moon City, the Elders had been cast aside. Their former prestige had vanished, and resources were scarce. Frustration had weighed on them for too long. Now, submitting to Nie Shengfeng felt far more dignified than serving Tang Qing. The oppression that had plagued them for so long seemed to lift, replaced by a renewed sense of purpose.

Hidden Families
 They had an extremely high status among the reclusive families, and the ‘sacred body’ that had been passed down from generation to generation was even more fascinating.

Ge
==

SPOILER ALERT!

Ge, was one of the Great Monsters  from ten thousands years ago, His friends are very important to him.

Past

In order to comprehend the rules of the
Ten Directions Realm
, he and his close ones sealed themselves in an array for tens of thousands of years, which resulted in a massive drop of their cultivation from a Peak Martial Sovereign (estimated even Divine Transcendence for himself and his friends and Peak of Perfection for Shang) down to the Martial Emperor Realm.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

In the midst of an intense battle above the Demon Plain, a fierce and bloody confrontation unfolds between a character named
Yi Qing
 and an opponent named
Fu
, who wields a powerful 9th Rank Battle-Axe. Despite Yi Qing's efforts, he is overpowered by Fu's strength, and their battle becomes increasingly dire.
Shang
 and his companions observe the fight.

During the battle, Shang reveals his true identity to a figure named
Little Qing
, who is also known as the Eternal Evergreen Tree. Shang explains his possession of the
Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere
, a treasure that has extended his life for millennia. He seeks Little Qing's assistance in restoring the Artifact's power using the Eternal Evergreen Tree's energy. However, Little Qing resists Shang's plea, leading to a tense exchange between them.

As the confrontation intensifies, Little Qing transforms into lightning and traps Shang and his companions. Shang utilizes the power of the Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere to create a celestial barrier, attempting to contain Little Qing.

Ge sacrifices himself to block Little Qing's devastating
Void Jade Azure Violet Palace Brahma World Annihilation Divine Thunder
 attack. Ge's sacrifice stabilizes the situation momentarily, preventing the annihilation of their group. The act of selflessness and bravery has a profound impact on his old friends and Shang.

Power

The four great demons were not strong but the weapons in their hands had been 100% refined tens of thousands of years ago. The power of a ninth tier profound armament was something that even a martial sovereign would not dare to underestimate.

Ge Xiangqian
============

He is a Fourth-Tier Alchemist from the
Duskflame Empire
's Alchemist Association. Even if he is not a High-Tier Alchemist, he is still a renowned figure in the Shangyang City.

Plot

Duskflame's Alchemist Association

Ge Xiangqian is one of the three Rank-Four Alchemist masters present during the confrontation with
Li Yunxiao
. When Li Yunxiao proposes a duel against all three of them simultaneously, Ge Xiangqian becomes offended by his arrogance and challenges him. However, Li Yunxiao calmly explains that the outcome of the duel depends on the stakes involved, and if they are too low, he won't be interested.

Xin Ze presents a seventh-tier quality
Cosmic Sun Note Jade
, which greatly enhances an alchemist master's refining abilities. The other two alchemist masters,
Lu Haochu
 and
Ge Xiangqian
, offer a
Heavenly Flame Battle Flag
 and a pair of
Purple Cloud Centipede Wings
, respectively, as their gambling stakes.

To everyone's astonishment, Li Yunxiao claims that someone will bring the 100 million mid-grade primal stones for the gambling bet soon. Xin Ze, initially skeptical, is proven wrong when his brother,
Xin Pi
, arrives and hands over the 100 million mid-grade primal stones as promised.

Despite the disbelief and shock from the other alchemist masters, their confidence in winning the bet is gradually shaken as he observes Li Yunxiao's demeanor, which shows deep certainty of victory against the three of them.

The Alchemy Competition

As the competition begins, Li Yunxiao surprises everyone by suggesting that each of the three alchemist masters will condense one primal stone, while he alone will condense two primal stones simultaneously. This shocks the three alchemist masters, as it increases the difficulty of the competition significantly.

Despite their anger and disbelief, they continue with the competition. Li Yunxiao impresses them with his mastery of the Twelve Forms of Flying Flower and Falling Snow, a set of refining techniques created by the renowned alchemist, Gu Feiyang. Li Yunxiao's use of these advanced techniques and his overall proficiency in alchemy leave the three alchemist masters in awe and shock.

Finally, Ge Xiangqian can no longer hold back and attacks first, using the same method as Li Yunxiao to condense his primal stone. The competition is now underway, and everyone is eager to see who will come out victorious.

Ge Xiangqian managed to raise the primal stone to a Mid-grade level but exhausted a lot of energy in the process, leaving him visibly fatigued. Next, Lu Haochu took over, using his Yamata Branch Heart Cultivation Mantra to condense the primal stone. His technique was beautiful and dreamy, but he also struggled to match Li Yunxiao's level of refinement.

Li Yunxiao, on the other hand, effortlessly advanced his primal stone to the middle grade, showcasing his superior understanding and control of the Twelve Forms of Flying Flower and Falling Snow. He surprised everyone by using a new and mysterious technique called the Scripture of Rippling Mirage. The technique impressed even Baili Gongjin, a rank six alchemist, who recognized its profoundness and admitted his admiration for Li Yunxiao's mastery.

After Baili Gongjin shared the story of his encounter with Lord Gu Feiyang and his advice, Lu Haochu attempted to condense a primal stone using his powerful soul force. However, his technique lacked finesse and appeared clumsy compared to Li Yunxiao's mastery. He raised the primal stone to a High-grade level but felt fatigued after the effort. In response, Li Yunxiao managed to advance the primal stone to a high-grade level, impressing everyone with his skills and talent.

Now, Xin Ze is attempting to advance the primal stone to the supreme-grade level, while Li Yunxiao is doing the same. Despite Li Yunxiao's exhausted state, he surprises everyone by suddenly revitalizing and displaying incredible control over his soul power and the primordial stone, keeping up with Xin Ze's progress. The two are in a fierce competition to see who can reach the supreme-grade level first.

But, later, Li Yunxiao even succeeded in forming a Innate Primordial Elixir, a divine object, which amazed all the alchemists present. Even the Supreme-grade primal stone he used to create it transformed into the Inner Core, which symbolized the Innate Primordial Elixir. Witnessing Li Yunxiao's extraordinary skill and calm demeanor, the other alchemists, including Xin Ze, Ge Xiangqian, and Lv Haochu, were deeply impressed. In a show of respect and admiration, the three fourth-grade Alchemists knelt down and expressed their admiration for Li Yunxiao's prowess.

General
=======

Appearance

The General was a tall and sturdy man. The man’s entire figure was covered in a gray robe, beneath the grey rob was clad in a golden armor that was engraved with arrays. His face was calm and his eyes were intelligent. with six golden beads between his fingers, each of which was engraved with a small seal character, which read: soldier, elephant, horse, chariot, cannon, and soldier.

Background

The general was the most mysterious person in the myriad Stars Valley. He followed the myriad Stars Valley’s sect master, Tian Xingzi, like a shadow and had never been separated. Even the people of the myriad Stars Valley never knew of the general’s identity.

History

Back then, Tian Xingzi brought this very General to wager against Teng Guang in a game of strategy. But even with such a formidable creation, he still lost

Power

The Chessboard General and his Six Puppet Knights were formidable, each representing a key piece in a deadly game of strategy and power. These puppets were not mere machines; they possessed intelligence, agility, and an eerie semblance of life. Their deep-set eyes flickered with eerie light as they moved with mechanical precision.

Wind-Chasing Cannon (Pao) –  A broad-shouldered, short-built puppet carrying a five-foot-long cylindrical cannon on his shoulder. He is impulsive, aggressive, and eager for battle, always the first to engage the enemy. His attacks are explosive and devastating, capable of unleashing destructive energy with immense force.

Blood-Eyed Knight (Shi Wushuang) – Slender and quick, with a head shaped like a crescent moon and red Bloodthirsty Demon Eyes that glow ominously. His gaze can see through his opponents, detecting their strength and weaknesses. Emotional and attached to his comrades, he has a strong sense of loyalty but is prone to reckless actions when enraged.

Sky-Devouring Elephant (Xiang) – A massive, heavily-armored brute with overwhelming strength. His enormous golden sickle could cleave through the battlefield like a storm.

Phantom Horse (Ma Feiying) – A master of spatial manipulation, able to teleport instantaneously. His ability to divide his body into multiple clones made him elusive and nearly untouchable.

Chariot (Yue Che) – The fastest among the puppets, specializing in overwhelming speed and maneuverability. His strikes are precise and relentless, making it difficult for opponents to counter.

Soldier (Ma Feifei) – A standard frontline warrior, disciplined and steadfast. Though seemingly unremarkable, his movements and battle instincts make him a reliable fighter.

Trivia

The General was created as a perfect vessel for Tian Xingzi's descent. Unlike ordinary possession techniques, which have limitations, the General was specially refined to ensure a high degree of compatibility, allowing Tian Xingzi to exert his full power when taking over the body.

Since the General and the other puppets are not truly living beings, they are essentially immortal. Even if they are killed or destroyed, Tian Xingzi can simply create new ones,

Geng Xing
=========

He is the city lord of
Yufeng City
 in the Northern Region. Since the teleportation array in Yufeng City was damaged, he organized a small trade fair, inviting prominent figures from the city to exchange their rarest treasures. He also invited
Mei Jiu
 to host the event.

Apprarance

He wore a blue robe, his eyes were as clear as lake water, and his face was full of smiles.

Plot

During the fair, he traded the Soul-Raising Tree, formed from the essence of the Kunwu Divine Tree, for the wreckage of an eighth-grade Netherworld Warship that Li Yunxiao possessed.

Later, in an act of generosity reminiscent of
Lei Feng
, he provided Li Yunxiao with free information about a location where mutated water elements might be found.

Geniuses of the Younger Generation
==================================

General Information

Young people from the North, West, East regions with exceptionally high talent and cultivations at the Martial Supreme / Martial Sovereign Realm. They are usually from big sects or influental forces. They all come from the Northern, Western and Eastern Regions which have a far superior cultivation environment to the Southern Region.

Tho not officially established, if one were to include the South Region then the most promising talents there would be
Li Yi
 and
Li Yunxiao
.

The seven stars of the Eastern Region

Jefe de las siete estrellas de la región oriental - Ruan Zimao.

He Guanyu

Li Xin

Tian Gan

Four Prodigies of the North

Jefe de los cuatro grandes del Norte -

Beiming Laifeng

Zhu Shunqi

Three Heroes of the West

líder de los cinco héroes de la Región Occidental - Cheng haomiao

Lu Yuxing

Kuai Qi

Ghost Asura
===========

The Ghost Asura was a product of a failed refinement of true Spirit's blood. It has no soul at all and only has a physical body. It's almost undying and extremely powerful. the most ideal killing machine created by
Wei Qing
 along with
Qiu Mujie
, with the support of the
Holy Region
 and Long Family, using humans with strong dragon bloodlines as the foundation for his experiments.

Appearance

Some had the head of a bull and the body of a snake, with four horns. Some had two horns on their heads, but they were of different species. The other had four heads and eight arms, which was even more terrifying than a true fiend Dharma idol.

Background

The Ghost Asura, though not as monstrous as
Qiu Mujie
, was fueled by semi-finished dragon’s blood. Lacking emotions, senses, or fear, it was even harder to defeat. However, dragon blood couldn’t be refined alone—it required a dragon descendant’s body as a container.

The experiment had a high failure rate, with most subjects reduced to ashes. Only a select few with strong bloodlines were chosen, like the nine Ghost Asuras.
Ruo Xiang
 had also been a candidate but failed, while
Luo Qingyun
 alone succeeded. Otherwise, there might have been a tenth Ghost Asura.

The other failed experiments are called Shuras, categorized by strength into Gold, Silver, Bronze, and Iron. Among them, Ghost Shuras are the most valuable, having nearly reached the Tenth Order Divine Blood. Only Gold Shuras pose a real threat, while the others are essentially worthless.

Power

Ghost Asuras had 'ultimate bodies' like Qiu Mujie. In addition to the half-finished dragon blood, the concentration of their blood was even higher than that of Yun Xiang. Even if they encountered a peak nine-star expert, they would not be defeated.

Unlike Qiu Mujie, who used the Battleship Fish to convert vital stones into endless energy, the Ghost Asuras couldn’t achieve perpetual regeneration. However, they compensated with the Vital Eating Pill, allowing them to rapidly recover strength—a groundbreaking and unnatural innovation. Each Ghost Asura also wore a spatial ring, likely filled with primordial cores to sustain their power.

Known Ghost Asura

Yang Yuanshu

Yi xi

(Qiu Mujiea dopted son)

Li Si

Zhang San

Yi Hongming

Trivia

To control ghost Asuras with semi-finished bloodlines, you must have Luo Qingyun or others people, who has the real dragon blood.

According to
Zi Xiao Ji
, Lord
Wei Qing
 research on these ghost Asuras costs one-third of the sacred zone's annual budget.

It need quite a few of the ingredients to creat Ghost Asura, is the bodies of ancient beasts or even true spirits. To refine dragon blood, one must possess the bloodline of a Dragon.

Although they didn't have much intelligence, they still had the emotion of anger and killing.

Ghost King
==========

Appearance

Ghost King is more than 30 meters tall, like a giant spirit he had a green face and fangs, its huge mouth was as red as a basin of blood, and its eyes flickered with a sinister look.

Background

Ghost King It is said that it is the same kind of existence as
Ramayana
 an existence that has existed for a long time. In the past he made a bet with the leader of the Ancestor of the Jiuli tribe, Great Demon Zhi  and lost he then signed this unfair contract. That's why they can summon Ghost King with a certain amount of offerings. And he will contribute as much power as the summoner offer.

Plot

Having successfully severed Yi Fen’s last connection to Noah’s Ship, the Ghost King took full control of the legendary warship. However, his focus quickly shifted to Lin Yunxiao, whose growing power filled him with unease. Ignoring Long Qianmiao, who was extracting the power of the Heavenly Phoenix, the Ghost King furiously charged at Lin Yunxiao, roaring in disbelief, With a massive green palm print infused with the Light of Reincarnation, he struck down, shattering space itself. Yet, just as the attack was about to land, a barrier of golden and black runes emerged, blocking his devastating blow. Shocked, the Ghost King unleashed the Eternal Reincarnation Blade, its power surging through the Great Wheel of Samsara. Despite relentless slashes, the barrier held firm until it finally shattered—but not before Lin Yunxiao opened his eyes, revealing one golden and one black pupil.

A deep, primal fear gripped the Ghost King’s soul. Beads of sweat rolled down his forehead as two True Fiend Dharma Idols—one golden, one black—manifested behind Lin Yunxiao. Each had three heads and six arms, their expressions embodying both divine serenity and demonic wrath. As their power merged, they formed a towering Giant Spirit Dharmakaya, its arms wielding golden and black energy spheres. The Ghost King, refusing to accept defeat, unleashed his strongest strike, summoning the Wheel of Samsara and the Eternal Reincarnation Blade to cut down his foe. But the Giant Spirit Dharmakaya effortlessly blocked both attacks, shattering the blade’s energy into chaos. Fear twisted the Ghost King’s face as Lin Yunxiao made his final move—a black saber, descending from the golden-black nebula.

As the saber fell, space itself began to collapse.

The Ghost King, believing himself invincible, had executed his plans flawlessly, even obtaining Noah’s Ship. However, when faced with Lin Yunxiao, his power was meaningless. He unleashed the Reincarnation Light, an ultimate attack capable of erasing all existence. Yet, Yunxiao’s True Fiend Dharma Idol effortlessly countered it with the Aghan Bone Cleaver, a blade so powerful that it fractured time and space itself. The Ghost King’s strongest technique was shattered in moments, and the very world split in half from Yunxiao’s attack. Terrified, the Ghost King tried to flee, but the blade’s energy pursued him relentlessly.
He made a desperate final stand with Heaven Burning Moon, but his defenses crumbled instantly. Severely wounded and consumed by demonic energy, he collapsed, barely clinging to life. The once unstoppable ruler of Samsara was reduced to a powerless figure, struggling to survive.

The Ghost King attempted to ambush Lin Yunxiao, but it was a trap. Yunxiao had been expecting the attack and lured him in. He summoned the Aghan Bone Cleaver, now radiating golden light, and struck with overwhelming force. The Ghost King, realizing his mistake too late, tried to flee, but the saber strike was inescapable. His body swelled uncontrollably before violently exploding, scattering ghostly energy across the battlefield.

The shockwave injured many warriors, even forcing Wei Qing to spit blood. As the battlefield fell silent, it became clear—the Ghost King had been completely destroyed, his existence erased.

Power

The Ghost King is so powerful that even beings of divine transcendence cannot match him. Wei Qing states that to face the Ghost King, one would need more than eight Ghost Asuras or three experts of divine transcendence to have a chance against him. He even wields the Small Wheel Three-Phase Life Transformation Reincarnation Wheel—an ancient artifact of unparalleled power refined directly from the force of reincarnation. Although this profound weapon contains only a trace of the reincarnation rules, when activated with long preparation, it enables him to unleash 100% of his power already reached the God Realm without being suppressed or restricted by the Heavenly Martial Realm law.

Ghost King’s ultimate ability he can merging directly with
Great Wheel of Reincarnation
. A massive green skull appeared above him, its hollow eyes burning with eerie flames. As its mouth opened into a pitch-black void, it devoured the Thirty-Three Gongcao. By merging directly with the Wheel of Samsara, he could assimilate everyone trapped within its domain. Bathed in the light of reincarnation, they would be melted into pure energy, becoming his nourishment and strengthening him endlessly.

Gluttonous Snake
================

Gluttonous Snake, is a descendant of a true spirit with powerful spatial abilities. Its cultivation revolves entirely around endless consumption—it constantly devours everything in its path, as if it can never be full. As it eats, its body grows proportionally, and when it reaches a certain limit, the consumed matter condenses within it, forming an internal space of varying size and quality. Some of these internal spaces can be as vast as half a city, capable of housing millions of people. This ability makes the Gluttonous Snake an ideal refuge for hidden families or sects, allowing them to exist in secrecy within the creature’s body.

Trivia

the internal space of the snake is restricted by the rules.
Narcissus
 can summon the deep-sea Giant beast at any time, but she could not contact it at all.

Gong
====

After the fall of one Demon Lord, a Gong projection  appeared to negotiate, as envoy he proposed gathering the elites of both worlds for a life-and-death battle in half a year. However, as the leader of the
Heavenly Martial Alliance
, Li Yunxiao not only rejected the offer but also destroyed the projection, making his stance clear the Tianwu Realm would fight to the death to protect their homeland.

Gong Haoqian
============

Gong Haoqian, was a elder of the
Heavenly Draconic Family
.

Appearance

Gong Haoqian  had a broad forehead and face, a tiger body and bear waist, a pitch-black body, and a pair of feather wings following him. Hi is the descendant of a bat spirit.

Plot

Gong Haoqian was the one who issued the order forbidding anyone from approaching the Council of Elders. When Fei Ni and Li Yunxiao attempted to force their way in, he personally confronted them, determined to capture Fei Ni and expel Li Yunxiao’s group. However, Li Yunxiao challenged him Take one move  from him. Confident in his strength, Gong Haoqian accepted the challenge, only to meet a devastating fate. Li Yunxiao unleashed the might of Tushita Peak, crushing him instantly, leaving no chance for resistance.

Gongyang Zhengqi
================

He seeks control of the great forces of the World, and hides his schemes from the other Rulers of the
Holy Region
.

Appearance

His face was a plain and ordinary face, the kind that would be forgotten immediately even if one walked in a crowd. There was not the slightest bit of brilliance.

Personality

Gongyang Zhengqi
 was a firm, calculating, and authoritative leader who thrived on control and order. He had a sharp mind and unwavering confidence in his ability to govern. Pragmatic and unyielding, he was not one to tolerate disorder or dissent, often enforcing strict measures to ensure stability. His long tenure overseeing the
Holy Region
 made him believe he was the most capable of managing its affairs, and he wasn’t afraid to challenge or override his peers to maintain authority. Though his methods were rigid, he saw them as necessary for the greater good. His stern demeanor masked a sharp political mind, always a step ahead in power struggles.

Five Clouds Mountains

During the war against the monster race, Gongyang Zhengqi watched the battle unfold from the shadows. However, when
Wei Wuya
 appeared to aid the human forces, Zhengqi was forced to reveal himself. He emerged with hundreds of golden-armored warriors, similar to
Ghost Asura
. It was then revealed that Zhengqi had orchestrated a secret plot, using the 100,000 True Earth Seals to trap both the monster race and his own allies,

Gongyang Zhengqi's plan was to unlock the seal of Five Cloud Mountain, allowing the human and demon tribes to battle and weaken each other. His ultimate goal was to use the golden-armored warriors and the
Earth Alliance
 to eliminate the Monster tribe and take control of the weakened Holy Land, reorganizing it under his authority.

However, the Monster tribe's unexpected strength prolonged the war, forcing him to involve various Holy Land factions. The heavy losses, including the deaths of key directors, were not part of his plan, as he aimed to control a strong and unified Holy Land. His carefully crafted strategy began to unravel as circumstances spiraled beyond his control.

Holy Capital/Earth

With
Li Yunxiao
, Wei Qing, and
Wei Wuya
 invasion of the
Holy Capital
, Gongyang Zhengqi who was being led by
Meng Ling
 appears. Having reached the
Virtual Extreme
 with the guidance of
Perfected Meng Ling
, he fights with Wei Wuya and offers to go to the Demon Realm to get a Qilin Bone, with the hope of attaining
Good Fortune
, but, he is stopped by Meng Ling who soon after comforts him.

Mount Meru
, one of the
four secret Realms
 of the

.

Martial Grandmaster

Martial Emperor,

Martial Supreme

Later, Li Yunxiao refined it again with Northern Heaven Cold Star Iron, Memory Origin Gold and Heavenly Shine Gold. With that it reached the Nine Heavens
Martial Sovereign
 Rank with incomparable strong defenses, high self-regeneration and combat-power.

When Yunxiao visited Ocean Emperor's Palace, he used the smithy to further strengthen it.

Run Zong

Northern Sea
's Royal Family, Gourd Little King Kong got teleported away by an artifact of Run Zong, which utilized pink crystal dust.

Beiming Dark Palace

Ling Mudi
, the former Palace Master of Black Tortoise Palace, an expert from 100,000 years ago.

After gathering sufficient materials, Yunxiao produces Divine Steel, with the help of Ling Mudi. With that, he refines a body for the latter and also improves the Gourd Little King Kongs body, so Ling Mudi no longer needs to possess it.

Founded by Li Yi, together with people who don't want to join the

. While Xuanli Island and the Heavenly Martial Alliance are allied forces and exist for the sole purpose of exterminating the demons/ devils from the Demon Realm, Li Yi's Hegemony Alliance was founded with the ulterior motive of taking advantage of the war. After the two sides wear down their forces, they plan to dominate the Heavenly Martial Realm and the Demon World.

Great Wheel of Reincarnation
============================

The Wheel of Reincarnation is a super-grade formation weapon, created to imitate the laws of Samsara (Reincarnation). Unlike ordinary mysterious weapons, which typically possess only one spirit, and even super-quality ones that may have two or three, this artifact contains thirty-three spirits known as the "Gong Cao". Each of these spirits was once a powerful god, their souls refined into the weapon to sustain its immense power.

However, true reincarnation is an elusive and unpredictable force, beyond the reach of even the most advanced formations or mysterious weapons. The creator of this artifact, despite their mastery, was unable to directly harness the power of reincarnation. As a result, they devised a formation where thirty-three powerful individuals acted as the core, channeling the laws of Samsara into the weapon.

Once activated, Wheel's greatest abilities is the power to create its own domain a projection of the true place of reincarnation, trapping numerous enemies inside and preventing them to escape and The power of reincarnation seeps into every being, suppressing not only living beings but even others Xuan weapons/Artifact. Those caught in its domain will find their strength rapidly drained, their very existence eroded by Samsara's power. A terrifying aspect of this artifact is its immortality effect. The Gongcao spirits, even after being slain, will revive as long as the Wheel of Reincarnation remains intact. This makes it an almost unstoppable force, as those who fall to its power will continuously resurrect, bound by the eternal cycle of reincarnation.

Trivia

With sufficient preparation, the Ghost King can use the Great Wheel of Reincarnation to bypass the laws of Heavenly Martial Arts, allowing him to unleash his full power without any restriction. Within the domain created by the Great Wheel of Reincarnation, he is completely unbound by external limitations, making him an overwhelming force.

Gu Qingqing
===========

Appearance

A woman with a graceful figure wore a flowing purple-blue dress adorned with embroidered cloud patterns trailing behind her. She had a fresh, refined appearance and an extraordinary temperament.

History

30.000 years ago, she led as the sect master of the Heavenly Night Palace. Her legendary status stems from the sealing of numerous monster race clans within her profound artifact, the Five Cloud Mountain. Notably, the lineage of the then-Monster Emperor, the Ash Demon Clan, were among those sealed, marking the beginning of the Monster clan's decline.

thousands of years ago, Gu Qingqing of the divine cloud Palace fused with the rainbow stones and became almost invincible. The patriarch was shocked and wanted to find out how to fuse them. In the end, he was severely injured and died not long after.

Plot

Heaven of Langya

Gu Qingqing, along with
Mo
,
Duanmu Yuyu
, and
Duanmu Cang
, tracked Yunxiao’s whereabouts using the Duanmu siblings’ divination techniques. They waited for him on
Big Wheel Island
, where Mo immediately confronted Yunxiao, demanding the
Buddhist Demon Sacred Art
, believing he possessed it.

Later, after entering
Langya Heaven
, Gu Qingqing helped Yunxiao reach the
Eternal World
. She even subdued
Mu Xing
, who tried to stop her from breaking the final seal of the
Heavy Equipment Tower
.

Trivia

The ancestor that Gu Qing Qing killed was Yu Yi Xian’s master.

Back then, The reason she had fought with the Monster clan is for the statue of the
Women
 with the Buddhist Demon Sacred art that Yunxiao got from Outer space where
Di Jun
 was sealed, but it ended up in vain. Instead, it had caused thousands of years of conflict between the two clans.

Gu Qingqinv could only  hold on for more than half an hour in the void extreme immortal state before got suppressed by the Tianwu rules.

===========

Situ Heng
, to kill
Hai Lin
 and their caravan.

Plot

Light Song Forest

He tried to kill
Hai Lin
 and their caravan during their way to the Light Song Forest, and failed in two attempts. So he tried to use a secret technique to summon a High-Rank Demonic Beast. But Li Yunxiao successfully traps the beast using his profound artifact, the Heavenly Spirit Ring, and the caravan absorbs the star power to cultivate and make breakthroughs.

Upon entering the Light Song Forest, Li Yunxiao confronts Gu Yuesheng and Situ Heng, Li Yunxiao displays his strength as a fifth-rank Alchemist and engages in a battle of spiritual attacks with Gu Yuesheng. Despite Gu Yuesheng's powerful attack using the
Immemorial Heaven Eye
 and the Pupil Technique — Moon Gap of Gu Feiyang, Li Yunxiao manages to counter it with the
Imperial Bell
, an ancient artifact, and overwhelms him.

During the battle,
Duan Yue
, who was previously thought to be dead, appears to assist Li Yunxiao. Duan Yue reveals himself as a Martial Emperor,
