Guangfa
=======

After
Li Yunxiao
 invaded the
Land of Rain
, the sacred territory of the
Southern Sea
, under the orders of the Southern Sea King,
Guangxian
, He is surrounded by several Dragon Guards due to desecrating the tombs there.

Dragon Head Guangfa, leader of the Dragon Guards, clashes with Che You after he acquires the
Dragon Treasure
 Body. During the battle, both summon one of the
Four Swords
 that make up the legendary World Sword of the first True Dragon.

But when they noticed that their strengths were equal, they were hesitant to use the legendary weapons. Until the sky was torn apart by Li Yunxiao's withdrawal of the
Dragon Hammer
, which results in the emergence of the forbidden place of the Land of Rain, the birthplace of
Shi
, the first Son of the True Dragon
Yin Yu
.

After coming face to face with Shi colossal eyes, they hear a sigh and narrowly escape inevitable death at the hands of the True Dragon Breath of the eldest of the
Nine Dragons
.

Some time later, during the confrontation between the
Guang Yuan
 forces and the
Guangxian
 forces, they are trapped in a seal, which is broken with a blow from Guangfa Limitless Tribulation, which appears on the spot. Upon encountering Li Yunxiao, he tries to eliminate him, until he is stopped by
Narcissus
.

Guangfa expresses indifference upon learning of Narcissus status, and attempts to kill her as well, until a
shadow
 emerges from the girl body to protect her. After trying a few more attacks and almost killing Li Yunxiao, a Divine Consciousness appeared under Narcissus body again.

When facing the
Ocean Emperor
 who asked Guangfa to let them both go, he once again expressed dissatisfaction and contempt for the Ocean Emperor status, which shocked everyone. But, Bo Long, noticing that his status alone is not enough, steals Amithaba Golden Lotus from Guang Yuan and asks if he will listen to him, which surprises Guangfa and leaves him with no option.

With that, he reveals his name to Guang Yuan and Guangxian who are astonished by his identity and choose to lower their heads and leave with him without a fight.

Years later, Yin Yu returns to the Land of Rain, kills Shi, and takes Guangfa, the Rank A Clans, and Royal Families of the Four Seas as his soldiers. During the battle in the
Sea Forest
, due to Yin Yu injuries, Guangfa willingly gives himself to his Master as a tonic to recover his forms.

Gui Lin
=======

Gui Lin,  the owner of the branch thunderwind Chamber of Commerce at South Fire City.

Background

Hai Beifei
==========

He is a Two-Star Martial Supreme and the Vice-Leader of the
Rookie Mercenary Group
. His son
Hai Lin
 suffering from a tyrannic illness that is related to the bloodline power of a Desolate Kun Bull, an ancient earth-type demonic beast.

Plot

Rookie Mercenary Group

He seeks
Li Yunxiao
's help to save his son,
Hai Lin
. An expert once left a method to extract the divine body's power to suppress Hai Lin's bloodline, but it would render the person with the divine body cultivation-less.

Hai Beifei believes that Li Yunxiao's arrival was an opportunity sent by heaven to save Hai Lin. He offers Li Yunxiao the position of the eighth team captain in their mercenary group, as well as assistance in improving his formula path. However, in return, Hai Beifei asks Li Yunxiao to sacrifice his divine body and cultivation to suppress Hai Lin's bloodline power.

Li Yunxiao refuses the offer, suspecting that Hai Beifei would have forcibly extracted his divine body's power if he hadn't saved Hai Lin and the group. He confronts Hai Beifei and warns him not to force him into such a situation.

After witnessing Li Yunxiao's powerful display of strength and the extraordinary nature of his divine body and demonic flame, Hai Beifei becomes cautious and refrains from forcing Li Yunxiao to sacrifice his divine body for Hai Lin's sake. Li Yunxiao reveals his intention to go to the Ancient Desolate Lands for training and seeks information on how to get there.

Hai Beifei reveals that he knows how to reach the Ancient Desolate Lands, but it requires the use of the Eternal Evergreen Tree, which is difficult to find due to its mobility and rarity. However, he informs Li Yunxiao that the Eternal Evergreen Tree is the only entrance to the Ancient Desolate Lands, which is located in the Outer Space.

Realizing the significance of the tree, Li Yunxiao and Hai Beifei decide to work together to find the Eternal Evergreen Tree to enable Li Yunxiao's entry into the Ancient Desolate Lands. In return, Li Yunxiao promises to help Hai Lin with his bloodline issue once they obtain the wood element essence from the tree.

Hai Beifei makes Li Yunxiao the captain of the eighth team in the rookie mercenary group during the search for the Eternal Evergreen Tree, allowing Li Yunxiao access to more resources and support from the group.

Hai Lin
=======

Hai Lin is the son of the Vice-Leader of the
Rookie Mercenary Group
,
Hai Beifei
. He is suffering from a tyrannic illness that is related to the bloodline power of a Desolate Kun Bull, an ancient earth-type demonic beast.

Plot

Light Song Forest

He leads a merchant group in the Demon Plain and encounters Li Yunxiao and his companions after their teleportation array deviates from its intended destination.

Initially wary of them, the group became more receptive upon learning that Li Yunxiao was an Alchemist.
Commander Zuo
, offered to guide them to the Gentle Song Forest but remained guarded, particularly towards
Ding Ling'er
, whom he found suspicious.

During their journey together, Li Yunxiao examined Hai Lin's condition and discovered that his illness was related to the bloodline power of a Desolate Kun Bull, an ancient earth-type demonic beast. Li Yunxiao suggested several potential cures, including hunting powerful demonic beasts or finding a Five Elements Devouring Spirit Rat. The caravan faced numerous challenges and dangers along the way, including an overwhelming attack by a massive horde of Five Elements Spirit Devouring Rats.

As they approach the Light Song Forest, they encounter a powerful Seven-Rank Demonic Beast summoned by
Gu Yuesheng
. Li Yunxiao successfully traps the beast using his profound artifact, the Heavenly Spirit Ring, and the caravan absorbs the star power to cultivate and make breakthroughs. Li Yunxiao and others experience significant improvements in their strength.

Upon entering the Light Song Forest, Li Yunxiao confronts Gu Yuesheng and
Situ Heng
, displaying his strength as an Alchemist.
Duan Yue
 also appears to help Li Yunxiao, revealing his true strength as a Martial Emperor. The Li Yunxiao successfully rescues rookie mercenary group from the lava swamp and escapes to safety, and they entered the city successfully.

History

New Li Yunxiao

 and Chen Zhen tried to protect Li Yunxiao from Du Feng and Luo Jie, but unfortunately, despite Han Bai's strength as a 4-chakra Martial Apprentice, Luo Jie was a 5-chakra Martial Apprentice. References

Han Junting
===========

One of the greatest talents on the
Tianwu Continent
. Already being a high-rank
Martial Sovereign
, when still in her twenties, few people can rival her. She is a direct disciple of
Qu Hongyan
.

Personality

Junting has always been a sensible, stubborn but highly calculative, always scheming and leveraging others' strength to achieve his goals. However, he often underestimates the impact of his own power, relying too much on manipulation. This flaw has led to repeated misjudgments, Although she can be a little temperamental sometimes, she can still distinguish right from wrong in the face of major issues.

Appearance

A touch of red flashed across her face, and her eyes flickered like the moon shining on the cold river, giving people a cold and ethereal feeling. As the poem slowly fell, her peerless beauty gradually revealed itself. She was as misty as the light clouds covering the moon, and as fleeting as the snow returning to the wind.

History

Getting news about Yunxiao and his treasures she tries many times to set him up and even kill him, but fails each time.

After Li Yunxiao's identy as Gu Feiyang is revealed she gets more desperate in ending Yunxiao's live. It's revealed that she is secretly in love with her Master Qu Hongyan and can't bear that she has been rejected.

In her last attempt to kill Li Yunxiao she reveals that she loves her Master,
Qu Hongyan
, and is extremely envious and hateful towards Yunxiao for that reason. Yunxiao manages to capture her and imprisons her in his
Divine Realm Tablet
 and to later hand her over to Qu Hongyan to punish.

Qu Hongyan can't bear to kill her and just imprisons her in the Sect.

Technique

Butterfly Transformation—two seven-colored orbs appeared, releasing a surge of mystical runes. Like a peacock spreading its tail, the radiant symbols bloomed, swiftly transforming into magnificent wings.

Trivia

When Gu Feiyang die at
Tiandang Mountains
 she sent people into tiandang mountain several times to get his body out.

Later, she revealed the reason why she hated Li Yunxiao so much and confessed her true feelings about her master.

Hao Feng
========

Hao Feng, one of four king of the
Eternal World
.

Plot

Haofeng first appears after
Yin Yu
 and
Li Yunxiao
 battle in the
Lin
 territory, attempting to snatch the
Divine Realm Tablet
 and shattering the Tusita Heavenly Peak in the process.

He kills a Void Prime expert with just two strikes, but since he is unable to take the Divine Realm Tablet, he chooses to side with Li Yunxiao and his team, escorting them out of the chaos. Even Lu Congzi, who attempts to stop them by summoning his 36 Ten Directional Evil Spirits, is easily defeated with a single saber slash.

Despite the disadvantageous situation, Lu Congzi refuses to back down. He summons two Devil Lords, and with Bo Yuqing’s aid, the battle between the two factions erupts once again. Facing one of the summoned Devil Lords, Qiang, he swiftly cuts him down with a single saber strike.

Seeing this, Lu Congzi, who is locked in battle with Feng Yaoli, realizes he has no other choice. Desperate to turn the tide, he uses Yin Yu’s body to summon the Demon King through the forbidden
God-Praying Technique
.

Soon, both sides Yunxiao and his allies against the Demon King unleashed their ultimate techniques. Under the joint assault of both groups, more than ten powerful attacks collided at once.

The most striking among them were the
Agama Bone Cleaver
 and the
Demon Picture of Qingyuan
, clashing like two massive black holes, devouring everything around them.

The terrifying explosion that followed engulfed everyone, its sheer destructive force ripping through the
Realm of Eternal Life
 itself. Even
Hao Feng
, who was far from the impact, couldn't escape its shockwave his face turned pale as he coughed up blood.

later under
Ye Qingyu
 orders completely sides with the
Heavenly Martial Alliance
.

Power

Among his techniques, listed at the top is the manifestation of a Sword Domain, which in conjunction with a secret technique, allows him to deliver a full force attack of an expert at the Early Stage of the Realm of Good Fortune, greatly exhausting his Energy in the process, before becoming a Good Fortune expert, he could use this move at most three times before becoming completely exhausted.

Haolian Shaohuang

Chronology

Cultivation

Techniques

Relationships

He greatly respects his
Master
. Although his cultivation talent is only mediocre among Gu Feiyang's disciples, through hard work and perseverance he manages to step into the Martial Sovereign Realm. His fist intent is unparalleled amongst his peers, since he solely focusses on improving his fist techniques.

Appearance

He is tall and has robo bust body, his eyes are dark yellow such as his hair as well, having blue marks around his body. While also having a light-ish yet dark gloves with an open coat-like. Without wearing a shirt under it. Keeping it open to all.

Personality

Haolian Shaohuang is a bold and carefree individual, known for his ruffian nature and straightforward attitude. He often speaks without restraint, displaying a playful and flirtatious side, especially when it comes to women. Despite his crude humor and brash behavior, Haolian is loyal and reliable when it comes to serious matters.

Background

Breaking through to the Nine Heavens Realm can't be done just by seclusion. It requires a great opportunity. So, He selected the Demon Origin Plains as a seclusion place to find his own opportunity to break through to Martial Sovereign.

In the past, he was
Li Yunxaio
 (Gu Feiyang) 4th discipline, 50 years ago. His master Gu Feiyang only taught him Vajra Fist technique at Lingxaio peak. On a mountain. covered with snow. Not teaching him anything else, and so- Haolian Shaohuag trained every day on the same technique.

Plot

After breaking through to the Martial Sovereign realm, Haolian Shaohuang returned to Qingge Forest with his mercenary group. he led a campaign against rival factions that refused to unite under his banner. One by one, he crushed those who resisted, showing no mercy to those who stood in his way. By the end of his conquest, only one mercenary group remained.

Trivia

Reach One-Star Martial Sovereign with the help of
Yunxiao
 and
Evergreen Tree

Reach Two-Star Martial Sovereign cultivating in
Divine Realm Tablet

Haolian Shaohuang

Chronology

Cultivation

Techniques

Relationships

Plot

Demon Origin Plains:

Young Emperor Hao Lian traverses the Demon Plain, displaying a deep connection with nature that allows him to move unnoticed among its creatures. Even a Demon Snake, normally hostile, climbs over him without aggression. The snake catches a Five-Elements Spirit Devouring Rat, and while devouring it, Hao Lian displays a sense of pity for the creatures.

The
Storm Mercenary Group
, led by
Chen Chuanjiu
, observes Hao Lian and recognizes his mastery over the Laws of Heaven and Earth. They attempt a surprise attack, but Hao Lian remains calm and unresponsive. He retrieves the half-eaten Spirit Rat from the snake's mouth, hinting at his compassion for all living beings.

Hao Lian's display of power and empathy astonishes his enemies. When they attack again, he uses a green battle armor to protect the Demon Snake and Spirit Rat. The armor shatters under their assault, seemingly injuring Hao Lian. However, he tricks his attackers by escaping into a pit and later reemerges to eliminate
Ouyang Qi
.

Chen Chuanjiu and
Zheng Yunfeng
 encounter a swarm of Spirit Devouring Rats and defeat them but fail to locate Hao Lian. They track him based on the thickening Spiritual Qi, while
another character
, dressed lavishly, contemplates whether to save Hao Lian or not, in the end he decided to not save him.

Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror:

Amidst the illusionary landscape,
Young Emperor Hao Lian
 and his pursuers, Chen Chuanjiu and
Zheng Yunfeng
, find themselves trapped and disoriented. The environment shifts between scenes of a tranquil green mountain and clear waters and a deadly ambush of flying squirrels. Despite realizing the illusion, Hao Lian is intrigued by its authenticity and presses on, while Chen Chuanjiu uses his formidable power to break through.

Young Emperor Hao Lian, while trying to comprehend the Power of Rules within a unique space, encounters
Zheng Yunfeng
, unleashes purplish-gray miasma to attack him. However, Hao Lian successfully resists the attack using his spring-themed powers and a new technique he learned, fusing the four seasons into his fist.
Chen Chuanjiu
, intervenes with a massive sword strike aimed at defeating Hao Lian and taking the Immortal Mountain for himself.

The confrontation results in a cataclysmic clash of powers that shatters the space, creates a devouring black hole, and ultimately triggers the activation of the Immortal Mountain's power ahead of schedule. As the Immortal Mountain's power activates, the entire Four Seasons Boundary, which is connected to
Xiao Qing
's body, starts to change, and the four seasons begin to rotate.

Vajara Fist

Vajra Fist was the first and the only technique Haolian Shaohuang learned, by his master
Li Yunxio
  (Gu Feiyang). Never bothering to learn anything else that was not by his master. With countless of practice Haolian Shaohuang was able to transcend to Martial Sovereign.

Heaven of Langya
================

Langya Heaven is located in the Northern Region and usually entry is managed by the
Natural Moat Order
, the strongest and deepest of the Hidden Families. Inside the
Mytic Realm
 are 4 Pavilions who seal the
Eternal World
, which is also inside Langya Heaven.

History

Langya Heaven
 was once a grand and powerful sect in ancient times, possessing immense knowledge and influence. However, despite its former glory, historical records contain little to no information about it, suggesting it deliberately concealed its existence or was erased from history.

The remnants of Langya Heaven hold powerful artifacts and secrets, and its
Eternal World
 can only be accessed by breaking four major restrictions:

Four Pavilions

Jade Library

The
Jade Pavilion
 is a mystical, floating structure in
Langya Heaven
, radiating a warm luster and a deep scholarly aura. It serves as an ancient
repository of knowledge
, containing countless
Jade Slips
 filled with powerful techniques, scriptures, and inheritances from a once-great sect.

Though it exists within Langya Heaven, the
Jade Pavilion has its own will
—not everyone who encounters it can access its wisdom. A
barrier of spiritual energy
 protects the Jade Slips, preventing warriors from taking them by force. Only those with fate and destiny aligned can receive its teachings.

At the heart of the Jade Pavilion lies a
mysterious teleportation array
, which leads to
108 different library spaces
. Those who enter are transported to different realms based on their unique fortunes, where they may obtain special inheritances or techniques.

Jade Pavilion is all-encompassing and has a vast collection of books contains powerful secret techniques.

Gu Feiyang
 obtained his
Sky Peering Technique
 from that place, which allowed him to control the
Moon Eye
.

Emperor Pill Pavilion

contains Pills of various grades

said to be refined by Alchemy God
Si Shen Yifan

on the lowest floor are 7th rank pills

through teleportation formations one arrives at places which contain the most suitable 10th rank Pills for one

Nine Palace Maze Formation at the center of Emperor Pill Pavilion, leads to the highest floor

Heavenly Fate Pill on the highest floor, said to be a legendary 11th rank Pill, able to change ones Fate and bring back the dead

Heavenly Treasure Pavilion

contains Treasures of various grades

Heavy Equipment Pagoda

The Heavy Equipment Tower is a powerful artifact and the final seal needed to unlock the Realm of Eternal Life. It had recently transformed into a spirit, taking the form of a massive metal monster, capable of reshaping itself into weapons and boasting an impenetrable body. When the top masters of the Tianwu Realm gathered to break its seal, they were suddenly transported to an entirely new space. a vast and mysterious domain, possibly even an ancient sect’s mountain gate. solemn golden city, paved with golden bricks and leading in all directions.

contains Xuan Artifacts of various grades

said to be refined by
Mu Xing
, the Ancestor of the
Mu Family

Heavenly Draconic Family
========================

General Information

One of the
7 major forces
. Alternate names: Long family of Sky ridge, Long family of Northern Heavenly Mountains. Located in
Northern Region
. The long family of the sky Ridge was a mysterious existence among the seven major sects. They rarely moved around the continent, but their strength made the other six sects extremely fearful.

Background

The Long Family of Skyridge is an ancient and powerful clan residing on Tianling Mountain, the tallest peak in the Tianwu Realm, standing at 180,000 feet high. Their heritage is deeply tied to the True Spirit Bloodline, a rare and powerful lineage that grants those who awaken it immense martial prowess.

The Long Family is divided into two main sects:

Inner Sect: Comprised exclusively of individuals who have successfully awakened their True Spirit Bloodline. These elite members wield extraordinary power and are considered the true inheritors of the family's strength.

Outer Sect: Made up of descendants of the True Spirit Bloodline who have yet to awaken their lineage. They are required to train diligently, as only those who reach the Ninth Heaven Martial Emperor level through their own efforts can qualify to join the Inner Sect. Because The probability of awakening the True Spirit Bloodline is incredibly rare—only one in ten thousand. Despite this low chance, the Long Family boasts over ten thousand Inner Sect disciples.

Structure

Sect Master

Long Qianmiao

Elder Council

Consisting of 9 Star Martial Sovereigns

Peng Yue

Yi Hongming

Lu Yuan

He Yu

Zhang Haosi

Gong Haoqian

Kangcheng

Young Masters

The most promising youths of the Long Family. The Long Family Head is selected amongst those.

Fei Ni

Qi Gui

6 others

Others

Hua Qing

Yu Zhuo

Yan Huai

Locations

The Dragon Palace is the main palace of the Long family. It is located at the highest point of the clouds on Tianling Mountain and is a symbol of supreme power.

Trivia

long family of Sky Ridge named their sect after the leader of the true spirits, the Dragon.

Due to the vast number of descendants and their families, a massive city has developed on Tianling Mountain, hosting a population exceeding 100 million people because of this This place is equivalent to a medium-sized city to large city.

This city functions as a major hub, attracting chambers of commerce, warriors, and outsiders, making it a vibrant and diverse place.

Given the mountain’s extreme height, it is nearly impossible for an ordinary person to reach the top in their lifetime, making it an isolated yet prestigious location.

Moreover, not all descendants of the True Spirit bloodline are necessarily outer disciples. Many descendants cannot even condense their sea of ​​​​qi, and are destined to be ordinary people all their lives.

the mountain protection formation the amount of Yuanshi consumed in one day just by opening it is equal to the total income of the Long family in one day, which is very huge. If there is no emergency, this formation will never be opened.

In the Tianling Long family, ordinary mortals have to pay a considerable amount of money to the sect every year.

a second war against the Devil World being imminent

Technique

The
Heavenly Sword Illustration
 from the
Divine Cloud Palace
 is a powerful and legendary artifact, consisting of
81 divine swords
 arranged in a formation. It is divided into
seven levels
, each corresponding to the advancement of a warrior from the
Tri-Elements Realm
 to the
Nine Heavens Realm

Shenxiao Palace
 and is rarely shown to outsiders.

Heavenly Tyrant Body Tempering Technique
========================================

Background

Back then, as a ranking battle of the Heaven & Earth power chart, the
Tyrant Martial Sovereign
 and the
Vanquisher Martial Sovereign
  fought for many days and nights, shattering the Heaven & Earth, and even causing the entire Holy City to nearly collapse. In the end, Because
Tyrant
's Physique was so strong that he could resist
Vanquisher
's Primordial Qi, and his advantage grew greater as the battle approached the end,
Vanquisher
 was forced to admit defeat.

History

Originally the Tyrant Body Tempering Technique was in possession of the
Ten Thousand Treasure Store
, they obtained it by chance in a huge treasure, which led to the establishment of the Chamber of Commerce. The Tyrant Body Tempering Art can't be passed down by normal means. So they sold the medium of inheritance to the
Ao Clan
, which are proficient in body cultivation.

The only one sucessfully inheriting it was
Ao Changkong
 and
Ao Wuxin
. He later gave the first part back to Ten Thousand Treasure Store's leader
Wan Yiqian
, who then gave that first part to
Gu Feiyang
 as an "experiment", without the latter knowing about its incompleteness. Since he has been reborn as Li Yunxiao he started cultivating the tyrant body tempering technique.

Informations

The Heavenly Tyrant Body Tempering Technique
 is famous for being the ultimate martial arts and the masterpiece of the
Tyrant Martial Sovereign
 one of the Ten Titled/Conferred Martial Sovereigns.

This technique is the strongest body tempering technique known to man.

After training in the
Tyrant Body Tempering Technique
, The strength of the physical body is split into three layers:

A BODY LIKE GLASS:
 The Realm of a Body of glass is reforming one physical body, Purging impurities and strengthening the physique reaching the state of a perfect body.

THE UNYIELDING TYRANT PHYSIQUE:
 It builds on the foundation of a body of glass to evolve the power of an unyielding tyrant. It is the extreme strength hidden in one's body. Tyrannical strength like steel, Shredding everything in its way.

THE IMMORTAL GOLDEN BODY:
 It is like a Xuan Artifact refined to the extremes  with the world as tripod and his body as mold.

If one achieves The Immortal Golden Body, They can ascend to becoming a saint immediately. At the wave of a hand or a single step, Mountains will collapse and the ground will crack!

Usage

If the martial artist practicing this technique, when he get slugged by the opponent the punch will flowing into the Dantian and the body will absorb the impacts and converting them into Yuan Qi.

Like all Body Tempering Techniques its final goal is to help the Martial Artist open the bodys 8 Gates.

Users

Ao Changkong
 (Complete Technique)

Li Yunxiao
 (First Half)

Meng Bai
 (First Half)

Mo Xiaochuan
 (First Half)

Haolian Shaohuang
 (First Half)

Trivia

Gu Fei Yang
 obtained the
Heavenly Tyrant Body Tempering Technique
 of the
Tyrant Martial Sovereign
 by chance.

References

Heavenscent Empire
==================

The Heavenscent Empire is the strongest among the three empires in the southern region of the Tianwu Continent. The most powerful organization of the empire isthe Thousand Crane Pavilion and its most prosperous city is the Qinghai Town.

Qinghai Town

Qinghai Town is a gathering place for more than half of the cultivators in the empire. Although it is called a small town, it is larger than ordinary cities, with a population of at least several tens of millions. It is renowned for its prosperity, ranking at the forefront within the country.

Heavenspan Island
=================

The
Mu Family
, one of the
Hidden Families
, resides on Tongtian Island, a massive and meticulously crafted man-made island located deep in the ocean. To reach it, one must pass through an endless fog infused with pink crystal dust, a natural spatial barrier that conceals the island from outsiders. Only those familiar with its intricacies, like Mu Zheng, can navigate through it successfully.

Once past the fog, Tongtian Island reveals itself as a thousand-acre expanse of breathtaking landscapes, shrouded in mist formed by abundant spiritual energy, giving it an ethereal, fairy-tale-like appearance. The island is a testament to generations of the Mu Family’s craftsmanship, with mountains, rivers, and lakes arranged in perfect harmony.{{r|1713}}

Unlike the Corpse Fiend Sect's Unmoving Return to the Forest, which was built atop the corpse of a giant turtle, Tongtian Island is a fully man-made marvel, constructed bit by bit by the Mu ancestors over centuries. While the eerie magic of the giant turtle makes the Corpse Fiend Sect’s base unique, Tongtian Island exudes grandeur, craftsmanship, and immense spiritual refinement.

The Mu Family takes immense pride in their puppetry and combat prowess, standing on par with the seven superpowers. Their defenses are nearly impenetrable, with the fog barrier serving as the first line of protection. Additionally, the island’s internal formations and spatial defenses are considered unparalleled, making it unnecessary to station guards outside.{{r|1714}}

Hei Yuhu
========

Appearance

A man in blue. His long robe was embroidered with elegant bamboo leaves.

Personality

Hei Yuhu is reasonable person.

Plot

Five Cloud Mountain

Amidst the conflict,
Shang
 offered the Holy Land warriors a chance to retreat, but insisted that Yunxiao stay. Hei Yuhu, leader of the Holy Land forces, hesitated, realizing the future threat a unified demon race under Shang could pose. Yunxiao pointed out that supporting
Huang
 could prevent greater conflict in the future. After deep contemplation, Hei Yuhu decided to side with Huang, choosing to confront Shang and Mo to protect the balance between the human and demon races.

Later when the human forces were surrounded and suppressed by thousands of powerful monsters, they struggled to withstand the relentless, locust-like bombardment. One formation after another fell, and even the mighty Five Star Formation was eventually broken.

In a desperate final attempt, Hei Yuhu chose to self-destruct along with the ninth-level battleship, sacrificing himself.

Hidden Families
===============

General Information

Hidden Families are Sects who are living secluded from the world. Usually they inhabit some artificial islands in the
Four Seas
 and are difficult to find. Both, in the human and sea race exist those hidden familys. The most powerful ones are comparable to the
7 major forces
, while the smaller ones can contend against some of the larger sects on the mainland.

Structure

Two factions have been formed by the hidden families. With the Heaven Alliances goal to conquer the mainland (
Tianwu Continent
), while the Earth Alliance forms the opposing faction.

Heaven Alliance (Tianmeng)

An alliance of some hidden families, with the goal of dominating the continent and occupying the resources of various sacred mountains and rivers. In recent years, overseas resources have been severely depleted, and many hidden sects have long been ready to move.

Leader

Xiao Hong
 known to outsiders as "Heavenly Being"

Members

Formed by 17 sects.

Mu Family

Corpse Fiend Sect

Wuqing Sect

Heartless Sect

Phaseless Sect

Gui Family

Blood Crow Palace

Pill Sun Sect

Burning Moon Sect

Flying Dragon Sect

Earth Alliance

Gongyang Zhengqi
 known to outsiders as "Earthly Man"

the number of hidden secth  were probably equivalent to half of the heavenly martial continent.

Holy Garden
===========

The most morally sacred place for the inhabitants of the
Holy Region
, it is the eternal resting place of the Holy
Region experts who died in past generations.

Wei Qing
 secretly grants permission for
Qiu Mujie
 and his disciples to explore the Holy Garden and desecrate the tombs, taking out the corpses and using them as puppets with their special Te.hniques.

Holy Region
===========

One of the two strongest human organizations of the world, and considered the de facto rulers of the Tianwu continent. Their word is law across the continent, with no power willingly defiant before them.

Background

About 100,000 years ago, during the final years of the
Demon Lord's reign,
 the world's experts gathered in Misty Snow Sacred City to discuss how to deal with demon lord. At that time, it was only the simplest organization, and their goal was also very clear, which was to exterminate the demon lord.

Later, the successfully sealed the demon lord, and in order to prevent him from returning to the world, these people did not leave, but used Misty Snow Sacred City as a stronghold and established the organization
Holy Region
, with the responsibility of monitoring the demon lord's seal.

General Information

Holy Region is like a continent floating in the void, just like the
Sea of Soul Formation
. They can be reached either by teleportation arrays on the
Tianwu Continent
 or by tearing the space (Martial Sovereigns). Other than that, there are no ways to reach it.

The Holy Region is equally governed by a council of 5 rulers with 3 high elders overseeing the organization.

Apart from them, there exists a multitude of directors, vice directors, leaders and soldiers who work in a great variety of tasks to preserve the stability of the Holy Region and Tianwu Continent.

Structure

High Elders

Wei Wuya

Tian Zhao Zi

Meng Ling

Zhuo Kun
(Old)

Authority/Leadership Department  — Rulers

Cangwu Qiong

The Blade of Judgment

The Blade of Judgment is an unknown-grade Xuan Artifact, enshrined as the Holy Region Absolute Punishment Weapon, The blade of judgement can only be used with the approval of three rulers.  The Blade of Judgment is a fearsome weapon of absolute destruction, wielded by the Sanctuary to maintain dominance over the world.

It is not an ordinary blade—it is a cursed weapon, forged from the blood and resentment of countless fallen experts.
For centuries, the Blade of Judgment has been used to execute the strongest warriors, absorbing their essence, grievances, and evil energy, making it stronger with each kill. The accumulated hatred and bloodlust within it have turned it into a terrifying force, capable of warping reality itself.
When unleashed, the blade engulfs the battlefield in an Asura-like purgatory, where the cries of the slain echo through the air. It strikes with unstoppable power, overwhelming even the most powerful beings, making them tremble in fear.

The magnitude of this Xuan Artifact power was first demonstrated in history during the Human vs Monster war at the Five Cloud Mountains, where Wei Qing, a
Divine Transcendent
, used the Weapon to its full power and nearly killed the King of Monsters,
Huang
, who was just one step away from reaching the
Primary Void Realm
, and who as a Monster possessed a physical body stronger than an ordinary Human. Therefore, it is obvious that it possesses more power than an ordinary Holy Artifact.

Hong Ling
=========

Redirect to:
Leng Hongling

Hong Yiyi
=========

She is the leader of the Red Coast Mercenary Group under the
Rookie Mercenary Group
, she is also a member of the
Empyrean One Pavillion
.

Plot

First Encounter

Hong Yiyi reveals her motive to collaborate in eliminating the
Four Extremes Sect
 from the
Light Song Forest
. Despite the vast difference in power between her mercenary group and the influential sect, Hong Yiyi's knowledge of Li Yunxiao's personal grudge with the Four Extremes Sect adds depth to her proposition.

The tension escalates as Hong Yiyi skillfully transitions from playful banter to a more serious tone, hinting at her awareness of Li Yunxiao's connections and even mentioning his association with the
Legendary Martial Sovereign
,
Li Huachi
. As their verbal sparring continues, Hong Yiyi's anger flares due to Li Yunxiao's remarks about her age. She threatens to involve Commander
Hao Lian
, but Li Yunxiao's unwavering demeanor hints at his confidence.

The conversation takes an intriguing turn when Hong Yiyi attacks Li Yunxiao using a technique known as "Pink Bone Erosion." Li Yunxiao effortlessly defends himself with his demonic powers and the Devil Sky Armor. He surprises Hong Yiyi by revealing his awareness of her identity as a member of the
Empyrean One Pavilion
 in the Light Sing Forest. This revelation leaves Hong Yiyi pondering the true extent of Li Yunxiao's knowledge and capabilities.

Hong Yiyi eventually discloses her mission to capture
Tang Jie
, the Young Master of the Four Extremes Sect, alive and discreetly. She proposes a collaboration with Li Yunxiao, suggesting they seize the ongoing Mercenary Meeting, the Heroes Assembly, as an opportunity to achieve their goal. In exchange, Li Yunxiao requests the rare and valuable Nine Evil Underworld Water as a reward.

Hong Yu
=======

He is Right Commander of
Hai Lin
 the son of the Vice-Leader of the
Rookie Mercenary Group
,
Hai Beifei
.

Plot

Light Song Forest

Like, the
Left Commander
, He is initially wary of Li Yunxiao and his group but becomes more receptive when he learns that Li Yunxiao is an Alchemist.
Hai Lin
 offers to guide them to the Gentle Song Forest, their intended destination, but
Zhu Lei
 remains guarded, especially towards
Ding Ling'er
, whom he finds suspicious.

Throughout their journey together, Hong Yu maintains a cautious attitude but also expresses his gratitude for Li Yunxiao's help. He has a significant responsibility in leading the caravan through the dangerous Demon Origin Plain, and he takes his role seriously. He also reveals his loyalty and trust in Hai Lin, believing that he will lead the Light Song Forest to a new future as the true King of Mercenaries.

As they approach the Light Song Forest, they encounter a powerful Seven-Rank Demonic Beast summoned by
Gu Yuesheng
. Li Yunxiao successfully traps the beast using his profound artifact, the Heavenly Spirit Ring, and the caravan absorbs the star power to cultivate and make breakthroughs. Li Yunxiao and others experience significant improvements in their strength.

Upon entering the Light Song Forest, Li Yunxiao confronts Gu Yuesheng and
Situ Heng
, displaying his strength as an Alchemist.
Duan Yue
 also appears to help Li Yunxiao, revealing his true strength as a Martial Emperor. Li Yunxiao successfully rescues the rookie mercenary group from the lava swamp and escapes to safety, and they entered the city successfully.

Hongyang
========

Hongyang was ninth level Alchemist and disciple of
Luo Tian
.

Appearance

The man’s face was handsome and his expression was calm. The red robe he was wearing was embroidered with cloud patterns and looked very gorgeous.

Trivia

Hongyang  broken through to the ninth level. It was not long before
Luo Tian
 went to the red moon City.

Hou
===

Power

The Earth Dragon Ring is a profound-level weapon, ring-shaped with demonic carvings and a snake-like beast head on top. When infused with enough power, it can eveb widen the crack to its maximum, but its duration depends on the power infused.

Hu Yanming
==========

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Hu Yanming

 about

improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Huyan Ming was the only alchemist among the
Supreme Six
. As a fourth-tier Alchemy Lord, he enjoyed a great reputation even in the Firecrow Empire, and his status was not lower than that of
Qi Zhenzi
, which made him an important figure who suffered no rebuke of others.

Plot

Mount Phoenix

Huyan Ming,  with others member the Supreme Six, sought the Ancient True Spirit Phoenix’s inheritance alongside his companions. Though highly skilled in breaking ancient seals, he grew frustrated with Qi Zhenzi’s impatience.

After Sun Xiumei reported the deaths of two members, Li Yunxiao, who had been secretly pursuing her, was discovered and had no choice but to reveal himself. Sun Xiumei immediately pointed to him as the culprit, shocking the group. Huyan Ming, in particular, was astonished by Yunxiao’s talent as a second-tier alchemist. However, before anyone could act, the seal suddenly broke, pulling them all into the remnant of a fire phoenix’s consciousnesse realm.

Confident in his superior soul power, Huyan Ming sought to claim two shares of the Phoenix True Fire, unaware of Li Yunxiao’s true strength. A battle erupted, but within the consciousness realm, where soul power reigns supreme, Yunxiao unleashed his ultimate skill, overpowering their combined attack. As the realm collapsed, one was killed, while the remaining four were gravely injured and forced to retreat, leaving Yunxiao victorious.

Supreme Palace

Unaware that the
Supreme Palace
 had been annihilated by
Xingyang Huo
 after, including their lord
Ma Tianhe
, he along with
Yi Xiaoshan
 and
Qi Zhenzi
 returned, only to find the palace empty and desolate. To their surprise, Li Yunxiao had arrived before them, carrying out his task of absorbing all the Qi veins to fill the
World God Monument
.

Yunxiao then challenged Qi Zhenzi, declaring that if he lost, they must submit to him. With
Duan Yue
 overseeing the battle and preventing any escape, Yunxiao and Qi Zhenzi exchanged several moves. In the end, Yunxiao crushed Qi Zhenzi to death using the World God Monument. Shocked that Yunxiao could kill Qi Zhenzi so easily, He and
Yi Xiaoshan
 had no choice but to pledge their loyalty to him. They were then placed inside the World God Monument, for him Yunxiao put him in the square inch mountain, to refined pills.

Hua Qianshu
===========

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Hua Qianshu
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Hua Qianshu
, the first and most beloved disciple of
Gu Feiyang
, was once a determined and gifted martial artist. However, his struggle with his own limitations eventually led him down the path of
Demonic Cultivation
.

History

Hua Qianshu was once a talented martial artist and a disciple of
Gu Feiyang
. However, due to his limited talent, he struggled to break through to higher realms. Desperate to overcome his limitations, he turned to forbidden demonic cultivation.

Gu Feiyang, determined to save Hua Qianshu, sought a way to expel the demonic energy possessing him. After discovering a method in ancient records, he traveled to the East China Sea, where it was said a technique existed to purge demonic influence. However, this pursuit led to a massacre, as Gu Feiyang slaughtered countless people from
Eastern Sea
 and killed over 100
Martial Sovereigns
 while being hunted across the
Four Seas
 in his desperate attempt to find a cure.

Later, Hua Qianshu was approached by
Cangwu Qiong
 and
Ren Ximin
, who sought test subjects for their experiments in breaking the shackles of martial arts through demonic cultivation. Along with other martial artists who willingly became test subjects, Hua Qianshu ventured into the
Tiandang Mountains
 a place where the laws of the Demon Realm and the Tianwu Realm intertwined hoping to comprehend demonic power and achieve greater strength.

Knowing that his talent alone was insufficient, Hua Qianshu deliberately involved his master, Gu Feiyang, in the expedition to the Tiandang Mountains, This decision ultimately led to Gu Feiyang’s demise, causing Ren Ximin and Cang Wuqiong’s plan to fail.

Plot

After
Gu Feiyang
 death at the whims of Ren Xifan and
Cangwu Qiong
, Hua Qianshu became a
Martial Sovereign
 a few years later and began practicing Demonic Techniques under Cangwu Qiong command.

Later,
Ren Ximin
 gathered Hua Qianshu along with other subordinates to practice Demonic Techniques under the command of
Di Jia
 who became their Demonic Master, forcing them to become Di Jia Demon Slaves, which resulted in Hua Qianshu becoming Di Jia strongest subordinate.

Later, with Di Jia death at the hands of
Zhuo Kun
, a thread of Demonic Qi from Di Jia remains sailed into Hua Qianshu body and was refined by Hua Qianshu, who took possession of his connection to the
Heavenly Demonic Weapon
. This process freed Hua Qianshu mind.

Power

After venturing into the Tiandang Mountains, Hua Qianshu and twelve others obtained the power of the fallen True Spirits. Hua Qianshu inherited the power of the phoenix—though not the ancient phoenix, it still granted him divine fire. However, after his demonization, this divine fire was corrupted and transformed into a powerful demonic flame.

With the infusion of True Spirit power and their descent into demonic cultivation, Hua Qianshu and his companions experienced a significant surge in strength, surpassing that of ordinary Heaven-Control Realm warriors.

Hua Qing
========

Appearance

wearing a long robe, holding a large sword in his right hand and carrying it on his shoulder.

Personality

known for his unwavering loyalty and strict adherence to duty. He is a principled warrior who values honor and responsibility above all else

Hua Qing is not easily swayed by words and acts decisively, as seen in his immediate attempt to subdue Fei Ni and prevent her from reaching the Council of Elders. Though he has a straightforward and somewhat rigid personality, he is not inherently malicious. Fei Ni even notes that despite his stubbornness, he remains an upright person.

Plot

When Fei Ni returned to the Long family, he immediately confronted her, fully believing the accusations that she had colluded with Li Yunxiao and murdered the clan leader. Despite their past rivalry, he acknowledged her rapid growth in strength, Determined to prevent a "traitor" from approaching the Council of Elders, Hua Qing attempted to suppress Fei Ni, proposing to seal her energy before allowing her to proceed. However, Fei Ni outright refused, declaring that the Long family was on the brink of destruction and that she had no time for unnecessary battles. Undeterred, Hua Qing launched a fierce attack, believing that eliminating her was his duty.

His strike—a powerful slash from his greatsword—was utterly ineffective, cutting through empty air as Fei Ni effortlessly evaded. Shocked by her newfound mastery, Hua Qing barely had time to react before Fei Ni struck back, sending him flying with a devastating palm strike. The impact shattered his bones, leaving him horrified at the gap in their strength.

Hua Xiu
=======

Appearance

A strange-looking man. He had a rough face, dark gray skin, long and fierce eyes, and a brown ball of flesh on his forehead, which seemed to have a horn. His black hands were exposed outside his long sleeves, and his ten fingers were as sharp as claws. There were actually scales shimmering on the back of his hands, and it was obvious that he was not human.

Plot

Xu Hua first appeared in the Eastern Region, in Feng Ling City. Entrusted by his master, his mission was to protect his young junior sister, Narcissus, as they searched for Li Yunxiao.

Huang
=====

He was monster king before Mo and the Monster war.

Appearance

A burly man, with an imposing presence even without anger. His skin was a light yellow, and he wore a purple gold crown inlaid with gems and a red brocade robe with hundreds of butterflies on it, which made him look luxurious and festive.

Plot

Five Cloud Mountain

Huang and Ai arrived at Five Cloud Mountain to fulfill the last wish of the past demon emperors, aiming to release their people who had been imprisoned for thousands of years. However, upon their arrival, they were confronted by
Li
 and High Priest
Ci
, who advised against breaking the seal. They warned that releasing the monsters before the monster race was united would lead to greater chaos.

Disagreeing with them, Huang attempted to eliminate Li and Ci, but as the conflict escalated, Li and Ci chose to retreat and avoid further confrontation.

After Xuan Hua arrived and was repelled by Huang, the Holy Region forces, led by Wei Qing and Hei Yuhu, came to the Five Cloud Mountain. Determined to eliminate the monster race once and for all, Wei Qing unleashed the Ruling Blade for the first time, engaging in a fierce clash with the Monster Emperor, Huang.

The impact of their battle was devastating, reducing the Thousand Mountains Prefecture to ruins. Huang suffered severe injuries, but Wei Qing pressed on, launching another attack. As Huang tried to defend himself, he transformed into his true form, exchanging another fierce blow. However, the Ruling Blade struck deep, its evil energy corroding Huang's body. Large portions of his flesh began to rot, forcing him back into his human form.

Though victorious, Wei Qing had reached his limit. The immense strain of wielding the Ruling Blade caused all his acupoints to explode, releasing clouds of blood mist from his body.

After this brutal exchange, both forces went all out, igniting a full-scale war.

In the all-out war between the monster and human races, the tide suddenly turned in favor of the humans with the arrival of reinforcements. Faced with this shift, Shang and Mo suggested a strategic withdrawal. However, Huang perceived this as betrayal. To assert his dominance and prove his power, he shockingly destroyed his own host beast, the Nandou Purple Deer, severing their bond to demonstrate his ruthless resolve.

Huang then revealed his breakthrough to the Void Extreme Divine Realm, solidifying his authority. He executed Ci, the high priest, without hesitation and gravely injured Shang, intending to imprison him and extract the secrets of the armillary sphere. Mo, witnessing Huang's merciless actions, was forced into submission.

With a new, powerful contract demonic beast integrated into his strength, Huang led the monster race in a final, desperate assault against the humans.

Power

Huang possesses an innate ability unique to his Heavenly Monster tribe, allowing him to share strength and magical powers with his host beast and even integrate with it. After reaching the Void Realm, he severed the bond with his original host and formed a new contract with Wu. This granted him the ability to unleash a black hole that devours not only his opponents' power but almost everything in its path.

Trivia

He can only maintain Void Prime state for a few minutes.

Huang Xiaolong
==============

Huang Xiaolong, an Enforcer and Elder from the Grim Reaper Cult, was one of the top authorities representing the three major forces in the South Domain, along with
Fang De
 and
Tu Lei
.

Plot

During the battle, Huang Xiaolong was present when
Luo Qingyun
 used a powerful mental attack through the mesmerizing sound of the Spirit Heaven Ring to affect
Li Yunxiao
. He observed Li Yunxiao's struggle in countering the mental attack due to his lower cultivation level and witnessed the intense clash between the two fighters.

When Li Yunxiao activated the
World God Monument
 and unleashed a vast sea of flames to combat Luo Qingyun's dragon bloodline abilities, Huang Xiaolong and the other enforcers had to intervene and set up a barrier to prevent the battle from causing further destruction to the island.

Huang Xiaolong was also part of the decision-making process regarding the outcome and termination of the crystal stone competition. He, along with the other enforcers, decided to activate the teleportation array and send all the disciples back after the competition ended.

He was also present when Li Yunxiao announced his plan to auction entry quotas to the Veiled Desolation in Flame Martial City. Although this decision astonished some participants.

Huangfu Bi
==========

Appearance

The figure had a dark complexion and two small gray mustaches on his upper lip. He looked like a wealthy country squire, but his eyes were fierce, as if lightning flashed in them.

Plot

Battle Soul Mountain

Huangfu Bi arrived at
Battle Soul Mountain
 alongside the elders of the Soul Devouring Sect, intent on eliminating and confronting
Myriad Stars Valley
 and its sect leader,
Tian Xingzi
. A fierce battle erupted between the two factions, with both sides suffering heavy losses. At first, Huangfu Bi seemed to gain the upper hand. He successfully eliminated Myriad Stars Valley’s vice sect leader, several elders, and even their general, pushing his enemies to the brink of collapse. However, just as victory appeared within his grasp, Tian Xingzi joined forces with Li Yunxiao, turning the tide of battle. The fierce counterattack nearly cost Huangfu Bi his life. At a critical moment, when he was on the verge of being slain by Li Yunxiao, he was saved by
Nanqiu Yu
, who intervened just in time to pull him from the jaws of death.

Five Cloud Mountain

Huangfu Bi, along with several Soul Devouring Sect elders, arrived at Five Cloud Mountain to aid in the war against the monster race. Attempting to stop Mo from absorbing thousands of fallen warriors, Huangfu Bi led a charge but was quickly outnumbered by powerful monsters,  Trapped and desperate, he fought fiercely as the three elders were torn to pieces around him. Left alone, Huangfu Bi slaughtered relentlessly, struggling to carve a path to escape.

Amid the chaos, Yunxiao and Beifeng launched a devastating combined attack, forcing Huangfu Bi into a desperate attempt to escape. However, Mo ambushed him. Despite merging with the Golden Speaker and defending with his Devouring Banner, Huangfu Bi's defense crumbled. His banner was destroyed, the Golden Speaker went berserk and devoured his soul, and Mo drained his blood essence, killing him instantly.

Power

Huangfu Bi, master of the Soul Devourer Sect, is a legendary figure known for his unmatched strength and eerie mastery of soul techniques.

Golden Speaker, also known as the Heaven-Grade Golden Soul, is Huangfu Bi’s powerful summoning technique. Upon its arrival, green flames burst from its eye sockets, exuding a shocking level of intelligence. Unlike ordinary main souls, which are fully controlled by their masters, Golden Speaker appears to act independently, standing as an equal to Huangfu Bi. This was no surprise to the elders of the Soul Devouring Sect, suggesting a deeper truth—once a main soul reaches the heavenly grade, it may develop its own wisdom and consciousness.
 Gold speaker was completely different from ordinary gold souls. Golden speaker was completely independent individuals. When the soul devouring banner was cultivated to the highest level, it would be the primary soul of heaven, earth, black, and yellow. The Golden speaker was an existence that transcended these four levels. Moreover, it had been passed down from generation to generation in the soul devouring sect. It was impossible to cultivate it to this level by relying on one's own strength.

The Soul Fighting Technique is one of the core secret arts of the Soul Devouring Sect. It focuses on harnessing and weaponizing the power of the soul in battle, allowing the user to engage in direct combat with soul energy. Unlike the Soul Devouring Banner, which is used to capture and absorb souls, the Soul Fighting Technique is purely an offensive martial technique designed for soul-to-soul combat. Huangfu Bi's ability to combine both techniques is unprecedented, making him an anomaly within the Soul Devouring Sect and giving him an edge over other practitioners

The Pangu Banner is a legendary artifact of the Soul-Devouring Sect, passed down through generations of sect leaders. Rather than forging their own Soul-Devouring Banner, each leader inherits the Pangu Banner and uses it to absorb the previous one. Within the banner exists a vast internal world, containing the sun, moon, and flowing rivers—granting it immense power, even though it is not a true holy weapon.

The Cloud Dancing Wind Art is a high-level martial technique that harnesses the power of wind and movement to create overwhelming force and agility in battle. It is likely a technique that combines speed, unpredictability, and destructive power, resembling the natural flow of clouds and the fierce movement of storms.

Soul battle technique-Dragonfish transformation. The Golden speaker instantly became one with him and struck down with an incantation seal.

Trivia

In 50 Years he is the only person ever to cross War Soul Mountain near
Jiangyu City
 and return alive.

He was the most hated person by all the magic practitioners in the world Because his specialized in extracting people's souls.

References

Huo Sen
=======

Plot

Qionghua Island

During a discussion with
Chu Yu
 and
Xin Pi
, Huo Sen expresses doubt about the rumors of a young genius from Shangyang City killing a Martial Grandmaster. Chu Yu seems to know more about the incident and hints that it might be true. They continue to chat about the powerful young talents participating in the competition.

When
Li Yunxiao
 arrives at Mingxin Lake with the Tiger King Chariot, he attracts attention and is met with hostility from some participants. Chu Yu's guard, a burly man with a Rank Five warhammer, confronts Li Yunxiao aggressively, resulting in a clash between them.

Li Yunxiao retaliates and traps the burly man with powerful gravity and seals his meridians, rendering him helpless. He then triggers an explosion with the Tiger King Chariot, causing a massive display of power. Chu Yu and Xin Pi both intervene to prevent the situation from escalating into a battle between Martial Emperors.

Huo Sen plays a role in diffusing the tension and advising them to focus on the competition for the slots. However, he also shows admiration for Li Yunxiao's audacity and wishes to see if the young man's life can withstand such bold actions.

Huo Sen is cautious about the possibility of trouble and warns that if anything untoward happens, there are thousands of people present who might retaliate against Chu Yu and Xin Pi. His remark serves as a warning to maintain peace during the competition.

Later, Chu Yu's dark expression hints at a scheme involving
Luo Qingyun
, a mysterious disciple, in the competition with the intention of eliminating Li Yunxiao. However, Huo Sen seems to dismiss any potential danger and plays the peacemaker, urging them to start the competition without further delays.

Immemorial Astral Wind
======================

The Mutant Wind element raw material closest to the Origin of Wind. The Immemorial Astral Wind is formed by the evolution and transformation of chaotic matter that arises through the convergence of countless forces of space, joined to a Wind Element product.

It is an incredibly wild and devastating raw material, it can be used to create True Spirits, refine High-Grade Xuan Artifacts, and temper the body. It is absurdly aggressive and can be found in the Starry Sky, Ancestral Land, and the Thirty-Three Heavens.

Li Yunxiao
 was able to achieve great mastery in the use of the Immemorial Astral Wind after creating a Xuan Artifact with the infusion of Immemorial Astral Wind and the fragments of the Eye of Immemorial Heaven.

Adjacent beasts;

Crocodile
 - Created through the evolution of the spirituality of the Immemorial Astral Wind, after being reformed with the Yang Qi of Solar Black Fire, became incredibly more powerful as the two Elements came into sync to cause a greater result.

Ishikawa city
=============

Ishikawa city was not a main city in the North, but it was still a large city. The huge teleportation formation was on the east side of the city, and it was guarded by a large number of soldiers.

Plot

Yunxiao informs Wan Yiqian that he
cannot accompany him to Thousand Leaves Island
 because he has
a private matter to attend to in Ishikawa City
. Wan Yiqian is initially concerned that someone might be plotting against Yunxiao but is reassured that it is merely a coincidence.

Yunxiao then reveals that
Han Junting sent him a message
 stating that someone important is
waiting for him in Ishikawa City
. This person turns out to be
the true master of the Star and Moon School
, who is also Han Junting’s master.

Ji
==

Appearance

Ji was like a pool of stagnant water. Standing there, it seemed as if this person did not exist, and it was bottomless.

Plot

After the downfall of one Demon Lord and the humiliation of the demon race, Ji proposed that the remaining four Demon Lords combine their power to widen the crack. In the short term, this would allow demons below the Demon Lord level to pass through. However, in exchange, the four Demon Lords would be bound, and their cultivation levels would temporarily drop significantly for half a year.

Jia Rong
========

Jia Rong
 is an Alchemist of The Tianshui Alchemist Association. He first met
Li Yunxiao
 when he came to the Alchemists Association looking for
Yang Di
.

Appearance

A man in a black robe. His robe was typical of an alchemist’s, and he had a curved badge hung over his shoulder, with a bright, glaring blood-red mark streaked across its surface.

Personality

As an Alchemist,
Jia Rong
 has an arrogant and conceited personality, but on the other hand, It is likable and flattering to his
Master
.

Background

Before taking The Alchemy Exam,
Jia Rong
 used the
Yin Wind Stone
 to increase his alchemy skills and used
Blood Flame Orchid
 to reduce its poisonous side effects.  But he didn't know, in fact, that he had to cut off his hand and destroy his Dantian to survive the true poisonous side effects.

History

The Arrogant Alchemist

Jia Rong
, showed an arrogant and disrespectful personality towards
Li Yunxiao
, when he threw the ingredients paper he wrote and
….

Jia Rong: What is this??!  I didn't say or do anything of that!!!  It's a lie cough, Yes, this is all a lie cough, cough, Now I will tell you the True Story:

The Favorite Servant

On the first day that I met
Li Yunxiao
, I discovered the intensity of his greatness and his light. Immediately and without hesitation, I accepted that I would become his sole and loyal servant. From that moment on, We continued our journey as a master and a servant. We faced difficulties and enemies, and every victory we achieve, My Master looks at me and hits me… Ah?!!!, I mean, he thanks me for being always on his side…

A Person:

What an arrogant master!! Why does he hit you when you are always on his side?

Jia Rong: The Fxck You Say?!! What nonsense!!, who are you, and who told you something shameless like this??

A Person: First I'm the writer of this article, second you said that.

Jia Rong: What?! Cough, I didn't say such a thing, and could not say such a thing about my master...

The Writer: Ah, O-okay.

Jiang Family

In the Eastern Region, there was only one red Moon City, which was composed of many complicated forces. Among them, the most powerful were the  Jiang family.

Jiang Ruomei
============

Jiang Ruomei, the elder sister of Jiang Ruobing, was consumed by resentment and jealousy. Despite being the older sibling, she was considered inferior to Ruobing, who was chosen to marry Tang and become the mistress of Red Moon City. In contrast, Ruomei was only given the position of mistress of the Jade Toad Clan—a fate she could never accept.

Appearance

After she was completely reborn, she had a slender waist, smooth skin, and Jade bones. She was wearing a red gauze dress, and her charm was no less than Jiang Ruobing’s. In fact, she was even more charming.

Jiangyu City
============

General Information

Jiangyu City,  a key stronghold on the Western Region's border, was a place of constant mist and lifeless air. The harsh environment made survival difficult, draining vitality from both ordinary people and warriors alike. To counter this, a brilliant senior from the past created the Great Five Elements Transformation Formation beneath the city. For two hours each day, this formation transformed the deathly grey aura into the life-giving essence of the North Water Primordial Tree, sustaining the city's inhabitants and allowing Jiangyu City to endure through the ages.

The Five Elements naturally reinforce and counteract each other, making their transformations within the formation unsurprising. However, maintaining this balance requires a vast amount of energy. explained that the city’s extremely high taxes were the primary source of funding to sustain the array. The energy consumption for each transformation was astronomical, far beyond what ordinary people could comprehend.

History

Beneath this land lies the rumored Netherworld Kingdom, its eerie aura seeping upward and reshaping the world above. The true cause of this transformation is the earth vein itself, which has undergone an elemental mutation over countless years, altering the environment on a massive scale.

Force

Firebird mercenary group.

Trivia

The only way to WUFA heaven, through riverbank city.

The harsh environment of Wutian makes it impossible for ordinary martial artists to stay for long, so there must be a buffer zone, which is jiangye city

The main city of the Eastern Region there be a domain-teleporting formation that can directly teleport to the Western Region.

Although this WUFA heaven is located at the border of the Western Region, it is also within the territory of the soul Devourer sect.

near the center of WUFA heaven, there is a mountain called the war Soul Mountain.

WUFA heaven is rich in an extremely important alchemy material-the earth Emperor Pearl.

The earth Emperor Pearl was an earth-type Pearl that gathered the power of the earth. It had a wide range of uses, and the difference in level was huge. It could be cheap, worthless, and expensive, worth thousands of gold.

The key was that the use and consumption of this the earth Emperor Pearl were extremely huge, especially when refining large scale profound level weapons such as warships and other things. The demand was very shocking.

The environment of Wutian was very suitable for earth-type martial artists to cultivate, and there were many rogue martial artists living in seclusion. All in all, although this place is dangerous, it’s still a good place with good feng shui

Lord of Nine Abyss

Jing Baimu
==========

Appearance

The old man had a sallow face and no expression on his face. His linen clothes were torn and his hair was disheveled. He looked slovenly. But he has the air of someone who has been in a high position for a long time, which is extraordinary and compelling.

Plot

Heaven of Langya

Jing Baimu confronted Li Yunxiao, demanding he hand over a magic pill in exchange for his life, However, Yunxiao refused then The confrontation escalated when Jing Baimu showed lecherous intent towards Qu Hongyan and the other women, enraging Yunxiao.

After a fierce battle, Yunxiao and Qu Hongyan used the Ten Thousand Swords Diagram to defeat and severely injure him. Yunxiao shattered Jing Baimu's magic sword, searched his soul, and reduced him to a fool. He then seized Jing Baimu's treasures, including the rare Bei Guang Fa Tian Pill, which aids in breaking through to the divine realm.

Jing Feibai was the head of the palace guards and a Martial Lord at the
Three-Star Four Quadrants Realm
. Known for his stout, round physique, When Yunxiao and Li Chunyang attempted to enter the court to report urgent military intelligence, Jing Feibai confronted them, refusing to let them pass. he launched a powerful attack at Yunxiao, However, before he could land a decisive blow, Li Chunyang intervened. In a swift counterattack, Li Chunyang broke Jing Feibai’s arm and kicked him in the chest, sending him flying and leaving him severely injured.

Jing Qi
=======

Jin Qi the leader of the
Corpse Fiend Sect
, a super powerful man who was feared by the hidden families overseas. his corpse puppet "Gan Qi" known world's number one corpse puppet.

Appearance

His face was as white as snow and he was surprisingly young. He was wearing a long black robe and looked calm and majestic.

Personality

Jing Qi was a calculating and ruthless individual, always weighing the risks before taking action. While he possessed great strength, he preferred strategy over brute force, ensuring he never engaged in a battle he wasn’t confident of winning.

Plot

With the sudden appearance of
the Giant True Devil
 that had taken over Li Yunxiao's body, an earth-shattering sword strike was unleashed, splitting the sky and sea for thousands of miles. The devastating attack annihilated the Sea Devil Monkey and countless Corpse Fiend Sect powerhouses. The sheer force of the strike caused the Unmoving Forest to collapse, and the island-carrying turtle began sinking, despite not being directly hit. Witnessing this overwhelming power, Jing Qi hesitated—he knew that stopping the demon was futile. Left with no choice, he abandoned the fight, allowing Li Yunxiao to depart unchallenged, leaving behind only his name.

Martial arts competitions

Despite the competition's strict age limit of 30, Jing Qi was allowed to participate due to his unique body condition. For the first time, he revealed his puppet, Gan Qi, to the public, stepping onto the battlefield to challenge Li Yunxiao for the Number Plate Zero.

As the final round of the top 20, Yunxiao wielded his Tusita Heavenly Peak, launching a powerful attack against Gan Qi. The puppet struggled to resist but was ultimately overwhelmed. With a thunderous impact, it was sent flying, shattering the Jade Coffin on impact. Both of Gan Qi’s arms were completely broken, a sight never before as the Fiendish God Zombie was believed to be indestructible. Yet, with a single blow, Yunxiao had done what no one had before.

Jing Qi was deeply shaken. In a futile attempt to claim a meaningless iron plate, he had suffered a huge loss, shattering his coffin and severely damaging his prized puppet. Suppressing his anger, he let out a cold snort and withdrew, abandoning the fight against Yunxiao.

Power

Jing Qi himself was a powerful person who had transcended the ordinary and reached the level of a saint. Coupled with a corpse puppet of unknown strength, and countless various corpse demons.

Gan Qi (divine fiend corpse puppet) appearance face was as fair as Jade, and it wore a Jade crown on its head, looking like a living person. At least, it looked more like a living person than Jing Qi, who had turned into a corpse.
 His Puppet Gan Qi has Black Feather of the Poison Sand one of the The Five Great Extinction Poisons.  the ancestor of the
Corpse Fiend Sect
 obtained this poison and refined it into the body of the Godly Corpse Puppet Gan Qi.

Demon Monkey, The huge sea beast. Even though the Sea Demon Monkey had been turned into a corpse puppet, it could still wield its innate magical power—the Symphony of the Sea, Ten Directions Divine Skill. Can instantly draining the spiritual energy from everything within a radius of several miles.

The Chaos Jade Coffin was the greatest treasure of the Corpse Fiend Sect, second only to the Divine Fiend Corpse Puppet. Crafted from Chaos Jade, it possessed the unique ability to nourish corpse, making it an irreplaceable artifact for the sect.

Jing Shaoyi
===========

Jing Shaoyi, was a young master of the
Liuming Mansion
.

Personality

Jing shaoyi known for his bad temper.

Plot

He use by
Han Junting
, to forcing
Li Yunxiao
 into difficult situations where he might make mistakes. By using Jing Shaoyi bad personality an arrogant yet cowardly noble who relies on his family’s power. His entanglement with
Ding Ling'er
 and Yunxiao sets up
a major personal and political conflict
.
Jing Shaoyi
 to stir up trouble, she aims to weaken Yunxiao's position and make him more vulnerable. Han Junting even willing to go against
Myriad Treasures Store
 and even withdraw from the alliance against
Ling Baiyi
 if necessary.

Jiu Guang
=========

Appearance

A man walking in slowly, wearing golden purple cloud clogs, a green robe with hundreds of butterflies, and his face was sallow, which looked a little weird.

Plot

Faced with Li Yunxiao, who was determined to rescue his captured comrades, Jiu Guang knew he couldn’t fight him alone. He devised a strategy, using his subordinates as cannon fodder while attempting to escape and summon reinforcements, including the sect master. However, as the battle unfolded, he realized too late that Li Yunxiao's power was beyond his expectations. Before he could react, Li Yunxiao had already unleashed his ultimate move.

In his final moments, Jiu Guang was consumed by desperation and fear. He begged for mercy, but his pleas were ignored. In a last-ditch effort, he summoned a massive blue palm print to defend himself, but Li Yunxiao’s sword light cut through it effortlessly—slicing Jiu Guang’s body in half

He is the most talented of
Gu Feiyang
 disciples. He originally doesn't believe in his masters rebirth. He is learning the way of the sword from Gu Feiyang.

Background

Jun Ruyun is the only one among
Gu Feiyang
 disciples who has truly mastered the Demon-Slaying Sword Technique to perfection. he alone has grasped its essence, setting him apart from his senior and junior brothers. With his exceptional comprehension, it’s only a matter of time before he reaches the level of mastery of his master
Gu Feiyang
 demonstrated.

History

After the events at the Hidden Sects genius competition. Li Yunxiao arrives at the Ancient Empire and makes use of his Disciples
Mo Xiaochuan
 and
Haolian Shaohuang
 to contact Jun Ruyun, which results in a reunion battle between the three, which consequently destroys Jun Ruyun mansion.

During the battle, Mo Xiaochuan notices that Jun Ruyun strength is very abnormal for his Cultivation level, which proves that he probably practiced some secret Martial Art. After following some instructions with his companions, Jun Ruyun heads towards his tasks to regain the stability of the Empire.

References

Junliang
========

Background

Although Junliang was from a poor family, he was intermediate apprentice alchemist at the Alchemist Association. he is
Jia Rong
 disciple, and  sworn brother  Long Hao, the eldest son of Lord Long Qing, the commander of the Imperial City Guards in
Tianshui Kingdom
.

Plot

As Jun Liang opened a stall at the market selling rare herbal ingredients,
Meng Wu
 approached, hoping to buy a vial of Magic Water for her ailing little brother. However, she didn’t have enough money to afford it. Desperate, she tried to negotiate, but Jun Liang saw an opportunity to exploit her predicament.

With ill intentions in his heart, he made an indecent proposal he would give her the Magic Water, but only if she agreed to be his girlfriend for three months. His true motive was clear, as he coveted her innocence. When she hesitated, he attempted to grope her, forcing himself upon her.

Just as Meng Wu was about to fall into despair, Li Yunxiao appeared, his presence like a cold blade cutting through the filth of the situation. Without a word, he intervened, stopping Jun Liang in his tracks. Seeing through his deceitful scheme, Yunxiao did not hesitate. With merciless precision, he struck, shattering Jun Liang’s dantian and crippling him on the spot.

Kang Wu
=======

He is a Low-Rank Martial Supreme from the Thunderfire Palace. He appeared in the Light Song Forest, wanting to witness the fight that will happen there.

Plot

Light Song Forest

Zou Chen
, proposes cooperation among the warriors to search for clues related to a rumored treasure. He offers his Time-fixing Plate, a unique artifact, to aid in the search. Despite skepticism about his reputation and intentions, Zou Chen's artifact reveals a lead pointing to the east, igniting hope among the gathered warriors. Kang Wu, associated with the Thunder Fire Palace, adds skepticism, implying the treasure's uncertainty and potential involvement of various factions.

The warriors share a gruesome tale of the Skull Mercenary Group's actions, intensifying their resolve. Zou Chen and Kang Wu engage in banter, reflecting discord between them. Zou Chen's lead prompts determination to pursue the Skeleton Mercenary Group. The warriors, led by Zou Chen and Kang Wu, set off on a mission to confront the perpetrators.

Demon Origin Plains

At the site, warriors from across the Demon Plain gather. Zou Chen and Kang Wu discuss the emergence of a formidable power and its link to Noah's Ark. Zou Chen expresses intent to withdraw due to the power's magnitude, while Kang Wu remains resolute. Tensions rise as a Martial Supreme offers a choice to continue or withdraw. The crowd divides, reflecting the uncertain atmosphere.

A chilling voice urges warriors to contribute for the potential appearance of Noah's Ark. Five mysterious figures arrive, leading by
Zhang Shaotian
, startling Zou Chen and Kang Wu. The strangers address Kang Wu by name, revealing his fear. The strangers demand assistance, sparking indignation and suspicion among the warriors. Facing the
Devouring Soul Sect
's might, Zou Chen sacrifices himself to prevent soul extraction.

The death of Zou Chen terrifies the warriors, and Kang Wu's defiance turns to submission. The warriors battle against the sect, but the Devouring Soul Sect's four Elite Disciples of the Martial Supreme Realm immobilize and capture them. Despite their efforts, the sect regains control through their domains and suppresses the warriors.

Members of the Devouring Soul Sect extract souls using the Soul Devourer Banner, displaying ruthless pleasure. As they devour the martial artists' souls, a nightmarish face appears, leaving behind only empty corpses.

Kangcheng
=========

Shi Kangcheng is a senior elder of the Long family and a staunch defender of tradition and rightful succession. He firmly believes in upholding the family’s ancestral rules, which dictate that the sect leader must always be chosen from among the young masters, not from the Council of Elders.

Appearance

An old man in a white robe.

Plot

He opposes
Yi Hongming
 self-declaration as temporary clan leader, arguing that
Fei Ni
, whom
Long Qianmiao
 appointed, should rightfully take over. Yi Hongming accuses him of siding with Fei Ni and causing turmoil, but Kangcheng counters that Yi Hongming is the real disruptor. Shocked to find that many elders, including the respected Lu Yuan, have sided with Yi Hongming, Kangcheng feels betrayed and furious, standing alone against a growing political takeover.

Kong Renyi
==========

Kong Renyi
 is a highly respected scholar in the
Tianshui Kingdom
, known as a Confucian descendant and a representative of righteousness and morality. He upholds the
five cardinal principles of righteousness
 and is widely revered by the
intellectual and scholarly community
. Despite not holding an official position in the royal court, his influence is immense
even the king
Qin Zheng
 and
Lan Hong
 address him as
"teacher"
 out of respec
t
. His
prestige and reputation
 make him a valuable tool for shaping public opinion and influencing the court.

Plot

After the
Three Wises
 incident, the scholars either retired, returned home, or went mad. Business along the Qinhuai River's flower boats also declined sharply.

Furious, Kong Renyi vomited blood and developed a high fever. Despite this, he had himself carried to the court, summoning all the imperial preceptors to demand an explanation from Li Chunyang. Terrified, Li Chunyang fled at the sight of them. Hearing they were still waiting at court, refusing to leave until he appeared, he had no choice but to call Yunxiao for help.

He led imperial preceptors in an attempt to slander and block Li Chunyang and Yunxiao from meeting the emperor. However, Yunxiao skillfully turned the law against him, Overcome with rage and humiliation, he suffered a fatal breakdown, vomiting blood and collapsing on the spot.

Lan
===

Lord Lan is one of the eight demon lords in the demon world.

Plot

Battle of Crimson Crescent City

Due to the weakness of the dimensional crack near
Crimson Crescent City
, his real body couldn't pass through, forcing him to use his clones to infiltrate the human world. However, the lack of demonic energy and the world's suppression prevented him from fully manifesting. Only by returning to the Demon World or completely demonizing the city could he restore his true form.

Power

Possessing the ability to split himself into a hundred powerful clones, each at the God Realm level. while his true body exists in the Void Extreme Realm.
