Plot

Lan Fei appeared to settle the score with Yunxiao after Yunxiao had previously defeated his subordinates. To make a statement, Lan Fei first overpowered Yunxiao’s two friends before confronting him directly. However, despite his confidence, he was swiftly defeated by Yunxiao in a single punch. Adding insult to injury, Yunxiao gave him a choice—either lose his family jewels or hand over all his wealth. Left with no option, Lan Fei was robbed of his fortune, including his family's prized jade pendant, the Five-Colored Divine Stone.

Later on, after his failed attempt to scam Li Yunxiao, Lan was expelled from the academy, losing his status and reputation.

Lan Xuan
========

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Lan Xuan
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Lan Xuan, was currently ranked third on Minor Chart in
Blue Jewel Academy
 and direct descendant of the Lan Family, Lan Fei's half brother.

Plot

Lan Xuan publicly challenges Yunxiao to a fight, giving him two choices—submit and never oppose the Lan Family again or face him in battle and be crippled. Confident and eager to establish dominance, Lan Xuan expects Yunxiao to back down. However, to his surprise, Yunxiao immediately accepts the challenge.

Meanwhile, Wang Feng, who had been trying to clear Lan Fei’s name, is enraged when Lan Xuan openly admits his brother’s guilt, ruining all his efforts. Lan Xuan, however, benefits from the situation, gaining a better reputation within his family.

As the duel began, Lan Xuan planned to win with a single move to establish his prestige. However, Li Yunxiao effortlessly evaded all of Lan Xuan's attacks using the
Moonwalk Step
, displaying incredible agility.







Not only did Yunxiao dodge every strike, but he was also preparing his ultimate technique—the
Floating Life Seal
. Borrowing the force of heaven and earth, he gathered immense power to unleash the move. His plan was clear—he would crush Lan Xuan completely with this decisive strike.

Lan Xuan stood petrified in the arena. Even before the palm seal descended, its heaven-shaking might had already shattered his fighting spirit. In an instant, his clothes were reduced to ashes, and bloody cracks spread across his skin.

When the
Floating Life Seal
 finally struck, it exploded into a blinding golden light, sending Lan Xuan flying like a punctured balloon. Streams of blood spurted from his body as he was hurled dozens of meters away, crashing into the ground with such force that the diamond rocks beneath him shattered.







Without hesitation, Li Yunxiao stepped forward and mercilessly destroyed Lan Xuan’s dantian, crippling him for life.

Lan Yanzhuo
===========

The
King of Misty Rock
 is a formidable figure, renowned as the most talented expert of the past 100,000 years. He swept across the continent, conquered nations, and established the
Purple Mist Dynasty
, solidifying his rule over vast territories. His overwhelming strength forced even the
Four Seas and the Monster Race
 to submit to his authority.

Background

A master of
Dharmakaya cultivation
, the
King of Misty Rock
 power exceeds that of an ordinary
Creation Realm expert
, placing him at the pinnacle of the martial world. He holds the highest position among the
Four Kings of Xuan Li Island
, a group of unparalleled warriors who govern the Eternal World. His ambitions extend far beyond mere rulership his goal is to ascend as the supreme
Universal God
, surpassing all others in history.

Plot

Emperor pill tower

King of Misty Rock
 appeared amidst a
red cloud
 that swept across the sky, arriving above the grand hall. With an
indifferent expression
, he took his seat upon the throne, exuding an air of absolute authority. His gaze swept across the room as he coldly issued a command
to leave the
Heavenly Fortune Pill
 behind.

However, when he discovered that
Yunxiao
 possessed the
Divine Realm Tablet
, his greed intensified. Without hesitation, he declared his intent to seize it, even if it meant killing
Yunxiao and his companions
.

As the battle erupted between the
King of Misty Rock
 and Yunxiao’s group, it quickly became apparent that the gap in power was insurmountable. Despite their combined efforts, Even yunxiao Killing Formation the Twelve Divine Beings  he had set up was insufficient to even threaten the
King of Misty Rock
. He planned to they found themselves cornered, unable to retaliate.

Yunxiao issued a chilling threat to detonate the Twelve Divine Fiend Puppets along with his own corporeal body in a final, devastating attack.

By his side stood
Qu Hongyan
,
Fei Ni
, Luo Yunshang,
Beifeng Nan
, the Sky-Patrolling Bull, the
Crocodile
, Yi, and
Gu Qingqing
, all prepared to stake everything on this desperate assault. If their combined strength still wasn’t enough to defeat the Misty Rock Lord, they could at least severely wound his Dharmakaya.

However, the
King of Misty Rock
 remained unfazed, exuding absolute confidence in his
Body Arts
 cultivation. But just as he dismissed their efforts, his confidence wavered.
Ye Nantian
, descending through
Ye Fan’s body
, appeared and issued a chilling warning if the Misty Rock Lord still insisted on killing Yunxiao, seizing the
Divine Realm Tablet
, and capturing Ye Fan, he would never leave the
Realm of Immortality
 alive.

Faced with this unexpected threat, the Misty Rock Lord’s expression darkened. Realizing the stakes had changed, he chose to retreat, disappearing into the void without another word.

Lei Feng
========

Lei Feng was a legendary Martial Emperor who did good deeds without leaving a name. He was only heard of in myths and legends, and no one had ever seen him in reality.

Lei Ling
========

He is the Leader of the
Four Extremes Sect
, which is extremely renowned in the Mercantile Union due to the fact that he carries a copy of a Transcendent Grade Weapon, the Heavenly Suppression Pagoda, a Xuan Artifact near the Ninth-Rank Peak. This Artifact is a replica of
Demon Emperor Di
 Holy Demonic Artifact, the Battlefield of the Ancient Gods.

Appearance

withered yellow face and high cheekbones

Personality

Luo Ying had always been a man of his word.

Plot

When Tang Jie attempted to capture Yunxiao and even threatened his own brother, Tang Xin, Luo Ying decisively intervened, stopping the conflict and asserting his authority. He made it clear that internal strife within the sect would not be tolerated, forcing Tang Jie and his faction to retreat.

Recognizing Tang Jie's growing arrogance and the resources backing him, Luo Ying resolved to return to the sect and confront the Sect Master about his stance.

Leng Hongling
=============

She is the daughter of the
Master of the Emotion-Severing Mountain
. She is very mysterious, even the most talented person in the younger generation of the
Duskflame Empire
 the prince
Xin Ruyu
, lost his pride upon seeing her in the Golden Crow Arena.

General Information

Her father
Leng Xingbo
, took
Zhou Yushan
 as a direct disciple. He tried to marry off his daughter to his disciple, the time the latter reaches the Fifth Layer of the Forgotten Love Heavenly Book.

Leng Quan
=========

He is a young talent from the Heaven-Shaking Sect of the
Wooden Dawn Empire
, he reached a Two-Star Martial Grandmaster in such a young age for the
Southern Region
. He is one of the opponents that
Li Yunxiao
 faces on Qionghua Island.

Plot

Qionghua Island

He set up the Rain Element Formation, one of the seven strongest elemental formations, to attack Li Yunxiao. The Rain Element Formation condenses the essence of water from the five elements and creates a rain of sharp swords that can pierce through trees and cause massive destruction.

When Li Yunxiao recognizes the Rain Element Formation and demands the formation diagram from Leng Quan, the latter becomes angry and denies Li Yunxiao's claim that he plans to merge the seven elemental formations into one. Leng Quan warns that each of the seven elemental formations is extremely powerful, and even a Martial Emperor would be affected by their might.

Li Yunxiao, still seeking to understand the power of the Rain Element Formation, decides to test his strength against Leng Quan, who is much more powerful than him. They clash, and despite Li Yunxiao's true qi advantage, the oppressive strength of the Rain Element Formation cracks Leng Quan's fists and causes him to bleed. However, Leng Quan manages to hold his ground and even conceals another disciple within the formation to maintain its effectiveness.

Leng Quan is surprised that Li Yunxiao can detect the hidden disciple, as the Rain Element Formation is known for its extreme concealment. Li Yunxiao revealed that he also practices Water-based martial techniques, surprising Leng Quan. Li Yunxiao's true qi transformed into the Water attribute, and he unleashed a move called the "Water Dragon's Song," inspired by observing a water snake. However, Leng Quan countered Li Yunxiao's attack using his "Azure Tyrant Palm," a powerful water-based palm technique.

Leng Quan then revealed four hidden disciples who also possessed water-based entities, each with strength comparable to a Martial Grandmaster. He challenged Li Yunxiao to face the combined strength of five Martial Grandmasters, claiming that if Li Yunxiao won, he would give him the Rain Barrier's map.

The battle intensified, and Li Yunxiao used the power of the
World God Monument
 to break Leng Quan's water-based entanglements. Employing the "Great Boundary God Art," Li Yunxiao's overwhelming strength suppressed Leng Quan and his disciples, forcing them to surrender and give up the crystals. However, Li Yunxiao's victory was somewhat controversial as a sudden sea of flames appeared during the battle, and Leng Quan felt frustrated by the unexpected turn of events.

Eventually, Leng Quan and his team surrendered after being overwhelmed by Li Yunxiao's strength. Leng Quan reluctantly handed over the crystals and the Rain Barrier formation map to Li Yunxiao. Despite his unwillingness, he was left puzzled and frustrated by the unexpected appearance of a sea of flames during the battle. The enforcement members watching from above were also astonished by the turn of events and the outcome of the battle.

Leng Xingbo
===========

He is the Master of the Emotion Severing Mountain, one of the three great experts of the
Duskflame Empire
. He, along with
Qi Feng
 of the Heaven-Gathering Sect and
Cui Songhe
 of the Heavenly Jewel Sect, were the symbols of the Duskflame Empire's martial path.

General Information

He took
Zhou Yushan
 as a direct disciple. He tried to marry off his daughter to his disciple, the time the latter reaches the Fifth Layer of the Forgotten Love Heavenly Book.

Plot

Leng Xingbo, the Lord of the Emotion Severing Mountain, on the foot of a mountain. Leng Xingbo was a formidable expert at the Eight Disolates Realm, a Martial Supreme. Confronted Li Yunxiao on Qionghua Island. He appeared without any concealment and displayed his Martial Supreme's domain, creating a formidable barrier that divided the earth into two halves.

Li Yunxiao recognized Leng Xingbo's domain and showed respect towards the powerful figure. Leng Xingbo revealed that he was there to reclaim his treasured sword, the Snow & Frost Bright Sword, which symbolized his Emotion Severing Mountain. However, he found the sword's spiritual aura had died, leading to confusion and sorrow in his heart.

Li Yunxiao explained that the sword had found its best destination and died without regrets, conveying emotions despite being an unfeeling sword. This revelation caused a breakthrough in Leng Xingbo's cultivation, as he broke through a long-standing bottleneck.

Feeling grateful to Li Yunxiao for helping him understand the message from the sword, Leng Xingbo decided to reward him by betrothing his daughter,
Hong Ling
, to him. Li Yunxiao, however, Li Yunxiao, feeling overwhelmed, proposed holding an auction in three days in Flame Martial City, where Leng Xingbo could bring Hong Ling to find a suitable son-in-law.

In the end, Leng Xingbo agreed to send Hong Ling to participate in Li Yunxiao's upcoming auction in three days. Afterward, Leng Xingbo disappeared into the distance, and Li Yunxiao continued his journey towards Flame Martial City.

Martial Flam City Coup d'état

During the Martial Flame City crisis,Leng Xingbo along with
Wang Songhe
,
Yu Zizhen
, and
Fan Long
 Support
Xin Ruyu
, taking advantage of the chaos to stir up trouble. With
Yanwu City
's spiritual energy depleting, Xin Ruyu openly declared his intent to seize control, claiming that the
Li family
 was no longer fit to rule.
However,
Li Yunxiao
 suddenly arrived at Martial Flame City, putting an abrupt end to Xin Ruyu's ambitions. In a decisive move, Yunxiao crippled Xin Ruyu. Facing Yunxiao’s overwhelming might,
Leng Xingbo
, realizing his mistake and seeing no other way out, attempted suicide to protect his family. But before he could act,
Li Chunyang
 stepped in, pledging to forgive them despite their betrayal and their attempts to destroy the Li family.

Moved by this,
Li Yunxiao
 granted them a chance at pardon—but on one condition. As punishment for their actions, they were forced to destroy their own dantians, permanently crippling their cultivation.

Li
==

SPOILER ALERT!

She one of the Great Monsters ten thousands years ago from the Jiuli tribe is one of the most ancient tribes of the demon race.

Past

In order to comprehend the rules of the
Ten Directions Realm
, she and her close ones sealed themselves in an array for tens of thousands of years, which resulted in a massive drop of their cultivation from a Peak Martial Sovereign (estimated even Divine Transcendence for herself and her friends and Peak of Perfection for Shang) down to the Martial Emperor Realm.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

In the midst of an intense battle above the Demon Plain,
Yi Qing
 faces off against
Fu
, wielding a mighty 9th Rank Battle-Axe. Despite Yi Qing's efforts, he's overpowered, and Shang and his group watch as the battle escalates. Shang reveals his identity as the possessor of the
Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere
 to
Little Qing
. He seeks Little Qing's assistance in restoring the Artifact's power using the Eternal Evergreen Tree's energy, but Little Qing resists.

As the confrontation intensifies, Little Qing transforms into lightning and traps Shang and his companions. Shang utilizes the power of the Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere to create a celestial barrier, attempting to contain Little Qing.

Later,
Ge
 sacrifices himself to block Little Qing's devastating
Void Jade Azure Violet Palace Brahma World Annihilation Divine Thunder
 attack.
Li Yunxiao
 rushes to save Little Qing. Li Yunxiao injures Shang heavily, and Little Qing leaves a cryptic message before disappearing. The Sacred Fire Temple and Tianyi Chamber of Commerce unite against the monsters,
Qing Luo
 leading against Fu.

Li Yunxiao and
Mister Yu
 engage in a fierce confrontation, with Li Yunxiao gaining the upper hand and breaking Mister Yu's arm. Following the intense clashes, the monsters retreat, leaving behind a tense atmosphere.

Later,
Yu
,
Li
,
Shang
, and others are fighting off Spirit Rats repelled by the sound of war drums. Yu's arm is missing, and the group discusses their dire situation. Tang Jie, suggests they join the Four Extremes Sect. Yu, Shang, and others disagreed and tried to recover and discuss finding someone to repair the damaged Supreme Celestial Armillary Sphere.

After a while, Shang submits Tang Jie could help, and the group eventually agrees to join forces with him. Li helps Tang Jie recover but places the Seven Fiend Seal on him, causing intense pain. After Tang Jie's confrontation with
Dan Yangze
 and the events that followed, Tang Jie and his group refocused their efforts on dealing with Li Yunxiao and his allies.

After Tang Jie's failed attempt to bravely face the attacks, he and the other Great Monsters fled when faced with the
World God Monument
's descending strike by Li Yunxiao.
Fu
, attempted to strike the battleship with a powerful ninth-grade Xuan Artifact called the Xuan Flower Axe. To counter this,
Ye Fan
 revealed a Martial Will Pill that was enhanced with Nine Heavens Sovereign Qi, capable of withstanding the Xuan Artifact's impact.

After a fierce battle between
Mister Yu
 against Li Yunxiao and
Gourd Little King Kong
, Yu and Yunxiao heavily injured. Suddenly
Shen Feng
 came in the back of the Rank Eight Demonic Beast, the Nine-winged Spirit Snake Bird, Yu requested Shen Feng's assistance in eliminating Li Yunxiao, to which Shen Feng agreed. However, at the critical moment, a giant flying artifact, the
Money Chamber of Commerce
, intervened.
Qian Wudi
, appeared on the artifact and engaged in a verbal exchange with Li Yunxiao. After Li Yunxiao and Qian Wudi's intense negotiation, Qian Wudi agrees to trade Tianhun Herb, 1.2 billion mid-grade Primordial Stones, and additional resources for a mysterious item Li Yunxiao possesses.

However, Shen Feng, tries to attack Li Yunxiao again, but
Zhang Hanzhe
 intervenes, leading to a standoff. Ultimately, the trade is made, with Li Yunxiao giving Qian Wudi the Seven Constellations Martial Will Fruit in exchange for Tianhun Herb and primordial stones. Tang Jie and his group from the Four Extremes Sect left the scene.

Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

In a frozen landscape, Li uses her formidable array skills to attempt to break the Four Seasons Formation. Li is uncertain of the success of her efforts and warns her comrades to distance themselves. As she works on the formation, Shang and others watch anxiously. Suddenly, the formation unleashes a series of violent events, with ice spikes and a rising ice mountain wreaking havoc.

Li's attempt to break the formation triggers catastrophic consequences, Little Qing, who has been observing, warns that disaster is looming. The formation's instability leads to the sudden rise of an enormous ice mountain that engulfs Li, while the surrounding area experiences chaotic shifts between the four seasons.

The mountain's peak undergoes rapid transformations, with spring, summer, autumn, and winter all manifesting at different levels. The mountain's appearance reflects the four seasons, with spring at the midpoint, peach blossoms, withered trees, and snow at the base. Meanwhile, an immense boundary of the four seasons emerges in the distance, revealing the Immortal Mountain of lord
Throne
.

Four Seasons Immortal Mountain

Shang
 and the other Great Monsters, including
Yu
, appeared in the space where
Li Yunxiao
,
Tang Jie
 and the others were. Tang Jie's eagerness for revenge against Li Yunxiao intensifies. Shang orders an attack against Li Yunxiao and his group, including Zhang Shaotian. However, the unique environment suppresses the use of Primordial Qi and Essence, rendering the attackers powerless. Li Yunxiao's true power becomes apparent as he effortlessly defeats Tang Jie despite the restrictions, leaving the group of Great Monsters stunned.

Technique

the Jiuli tribe has a secret technique to summon the
Ghost King
.

Trivia

Her friends are very important to her.

Li Baifeng
==========

Li Baifeng, playing a key role in the internal power struggle against
Li Yi
. Unlike Yunxiao, who prefers direct confrontation, he believes in patience, careful planning, and striking only when the time is right. He works alongside several family elders, trying to build enough support to overthrow Li Yi, who has seized control of most of the
Li Family
.

Plot

Li Baifeng is deeply loyal to Yunxiao and his father, constantly working behind the scenes to protect them. He understands that Li Yi is more than just a usurperhe likely has powerful backers supporting him, so he give a task to
Li Xian
 to urges Yunxiao to avoid conflict until they are fully prepared.

Li Chunyang
===========

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about

.
Please help by

 about

 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Li Chunyang, the former
Li Family
 patriarch and the number one veteran of the military, was a revered warrior of
Tianshui Kingdom
. Though believed dead, he had gone into hiding, secretly observing the power struggle between
Prince
Qin Yang
 and
Prince
Qin Yue
 while planning the best path for his family's future.

Background

Despite his age, Li Chunyang remained a formidable Warrior. He had
broken through the realm of Five Elements
 and ascended to the rank of
Martial King
. His strength alone made him a deciding factor in the political landscape of Tianshui. However, rather than blindly involving himself in the conflict, he chose to
stay hidden
, waiting for the most beneficial path for the
Li Family's survival and prosperity
.

His grandson,
Yunxiao
, was the one who pulled him out of hiding, demonstrating a level of intelligence, foresight, and dominance that even Li Chunyang did not expect. Realizing Yunxiao's potential and his alliance with
Prince
Qin Yue
, Li Chunyang made a decisive choice: he would throw the full weight of the
Li Family
 behind Yunxiao and Qin Yue, ensuring their rise to power. Though he had once been a loyal subject of
King
Qin Zheng
, he understood that times were changing, and if Qin Yue was destined to ascend the throne, then the
Li Family would rise alongside him
.

Plot

Martial Flam City Coup d'état

During the Martial Flame City crisis,
Li Chunyang
 and other key figures of
Yanwu City
 held a meeting to discuss the city's declining spiritual energy and growing threats. Amid the chaos,
Xin Ruyu
, backed by major force from Duskflame Empire and one of the Seven Major Powers of Tianwu, seized the opportunity to declare his intent to take over, claiming the
Li family
 was no longer fit to rule. Li Chunyang tried to stop him but was nearly killed in the process.
Before Xin Ruyu could succeed,
Li Yunxiao
 suddenly arrived, crushing his ambitions. In a decisive move, Yunxiao crippled Xin Ruyu, while the sect masters who had sided with him were granted pardon becausr Li Chunyang pledge to forgive them because their past deed help martial flame xity yunxio that touch by this forgive them on the condition that they destroy their own dantians as punishment.

The
Leng Xingbo
,
Wang Songhe
 and the others who had sided with him were granted pardon because
Li Chunyang
, remembering their past contributions to Martial Flame City, pleaded for their forgiveness. Moved by Li Chunyang’s compassion, Yunxiao agreed to spare them on the condition that they destroy their own dantians as punishment.

Trivia

He was bestowed the title of ‘country guarding martial King’ by Qin Yue.

Li Dayuan
=========

Li Dayuan
 was a miner who lived next door to Meng Wu and Meng Bai. From time to time, he would check on the siblings, making sure they were safe and doing well. Because of his kindness and concern, Meng Wu and Meng Bai came to see him as a trusted uncle figure in their lives.

Personality

Despite his rough mining background, he is straightforward and honest.

Background

Li Dayuan is a five-star warrior who used to mine in Fivepeaks Vein before the officials took control of the area. Since then, he has been working in smaller, overlooked veins, where competition is fierce, but his strength ensures that no one dares to steal from him.

As Li Yunxiao  recognizing his skills and knowledge, he then offers him a new role, tasking him with infiltrating the Li Family’s mining team to locate Purple Sun Stones, in exchange for a steady income of 500 gold coins per month.

Li Family
=========

Background

The Li Family, once a prestigious and powerful clan with deep military influence, had fallen into internal strife and external suppression. Li Yi, backed by hidden forces—including King Qin Zheng had gained control over most of the family. The king, wary of the Li Family’s immense military power, sought to weaken them by supporting the rival Lan Family and using Li Yi as a puppet to create division from within. Despite this, Li Baifeng and several elders were secretly plotting a counterattack, waiting for the right moment to reclaim their family's former strength.

Structure

Patriarch

Li Changfeng

Li Chunyang
(Former)

Young Master

Li Yunxiao

Members

Li Baifeng

Others

Li Xian

Li Yi
(Former)

Trivia

The Li Mansion was so large that all the servants’ names were erased and replaced by numbers to make it easier to manage. They would be given names only if they did a good job and were approved by their masters.

Li Feiyu
========

Li Feiyu was one of the four rising stars of the North Region. He also the well-deserved number one young man of the ten thousand treasures store.

Appearance

A young man less than thirty years old in a light red silk robe slowly walked out of the air. The man’s body was full of jewels and treasures, and he looked very energetic. He had flaxen hair and a pair of bright eyes.

Plot

When Li Yunxiao chased
Wang Zhen
 but lost track of him, he help revealed Wang Zhan’s location to Yunxiao. Later, he offered to buy Little Gourd from him.

Li Huachi
=========

Li Huachi
 (厉华池), the
Heavenly Zither Martial Sovereign
 (天琴武帝), the
Fifth-Ranked Martial Sovereign
 on the
Heaven and Earth Power Chart
 and he is one of
Gu Feiyang
's old friends. If the Martial Sovereigns were a God-level Existences in the
Tianwu Continent
, then the Conferred Martial Sovereigns are the True Gods.

Plot

Martial Flame Crisis

After the collapse of the
Sumero Mountain Secret Realm
,
Yanwu City
 turns into a cultivation paradise. Yunxiao, knowing that trouble is around the corner, sents someone to redeem the favor, which Li Huachi owes him.

When he arrived in Yanwu City, he encountered the powerful and tyrannical
Constellation Old Monster
, who had been causing trouble and wanted to seize control of the city.

Li Huachi intervened to protect Yanwu City, owing a favor to Gu Feiyang there. He engaged in a brief confrontation with Constellation Old Monster and effortlessly countered his powerful Raging Waves Technique with his Divine Charm, a segment of ancient divine music played on his zither. Li Huachi's mastery over the zither and his overwhelming strength caused Old Monster to suffer a humiliating defeat, and he disintegrated into dust with a single move from Li Huachi.

Afterward, Li Huachi chased away the Constellation Sect disciples who had fled in fear, demonstrating his might as a Titled Martial Sovereign. He then sensed the presence of someone hiding in the void and demanded they reveal themselves. Two black silhouettes emerged, one of them accompanied by a silver-white demonic beast with a golden horn on its forehead.

He encountered
Yao Jinliang
, another Titled Martial Sovereign, and his powerful demonic beast and Kun Nu. Yao Jinliang demanded the Meng siblings, who were hidden in the World God Monument at that time. Li Huachi confronted them and refused to let them take the siblings. However,
Wei Qing
, a mysterious figure, arrived, and it was revealed that he was using a divine will to communicate through Kun Nu. Li Huachi and Li Yunxiao were surprised by Wei Qing's appearance.

Li Huachi threatened to kill Wei Qing's divine will if they acted recklessly. Yao Jinliang and Wei Qing then used a technique to search for the Meng siblings. Li Yunxiao set-up restrictions in the World God Monument to protect them, but Wei Qing's transcendent-grade profound artifact began to break the realm, and Li Huachi reluctantly agreed to help find the siblings to prevent the destruction of the southern region, with one tune he made all the people below to fell asleep for three days.

In the end, Wei Qing and Yao Jinliang left, and Li Yunxiao became less visible in Yanwu City after the incident. After that incident, the
Holy Region
 issues an iron law that no one, other than people from the Souther Region, is allowed to interfere in Yanwu City's matter.

Relationships

Xue Chenxi

He is secretly in love with her for a long time.

References

Li Mangshan
===========

Li Mangshan first appears during the battle at
Crimson Crescent City
, he has mastered the incredibly rare Dao of Light and wields strength equal to the Stone King, standing out as one of the two strongest Kings on
Xuanli Island
.

Curiosity

The path of Light allows you to exercise a force of nature that transcends the Nine Elements (possibly the
Five natural Elementals
 and the
Four Quadrants
), working together with the Laws. Along with the Dao of Darkness, this is a force of legendary authority.

Li Yi
=====

SPOILER ALERT!

Li Yi has a high talent for cultivation and bears great hatred for Yunxiao. Many times he manages to avoid death and even though he suffers greatly, he also has great luck.

Background

Li Yi was once nothing more than a nameless servant, known only by his assigned number, Once known as
"8527,"
 he was merely a numbered servant, a reminder of his lowly past. Li Yi's origins as a former servant marked him as an outsider within the
Li Family.
 Somewhere along the way,
Li Yi gained the backing of the king himself,
Qin Zheng
 and the oldest prince
Qin Yang
.
 The monarch, wary of the immense military power held by Yunxiao’s grandfather,
Duke Jingguo
,
 and Yunxiao’s father,
General
Li Changfeng
, sought a means to weaken the mighty
Li Family
 from within.
Li Yi became that instrument a puppet used to divide and conquer.

Li Yi eventual rise to power, he managed to climb the ranks and was eventually granted the
Li surname.
 With royal favor supporting him, Li Yi began systematically tightening his grip over the Li Family. Through political maneuvering, Despite this, his past remains a sensitive topic. No one dares to bring up his origins anymore, as he has consolidated his power, seizing control over most of the
Li Family
.

Plot

After the death of the last Xingyang family member
Xingyang Huo
 that attack
Martial Flame City
, which was brought by Li Yi in hope of killing Yunxiao, he managed to run away amidst the commotion.

Mount Meru

On Mount Meru, Li Yi scavenged the bodies of other participants and managed to find a token of the
Death God Palace
. After leaving the secret Realm he searched for that organization.

Death God Palace

He then found a person called "Tyrannical Sky Tiger" which showed him the way to the passage leading to the Death God Palace. After entering through a toilet bowl and swimming through a pool of feces before arriving at the destination.

He meets the Palace Master
Yuwen Xiang
 and shows him the token and issued his wish for Yunxiao to get assassinated. Because of the destruction of the secret Realm Mount Meru, Yanwu City turned into a Cultivation Paradise. Since Yunxiao is the City Lord and the Holy Region issued an Iron Order which forbids outsiders from attacking it, the token as a price is not enough. In exchange for Yunxiao's assassination Li Yi was forced to become the plaything of the Palace Master.

Revenge

Later after he manage to learn The Yang yang art of creation from
Yuwen Xiang
 through a special "
dual cultivation technique"
. Li Yi managed to extract the Ancestral Bloodline of the Demons from the Palace Master Yuwen Xiang and his brother
Yuwen Xun
, kills both of them and takes over the Death God Palace.
 Thinking he finally made it, just to find out that the Death God Palace is only a small subordinate force of
Beiming Dark Palace
.

Crimson Crescent City

Li Yi appears in Red Moon City with the intention to compete for the position as the City Lord's daughters husband. Before the competition started the young geniuses of the region had an assembly where Li Yi tried to show off. After succeeding at first, Li Yunxiao later appears and greatly humiliates him, before almost killing Li Yi in a fight that later breaks out. In the last second he got saved and brought back to the Death God Palace.

He later appears at the wedding ceremony of
Jiang Ruobing
 and
Tang Xin
 in
Red Moon City
. There he witnesses Yunxiao stopping the ceremony and fighting
Tang Qing
, the former
Four Extremes Sects
 Sect Master.

Later he betrayed
Shang
, extracted part of his power, seized part of
Teng Guang
's Void Dao Fruit and joined
Wei Qing
's side. Wei Qing appoints him Vice City Lord of
Crimson Crescent City
 while
Luo Qingyun
 becomes City Lord.

The
Dongmen Yuan
 Execution

When the
ten thousand treasure store
 assembled forces at
New Yan city
 to kill
Ling Baiyi
 he appeared as the Vice City Lord of
Crimson Crescent City
.

After the failed assassination of Ling Baiyi,
Wan Yiqian
,
Su Lianyi
, and Yunxiao were ambushed at
Ishikawa city
 by disciples and several elders
Heavenly Night Palace
, led by
Han Junting
, who was working with
Beiming Duanjue
 to eliminate Yunxiao, along with several other forces seeking to snatch the Ten Thousand Treasure Store's key from
Wan Yiqian
. At that moment, Li Yi appeared and attempted to seize the key to the Ancient Treasure Pagoda of the Ten Thousand Treasure Store, diverting the attention of numerous forces and unintentionally aiding Yunxiao and his companions.

[...]

It's implied that Shang visited Li Yi, to let him absorb his strength since Shangs Cultivation is crippled from the war at Five Cloud Mountain.

Demon Invasion

Shortly after Li Yi is founding the
Grand Hegemony Alliance
.
 Unfortunately the Devils from the Demon Realm managed to invade through the East Regions Mystic Realm and directly appear in Crimson Crescent City. A great fight breaks out. Li Yi suspecting Yunxiao of sending the Demons after him initially fights in order to destroy 'Yunxiao's plot'.

After failing miserably Li Yi, Ding Shan, Wan Yiqian, Wan Xuanan try to flee through the teleportation formation of Crimson Crescent City. Yunxiao who observed the appearance of the Devils appears and blocks their path, since Experts are planned to arrive through the teleportation formation from the Heavenly Martial Alliance, to deal with the Devils. The four attack Yunxiao together and rush to the teleportation formation, but get tricked by Yunxiao and land right in front of the Demon Lan. Lan lets his clones possess the three of them and kills Ding Shan after searching his memory for information about Li Yi's bloodline/ special body.

power

Li Yi, once underestimated by Yuxio, has now emerged as a top figure. After severing ties with the monster race, he prevented Shang from reaching the Immortal State, even absorbing part of Shang’s power with the bloodline of the myriad demon mother, which allows him to absorb the power of the demon race very thoroughly  and even swallowing a Dao fruit fragment
Teng Guang
 in the process. This drastic shift turned the tide of the situation, not only altering the power structure of the Heavenly Martial Arts realm but also making a crucial contribution to the human race.

Trivia

Yunxiao state. that Li Yi is indeed strange. He seems to have a very strong fate, and he was able to turn misfortune into fortune in a series of events, and even profited from them.

Li Yunxiao
==========

SPOILER ALERT!

“

Through the experience of my previous life, I will definitely become even stronger! In this life--I WILL REACH THE PINNACLE OF THIS WORLD!!

”

 ― Gu Feiyang as Li Yunxiao,
Chapter 1

Overview
History
Cultivation
Martial Skills
Techniques
Alchemy Pills
Xuan Artifacts

Gu Feiyang
is the main character of the Manhua
"The Eternal Supreme"
. He reincarnated as
Li Yunxiao
, the Young Master of the Li Family, who is known for being a good for nothing since he can't open a single chakra.

Appearance

Personality

Li Yunxiao
 has a personality that seems arrogant at first sight, and he does not know his limits under the heavens, but this personality is due to the fact that he was at the Peak of the Martial World, so even after his reincarnation he could not change it, in addition to him being wise, which makes him appear bold and cunning, he will also take what he wants in all possible ways.  Despite that, he still cares a lot about his friends and family, and if someone hurts them, he will not rest until this person is gone.

Background

One of the
Conferred Martial Sovereigns
, and the top third strongest in Heaven and Earth Power Chart, Gu Feiyang, passed away in the Tiandang Mountains and was reincarnated 15 years later as Li Yunxiao in the
State of Tianshui
, embarking on a heaven-defying journey against the innumerable geniuses of the time.

Specialities

Best Sword Skills

Trivia

He defeated
Ten Peak Martial Sovereigns
 with only one move.

He fought against the
Heavenly Night Palace Lady
 and won.

He plays music brilliantly.

He was the first youngest
9th Tier Alchemist
.

He carried out a massacre against one of the
Three Ruling Families
 of the
Crimson Crescent City
.

He provoked a massacre among fishmen that stretched across eight thousand miles of water (as known to the public).

Quotes

Respect is not given by others. You have to earn it yourself. And you lost mine from the beginning.

”

Jia Rong
,
Chapter 3

The winds and clouds rise high, all because of me!

”

 ― Li Yunxiao while fighting
Zhong Lishan
,
Chapter 22

Life is glory and shame, But all turns to dust. Life is like a fog, But martial arts are eternal!

”

Chapter 69

Martial Lord? In my eyes, Martial Lords have not even stepped into the Martial Realm!

Cultivation

Trivia

Before embarking on his cultivation path, Yunxiao unclogged his Meridians and then opened up his 7 Chakra Points.
