Li Yunxiao/History
==================

This page is under
development
.  All existing information will be
modified
 or
deleted
.  To help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
 add some information about
Li Yunxiao/History
 as it is released. We will fix it.

Overview
History
Cultivation
Martial Skills
Techniques
Alchemy Pills
Xuan Artifacts

The Blue Jewel Academy

Gu Feiyang was reborn in Li Yunxiao's body from the Tianshui Kingdom, in his first appearance, dazzling all his classmates. He knew twelve other ways to craft an ordinary mysterious weapon in addition to the thirty-six methods written down by Yang Di…

The Zhou Great Family Crisis Arc

Yunxiao provokes the Zhou Great Family and demands an immediate fight with
Zhou Yushan
, but
Zhou Yangbiao
 states that the fight will take place in seven days when his son is out of seclusion. Yunxiao refuses to trust the healing medicine given by Zhou Yangbiao and asks for an alchemist to verify its safety.
Baili Gongjin
, the president of the
Duskflame Empire
's Alchemist Association, steps forward to examine the medicine and expresses his astonishment at Yunxiao's abilities. This further angers Zhou Yangbiao, who feels humiliated by the turn of events.

Yunxiao accuses the Zhou Great Family of attempting to poison him, causing a stir among the onlookers. Baili Gongjin, an esteemed alchemist, examines the pill and confirms it is indeed poisonous. However, Zhou Bo, the seventh elder of the Zhou family, volunteers to test the pill and ends up dying from the poison. The shocking turn of events leaves the crowd in disbelief. Zhou yangbiao, enraged by the accusation and the death of Zhou Bo, confronts Yunxiao, but their confrontation is interrupted by the appearance of the Green Phoenix Floating Battleship, a massive and intimidating presence.

Yunxiao claims to possess the powerful Green Phoenix Floating Battleship, causing shock and fear among the crowd. The Martial Emperor Supreme elder
Zhou Changfa
 of the Zhou family confront Yunxiao, demanding the warship's surrender. In response, Yunxiao threatens to self-destruct the warship, causing panic.
Xin Pi
 and his companions intervene, offering to mediate and prevent the destruction. Yunxiao reluctantly agrees, but as the warship stops, Zhou Changfa, the Supreme Elder of the Zhou family, attacks Yunxiao with a powerful killing intent.

Yunxiao is confronted by Zhou Changfa, who launches a powerful attack. Yunxiao manages to block the attack using a talisman, surprising everyone present. He then swiftly rushes towards the Green Phoenix Floating Battleship, intending to activate its self-destruction. Xin Pi and others plead with Yunxiao to stop and offer to mediate. Yunxiao agrees, but continues to threaten the self-destruction. He eventually lands on the warship and demands the release of
Qin Ruxue
, compensation, and an end to the hiding of the Zhou family in the duel. Zhou Changfa agrees to the last condition but refuses the other demands.

Yunxiao threatens to activate the self-destruction of the Green Phoenix Floating Battleship and the six-universe Star Observation formation. Xin Pi, on behalf of the Zhou family, agrees to Yunxiao's demands to prevent the destruction. Qin Ruxue is released, and Yunxiao demands compensation of 55 million mid-grade primordial stones. He also warns the Zhou family not to hide in the duel. Yunxiao takes Qin Ruxue and leaves on the battleship. Zhou Changfa and the Zhou family express anger and resentment towards Yunxiao. Meanwhile, Yunxiao acknowledges and thanks several individuals, including
Wang Chen
,
Cheng Feng
,
Mo Zhai
, and Baili Gongjin. Leaving them in the midst of accusations from both Zhou Changfa and his Zhou Great Family.

Destroying
Zhou Yushan
 Arc

Li Yunxiao arrives at the arena with a powerful Martial Grandmaster level demonic beast, stunning everyone. Many had bet against him but now fear his advantage. Some speculate that he used a pill to control the beast temporarily. The Zhou family accuses him of cheating, demanding proof of his beast-taming abilities. Li Yunxiao demonstrates his control over the demonic beast, making it obey his commands, silencing the accusers and impressing the crowd. Later, He names it "Mountain Splitting, Jade Devouring." The Zhou family accuses him of cheating in the duel.
Xin Pi
 tries to mediate, but Li Yunxiao demands compensation to put away the beast. Later, he didn't fight with it as an exchange for Sixty Million Mid-Grade Primal Stones.

In the duel, Li Yunxiao shows incredible agility and physical strength, surprising everyone with his
Heavenly Tyrant Body Tempering Technique
. He neutralizes the Martial King Zhou Yushan's powerful strike and counterattacks with his own sword technique, demonstrating exceptional comprehension and skill. Li Yunxiao also delivers a humiliating slap to Zhou Yushan's face, asserting his dominance in the battle. His performance garners admiration and fear from the spectators, making
Xin Ruyu
 view him as a formidable rival.
Leng Hongling
 remains composed and suggests that Zhou Yushan should still have an advantage if Li Yunxiao relies solely on body techniques.

Later, Zhou Yushan activates the Fifth Layer of the Forgotten Love Heavenly Book, which impresses
Zhou Changfa
 and others as it fulfills the condition for him to marry
Leng Hongling
. He wields the Cold Moon Sword, a powerful Sixth-Tier Xuan Artifact, displaying an overwhelming aura and releasing moonlight that threatens to crush Li Yunxiao. However, Li Yunxiao remains calm and recites poetry, appreciating the Cold Moon Sword's craftsmanship. He skillfully controls the Tiger Tooth Sword, which is eventually shattered by the Wugou Frost. Despite the significant power difference, Li Yunxiao showcases remarkable skill and control, handling the dangerous situation with ease, leaving everyone astonished by his abilities and calm demeanor.

Later. He used the Dusty World Seal, and later the enhanced Heaven and Earth Seal, he counters Zhou Yushan's powerful attacks and withstands the impact. While Zhou Yushan's fate is uncertain after the collision, Li Yunxiao emerges unscathed and confidently challenges his opponent, displaying his dominance and ability to survive even against powerful adversaries. The onlookers are left in awe of his abilities, leading to speculations especially
Xin Pi
,
Baili Gongjin
 and
Yuan Hao
 about his background and potential connections to Gu Feiyang.

Later, Li Yunxiao effortlessly neutralizes Zhou's powerful strike using his "One-Finger Flower Pinch" technique. He then subdues Zhou Yushan, defeating him without killing him, and challenges anyone who dares to provoke him in the future. However,
Jiang Wuji
, a Two-Star Martial Grandmaster, interferes and tries to attack Li Yunxiao. Li Yunxiao uses a soul attack to make Jiang Wuji kneel before him, astonishing everyone present. A few breaths later, Yunxiao killed Jiang Wuji and Zhou Yushan with The
World God Monument
. In moment of terror and anger,
Jiang Wuwei
 and
Zhou Yangbiao
 prepare to attack Yunxiao with all thier might as a Two-Star Martial Grandmaster and a Nine-Star Martial Grandmaster respectively. But a green flame is unleashed in front of Yunxiao to protect him from their combined assault.

it was the Three-Star Martial Emperor
Duan Yue
 who intervenes with the Earthy Green Lotus Fire, scaring off Zhou Yangbiao and Jiang Wuwei. Leng Hongling confronts Li Yunxiao but is unable to take back the WuGou Frost Snow Sword. Li Yunxiao demands one billion middle-grade Spirit Stones from Xin Pi, to settle the matter. Xin Pi handles the situation calmly and cunningly, leaving everyone amazed at his audacity and intelligence. He also shows no sympathy for Zhou Yangbiao's punishment, further impressing the others with his cold and ruthless nature. The Zhou Great Family suffers a significant blow to their reputation after Zhou Yushan death and Zhou Yangbiao's punishment.

Duskflame's Alchemist Association

Li Yunxiao challenges three Rank-Four Lord-Grade Alchemist masters –
Xin Ze
,
Lu Haochu
, and
Ge Xiangqian
 – to a high-stakes duel, displaying arrogance that offends them. The alchemists, offended yet intrigued, accept the challenge and offer their most prized treasures as gambling stakes. Xin Ze presents a
seventh-tier Cosmic Sun Note Jade
, enhancing alchemical refining. Lu Haochu offers a
Heavenly Flame Battle Flag
, and Ge Xiangqian stakes a pair of
Purple Cloud Centipede Wings
.

When Ge Xiangqian becomes angry about Li Yunxiao's contempt for his pair of Purple Cloud Centipede Wings,
Yuan Hao
 expresses his desire for the wings, offering to pay up to 60 million mid-grade primal stones for them. Li Yunxiao then includes the wings as part of the gambling stakes.

Throughout the confrontation, Xin Ze is visibly angry and irritated by Li Yunxiao's dismissive attitude towards his treasures and insistence on betting with primal stones. He questions Li Yunxiao's understanding of the value of the seventh-tier Cosmic Sun Note Jade and tries to argue that it is worth much more than the proposed 50 million primal stones. Later,
Baili Gongjin
 expresses an offer to pay up to 50 million mid-grade primal stones for it. Li Yunxiao then includes the wings as part of the gambling stakes.

To everyone's astonishment, Li Yunxiao claims that someone will bring the 100 million mid-grade primal stones for the gambling bet soon. Xin Ze, initially skeptical, is proven wrong when his brother,
Xin Pi
, arrives and hands over the 100 million mid-grade primal stones as promised. Despite the disbelief and shock from the other alchemist masters, Their confidence in winning the bet is gradually shaken as he observes Li Yunxiao's demeanor, which shows deep certainty of victory against the three of them.

As the competition begins, Li Yunxiao surprises everyone by suggesting that each of the three alchemist masters will condense one primal stone, while he alone will condense two primal stones simultaneously. His mastery of refining techniques, including the Twelve Forms of Flying Flower and Falling Snow, amazes. Li Yunxiao's adept use of the Scripture of Rippling Mirage, a mysterious technique, adds to the astonishment.

As the alchemists compete, Li Yunxiao maintains superior refinement and control, advancing his primal stone beyond the others. He unveils a technique called the "Scripture of Rippling Mirage," impressing even Baili Gongjin. Li Yunxiao consistently demonstrates mastery, impressing Baili Gongjin.

Just when it seemed like Li Yunxiao was about to win, Xin Ze decided to risk it all and swallowed a valuable rank seven beast soul pellet, "Purple Qi from the East," which significantly boosted his soul power. With renewed strength, he successfully advanced his primal stone to the supreme-grade level, surpassing Li Yunxiao's pseudo-supreme grade.

In the final stages, Li Yunxiao pushes his primal stone beyond supreme-grade, borrowing power from the
Kunwu Divine Tree
's sapling. He creates the Innate Primordial Elixir, astonishing the alchemists. Witnessing Li Yunxiao's exceptional skill and demeanor, the alchemists, including his opponents, are left deeply impressed, kneeling in respect and admiration for his prowess.

Qionghua Island Arc

Leng Quan
 encounter

Li Yunxiao encountered
Leng Quan
, who had set up the Rain Element Formation, one of the seven strongest elemental formations, on Qionghua Island. Li Yunxiao recognized the formation and demanded the formation diagram from Leng Quan, claiming he planned to merge the seven elemental formations into one.

To understand the power of the Rain Element Formation, Li Yunxiao tested his strength against Leng Quan in a fierce battle. Despite Leng Quan's higher cultivation, Li Yunxiao's true qi advantage cracked Leng Quan's fists and caused him to bleed. However, Leng Quan concealed other disciples within the formation to maintain its effectiveness.

Li Yunxiao surprised Leng Quan by detecting the hidden disciples and revealed that he also practiced Water-based martial techniques. He unleashed the "Water Dragon's Song," inspired by observing a water snake, but Leng Quan countered with his "Azure Tyrant Palm."

Leng Quan challenged Li Yunxiao to face the combined strength of five Martial Grandmasters, and the battle intensified. Li Yunxiao used the power of the
World God Monument
 to break Leng Quan's water-based entanglements and employed the "Great Boundary God Art," overwhelming Leng Quan and his disciples.

Leng Quan and his team surrendered after being overwhelmed by Li Yunxiao's strength. Reluctantly, Leng Quan handed over the crystals and the Rain Barrier formation map to Li Yunxiao. However, he was left puzzled and frustrated by the unexpected appearance of a sea of flames during the battle. The enforcement members were also astonished by the turn of events and the outcome of the battle.

Luo Qingyun
 encounter

Later, He engaged in a fierce battle with
Luo Qingyun
, utilizing powerful martial skills like the "Sword Art - Star Annihilation" with the Frosty Brightness of Wu Gou to counter Luo Qingyun's "Universal Art - Return to Ruins."

During their clash, Luo Qingyun revealed the power of the Spirit Heaven Ring, which could create a potent mental attack through the sound of the copper ring. This attack affected many on the island, leaving them entranced, and even Li Yunxiao struggled to resist it due to his Martial Lord cultivation level.

The battle between Li Yunxiao and Luo Qingyun escalated, with both displaying extraordinary techniques and martial prowess. Luo Qingyun transformed into an ancient dragon using the Soaring Dragon Body technique, while Li Yunxiao unleashed the Great Illusory Fist, creating a distorted space filled with illusions.

Their intense battle created an independent domain-like space, showcasing their mastery of martial techniques beyond their cultivation levels. Luo Qingyun summoned a true dragon's shadow using the "Dragon's Dominion Four Extremes" divine technique, and Li Yunxiao responded with his own phoenix shadow, using a powerful sword technique that cut through the dragon's body, causing an explosive force that created a black hole above Qionghua Island. The tremendous power from the battle affected Mingxin Lake, causing massive waves and elemental energy fluctuations, catching the attention of
Xin Pi
 and
Huo Sen
, though they couldn't interfere due to the rules.

After surviving the intense battle, Luo Qingyun suffered severe injuries and fell into the sea. Li Yunxiao, who had planned an escape route, hid in the depths of the sea to avoid the devastating attack that reshaped the land into a vast sea. Although Luo Qingyun harbored hatred and humiliation, he couldn't resist Li Yunxiao's overpowering strength, and Li Yunxiao decided not to push further, conserving his strength.

Li Yunxiao collected some of Luo Qingyun's blood and emerged victorious in the competition with over a thousand crystal stones. The remaining 132 crystal stones couldn't be found due to the damaged array, leading to the decision to activate the teleportation array to send everyone back.

Later, Li Yunxiao announced his plan to auction entry quotas to the Veiled Desolation in Flame Martial City. Although this decision astonished some participants, including
Fang De
 and even
Xin Pi
, who already knew it.

Leng Xingbo
 encounter

Li Yunxiao encountered
Leng Xingbo
, the Lord of Emotion Severing Mountain, on the foot of a mountain. Leng Xingbo was a formidable expert at the Eight Disolates Martial Supreme Realm. Leng Xingbo had come to reclaim his treasured sword, the Wu Gou Frosty Brilliance Sword, which Li Yunxiao had won during his duel on the Golden Crow Arena.

Despite Leng Xingbo's intimidating presence, Li Yunxiao remained calm and engaged in a casual conversation with him. Leng Xingbo praised Li Yunxiao's courage and even considered taking him as his disciple and betrothing his daughter,
Hong Ling
, to him. However, Li Yunxiao declined the offer, revealing that he was responsible for the death of Hong Ling's husband.

When Leng Xingbo retrieved the Wu Gou Frosty Brilliance Sword, he felt something was amiss as the sword had lost its brilliance and spirit. Li Yunxiao explained that the sword had found its best destination and died without regrets, conveying emotions despite being an unfeeling sword. Leng Xingbo was deeply moved by this realization and achieved a breakthrough, breaking through a long-standing bottleneck in his cultivation.

As a reward, Leng Xingbo decided to betroth his daughter, Hong Ling, to Li Yunxiao. However, Li Yunxiao, feeling overwhelmed, proposed holding an auction in three days in Flame Martial City, where Leng Xingbo could bring Hong Ling to find a suitable son-in-law.

After their conversation, Leng Xingbo left, and Li Yunxiao continued on his journey, pondering the need for valuable weapons beyond the Wu Gou Frosty Brilliance Sword and the Realm God Stele, and headed towards Flame Martial City on a green wolf battle chariot.

The Mount Meru
 Arc

Upon the opening of the Sumeru Mountain Secret Realm above
Martial Flame City
, Yunxiao took control of the arrays, laid out by the experts, which were originally intended to only let people in who obtained or purchased the
quota crystal
.

In order to enter, one had to pay a fee to Li Yunxiao to get entry into the secret Realm. After entering the Secret Realm, he let
Luo Yunshang
 out of the
World God Monument
 and left it behind to absorb the dense spirit Qi. Shortly after, Yunxiao caught a "little green demon" and gave it Luo Yunshang and taught her how to control it (its strong point is high agility).

Shortly after, they discover people fighting a
Stone Beast
. While fighting it, the Stone Beast advances from the Martial Grandmaster to the Martial Emperor Realm. Because of that, the people decide to run away. While escaping, Yunxiao and the others come across a bunch of people who fight for a seven constellation
Dao Fruit
. Luo Yunshang manages to snatch it with the help of the little green demon.

Before people can get agitated about it, the Stone Beast manages to catch up. Sitting in the same boat, the people join forces to take it down. After destroying the Stone Beast's physical body, its "heart" remains, which allows it to recover its body again. Before that happens, Yunxiao manages to subdue it.

After that,
Wang Qiang
, whom Yunxiao saved from the little green demon previously, takes Luo Yunshang hostage in an attempt to get the Dao Fruit. However, before Yunxiao can make a move, a passage opens and swallows all people present. Yunxiao enters it as well and finds himself in a passage. Wandering in the passage, he finds
Tadpole-Like Characters
 on the walls, similar to those of his
Godly Evolution Technique
 and
Godly Realm Technique
. He manages to activate those characters, which opens up another passage.

Following the passage his Qi greatly increases, and he breaks through several stars, furthermore some
mysterious energy
 accumulates in his dantian. At the end of the passageway, he finds a jade platform with a
golden sword
 on it. After taking it, he arrives inside the so-called Soaring Heaven Palace, which gives massive benefits according to legends. Meanwhile, the other people who got swallowed by the passage, but didn't activate the characters, arrive outside the Soaring Heaven Palace where many other people are also gathered. There, Ding Ling'er is also in the crowd and manages to free the hostage taken Luo Yunshang from Wang Qiang.

Ding Ling'er gets into a quarrel with Tang Yuan, who tries to pursue her, but Qian Wudi interferes. After that, they discover Yunxiao coming out of the Divine Palace, only a barrier separating the two parties. Yunxiao brings the people to humiliate Tang Yuang in exchange for opening up the barrier.

After entering the Palace, they arrive in a hall. In order to go deeper inside, they have to open a sealed stone door. Managing to solve some arrays the door opens up, however without bypassing the dragon pressure one cannot enter. Yunxiao, who obtained
Luo Qingyun
's blood (in previous arcs) can enter together with Ding Ling'er and Luo Yunshang without problems since the blood contains a trace of the dragon's bloodline. Arriving in a hall, the three meet a Demon Dragon Soul who turns out to be Gu Feiyang's sword spirit. At that moment,
Luo Yunshang
 and
Ding Ling'er
 also learn of Yunxiao's real identity.

The
Demon Dragon
 having a grudge with Yunxiao tries to kill the latter. Yunxiao and the two women flee out of the hall, the people still being outside follow up and flee together with Yunxiao. After a short time, the Demon Dragon manages to catch up. Yunxiao and the others, forced to fight him, suppress the Dragon Soul and try to capture it. Getting beaten up, the Dragon flees back to the Palace and hides.

Yunxiao who chased the Demon Dragon back to the Palace manages to convice the latter to once again become his sword spirit. Yunxiao learns that the Soaring Heaven Palace, he previously was in, only is a "reflection" of the original one. The entrance to the real Palace is at the bottom of the sea of qi nearby. To open the gates to the real palace, he uses the
golden sword
, which he previously obtained in the passageway, as a key. Before entering, five people appear, who turn out to be disciples from the
Seven Major Forces
. who were also waiting for the palace to open. Li Yunxiao allowed them to go ahead and lead the way.

They encountered various challenges, including petrified obstacles, a bridge with a Divine Sense barrier, and a powerful Gravity Formation caused by
Living Soil
. During the confrontation with
Cao Yaxing
's group, Li Yunxiao was able to obtain a
purple cauldron
, which seemed to be of higher value than the five Nine-Rank Profound Artifacts found in the inner hall. This choice surprised and impressed the others, leading to tensions and confrontations over the remaining treasures.

Inside the inner hall, they faced
Liu Yongheng
, who was possessed by a mysterious and powerful entity named
Di Jia
. The possession caused chaos, and Liu Yongheng's true strength remained a mystery. As they fought for the treasures and the Living Soil, Di Jia displayed overwhelming power, defeating many members of the group.

Li Yunxiao and Luo Qingyun tried to resist Di Jia's power, but their efforts seemed futile. Di Jia revealed that their energies were effective against the Black Demon Qi, but not strong enough to overcome it. Despite the dire situation, Li Yunxiao encouraged the group to work together and find a way to defeat Di Jia.

During the battle,
Xu Qing
 used a technique to make a
Martial Sovereign
's divine consciousness descend to suppress the Black Demon Shadow temporarily. In a desperate attempt,
Lu Daozi
 and the others managed to escape through a hole created by Lu Daozi's Martial Sovereign equal-attack, leaving Di Jia weakened and frustrated.

Li Yunxiao and Luo Qingyun used the Heavenly Spiritual Ring to escape the inner hall, and the Soaring Heaven Palace's defenses opened, causing the inner hall to collapse and create a massive whirlpool at the bottom of the sea. Many corpses were left in the aftermath of the intense battle.

Martial Flame City
 Crisis Arc

Qi Feng
 confronted
Li Yunxiao
, who was refining the Rank Nine Mysterious Artifacts in the
World God Monument
. Qi Feng wanted Li Yunxiao to accompany him to the Sanctuary to explain certain matters, including the destruction of the Constellation Sect's branch in
Qinghai Town
. Li Yunxiao refused and a fierce battle ensued. Despite Li Yunxiao's efforts, he was outmatched by the Martial Supreme Qi Feng, who used powerful martial arts and even summoned a Fleeting Life Seal. However, Li Yunxiao's ancient bell, a Ninth Rank magical artifact, shattered the Fleeting Life Seal, impressing Qi Feng with his strength and luck. Qi Feng eventually chose to leave without further pursuing the matter.

Star Constellation Old Monster
, arrived at Yanwu City to seek revenge for the destruction of his Star Constellation Sect's branch and the killing of his people. He demanded that Li Yunxiao, the culprit, reveal himself. However, nobody dared to admit it. The Old Monster threatened to kill everyone in the city if Li Yunxiao didn't show himself. Li Yunxiao responded arrogantly from the City Lord's Mansion, insulting and challenging the Old Monster.

Infuriated, the Old Monster unleashed a powerful aurora attack, which Li Yunxiao valiantly attempted to defend against using a series of powerful techniques and defensive arrays. Despite Li Yunxiao's efforts, the aurora's overwhelming power proved too much for him, and he was ultimately knocked into the ground, leaving the city in awe of the Old Monster's might. However, Li Yunxiao's bold defiance and refusal to be intimidated impressed many in the city, including some Constellation Sect members who secretly admired his bravery.

Li Huachi
, also known as Heavenly Zither Martial Sovereign, one of the
Ten Supreme Martial Sovereigns
, arrived on the scene and sided with Li Yunxiao, leaving everyone in awe of his presence and protection over Yanwu City. Li Huachi's appearance shifted the situation in the city, as he used his zither to effortlessly neutralize the Old Monster's attacks and defeated him with ease. Li Huachi then protected Yanwu City and chased away the Constellation Sect disciples who had fled in fear.

Later,
Yao Jinliang
, another Titled Martial Sovereign, and
Wei Qing
, a mysterious figure, arrived in Yanwu City searching for the Meng siblings. Li Huachi confronted them and refused to let them take the siblings. Wei Qing used his divine will to communicate through his demonic beast, Kun Nu, and Li Huachi threatened to kill Wei Qing's divine will if they acted recklessly.

Eventually, Li Huachi agreed to help find the Meng siblings to prevent the destruction of the southern region, and he put all the people below to sleep for three days with a tune. After the incident, the
Holy Region
 issued an iron law prohibiting anyone other than people from the Southern Region from interfering in Yanwu City's matters.

Light Song Forest
 Arc

Hai Lin
 encounter

Li Yunxiao and his companions find themselves in the Demon Origin Plains after a teleportation mishap. They encounter a merchant group led by
Hai Lin
, who has a chronic illness. Li Yunxiao's alchemy skills gain their trust. They seek a cure for Hai Lin's illness caused by a demonic beast's bloodline power.

Li Yunxiao suggests three ways to cure Hai Lin: hunting powerful demonic beasts, finding the Eternal Evergreen Tree, or Quintet Spirit Devouring Rats. They head to the Light Song Forest, facing chaos and violence. They encounter and fight off a huge group of The Quintet Spirit Devouring Rats under an illusion attack.

Li Yunxiao uses his skills to control and weaken the Spirit Rats. The caravan breaks through, heading back to the Light Song Forest. They encounter a Seven Constellation Realm Rank-7 Demonic Beast summoned by
Gu Yuesheng
. After trapping the beast, they gain power from starlight.

Later, Li Yunxiao confront Gu Yuesheng and
Situ Heng
, from the
Skull Mercenary Group
, and defeat them.
Duan Yue
, also joined the fight. The caravan regroups and heads back to the Singing Forest, facing minor threats. They reach the city safely and plan to report their mission's outcome.

Hai Beifei
 Encounter

Li Yunxiao is approached by Hai Beifei, who seeks his help to save his son Hai Lin. Hai Lin's bloodline power is uncontrollable, and a method exists to suppress it, but it would strip the person of their divine body cultivation. Hai Beifei offers Li Yunxiao the position of eighth team captain in their mercenary group and assistance in his formula path if he sacrifices his divine body to help Hai Lin.

Li Yunxiao suspects that Hai Beifei would have forcibly taken his divine body's power if he hadn't rescued Hai Lin and the group. He confronts Hai Beifei, refusing the offer and warning against forcing him into such a situation. After witnessing Li Yunxiao's strength and his unique divine body and demonic flame, Hai Beifei becomes cautious. Li Yunxiao intends to train in the Ancient Desolate Lands and seeks information on reaching there. Hai Beifei reveals that the only entrance is through the rare Eternal Evergreen Tree, since the Ancient Desolate Lands located in Outer Space.

Realizing the significance of the tree, Li Yunxiao and Hai Beifei decide to work together to find the Eternal Evergreen Tree to enable Li Yunxiao's entry into the Ancient Desolate Lands. In return, Li Yunxiao promises to help Hai Lin with his bloodline issue once they obtain the wood element essence from the tree. Hai Beifei makes Li Yunxiao the captain of the eighth team in the rookie mercenary group during the search for the Eternal Evergreen Tree, allowing Li Yunxiao access to more resources and support from the group.

Mr Yu
 encounter

He engages in a fierce battle against
Li Yunxiao
 in an underground space. The confrontation escalates as they exchange powerful blows, with Li Yunxiao utilizing his divine body's abilities to counter Master Yu's attacks. During the fight, Master Yu recognizes Li Yunxiao's strong
Divine Body
. This leads to a tense exchange where Li Yunxiao demands to know Master Yu's identity. The battle showcases Master Yu's exceptional strength and his use of the half power of a Rank Nine weapon, pushing Li Yunxiao to his limits and highlighting the vast power disparity between them.

Li Yunxiao employs his Heavenly Spirit Ring to defend against Master Yu's rank nine sword attack, only for Master Yu to reveal his remote control over the sword, leading to the destruction of Li Yunxiao's Spirit Ring. Li Yunxiao then relies on his
World God Monument
 to withstand the assault. As the battle continues, Li Yunxiao surprises Master Yu with his mental attack abilities. A mental showdown ensues, where Li Yunxiao's World God Monument and mental strength confront Master Yu's Tail Light Sword and mental domain. Despite Li Yunxiao's resilient display, he eventually retreats under the overwhelming might of Master Yu. The conflict intensifies as Li Yunxiao summons
Duan Yue
, a
stone beast
 and employs the True Phoenix Fire, only to be thwarted by Master Yu's resilience. The situation becomes even more dire as Li Yunxiao escapes into his Universe God Monument for safety, leaving the outcome of this formidable clash unresolved.

Later, Master Yu successfully activates a powerful formation known as the Cloudy Sky Crystal Enchantment. He releases three Legendary Monsters. With great effort and sacrifice, Master Yu manages to break the Cloudy Sky Crystal Enchantment, releasing the three monsters encased in a transparent sphere. Despite his depletion, Master Yu uses his remaining energy to guide the monsters out of the formation and collapses afterward.

Meanwhile, within the Universe God Monument, Li Yunxiao regains consciousness and communicates with a stone beast that informs him about the events in the outside world. Upon learning that the Great Demons have been released, Li Yunxiao initially worries, but he is reassured by
Genryu
 that the monsters' power will likely be greatly diminished after so many years. Li Yunxiao then discovers a white fog emanating from the cave, which contains pure energy. He uses the Single Energy of Creation technique to absorb this energy, aiding in his recovery from his injuries.

Noah's Ark
 Born Arc

Ye Fan
 Encounter

Li Yunxiao confronts a group of individuals from the Sacred Fire Temple, led by a young man named Yi Fan, Tao Guan, Feng Zhu and Qi Guang. The Sacred Fire Temple is seeking the Yang Key, a treasure linked to Noah's Ark, and believes that the key is with them. Li Yunxiao cleverly takes Yi Fan hostage, forcing Tao Guan, Feng Zhu and Qi Guang into a tense negotiation. Li Yunxiao demands cooperation and information in exchange for Yi Fan's safety.

During the discussion, they tentatively agree to cooperate, aiming to rescue Tang Jie, take Yang Key and locate Noah's Ark. However, an explosion disrupts their conversation, leading to speculation about Tang Jie's rescue and the involvement of various factions.

As they observe the chaos,
Zou Chen
 offers his Time-fixing Plate to assist the crowd in tracking auras. Zou Chen uses the Time-fixing Plate to trace a lead to the east of the Demon Plains, where Noah's Ark might be located. Li Yunxiao's group proposes a plan to intercept the Skeleton Mercenary Group, discovering a teleportation array within their headquarters. They activate it and arrive in the Demon Plain, while other factions continue their pursuit of Noah's Ark.

After teleporting to the Demon Plain, Li Yunxiao's group discusses their encounter with the Skeleton Mercenary Group. The conversation shifts to
Ye Nantian
's notes about breaking through to the Divine Realm. Li Yunxiao seeks to view the notes, leading to a deal: he helps them obtain Noah's Ark in exchange for access to the notes. Tension arises when
Feng Zhu
 challenges Li Yunxiao's skills. Suddenly, the legendary creature "
Wu
" appears behind Li Yunxiao, leaving the group awestruck. The Wu enters its own body and disappears, a rare and enigmatic event that emphasizes the rarity and significance of the encounter.

Continuing their journey, the group finds a preserved corpse of a powerful Martial Supreme killed by
Young Master Hao Lian
. Concerns about Hao Lian's motives arise. Dark clouds gather, signaling the arrival of forces from other territories. Three formidable warships, two Rank 7 Golden Sun Warships and a Rank 8 Netherworld Warship, appear in the sky.  Amidst the warships,
Xuan Bing
 commands an attack from formidable warships, forcing Li Yunxiao's group to narrowly escape. Amidst the battle, the Imperial Bell emerges, withstanding attacks.
Feng Zhu
 and
Qi Guang
 join, using “Holy Skill” techniques to clash with Xuan Bing. The World God Monument appears and causes a warship to sink, leading to chaos.

Li Yunxiao suppresses the Netherworld Warship using the
World God Monument
, causing it to sink irreparably. Xuan Bing and his forces are left in shock and desperation over the loss of the two warships. Interrogating captives, they learn about involvement from the Feather Frost Sect, led by Martial Sovereign. The group continues its quest cautiously, sensing hostile auras ahead. Investigating the strange death of an eighth-rank Soul-shattering Tapir, the possibility of a Peak Martial Sovereign's presence raises concerns, as their pursuit of Noah's Ark could be threatened. Despite the fear and uncertainty, the members of the Sacred Fire Temple reaffirm their determination to continue their quest for Noah's Ark. They are motivated by their ancestral legacy and the opportunity to restore their sect's glory.

Qing Luo
 Encounter

Qing Luo confronts
Li Yunxiao
 and his companions in an 8th Rank Underworld Warship representing the
Tianyi Pavilion
. Suspicion arises about Li Yunxiao leaking information about
Noah's Ark
. Li Yunxiao strategically responds, implying he joined the
Rookie Mercenary Group
 for opportunities. The conversation escalates, and
Shen Li
 suspect the identities of the individuals accompanying Li Yunxiao.

Li Yunxiao warns Qing Luo about hasty accusations. The conversation shifts to the Skeleton Mercenary Group's whereabouts. Li Yunxiao audaciously devours Martial Intent Dao Fruits, shocking Qing Luo. She suppresses her anger, needing his help to locate the group. Shen Li warns about Li Yunxiao's tactics.

As the conversation continues, Li Yunxiao's knowledge creates mystery around him. He shifts focus to the Nine Evil Yellow Spring, implying a reward for aiding the Tianyi Pavilion. Qing Luo reluctantly agrees to Li Yunxiao's conditions for assistance in finding the Skeleton Mercenary Group. Li Yunxiao's manipulation and connection to
Li Huachi
 raise questions. They discuss strategy for navigating the Demon Plain and the potential involvement of Li Huachi. Qing Luo extends an olive branch, agreeing to provide materials.

Later, a mysterious and powerful youth dressed in green is discovered within a sphere of lightning energy in the Empty Space by Qing Luo and her group. The mysterious youth absorbs lightning and gazes at Li Yunxiao, uttering the name "Little Wu." His enigmatic behavior leaves Qing Luo and her group baffled and intrigued, adding complexity to the unfolding events in the Demon Plain.

Shang
 & the Great Monsters Encounter

Later,
Xiao Wu
's voice alerts Li Yunxiao to an intense battle involving the
Eternal Evergreen Tree
. Li Yunxiao realizes the urgency of their situation and suggests entering the Demon Origin Plainse.
Qing Luo
 decides to enter the Demon Origin Plains, and the Netherworld Battleship isolates itself from the vortex's darkness before disappearing from the void.

Upon emerging above the Demon Origin Plains, Li Yunxiao's group navigates the dangerous environment. Meanwhile, a fierce battle above the Demon Origin Plain sees
Yi Qing
 fighting
Fu
 with his sword. Fu's Xuan Flower Axe shatters Yi Qing's sword, seemingly defeating him.
Shang
 intervenes, introducing himself to
Little Qing
 as a user of the
Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere
. Shang seeks Little Qing's help to restore his nearly depleted artifact, leading to a tense exchange.

Little Qing attacks Shang, and Shang's allies defend him. A powerful confrontation ensues with lightning and energy filling the sky. Little Qing's lightning imprisons Shang, but Shang's Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere creates a celestial barrier. Little Qing breaks free using the Rule of Heaven's power and attacks. The intense battle showcases Shang and Little Qing's formidable abilities.

Little Qing's counter-attack threatens to annihilate everything.
Ge
 sacrifices himself to block Little Qing's devastating
Void Jade Azure Violet Palace Brahma World Annihilation Divine Thunder
 attack. Ge's sacrifice stabilizes the situation momentarily, preventing the annihilation of their group. The act of selflessness and bravery has a profound impact on his old friends and Shang. Li Yunxiao rushes to save Little Qing, and the appearance of the
Tianyi Chamber of Commerce
 adds a new layer of complexity to the unfolding events.

Li Yunxiao clashes with Shang, and their profound weapons clash, leading to an injured standoff. The Monsters overpower Qing Luo's group with ninth-grade mysterious artifacts.
Mu Wu
 &
Yuwen Ao
 join the battle against the monsters. Li Yunxiao faces
Mister Yu
, using
Genryu
's help to overpower him. The monsters retreat after the battle. Qing Luo acknowledges Li Yunxiao's capabilities. Li Yunxiao advises tracking the Monster Clan's aura, believing their reputation will deter others from provoking them. Qing Luo follows Li Yunxiao's guidance, pursuing Tang Jie.

You Die or I Die

After the Great Monsters agreed to join forces with
Tang Jie
 and putting on him a Seven Fiend Seal, and after Tang Jie managed to gain control over
Dan Yangze
, He who had opposed him, was subdued and subjected to the effects of the Seven Fiend Seal, rendering him incapacitated. Tang Jie and his group refocused their efforts on dealing with Li Yunxiao and his allies.

After Tang Jie's failed attempt to bravely face the attacks, he and the other Great Monsters fled when faced with the
World God Monument
's descending strike by Li Yunxiao.
Fu
, attempted to strike the battleship with a powerful ninth-grade Xuan Artifact called the Xuan Flower Axe. To counter this,
Ye Fan
 revealed a Martial Will Pill that was enhanced with Nine Heavens Sovereign Qi, capable of withstanding the Xuan Artifact's impact. The
Tianyi Pavilion
 halted their attacks to regroup and prepare for the second round, while Fu remained poised to strike. However, Shang, suspected that the Tianyi Pavilion might have a countermeasure or trap in place, and the situation remained tense.

After a fierce battle between
Mister Yu
 against Li Yunxiao and
Gourd Little King Kong
, Yu and Yunxiao heavily injured. Suddenly,
Shen Feng
 came on the back of the Rank Eight Demonic Beast, the Nine-winged Spirit Snake Bird, Yu requested Shen Feng's assistance in eliminating Li Yunxiao, to which Shen Feng agreed. However, at the crucial moment, a giant flying artifact, the
Money Chamber of Commerce
, intervened.
Qian Wudi
, appeared on the artifact and engaged in a verbal exchange with Li Yunxiao. After Li Yunxiao and Qian Wudi's intense negotiation, Qian Wudi agrees to trade Heavenly Soul Herb, 1.2 billion mid-grade Primordial Stones, and additional resources for a mysterious item Li Yunxiao possesses.

This item turns out to be the Seven Constellations Martial Will Fruit, a potent treasure that Qian Wudi desires to boost his power. The exchange takes place amidst tense confrontations between various factions. Shen Feng, tries to attack Li Yunxiao, but
Zhang Hanzhe
 intervenes, leading to a standoff. Ultimately, the trade is made, with Li Yunxiao giving Qian Wudi the Seven Constellations Martial Will Fruit in exchange for Heavenly Soul Herb and primordial stones. Tang Jie and his group from the Four Extremes Sect left the scene, while Qian Wudi and his forces secured the area around Li Yunxiao to ensure his safety as he absorbs the powerful Heavenly Soul Herb. The situation remains tense, with factions watching each other closely, and Qian Wudi retreats to cultivate in seclusion, leaving his subordinates to guard the area.

Zhang Shaotian
 &
Little Qing
 Encounter

Inside the Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror, the group continues to struggle with the complex illusion. They discover that the illusion is structured like a series of barriers within barriers, each layer becoming more intricate and challenging to navigate. Suddenly, Zhang Shaotian and his juniors confront Li Yunxiao,
Ye Fan
 and their companions. They demand information on how to break the array and offers to spare Li Yunxiao's life if he complies.

Li Yunxiao initiates an attack against Zhang Shaotian and his group. Li Yunxiao employs his Eye Technique and Spring Life Qi to confound and suppress Zhang Shaotian, temporarily gaining the upper hand. However, Zhang Shaotian manages to counteract the attack and escapes the restraints. The Soul Devouring Clan members vow to follow the Sacred Fire Temple group through the illusion. Li Yunxiao successfully uses his array skills to shift the Tiger King War Chariot into the Summer Boundary, the next layer of the Four Seasons Boundary.

Li Yunxiao shifts the Tiger King War Chariot to the Summer Boundary, elevating his cultivation remarkably by absorbing earth's rules. After a fierce exchange with
Little Qing
, Li Yunxiao discloses his desire to reach the Ancient Desolate Land, and Little Qing agrees to help due to past debt.

After Little Qing's departure, Li Yunxiao and the Sacred Fire Temple members discuss the significance of Little Qing's response and conclude that Noah's Ark must indeed be present. Suddenly, the surroundings tremble violently, and Li Yunxiao deduces that someone is forcefully breaking the formation. He urges everyone to return to the war chariot and activates, prepares to investigate the other three seasons to understand the situation further.

Four Seasons Immortal Mountain Appearance

Later, in another place,
Li
's attempt to break the formation triggers catastrophic consequences, Little Qing, who has been observing, warns that disaster is looming. The formation's instability leads to the sudden rise of an enormous ice mountain that engulfs Li, while the surrounding area experiences chaotic shifts between the four seasons.

The mountain's peak undergoes rapid transformations, with spring, summer, autumn, and winter all manifesting at different levels. The mountain's appearance reflects the four seasons, with spring at the midpoint, peach blossoms, withered trees, and snow at the base. Meanwhile, an immense boundary of the four seasons emerges in the distance, revealing the Immortal Mountain of lord
Throne
.

Li Yunxiao explains that breaking the formation requires either taking and breaking the Immortal Mountain, an almost impossible task, or relying on Little Qing, who is the only one capable of truly controlling the formation. The group's hopes rest on Little Qing's ability to free them from its grasp.

Li Yunxiao successfully defends himself against an ambush by Zhang Shaotian and his fellow Soul Devouring Sect disciples. Utilizing his control over the rule of Autumn, he overpowers one of the disciples and eliminates him. Zhang Shaotian is taken aback by Li Yunxiao's ability to wield the power of rules and realizes the threat he poses.

Li Yunxiao proposes a cooperation to escape the barrier and seize Throne's Immortal Mountain. Zhang Shaotian is intrigued by the potential of obtaining the Immortal Mountain and agrees to the plan, with the condition that Li Yunxiao shares the secret method to condense the laws of heaven and earth, which could bolster his strength to contend with the Martial Sovereigns from Myriad Star Valley.

With Zhang Shaotian's brute force, they retrieve a powerful artifact, a long gray banner, from the body of a deceased junior disciple of the Soul Devouring Sect. The banner's main soul has been extracted, and its power diminished, but the artifact still holds a malevolent aura.

Inside Four Seasons Immortal Mountain

Li Yunxiao
 and his group, including Zhang Shaotian and others, enter the Immortal Mountain and are awed by the profound changes in the surroundings. Li Yunxiao reveals that the Soul Devouring Sect members possess a secret technique for soul-searching, which they can use to locate living and even deceased souls. This technique sparks both intrigue and discomfort among the group. Zhang Shaotian employs his Soul Devouring Sect's soul-searching ability through a golden soul slave to find traces of other individuals within the vast mountain. That leaded to a fight against
Tang Jie
 and his Companions.

As Zhang Shaotian's Soul Devouring Gonfalon faces off against Tang Jie's Vermilion Bird Saber, the confrontation creates a stunning clash of power. Tang Jie's profound artifact is a ninth-grade weapon, and its overwhelming strength surprises Zhang Shaotian, making him realize the potential benefits of refining a ninth-grade profound artifact in conjunction with his Soul Devouring Gonfalon. This revelation adds to Zhang Shaotian's determination to capture Tang Jie and take advantage of his connection to the Vermilion Bird Saber.

As the battle unfolds, Tang Jie's fear reaches its peak as he witnesses the horrifying power of the golden soul slave when Zhang Shaotian extract the soul of the living
Dan Yangze
. However,
Shen Feng
 intervenes to save Tang Jie, suppressing the soul slave and briefly turning the tide of the battle. Zhang Shaotian retreats, and a standoff ensues between Shen Feng and Li Yunxiao's group.

Tang Jie seeks to persuade Shen Feng to eliminate their enemies, but Shen Feng hesitates due to the dangerous environment and the potential for wasting his strength. Li Yunxiao engages in a tense verbal exchange with Shen Feng, asserting that he is not afraid and even challenging Shen Feng's strength. Shen Feng eventually decides not to engage in a direct confrontation, opting to leave the situation for later resolution outside the barrier. Amid the tension, Li Yunxiao raises a new topic, inquiring about any discoveries Shen Feng might have made during his time in the Immortal Mountain.

Shen Feng shares his findings about the Immortal Mountain's strange environment and the disappearance of Mister Yu and his group. They discover a peculiar cliff that absorbs divine sense and essence upon contact, revealing a hidden space resembling a giant chessboard.
Shang
 and the other Great Monsters, including
Yu
, also appear in this space. Tang Jie's eagerness for revenge against Li Yunxiao intensifies. Shang orders an attack against Li Yunxiao and his group, including Zhang Shaotian. However, the unique environment suppresses the use of Primordial Qi and Essence, rendering the attackers powerless. Li Yunxiao's true power becomes apparent as he effortlessly defeats Tang Jie despite the restrictions, leaving the group of Great Monsters stunned.

Extremely sharp weapon, purest cold energy. Has been a Sub-Saint Xuan Artifact, before Feng Yaoli turned the Frozen Kingdom into an individual space and then fused it with the sword, elevating it to the 10th Tier.

Advocate Ups and Downs Sword

Refined by fusing three swords (Sword Decapitation Red, Cold Sword Ice Frost, ???) and ultra-mysterious space. The sword can even slash the Chains of Law, making it a higher grade than Heavenly Supreme Artifacts.

According to Ancient God Maha, Li Yunxiao refined the sword by coincidence and it's one of the two conditions needed to enter Outer Space.

Trivia

Sub-Saint/ Divine Artifacts:
Ye Fan
's "
Heavens Ark
" and
Gu Feiyang
's "
Sword Slash Star
"
are Artifacts who exceed the power of 9th Tier, but haven't reached the 10th Tier.

Earthly Supreme Artifacts
:
10th Tier Artifacts made by living beings (humans, demons, sea race, etc.)

Heavenly Supreme Artifacts
:
10th Tier Artifacts created by world itself during its birth

References

Lian family
===========

the Lian family of the three cities of the Eastern Region. the Lian family is very powerful in the Eastern Region. They directly occupy the resources of three main cities and have a wide circle of friends. Their power can be said to spread throughout the entire Eastern Region. Besides the Super power of the red moon City, the Lian family is definitely one of the most powerful families.

Trivia

the Lian family’s strength is enough to rank in the top ten in the entire Eastern Region.

Liang Yuyi
==========

Yu Yi is one of the top experts in the merchant Union.

Plot

A conflict erupts in the Merchant Union after an elder
Qiu
 from
Empyrean One Pavillion
 is killed. To avoid war, the dispute is settled through a martial duel. The agreement is that the losing faction must withdraw from an upcoming
grand competition
, Empyrean One Pavilion selects their formidable warrior, Liang Yuyi, while Yunxiao steps in for Tianyuan Chamber of Commerce. His eligibility is questioned, but Ding Ling’er declares him an honorary elder, solidifying his place.

Before the duel, a massive gambling event takes place, with different factions placing huge bets on the outcome. Many favor
Liang Yuyi
, considering her superior strength, but some, including
Qian Wudi
,
Mo Xiaochuan
,
Ding Ling'er
 bet on him, knowing his true capabilities.

As tensions rise, Yunxiao himself wagers an extraordinary amount, offering rare
Southern fire golden crystal essence
 as collateral. As the stakes skyrocket to
hundreds of billions of primordial stones
., The battle begins with Liang Yuyi using powerful fire techniques and a mysterious movement skill that makes her attacks unpredictable. Yunxiao struggles but counters with the Dynasty Bell, a sound-wave weapon that disrupts her concealment, exposing her location.

With her energy drained, Liang Yuyi attempts one last fiery attack, but Yunxiao teleports and lands a decisive blow.

Technique

She cultivates an extreme yang martial technique.

Great sun Divine Art, one breath turning into blazing sun.

Ten suns in the same sky, destroy the heavens and earth

Light Song Forest
=================

Light Song Forest is actually a chaotic place, with many deaths occurring every day, yet people still flock to it. Because this is a paradise of violence, a haven for criminals. As long as you have strength or money, you can get everything you want inside. Though it may seem very chaotic inside, it still operates under its own rules. There are hundreds of different forces, and three of them even claim to be the Kings of Mercenaries, refusing to submit to each other, resulting in countless clashes and numerous casualties.

These three individuals are the leaders of the three largest mercenary forces in Qingge Forest. They are Skull Mercenary Group's leader,
Shen Feng
 ruled over the South, Storm Mercenary Group's leader,
Chen Chuanjiu
 ruled over the East, and Rookie Mercenary Group's leader,
Haolian Shaohuang
 ruled over the North. There is also another Mercenary Groups, but they're small and under the leadership of the Three Big Groups.

As for the West of the City is a chaotic place. None of the three mercenary groups have the upper hand. As there were no rules or restrictions, this place became the place with the highest number of deaths in the Light Song Forest every day. But many martial artists still poured in tirelessly, because the greatest joy here was that there were no rules or restrictions.

Lin
===

Lady Lin
 is an ancient and powerful figure with deep connections to the
Realm of Heavenly Martial Arts from 100.000 Years ago
. She was one of the
Four World Kings
 in the past and bore the title of
Empress of Ten Thousand Monsters
, signifying her unparalleled status and strength in the Monster realm. Her influence and power once surpassed even that of
Ling Mudi
 and others King.

Appearance

Lin possesses an unreal, otherworldly beauty, a face so flawless that it seems like a miracle of creation. Even Li Yunxiao, who had seen countless beauties and had spent years with Qu Hongyan, found himself momentarily dazed by her presence.

If Qu Hongyan's beauty is considered the pinnacle of mortal perfection, then Lin's appearance transcends reality, almost as if it does not belong to this world. Her beauty is so striking that everyone, regardless of gender, reacts with awe upon seeing her for the first time.

Background

After a catastrophic battle in the past,
Lady Lin lost her main body
 and was reduced to only a
clone
,  later she and her subordinates lived in the
Eternal World
, a secret Realm inside the Mystic Realm
Langya Heaven
.  sustained by the power of twelve Heavenly Phoenix Feathers. The power of these feathers allowed her to survive for 100,000 years, but the remaining three feathers were running out of power, making her existence increasingly fragile. because of this she was trapped in her current state and could not leave her sanctuary.

Plot

Yunxiao and other factions entered the Eternal World, with the intention to find the Phoenix Feathers to help
Fei Ni
. Lin, who has fallen from the World King Realm due to injuries from the Demon War, gave Yunxiao a chance to obtain the Phoenix Feathers, which is benefical for
Fei Ni
's cultivation.

Wu Dacheng
,
Wei Qing
,
Yao Jinliang
 and other allies of them arrived and interferred with Yunxiao to obtain the Phoenix Feathers. After killing Yao Jinliang they agreed to hold a small competition between Yunxio and
Wu Dacheng
(
Yin Yu
)
, to decide the owner of the tue tail Phoenix Feathers.

For one month lin help Yunxiao of  his preparation breaking through, improving techniques  and even show Yunxiao the fight between her and
Yin Yu
 in the past. to give yunxiao higher chance of winning. with it yunxiao manages to win the fight and almost Killed
Yin Yu
. But
Feng Yaoli
 interfere, and unwilling to give up on the Phoenix Feathers. Soon after, other hidden experts who had been silently observing the situation began to reveal themselves, drawn by Lin’s condition.

With Lin, Can, and Hou’s assistance, Yunxiao and the others managed to escape.

Yunxiao puts them in his
World God Monument
, Lin only being a weak Soul after her strength is greatly exhausted.

[...]

Helping Yunxiao escape from the 10th rank Xuan Artifacts space of the
Eye Race
 she arrives at the end of her lifespan and dies together with her loyal subordinates Can and Hou.

Trivia

Yuxiao Found a statue of her in Outer Space where
Di Jun
 sealed that made of with calestial azure gold and one made of
Southern fire golden crystal essence
 at the one in the outer space in the treasure of the North Scorpion sect.

True Tail Feather she kept  for 100,000 years. There are only four people in the world that I can give it to. One is the Heavenly Phoenix Nirvana Body, one is the Lord of the World God Monument, one is the King of Ten Thousand Monsters, and the last one, Yin Yu.

On his journey Yunxiao found statues of her and despite his high soul cultivation he was strongly influenced by the statues alone.

Ever since she could remember, she had never lost a beauty contest, no matter in front of anyone.

Plot

Lin Yu was the second to rebel against
Prince Qin Yue
 idea of making
Li Yunxiao
 as the commander. When Bai Chengfeng raised his hand, leading him to join in as well.

While also accompany by
Bai Chengfeng
 in the Jialan academy arena. Both wanted to see how strong Li Yunxiao was, since they believed that the strong should lead an army.

With Li Yunxiao past, he was forced to prove himself to everyone present.

During the 1v2 fight, Lin yu and Bai Chengfeng was defeated with ease by Li Yunxiao '
ten steps one kill'
 technique from the
Black lass
. And with that duel, seemingly everyone trusted Li Yunxiao by his immense power.

Ling Baiyi
==========

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Ling Baiyi
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Ling Baiyi
 (凌白衣), the
Night Shadow Martial Sovereign
 (夜影武帝), the
Fourth-Ranked Martial Sovereign
 on the
Heaven and Earth Power Chart
. He founded his own force the "
Eight Elephants
", an assassin organization. A subsidiary group of it is
Death God Palace
.

Appearance

The White snow danced in the sky as the pure white figure landed. he was like the purest snowflake, standing quietly in the sky, never changing.

Plot

Ling Baiyi vs Li Yunxiao

Amidst the falling snow, Ling Baiyi and Li Yunxiao faced off. Without hesitation, Yunxiao unleashed his 36 Northern Heaven Cold Star Swords, Ling Baiyi remained unmoved. With a flick of his sleeve a single snowflake drifted down, shattering Yunxiao’s attack effortlessly. blood spilled from his lips.
Before Yunxiao could react, Ling Baiyi had already vanished into the snowy sky, leaving behind only silence—and a bitter sense of defeat.

The
Dongmen Yuan
 Execution

The Execution turned into a catastrophic battle when
Ling Baiyi with
Duanmu Yuyu
 help infiltrated
Xinyan City
, unleashing chaos with a
ninth-rank demonic beast
, a
giant scorpion
, a
Feather Bees
, and the stolen
Xuangong Turtle
, the
Beiming Dark Palace

Guardian Beast
, sending waves of destruction across the land. The beasts were ultimately shattered by the overwhelming force of
Yunxiao and his allies
. Ling Baiyi then revealed his true goal—to refine the
Ramayana

Armor (Armor of Nightshadow),
 an artifact of unparalleled power. His brother,
Bai Lingyue
, desperately tried to claim it but was brutally rejected, his flesh burned away. With the armor fully merging with Ling Baiyi, his strength skyrocketed, and a single strike from his
Six Wounds Purple Blade
 tore open the sky, nearly splitting the city in two. Those who opposed him, including
Ming Zhen

and
Ming Jian
, were effortlessly slain. The execution became a bloodbath, marking
Ling Baiyi’s unstoppable rise
, shaking the balance of power in the world forever. Only with the combined efforts of
five Divine Transcendent experts
 was Ling Baiyi finally suppressed. Just when he was on the brink of death, the
number one titled Martial Sovereign,
Ao Chang Kong
,
 suddenly appeared and prepared to deliver the finishing blow. However, his attack was stopped at the last moment by
Zhuo Qingfan
, the number two titled Martial Sovereign
, who emerged out of nowhere. With Zhuo Qingfan intervention,
Ling Baiyi’s life was saved
, and the battle concluded without a true victor—only devastation and casualties.

Power

Ramayana Armor
, Ling Baiyi's armor is the legendary God-level and terrifying piece of equipment passed down through the Ling family. This armor is capable of summoning
Ramayana
, the God of Slaughter.
 Primarily purple-black in color, the armor can manifest a towering giant spirit behind Ling Baiyi, mirroring his movements and exponentially enhancing his strength. However, once completely refined, the armor undergoes a profound transformation. It is reborn under a new name—the
Nightshadow Armor
.  Upon achieving complete fusion with the armor, Ling Baiyi undergoes a shocking metamorphosis—his body expands by over three feet, his skin becomes covered in purple scales, and two ominous horns sprout from his forehead. At that moment, he no longer merely summons Ramayana—he becomes Ramayana himself, a living embodiment of
the God of Slaughter
.

Trivia

Ling Baiyi once swore an oath that she would never step foot in the
Crimson Crescent City
 in her life.

References

Ling Mudi
=========

SPOILER ALERT!

He is the King of the Northern Region. He participated in the Ancient Demon Sealing War 100,000 years ago.

Personality

Ling mudi personality was once calm and wise, like a kind elder, but the influence of the Rainbow Stone had gradually eroded his mind, pushing him into a demonic state. Under its effects, his thoughts became chaotic, his emotions unstable, and his actions ruthless, as if he were no longer the same person. Even after the stone was removed, the corruption of tens of thousands of years could not be undone instantly. Though he regained some of his former clarity, he admitted that he might never fully return to the Ling Mudi of old—not until his very soul faded away.

Background

100,000 years ago, Ling Mudi was invited by Lord Universe God to take part in the Demon-Sealing War. As one of the Four Domain Monarchs, ruling over the Eastern, Western, Southern, and Northern Domains, his status was once above that of the current Seven Sect Masters, nearly on par with the Masters of the Two Holy Lands. Back then, these monarchs stood at the pinnacle of power, playing a crucial role in shaping the fate of the world during the great war.

Plot

after his remnant soul come from the void he then  possessed the gourd Little King Kong.

Beifeng Nan and Ling mudi, once allies, clashed over the fate of the Rainbow Stone. Beifeng Nan believed it should aid the new generation, honoring their fallen comrades' sacrifice. Ling Mudi, however, saw it as a sacred relic too dangerous to fall into unknown hands. Their differing ideals led to a battle.

Ling Mudi acknowledged Li Yunxiao as the master of this generation’s World Deity and the chosen one. Given his age and achievements, even if he had lived a hundred thousand years ago, he would still have been an extraordinary genius. He truly deserved to possess the Divine Realm Tablet. Ling Mudi had a deep connection with the tablet’s previous owner and stated that its reappearance signaled the arrival of another great tribulation.

Power

Ling Mudi is undoubtedly one of the greatest alchemists of all time. His unparalleled skill allows him to extract the power of fundamental rules, and with the right materials, he can forge divine steel and craft tenth-tier items.

The Seven-Colored Tusita Heaven, crafted by Lord Ling Mudi, is an ancient profound-level weapon with power rivaling Saint weapons. However, due to incomplete materials, only a three-colored version was created using three Extreme Earth-type origins. Before the Demon-Sealing War, the warriors of Two World Mountain sought to complete it but failed to obtain the remaining four supreme earth elements. Now in Yunxiao’s hands, this tricolored Tusita Heaven still possesses immense weight and earth energy. If fully cultivated, it could manifest the divine ability of the Boundless Pure Land, that has infinite weight and heaviness would probably kill anyone who touched it, becoming an unrivaled force under the current sky.

Rainbow stone can also nourish the soul

Little Yunyun
=============

little Yunyun, The Burial Cloud Beast was
Yao Jinliang
 trusted familiar and closest confidant. The beast has a set of dark golden armor had appeared on its furry body, engraved with hundreds of intricate array patterns. These patterns radiated immense power, with the force of the weapon spreading through them, causing the surrounding air to flicker with energy.

Beyond its formidable defenses, the beast also possessed exceptional movement techniques and the ability to shapeshift, altering its body size at will. In an instant, it could grow to over 100 feet tall, transforming into a truly fearsome presence on the battlefield.

Trivia

Yao Jinliang's year burier beast has intelligence comparable to humans.

Liu Feiyan
==========

Liu Feiyan
 (柳菲烟), the
Red Lotus Martial Sovereign
 (红莲武帝), the
Eighth-Ranked Martial Sovereign
 on the
Heaven and Earth Power Chart
.
Gu Feiyang
's friend and
Lu Congzi
's adopted daughter. One of the Elders of
Sea of Soul Formation
.

Appearance

Red haired women with a red sword with cloud patterns on her waist. She was wearing a light blue jade water thin smoke battle armor and had a heroic spirit.

General Information

One of
Gu Feiyang
's friends as well as a
Titled Martial Sovereign
. Like most other Titled Martial Sovereigns she reached the
Divine Transcendence Realm
.

Plot

Liuming Mansion
===============

Plot

The Tianyuan Merchant Association has an agreement with Liuming Mansion to refine the Nine Yin and Nine Yang Devil-Breaking Pill. They sent people to Liuming Mansion to persuade them to assist because the key to refining this pill is the Yin-Yang Cauldron, a treasured artifact of Liuming Mansion.
Ding Shan
 promised to give them one-third of the pills after the refinement was complete and offering the marriage arrangement between
Jing Shaoyi
 and
Ding Ling'er
, Only then did Liuming Mansion agree to provide the cauldron and send three elders to assist in the process. These three elders from Liuming Mansion also serve as assistants in refining the pill.

Long Hao
========

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Long Hao
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme

improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Plot

While patrolling with his men, Long Hao spotted
Junliang
 in trouble. Seeing an opportunity to do him a favor, he was more than eager to step in and deal with Li Yunxiao.

However, before he could even act, Yunxiao decisively struck, shattering Jun Liang’s dantian and crippling him on the spot. The sheer brutality of the act sent Long Hao into a fury. Enraged, he drew his prized Mystic weapon the broadsword
Bluemoon
 and charged at Yunxiao, determined to make him pay.

To his shock, Yunxiao countered his attack with ease, dismantling his every move as if he were toying with a child. Then, with a single decisive strike, Yunxiao utterly destroyed
Bluemoon
, his so-called first-tier Mystic weapon. Long Hao stood frozen in disbelief his greatest weapon that cost all his money  reduced to scrap in an instant, and his pride crushed along with it.

Power & equipment

Bluemoon broadsword first-tier Mystic weapon was made of deep-sea cold iron by Master
Liang Wenyu
, a second-tier Master Alchemist. he had spent all his money and begged  Liang Wenyu to craft it for him.

Long Qianmiao
=============

Appearance

A man in red, with thick eyebrows and big eyes, and a stiff face.

Personality

Despite his unmatched strength and prestigious background, Long Qianmo is a cautious and strategic individual. He carefully weighs every decision, always choosing the best possible outcome—not just for himself but for his family as well. He never lets emotions cloud his judgment, ensuring that his actions serve a greater purpose. Though he often appears cold and harsh, he deeply cares for
Fei Ni
, his most beloved disciple, and silently protects her in his own way.

Background

He was the previous sect leader of  Heavenly draconic family . He was among the top powerhouses among seven super sect . He was with Wei Qing plan to transform Spirit bloodline people of his sect to attain avatism and to form pure 10th grade dragon blood so become powerful.

Plot

Long Qionmiao, appeared in
Crimson Crescent City
 after
Teng Guang
 800 Array that trap many expert was destroyed. In alliance with
Wei Qing
, he moved to force
Fei Ni
 surrender her Dao Fruit fragment. This demand shocked Fe Ni, as her Long family supposed to be above the world and not form alliances with others. Determined to give the fragment to
Li Yunxiao
 and remain by his side, even hoping to marry him in the future, she refused his command. Yet Long was unwavering; her rare bloodline was vital to his family's long-held ambitions, and he would reclaim her at any cost.

In the ensuing conflict,
Li Yunxiao
 intervened with fierce determination. With no other choice against experts like Long Qianmiao,
Wei Qing
 and the others, he unleashed his final ace: the Million Sword Illustration a Supreme Sword Array divine treasure fused with the will of the Heavenly Dao. He even threatened to detonate all thirty-six profound armaments, warning that the resulting explosion would unleash uncontrollable power and leave few survivors
Crimson Crescent City
. Even a divine transcendent him might not be able to block the blast if all thirty-six ninth-grade armaments exploded at once. This threat forced him and the remaining experts in Red Moon City to proceed with extreme caution, caught in Yunxiao's deadly trap.

The area within a thousand feet fell into dead silence. As one of the seven sect masters, he could not tolerate being threatened by a young man in front of so many experts; if this news spread, he would lose all face and it would be a real joke if he were dragged down by a crazy young man. However, when he sensed the cold Qi of the Northern Heaven Cold Star Sword beside him, he swallowed his anger and promised Yunxiao that he would no longer interfere with Fei Ni's marriage. He made it clear, though, that this promise reflected only his own will, not that of his family or the others.

After the Dragon essence and Phoenix light were forcefully extracted by
Lord Pu
, long qianmiao’s strength fell from divine transcendence. Such a drop in realm would be difficult to recover for the rest of his life. In the realm of heavenly martial arts, there would probably be no more legends of this person.

During his final battle with
Fei Ni
, Long Qianmo was deeply impressed by her growth that take the Dragon essence and Phoenix light and her determination to stand with
Li Yunxiao
. In the end, he willingly allowed her to deliver the final blow. Before his death, he acknowledged that her power had already surpassed his past self and entrusted her with the True Dragon Sword and the sect leader token, appointing her as the new leader of the sect.

Power

Even though the rules of the ten directions did not exist in this world, Long Qianmiao’s comprehension surpassed the peak of martial arts, and with his tenth-grade dragon blood, his power was comparable to that of a True Spirit and with Heaven and Earth Wufa, one of the True Dragon’s Sword, Long Qianmiao was likely the strongest person in the world, with only a handful who could possibly rival him. Even
Ghost king
 with the power of reincarnation can’t suppress him at all becauee his dragon bloodline.

Heaven and earth WUFA’. It was on of the divine sword of the leader of all living beings, the true dragon, A divine sword passed down from the ancient true dragon. According to the legend, in the flow of time, the Sword of the Dragon was fought over by countless strong cultivators. In the end, it was split into four and disappeared under the realm of heavenly martial arts.

Dragon Field is a domain created by Long Qianmo, an innate divine ability of the Dragon Race that forms its own independent world. By absorbing the power of the Nirvana Body of the Celestial Phoenix, he strengthened this domain, elevating its power to new heights. Unlike ordinary domains, Dragon Field is a manifestation of the True Dragon’s bloodline, which no longer exists in the Heavenly Martial Realm but resides in the legendary Dragon Realm. Though the power of the Dragon Realm far surpasses anything in the present world, Long Qianmo’s ability to create Dragon Field proves his extraordinary mastery over his bloodline.

Trivia

He had never shown his face to anyone, and his first public debut was in
Crimson Crescent City
.

The reason he formed an alliance with
Wei Qing
 was because of the
seceret experiments
.
