While Long Ran was practicing his martial art, the Tiger Knuckle Fist, his father looked displeased. The news of
Li Family
  Young master disappearance had shaken the kingdom even the Imperial Guards had been searching for him nonstop for three days.

It was only then that Long Ran finally remembered—his useless brother had once locked up a young man along with Li Yunxiao in Long's private jail.

Long Valley City
================

Long Valley City, one of the main cities of the Eastern Region.

Plot

Long Valley City was once a battleground of competing families, but under Shuai Junwei’s rule, the Shuai family rose to dominance. Through strategic alliances and ruthless decisions, they secured their position, even gaining influence over the powerful Ink Feather Merchant Association. However, their stability was shaken when Li Yunxiao intervened in their arranged marriage with the Du family. Fearing disaster, Junwei swiftly broke off the engagement, redirecting the situation to maintain peace. Despite the initial shock, the crisis ended with a strengthened bond between Long Valley City and Earth Dragon City, as the Shuai family cleverly turned a potential conflict into a new alliance.

Force

Shuai Family

Lord Pu
=======

The
Demon Emperor
's personality split into two: One “good” and one “evil”. Lord Pu represents the “good” personality. For 100,000 years, they had been mortal enemies, constantly seeking to devour each other in an endless struggle for dominance. Their conflict shaped the fate of the demon race, with neither willing to yield until only one remained.

Personality

He is cold, aloof and  does not have that kind of evil hostility.

Appearance

He hasas three heads and six arms.

History

Sealed in the
Southern Region
, which turned it from the most prosperous with the highest Qi density into the worst of the
Four Regions
. The Qi concentration became by a large margin the thinnest on the Tianwu Continent. None of the Major Forces and Business Alliance Perpetual Chambers have their headquarters in the Southern Region, at most some small branches are set up.

Plot

Crimson Crescent City

During a large battle against the monster race in near
Crimson Crescent City
, Lord Pu descended upon Yunxiao, severely wounded and near death body. Lord Pu sought to fulfill Lin Yunxiao’s dying wish to purge the resentment and obsession lingering within him. By doing so, Lord Pu could fully merge with Lin Yunxiao body, gaining complete control of it would also allow his true body to descend, unlocking even greater power. Lord Pu easily contending with several Peak Nine-Star Martial Sovereigns and
Divine Transcendence
 Masters. Only by the joint effort of numerous factions from the
Human Race
 forces as well as the help of the
Ocean Emperor
 descent, they managed to seal Lord Pu in Yunxiao body.

Lord Pu had tried many times to regain control over Li Yunxiao body, but he only helped him to use the
Six Paths Demon Artifact
. After much difficulty in sealing Lord Pu's clone, Yunxiao unintentionally manages to completely seal it into his body by strengthening the Chains of Law with the celestial phenomenon of his ascension to the Nine Star Peak of the
Martial Sovereign Realm
.

Devil Sealing Grounds of the Southern Domain

After Yunxio fight with
Yin Yu
 that lead to the destruction of the
Universe Light Plate
, a powerful space turbulence was triggered, swallowing
Li Yunxiao
 and transporting him to the
Devil Sealing Grounds
 in the
Southern Domain
.

in the Thirty-Three Heavens, Li Yunxiao meet the
Western Region King
 that being trap for 100.000 years. later Western Region King, Yunxiao and lord pu decided to work together to dismantle the powerful array formation. But after Yunxiao enter the first level where Lord Pu sealed, the First Heaven, lord Pu absorb the magic power from the Emperor Clone within Yunxiao body that was amplified during all this time in the Protagonist body, allowing him to reclaim a portion of his lost strength.

With this regained power, Lord Pu aimed to seize control of the Six Magic Soldiers,Using this to fight the Seal Formation Spirit Dragon Turtle. After enduring a long and grueling battle Which causes a crack in the First Heaven and allows Li Yunxiao and the Eastern Region King to escape.

Later, during the battle against
Yin Yu
 and
Qiu
 in the Sea Forest, the Sea Goddess
Bo Mu
 reveals that she was previously a demonic slave of Lord Pu, proving this with both the demonic golden blood and the appearance of the Sea Goddess Palace, or rather, the Holy Demon Hall. After some intrigue in the battle, Lord Pu appears in Bo Mu body and fights
Feng Yaoli
, until it is again suppressed by the Incomplete Divine Art of Lord
Nine Abyss
.

After these events, Lord Pu Demonic Qi condenses above
Martial Flame City
 to contact Li Yunxiao about
Di Jia
 death, and that they should be on the lookout for it. After completely breaking the seal, Lord Pu heads to the Demon Realm to confront
Yuan
, meeting Li Yunxiao in a connection between the users of the Six Paths Demonic Artifacts. Where he suppresses the appearance of the Technique in the Book, the last Demonic Artifact of the Six Paths.

Arranging to meet in Tianhan City, Li Yunxiao is late arriving in the city and Yuan defeats and arrests Lord Pu, who is released due to the battle against the
Six Wings
 Clone. After briefly telling him about the last Demonic Artifact of the Six Paths, the Book, he begins a fight with Six Wings that seemingly creates a hole in the Realm. Dying in the battle.

Power

The Six Paths Demonic Weapon is a Heavenly Saint Tool, far surpassing ordinary Saint tools. Its power has completely exceeded the rules of the Heavenly Martial Realm. Even the laws of heaven and earth no longer dare to interfere or suppress it, making it an existence beyond the control of the heavens.

Trivia

Although Lord Pu also a demon master, his strength is far inferior.

In the sealed land, Lord Pu fought countless battles against the Array Spirit Dragon Turtle for 100,000 years but never won.

Lu
==

Lu On is an elder of the Big Dipper Sect, responsible for guarding the entrance and verifying the identities of those seeking entry. He noticed Li Yunxiao and took an interest in him, considering the possibility of recruiting Yunxiao into the sect

Appearance

A white-bearded old man with an extraordinary appearance was resting on a pear chair inlaid with gold and wrapped in Jade with his eyes closed and his expression lazy.

Lu Congzi
=========

Lu congzi, The chief Alchemist was the leader of the sea of soul formation and the president of The Alchemist Association.

Appearance

An elderly man with white hair and a face etched with deep wrinkles, Though his aged appearance suggested frailty, his sharp, star-like eyes revealed the wisdom and authority of a true leader.

Personality

Lu Congzi is a devilish individual who cares about absolutely nothing but himself and his own glory on the path to the heaven of the Mystic Arts. Being cold and cruel to the point of even modifying his own daughter emotions and body to achieve his goals.

Background

Lu Congzi was the last Chief of the
Sea of Soul Formation
, one of the two Cultivation Sacred Lands of the
Tianwu Continent
, and one of the top powerhouses of the
Heavenly Martial Realm
, having power and authority comparable to the most powerful Clans of the Ocean Abyss, the
Heavenly Night Palace
, and others.

Therefore, Lu Congzi is the supreme face of all modern Alchemists. He was originally one of the two Disciples of the former Sea of Soul Formation Master,
Yu Shengfeng
, the heir to the lineage of Masters who followed the teachings of
Yu Yixian
, a demonic slave of the
Demon Emperor Di
.

Backstory & Plot

After discovering that his Master planned to use his body as a vessel for the “afterlife inheritance” experiment to obtain the
Extreme Yin Divine Body
, he manipulated the situation to make his Master place the Neonite Stone into the body of
Bo Yuqing
, his brother-disciple, with this, they killed Yu Shengfeng together, but they were unable to eliminate his Soul, which wandered until it found the Rainbow Powder.

After becoming the Master of the Sea of Soul Formation, he took in a young red-haired girl as his daughter and trained her to become one of the elites of the Sea of Soul Formation,
Liu Feiyan
. And after consolidating his position, he began to silently spread the use of the
Demonic Qi
 present in the Devi Well for the use of Alchemy and Martial Arts. Reaching greater heights of power and techniques.

During the arrival of
Ai
, the great Alchemist of the Monster Race in the human territories, both
Tian Zhao Zi
 and Lu Congzi were hesitant about confronting the young woman, until Liu Feiyan recommended that they call
Gu Feiyang
, who accepted after Lu Congzi bestowed a Tenth-Grade Herb on him. With Gu Feiyang victory, he didn't need to risk his public image.

After learning of the incidents in
Crimson Crescent City
 involving his former Master and brother-disciple, Lu Congzi ordered his adopted daughter to go there and capture Bo Yuqing. After Bo Yuqing arrived at the Sea Soul Formation, he had made his brother-disciple mind, or at least he thought he had, and brought him to his side.

After
Li Yunxiao
 arrived in Lu Congzi territory after the events of the Human vs. Monster War, he once again bestowed the title of Honorary Elder of the Sea of Soul Formation to Li Yunxiao, so that he would be stuck to it.

With the arrival of Yu Shengfeng at the place after the promise made by his Master to Liu Feiyan,
Xuan Hua
 and Li Yunxiao, Lu Congzi remained quiet and apathetic towards his Master provocations, as he noticed that one of the figures beside his Master was
Perfected Meng Ling
, a figure he could not risk facing.

But, he ordered
Yuan De
 to test his Master's strength, hoping to know if he had truly reached the
Physical Body Harmonization Stage
, after the battle, He faces Li Yunxiao and Yu Shengfeng in the secret space below the entrance to the
Demon Realm
, and after hearing Bo Yuqing psychological revelation, Yu Shengfeng dies on the spot at the hands of his brother-disciple.

In the
Eternal World
, Lu Congzi appears during
Yin Yu
 and Li Yunxiao battle and attempts to steal the
Divine Realm Tablet
, but is stopped by the
Xuanli Island

Saber King
. And is forced to reveal his trump card, summoning a
Second Grade Demon Lord
 into his body, and fighting with the
Hao Feng
. Until he causes the
Demon Commander Man
 to appear in Yin Yu body, which is expelled soon after.

Some time later, the
Heavenly Martial Alliance
 and the
Mysterious Island of Severing
 go after the Demonic Cultivators and Lu Congzi in the Sea of Soul Formation.

After starting to work with
Demon Commander

Man
, Lu Congzi began to develop new Demon lifeforms and equipment that could withstand the Power of the Realm. Sending several
Extreme Virtual Realm
-level Demons against Li Yunxiao and
Ye Nantian
's subordinates, Lu Congzi leaves them trapped in a magical mist with Demonic properties.

Inside the Devil Well, Lu Congzi traps Ye Nantian who self-destructs one of the layers of Noah's Ark to escape. Later, Li Yunxiao and the others reach the secret space below the Devil's Well, where they see Ye Nantian defeated and trapped by the demons in the Wall of Demonic Faces.

After the battle, Lu Congzi goes to the
Devil Realm
 and works with Man to steal a
Demonic Monkey Egg
 auctioned in Falling Star City. Which results in a battle between the forces of Falling Star City, Lu Congzi and Li Yunxiao's forces.

After fleeing, Man and Lu Congzi return to Extreme Emperor City in the Man Tribe territory, after absorbing the Demonic Monkey Egg and a Golden Egg prepared as a tonic to increase
Li Yi
 que power by
Six Wings
, Lu Congzi betrays Man and kills him by stealing his body, as he had modified the Demonic Monkey Egg and taken control of Man without him noticing.

During the battle that was currently taking place against Li Yunxiao and his companions, Lu Congzi reveals that the new demonic lifeforms created by him were the people of the Sea of Soul Formation, including Xuan Hua and Liu Feiyan, with everyone losing control of their minds to Lu Congzi.

This experiment fused the properties present in the Laws of the
Heavenly Martial Realm
 and the
Demon Realm
, allowing all individuals to reach the level of a Second Grade Demon Lord, with some reaching the level of a Peak Demon Lord.

Seeing this scene, Li Yunxiao exudes extreme anger and goes after Lu Congzi who thought he could kill him with his new level of power, but, he is surprised after Li Yunxiao uses the
Sword that Will Rise and Fall
, revealing the strength of a World King of the Hundred Tribulations Realm, which scares Lu Congzi.

Becoming desperate, Lu Congzi says countless things trying to make Li Yunxiao spare his life, but all his efforts are in vain when Li Yunxiao uses the Sword that Will Rise and Fall to its fullest, eliminating Lu Congzi with his trademark attack, “Sword Technique: Sword Cuts Stars”.

Trivia

Yu Shengfeng
 state In terms of intelligence, In the past hundreds of years, the only person who can be mentioned as Lu Congzi equal in his eyes is  li Yunxiao.

Lu Daozi
========

Lu Daozi is a powerful and renowned expert Martial Sovereign in the Western Regions, and he is known as the master of the Tide-listening Pavilion.

Plot

Mount Meru

He becomes involved in the events at the "Mount Meru's Soaring Heaven Palace" when he senses the Divine Prayer Technique being used by
Xu Qing
.

During the confrontation with
Di Jia
, Lu Daozi attempts to suppress the Black Demon Shadow unleashed by Di Jia's powerful demonic techniques. He shows great expertise and strategic thinking, leading the group in their efforts to overcome Di Jia.

Lu Daozi's powers are instrumental in aiding Li Yunxiao and his companions in their escape from the inner hall. He creates a hole through his powerful attack, allowing them to flee from Di Jia's overwhelming strength.

Lu Haochu
=========

He is a Fourth-Tier Alchemist from the
Duskflame Empire
's Alchemist Association. Even if he is not a High-Tier Alchemist, he is still a renowned figure in the Shangyang City.

Plot

Duskflame's Alchemist Association

Lu Haochu is one of the three Rank-Four Alchemist masters who confront
Li Yunxiao
 when he proposes a duel against all of them simultaneously. He is offended by Li Yunxiao's arrogance and agrees to take part in the duel.

Xin Ze presents a seventh-tier quality
Cosmic Sun Note Jade
, which greatly enhances an alchemist master's refining abilities. The other two alchemist masters,
Lu Haochu
 and
Ge Xiangqian
, offer a
Heavenly Flame Battle Flag
 and a pair of
Purple Cloud Centipede Wings
, respectively, as their gambling stakes.

To everyone's astonishment, Li Yunxiao claims that someone will bring the 100 million mid-grade primal stones for the gambling bet soon. Xin Ze, initially skeptical, is proven wrong when his brother,
Xin Pi
, arrives and hands over the 100 million mid-grade primal stones as promised.

Despite the disbelief and shock from the other alchemist masters, their confidence in winning the bet is gradually shaken as he observes Li Yunxiao's demeanor, which shows deep certainty of victory against the three of them.

The Alchemy Competition

As the competition begins, Li Yunxiao surprises everyone by suggesting that each of the three alchemist masters will condense one primal stone, while he alone will condense two primal stones simultaneously. This shocks the three alchemist masters, as it increases the difficulty of the competition significantly.

Despite their anger and disbelief, they continue with the competition. Li Yunxiao impresses them with his mastery of the Twelve Forms of Flying Flower and Falling Snow, a set of refining techniques created by the renowned alchemist, Gu Feiyang. Li Yunxiao's use of these advanced techniques and his overall proficiency in alchemy leave the three alchemist masters in awe and shock.

Finally, Ge Xiangqian can no longer hold back and attacks first, using the same method as Li Yunxiao to condense his primal stone. The competition is now underway, and everyone is eager to see who will come out victorious.

Ge Xiangqian managed to raise the primal stone to a low-grade level but exhausted a lot of energy in the process, leaving him visibly fatigued. Next, Lu Haochu took over, using his Yamata Branch Heart Cultivation Mantra to condense the primal stone. His technique was beautiful and dreamy, but he also struggled to match Li Yunxiao's level of refinement.

Li Yunxiao, on the other hand, effortlessly advanced his primal stone to the middle grade, showcasing his superior understanding and control of the Twelve Forms of Flying Flower and Falling Snow. He surprised everyone by using a new and mysterious technique called the Scripture of Rippling Mirage. The technique impressed even Baili Gongjin, a rank six alchemist, who recognized its profoundness and admitted his admiration for Li Yunxiao's mastery.

After Baili Gongjin shared the story of his encounter with Lord Gu Feiyang and his advice, Lu Haochu attempted to condense a primal stone using his powerful soul force. However, his technique lacked finesse and appeared clumsy compared to Li Yunxiao's mastery. He raised the primal stone to a High-grade level but felt fatigued after the effort. In response, Li Yunxiao managed to advance the primal stone to a high-grade level, impressing everyone with his skills and talent.

Now, Xin Ze is attempting to advance the primal stone to the supreme-grade level, while Li Yunxiao is doing the same. Despite Li Yunxiao's exhausted state, he surprises everyone by suddenly revitalizing and displaying incredible control over his soul power and the primordial stone, keeping up with Xin Ze's progress. The two are in a fierce competition to see who can reach the supreme-grade level first.

But, later, Li Yunxiao even succeeded in forming a Innate Primordial Elixir, a divine object, which amazed all the alchemists present. Even the Supreme-grade primal stone he used to create it transformed into the Inner Core, which symbolized the Innate Primordial Elixir. Witnessing Li Yunxiao's extraordinary skill and calm demeanor, the other alchemists, including Xin Ze, Ge Xiangqian, and Lv Haochu, were deeply impressed. In a show of respect and admiration, the three fourth-grade Alchemists knelt down and expressed their admiration for Li Yunxiao's prowess.

Lu Jianbo
=========

Appearancee

He was dressed in a gray robe. His face was cold.

Lu Qingcheng
============

Lu Qingcheng Lu Qingcheng makes a grand entrance,
flaunting his ability to bypass the spatial restrictions
 that prevent others from entering
Mount Meru
. He rides his
seventh-rank Qing Suo sword
, which has been refined since his youth and allows him to
break through space
. Just as he is about to enter Mount Meru, Yunxiao stops him with a powerful golden hand crush Lu Qingcheng into the ground like a meteorite.

Power

Qing suo sword was a seventh-rank weapon It had been refined by the elders of the sect since he was young into his dantian, and had already become one with him.

Lu Yao

Lu Yao
 is The Receptionist of The Tianshui Alchemist Association. She first met
Li Yunxiao
 when he came to the Alchemists Association looking for
Yang Di
.

Appearance

A beautiful woman in a fashionable dress smiling sweetly.

Background

She was a waitress that every Association of Alchemists had, specializing in receiving guests. In the past, whenever
Li Yunxiao
 visited the association, the waitresses always greeted yunxiao respectfully with bowed heads.

History

The Tianshui Alchemist Association

Trivia

She has been working at Tianshui Alchemist Association for 5 years.

References

An old man in a purple robe

Luan Junhao
===========

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Luan Junhao
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Personality

Luan Junhao had always been timid, deeply fearing death. In the past, he had even cried and begged the Palace Master to save him. Having spent his entire life serving Shenxiao Palace, it was no surprise that he lacked true courage, willing to submit to any master for survival.

Plot

Luan Junhao was a peak Nine Heavens Realm expert who, during Gu Feiyang's visit to Shenxiao Palace, was invited to fight alongside the Palace Mistress and 9 other Martial Sovereigns who reached the 9 Stars. But with a single attack from the Wind and Cloud Palm, all 10 9-Star Martial Sovereigns were partially crippled and incapacitated, Luan Junhao had recovered his Martial Arts foundation and his Dao Heart after receiving the Immortal Elixir from Shenxiao Palace.

It took Luan Junhao dozens of years to almost fully recover, but he is still a peak expert in the Nine Heavens Realm, as he has acquired an age-old move that once dominated the World in the hands of a peerless expert, therefore, his overall strength does not differ from an Expert at the peak of the Peak Stage of a Martial Sovereign of the Nine Heavens Realm.

Afterwards, he was hired by the Head of the Star and Moon School to help the Eight Elephants and their affiliates acquire Gu Feiyang's Star Extinction Sword that had been stolen by the Eight Elephants during a Thousand Treasures Shop in New Yan City, which caused the deaths of the Eight Elephants members in the process, but Mr. Quan, a member of the Monster Race, resolved to complete the mission, sending the Star Extinction Sword in an Interspatial Ring to Luan Junhao, who resolved to traverse the path of the Void and come face to face with the Great Elder of the Thousand Treasures Lodge.

Power

Despite possessing considerable martial talent, he lacked the heart of a true powerhouse. Without the unwavering will to advance, his path in the martial world was destined to remain stagnant, forever falling short of true greatness.

Luo Landuo
==========

Luo Landuo, was a famous beauty in
Blue Jewel Academy
, Li Yunxiao Has a feeling for her and  persistently pursued Luo Landuo in the past, but after experiencing rejection he finally gave up.

Appearance

Delicate and beautiful face.

Background

Luo Landuo is one of the top five experts among all the freshmen in
Blue Jewel Academy
 that already reached the Origin Realm.

History

In the past, Li Yunxiao had proposed to Luo Landuo, but despite his noble background, he was seen as weak and incapable of practicing martial arts, making him unworthy in her eyes. She firmly believed that her future husband must be a hero of indomitable spirit, a guardian of the state  not a loser like Yunxiao.

Her decisive rejection struck a deep blow to Yunxiao’s pride. Humiliated by her words, he had no choice but to give up his pursuit.

Plot

Luo Landuo meet Li Yunxiao in Cultivating Chamber at
Blue Jewel Academy
 she underestimated Li Yunxiao's pursuit of martial arts and advised him to give up. He believed that without strength, mere skill alone could never reach the pinnacle of martial arts. However, he still saw a bright future for Yunxiao, as he was the young master of the Li family.

When Luo Landuo saw Li Yunxiao's unwavering dedication to training, she began to reconsider his proposal. Though she had once dismissed him as a weakling, his persistence made her rethink her judgment. To testing his determination, she issued him a challenge if he could defeat her in battle, she would reconsider his proposal.

Yet, little did she know, the Li Yunxiao before her was no longer the same man who had once desperately pursued her. To him, her beauty was now nothing more than mediocrity, and her past arrogance held no weight in his heart. He knew she had misunderstood his dedication his training was never for her.

Luo Qingyun

Chronology

Cultivation

Techniques

Relationships

He is a young talent from the
Heavenscent Empire
, he reached the Martial Grandmaster in such a young age for the
Southern Region
.

Appearance

A tall, slender man in a long green robe stood with distinct features, His eyes is yellow with green hair his face as cold as the high-altitude wind. No longer youthful, his expression carried the weight of time, exuding a calm and steady presence.

Personality

He is proud expert who possesses the true dragon's blood will never be willing to be under someone else.

Background

Qingyun, one of many people with dragon bloodline used as test subjects by
Wei Qing
 to creata perfect killing weapon through ruthless experimentation.

Plot

Chu Yu
 was secretly approached by the Zhou Family from the
Fire Crow Empire
, who offered a large bargaining chip to have
Li Yunxiao
 killed during the competition. Chu Yu considered adding a mysterious disciple named
Luo Qingyun
 to participate in the competition, believing that Luo Qingyun will defeat Li Yunxiao.

Mount Meru

He was one of those present in the inner hall of Xumi Temple, where others fought over a profound item used to seal Di Jia. Shortly after Di Jia awoke from his slumber and possessed several participants,  When Di Jia, the Black Demon Shadow, attacked, everyone tried to counter with their martial techniques and powerful armaments, but they were quickly overwhelmed by his immense strength.

Later, when
Xu Qing
 employed the Divine Prayer Technique, Martial Sovereign
Lu Daozi
 descended to confront
Di Jia
. He witnessed the fierce struggle between these mighty forces. As the inner hall neared collapse and the temple’s defenses failed,
Xu Qing
 managed to escape along with
Lu Daozi
,
Cao Yaxing
. He and Li Yunxiao.

In his pursuit of power, Luo Qingyun was even willing to become Wei Qing’s test subject to create the perfect killing machine
Ghost Asura
. During the process, he awakened his bloodline even granting him the ability to control
Ghost Asura
.

the True Tail Feather of the Heavenly Phoenix

When the Realm of Immortality opened, he joined Wei Qing,
Yin Yu
,
Feng Yaoli
, and Wei Wuya in the search for the the True Tail Feather of the Heavenly Phoenix and to eliminate Yunxiao.

During Yin Yu and Yunxiao’s duel, he caught the attention of the Monster Empress,
Lin
, who gave him the opportunity to break through to the Peak Perfection Realm.

Power

The Wild God's Moon Spear/The desolate God’s moon spear was like
Li Yunxiao
 ice sword. They were both obtained from the divine Palace of Mount Meru. They were both Maha ancient weapons,

Trivia

Luo Qingyun, possessed level 10 God blood, was bound to become one of the most dazzling new stars in the world.

Luo Qingyun

Chronology

Cultivation

Techniques

Relationships

Plot

Qionghua Island:

He engaged in a fierce battle with
Li Yunxiao
, using "Universal Art - Return to Ruins" countered by Yunxiao's "Sword Art - Star Annihilation." Luo Qingyun revealed the Spirit Heaven Ring, entrancing many with its sound. Li Yunxiao struggled against this mental attack. Their battle intensified as they unleashed powerful techniques. Luo Qingyun transformed into a dragon with the Soaring Dragon Body technique, and Li Yunxiao used the Great Illusory Fist, threatening Qionghua Island. Luo Qingyun underwent demonification, gaining monstrous strength. Their clash created an independent space, showcasing their mastery. Luo Qingyun used "Dragon's Dominion Four Extremes" with a dragon's shadow. Li Yunxiao responded with a phoenix shadow, leading to a cataclysmic collision, causing a black hole. The battle affected Mingxin Lake, but the Enforcers and the Elders hesitated to intervene. Luo Qingyun fell into the sea but survived using the Heaven Spirit Ring. Li Yunxiao extracted some of his blood, revealing a planned escape route and sparing Luo Qingyun. He collected crystal stones, and
Tu Lei
 surrendered on Luo Qingyun's behalf. Li Yunxiao won, and the competition ended.

Mount Meru:

During their exploration, they encountered the powerful and mysterious Di Jia, who had been sealed for a long time. The confrontation with Di Jia turned out to be disastrous for the group as they were no match for his black Demon Qi.
In the midst of the battle, Luo Qingyun was severely injured and almost lost his life. However, he managed to survive and confronted
Di Jia
 once again, using the Desolate God's Moon Spear to attack. However, even with his powerful strikes, he couldn't defeat Di Jia, and the demon easily brushed off his attacks. Eventually,
Xu Qing
 used a technique to make a Martial Sovereign's divine consciousness descend to suppress the Black Demon Shadow temporarily. In a desperate attempt, Lu Daozi and the others managed to escape through a hole created by
Lu Daozi's
 Martial Sovereign equal-attack, leaving Di Jia weakened and frustrated. Li Yunxiao and Luo Qingyun used the Heavenly Spiritual Ring to escape the inner hall, and the Soaring Heaven Palace's defenses opened, causing the inner hall to collapse and create a massive whirlpool at the bottom of the sea. Many corpses were left in the aftermath of the intense battle.

========

Luo Tian the ninth-level magic refiner who represented the Huashen Sea during the siege of the East China Sea that day and sent a huge city to fight against the sea clan.

Luo Xing
========

Luo Xing, one of the four nine-star peak powerhouses under Wei Qing. The other three all died in the Red Moon City incident, leaving him the only one who survived by chance.

Appearance

She has Red hair and red eyes, she is very beautiful. If she wear a red armor she look like Flame Empress one of the ten sovereigns

Personality

Characteristics

Golddigger

Strict

Cowardly

Dishonest

Evil

Manipulative

Arrogant

History

She is a disciple at
Heavenly Night Palace
. After the battle with Gu feiyang, Qu hongyan goes into Seclusion and other members leaves the heavenly night palace because it was totally destroyed by Gu feiyang. At that time luo Yunshang fall in love with him left in search of him so she could see his face and his eyes that charmed her once more but later she got the news that Gu feiyang is dead, Which she was shocked after wandering she reached Tianshui where she became a teacher and settled until she met Gu feiyang aka Li Yunxiao.

Plot

She is completly talentless apart from her
innate physique
 and have to move to a
low rank country
 on the
lowest ranked region on the continent
 where she uses the techniques from her master meant for Martial Sovereigns and her
innate physique
 to rise to a mid level teacher and torments
our mc
 for being born with a crippled physique and see him as trash until she finds out about his connection to
the former 3rd strongest person in the world
 and starts to manipulate him and acting closer to him so she can seduce
Gu Feiyang
 only to find out
Li Yunxiao
 is
Gu Feiyang
 and then she tries to seduce
her former student

The Land of No Return

Qu Hongyan
 brought Luo Yunshang to the Land of No Return in an attempt to delay her worsening condition. However, he ultimately failed, as
Gu Qingqing
 successfully took over Luo Yunshang’s body and sealed Qu Hongyan within the Land of No Return.

Luo Yunshang

Chronology

Cultivation

Techniques

Relationships

Plot

SPOILER ALERT!

She later follows Yunxiao to Gentle Song Forest, where they meet
Haolian Shaohuang
. There Yunxiao leaves for the outer space, while Yunshang stays together with Ding Ling'er at Haolian Shaohuang's place. When they meet up again she stays in Yunxiao's
Divine Realm Talet
 during his travels. After reaching the
Martial Supreme Realm
 she leaves Yunxiao and goes to Heavenly Night Palace to reach the
Extreme Yang Divine Body
 with the help of a
Rainbow stone
. Later Yunxiao visits Heavenly Night Palace and learns that Luo Yunshang and Qu Hongyan went to the "Realm of No Return" in the thousand mountain prefecture in the
Western Region
, in order to completely refine the rainbow stone. After finding both Yunshang and Hongyan he discovers the refinement doesn't work out well. In order to help her he has to destroy a seal on the so-called "
Five Cloud Mountain
", which is a place to seal the demon race in the Realm of No Return. After that Yunxiao left the two of them behind. Meanwhile the Heavenly Night Palace's ancestor Gu Qingqing takes over Luo Yunshangs body. 'Luo Yunshang' manages to seal Hongyan below the "Five Cloud Mountain". Meanwhile several other partys also arrived and managed to destroy the seal on Five Cloud Mountain and a great fight broke out between the human and demon race. Yunxiao discovers Yunshang is possessed and fights Gu Qingqing as well as
Mo
, while Gu Qingqing constantly ridicules him as "little lover". At some point 'Luo Yunshang' opens 7 of the 8 Gates of the humans body in a row, shocking Yunxiao (with the help of the Divine Blood Bead which she snatched from Mo). The blood demon Mo, who was one of the demons sealed in Five Cloud Mountain, places a seal on Gu Qingqing. During the fights Yunxiao convinces 'Luo Yunshang' to release Qu Hongyan. Later 'Luo Yunshang', still possessed by Gu Qingqing who is also in control of the body, gets imprisoned by the blood demon Mo. Before being taken away by Mo, Gu Qingqing gives the Five Cloud Mountain to Yunxiao. She meets up with Li Yunxiao in
Langya Heaven
, where they enter the
Eternal World
. There Gu Qingqing's real body is located. After Gu Qingqing helps fending off enemys with her real body she takes back her soul from Luo Yunshang's body setting her free. Luo Yunshang helps Yunxiao healing his severe injuries through her Nine Yang Body, which represents the extreme Yang while Yunxiao's Bright Moon Body represents the extreme Yin. Hence resonating and giving each other benefits while cultivating. It's implied that Yunxiao managed to improve through her help, and later confirmed that he opened the 8th gate of his body, hence achieving great success.

Luo Yunshang

Chronology

Cultivation

Techniques

Relationships

The Nine Yang Sacred Technique was Shenxiao Temple’s greatest treasure, granting immense power through dual cultivation. When a woman with a Nine Yang True Body engaged in intimacy for the first time, she transferred pure Yang energy to her partner, boosting his cultivation. In return, she awakened Yin energy, balancing her power and accelerating her growth. Due to the rarity of Nine Yang True Bodies, few had ever practiced the technique, but those who did became peerless experts.

Luo Yunshang

Luofu Island
============

Luofu Island. It is dead silent, with no life. The environment is extremely harsh, and the rock formations are very solid, making it the most suitable location for a martial arts duel.

A huge land emerged, the largest island Yunxiao had ever seen, but it was desolate and without any trees or creatures. There were strange rocks everywhere on the island, and barren mountain valleys rose and fell one after another. At a glance, the heights were uneven, and the mountains were endless.

Man
===

Man is one Of The 8 Demon Sovereign Of The Devil World First Appeard In The
Eternal World
 In The Fight Between Yunxiao And Yin Yu As A Clone But Got Destroyed By Ye Qinqyu.

Later he work with
Lu Congzi
 to Steal an Ancient Demonic Ape's Egg From An Material Exchange of the Zheng tribe and absorbed its power. Soon his location was revealed by the Zhu(Holy Envoy),When he confront
Li Yunxiao
 And Demon Sovereign
Zheng
 and his army, afraid that his identity would be exposed he hide inside the chariot, letting only Lu Congzi fought alone. But later to save Lu Congzi from begin nearly killed by Yunxiao. He appeared and saved Lu Congzi and used the Demonic Ape's power to forced Zheng to a disadvantage position. But later in the battle when yunxiao used the sword "who will rise and fall" he was terrified and lost his arm by the sword's Qi and forced to flee.

After fleeing, Man and Lu Congzi return to Extreme Emperor City in the Man Tribe territory. Then he Completely absorbs and refined the Demonic Ape's Egg. When he was about fight yunxiao and Zheng, Lu Congzi betrays him and kills him by stealing his body Later it was revealed that Lu Congzi had modified the Demonic Ape's Egg and taken control of Man without him noticing.

Mao Haokong
===========

Plot

He secretly colluding with the Holy Region's dark agents to break the seal of the Five Cloud Mountain. His ultimate goal is to release the powerful demon sealed within, seeking to reshape the power structure of the Tianwu Continent to his advantage.

In his plot, Mao Haokong manipulates events, framing the sect leader, Bai Sheng, for colluding with demons and attempting to seize control of the Prefecture. Using the authority of the dark agents, Mao Haokong pressures Bai Sheng to hand over the key to the Five Cloud Mountain seal. However, Bai Sheng resists, demanding an official decree from the Holy Region.

===========

Appearance

A green-robed old man with beard.

Martial Flame City
==================

SPOILER ALERT!

This page is under
development
.  All existing information will be
modified
 or
deleted
.  To help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
 add some information about
Martial Flame City
 as it is released. We will fix it.

Overview

Spoilers

Plot

Mount Meru

After Mount Xumi released its spiritual energy, Yanwu City became one of the most treasured cultivation grounds in the Tianwu Realm, attracting countless warriors from all regions. The city expanded over tenfold and rose to lead the entire Southern Region.

Martial Flam City Crisis

After  Mount Xumi’s disappearance, the spiritual energy has started to decline, A few years ago, a strange phenomenon appeared above Tianshui Kingdom, releasing astonishing spiritual energy, which was continuously absorbed by Yanwu City's spirit-gathering formation.

In response, major sects from the Southern Region sent experts to investigate. They concluded that a massive spiritual vein existed near Tianshui Kingdom, but despite extensive searches, they found nothing. Even warriors from the other three regions continued their exploration for a long time but eventually gave up.

Now, with Yanwu City's spiritual energy depleting, concerns are growing over how long it will last. To slow down consumption, the city has begun restricting foreign warriors, requiring those who wish to cultivate there to pay a large sum of Yuanshi.

Southern Sealed Land

Yanwu City is experiencing a severe spiritual energy crisis, with reserves rapidly depleting and cultivation becoming unsustainable. To slow this decline, the City Lord’s Mansion has imposed restrictions, but without discovering a new energy source, the city's future remains uncertain.

A past attempt to locate the source failed despite the promise of control over East Yanwu City as a reward. Now, discussions are underway to increase the stakes, but many fear that even offering half the city won’t help if the source remains undiscovered.

Meanwhile, power struggles are intensifying. Major sects like Tianzhu Sect and Duanqing Mountain are secretly backing factions to infiltrate Yanwu City, while smaller sects also compete for control over its spiritual veins. As internal and external forces fight for dominance, Yanwu City stands on the brink of collapse.

Coup d'état

During the Martial Flame City crisis, Xin Ruyu, backed by a major force from the Duskflame Empire and supported by one of the Seven Major Powers in Tianwu, took advantage of the chaos to stir up trouble. With Yanwu City's spiritual energy depleting, he openly declared his intent to seize control, claiming that the Li family was no longer fit to rule.

However, before his plans could unfold, Yunxiao suddenly arrived at Martial Flame City, putting an abrupt end to Xin Ruyu's ambitions. In a decisive move, Yunxiao crippled Xin Ruyu, while the sect masters who had sided with him were given a chance at pardon on the condition that they destroy their own dantians as a form of punishment.

Later, while searching the soul of one of the fallen experts, Yunxiao discovered a shocking truth: the force backing Xin Ruyu was none other than
Beiming Dark Palace
, one of the Seven Major Powers.

Before the Storm

After stopping
Xin Ruyu
 and the
Duskflame Empire
’s forces from taking over
Martial Flame City
,
Li Yunxiao
 gathered key figures to discuss an even greater looming threat.
In the meeting, familiar faces like
Ji Meng
,
Xu Han
,
Zhang Qingfan
,
Jia Rong
,
Qian Duoduo
,
Li Chunyang
, and
Li Changfeng
 were present, along with elite
Student Army
 members.
Su Lianyi
,
Ding Ling’er
, and others also emerged from the
World God Monument
 to join the discussion.
Yunxiao revealed that the
Demon Emperor
’s seal had been broken, and the
Ten Directions Rules
 would soon spread. As Martial Flame City was the closest hub, powerful warriors seeking to break into the Divine Realm would soon gather, making the city vulnerable.
To prepare, Yunxiao proposed an alliance between Martial Falme City,
Shenxiao Palace
, and the
Tianling Long Family
, creating a fixed channel to unite their forces and stand against the impending crisis.

At the same time, the City Lord’s Mansion took control of the Tianyuan Chamber of Commerce and the Jinqian Gang, merging them into the Yanwu City Chamber of Commerce. Surprisingly, both factions cooperated, with the Jinqian Chamber even donating its assets and pledging support.

With 100,000 years’ worth of sealed spiritual energy soon to be released, Yanwu City was poised for massive growth, expected to expand tenfold. This transformation would make it a major economic and cultivation hub, reshaping the balance of power in the world.

Force

Heaven Core with 2330 members

Martial Flame City/Spoilers
===========================

This page is under
development
.  All existing information will be
modified
 or

.  To help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
 add some information about
Martial Flame City/Spoilers
 as it is released. We will fix it.

Overview

Spoilers

Martial arts competitions
=========================

Martial arts competitions Held in
Luofu Island
 by hidden families to get to know each other, increase their prestige, and understand the situation of other sects.

History

Martial arts competitions weren’t very important. They were just a way for the hidden families to get to know each other, increase their prestige, and understand the situation of other sects. They could be considered a more important form of communication, but they were just communication and didn’t have much of a relationship of interest. But it’s different this time. It’s directly related to two major matters, the quota to enter the heaven of Langya and the distribution of the
Ancient Treasure Trove
.

Rule

the martial arts competition must be young disciples of each sect, and their
bone age
 is limited to
thirty years old
 and below, each sect will have at least one quota. There will be a total of 12 places in the martial arts competition. Whether it’s going to the eternal world or the secret treasure of the true dragon Next, it will be distributed according to the martial arts ranking. for the first place, will get thirty quotas as a reward for the the heaven of Langya.

Trivia

Since
Jing Qi
 cultivated the Corpse Fiend Technique, which refines the body into a corpse fiend, his bone age remains fixed at the year he first practiced this divine ability. Although he is much older, his bone age is technically 23 years old, allowing him to qualify as a participant in the tournament.

Mei Dong'er
===========

Mei Dong'er is a descendant of the Mei Family, and a valued disciple of the Big Dipper Sect, as well as a great friend of
Li Yunxiao
.

Appearance

A delicate and Pretty Woman was dressed in a flowery-collared brocade robe and had a Jade hairpin in her hair. Her body exuded a faint Yuan Qi fluctuation.

Background

Mei Dong'er hailed from a prestigious, yet complex family background. Though she bore the surname Mei, she was a distant branch of the renowned Mei family and thus, had no access to the wealth or privileges typically associated with her name. Like most others, she was raised within the Big Dipper Sect, where she cultivated her skills alongside ordinary children. Despite this, her innate talent shone through. By the age of fifteen, she had already reached the Six Directions Realm, a feat that few could achieve at such a young age. Over the next year, her rapid progression continued, as she shattered barriers and ascended to the peak of the Five-Star Martial Grandmaster realm. While her speed of advancement wasn’t unparalleled, it was certainly among the fastest in the sect, marking her as an exceptional talent.

History

Mei Dong’er was born with a rare and fatal condition known as the Five Righteous Que Qi, abody that was lacking in all five virtues, terminal disease so severe that even ninth-tier great alchemists couldn't cure it. With such an affliction, she was not expected to survive beyond the age of ten.

Originally, Mei Dong’er was meant to be punished alongside her parents, but due to her fragile condition, Aunt Jiu's mother spared her life and instead expelled her from the
Mei Family
. Five years ago, when Granny, who had taken her in, passed away, she left behind a will from Mei Dong’er's mother. Since then, Mei Dong’er has been determined to fulfill her mother's last wish—to return to Plum Valley.

Plot

Big Dipper Sect

Mei Dong'er, a valued disciple of the Big Dipper Sect, is deceived by her senior, Yin Nian, who gifts her a poisoned Sixth-Grade Megrez Inner Core, intending to harm her. Just as Mei Dong'er falls into his trap, Li Yunxiao unexpectedly arrives after fleeing from
Di Jun
, his
World God Monument
 crashing nearby. He saves Mei Dong'er from danger. Gratefu, saving her. Grateful, Mei Dong'er informs him about a secret long-range Teleportation Array, which can only be accessed by the top three winners of the upcoming martial competition. She promises to help Li Yunxiao if he secures a top spot.

To aid her, Li Yunxiao teaches Mei Dong'er the mystic martial technique, "As Gentle as Water." During the competition, Mei Dong'er uses the technique to defeat Cheng Yu, the sect’s top young talent. Enraged by his loss, Cheng Yu consumes a Demonic Transformation Pill and attacks her. Li Yunxiao intervenes, saving Mei Dong'er but exposing himself and angering Cheng Yu's master.

This sparks a fierce conflict. Li Yunxiao confronts the sect’s elders and
Zhang Linghua
, the Sect Master, who reveals his advancement to an Initial Stage Martial Sovereign. Severely injured by Zhang Linghua's powerful strike, Li Yunxiao is forced to flee, leaving Mei Dong'er worried for his safety.

Song Yueyang City

Later, Mei Dong'er, along with
Mo Xiaochuan
, Li Yunxiao, and others, used the Teleportation Array and flew to another location where they could use a Teleportation Array and finally arrived at Songyue Yang City, where the great Merchant Union Sorcery and Martial Arts Competition would take place. And during her stay there, Mei Dong'er gets involved in a conflict with the subordinates of the Young Master of one of the 10 Great Sects of the Northern Region, where Li Yunxiao appears and resolves the situation, with Li Feiyu, showing his face at this moment.

During the conflict, Mei Dong'er sees that she is a descendant of the Mei Family of item appraisers, and during the conflict an
Mei kui
 who entrusted to take care the place by
Mei Family
 where they were interacting dies,  After this, Li Yunxiao meets the head of the Mei Family during a Event Held By
Song Yueyang City
 city Lord between experts where he goes with Li Feiyu, mentioning having a good relationship with Mei Dong'er when
Li Feiyu
, The Mei Family leader and he were alone talking privately, which infuriated the Mei Family leader.

Plum Valley

After Mei Dong'er,
Mei Jiu
 (Head of the Mei Family, also called Ninth Jiu), and Li Yunxiao meet in the Mei Family territory amidst a conflict, Li Yunxiao manages to persuade Ninth Jiu to tell him the reason for her hatred and repulsion towards Mei Dong'er. Ninth Jiu says that Mei Dong'er mother stole the Key to the Wudang River space, which caused the decline of the Mei Family, and such a disappointment on the part of Ninth Jiu's mother that she commit suicide.

During the conversation, Ninth Aunt tells that this Wudang River was a sea of mysterious Spiritual Qi that existed in a space that existed in the Mei Family's territory, which contained a poison that gave the Mei Family's Treasure Analysis skill.

After Li Yunxiao discovered that the necklace that Mei Dong'er mother had was the key, and that it was only used to treat Mei Dong'er illness that she had exhibited at birth, Mei Dong'er cries to the point of fainting, handing over the Key shortly before this to Ninth Jiu, as after these long years, her illness has already been treated.

Mei Dong'er becomes an incredibly important member of the Mei Family, as Li Yunxiao asks Ninth Aunt to take care of Mei Dong'er, which she approves of. About 4 years later, Li Yunxiao reunites with Ninth Aunt and Mei Dong'er during a
Ten Thousand Treasures Store
 Auction in New Yan City, with Li Yunxiao noting that Mei Dong'er was treated well as she became a High-Level Martial Supreme under the Mei Family's care.

During a conversation between Li Yunxiao, Ninth Aunt, and Mei Dong'er, Ninth Aunt says that after Li Yunxiao entered the Wudang River, the Spiritual Qi and poison present became incredibly stronger and denser. With Mei Dong'er showing, as she expelled a tiny part of the poison from her body with difficulty, the poison was so dense that it solidified into a small crystal. Later it was known that this Wudang River is connected to Earth Domain .

Mei Family
==========

The Mei family was very low-key on the continent. Other than the rumor that they had extremely high appraisal power, there were very few other rumors. And the Mei family basically only dealt with the merchant Union, and had very little contact with other sects

Histroy

The Wuding River is a mysterious place flowing beneath Plum Valley. is the origin of Mei family’s power and is extremely important Every girl born into the Mei family must enter its waters at the age of five to cultivate the Appraisal Art, a divine ability granting appraisal talent. Those with high talent take three to four years to succeed, while others may take over a decade. This cultivation technique has led Mei family women to marry outsiders for generations, only giving birth to daughters.

When a Mei family woman marries, the essence of the technique is transferred to her husband, allowing him to cultivate and eventually master the Appraisal Art. However, over ten years ago, Mei Wanbai lost the key to the Wuding River’s gate, putting the Mei family in crisis. Without access, no one has been able to master the Appraisal Art since. Furious,
Mei jiu
 mother punished Mei Dong’er’s parents by throwing them into the Wuding River.
Mei Dong'er
 was meant to share their fate, but due to her frail condition, she was spared and exiled.

For the past decade, Aunt Jiu’s mother had been keeping the gate open alone. Last year, she overexerted herself and passed away, causing the gate to finally close.

Later ever since the Wuding River has been reopened, the spiritual energy inside has become stronger and stronger, and the toxicity has also become stronger. In the beginning, the disciples of the Mei family benefited a lot and I was also secretly happy. It was also thanks to this that Dong ‘er was able to break through to the high-level martial honored realm so quickly.

Structure

Leader

Mei Jiu

Other

Mei Wanbai

Mei kui

Mei Dong'er

Family Heirloom

Mu Qian Ling Yue
. It is a peerless divine jade. Its value is not less than Amaterasu Que Jin. Moreover, it is a rare divine object in the world that can suppress the five positive and strange things.

Trivia

The Mei family's Hundred Flowers Dew Wine possesses medicinal properties comparable to spirit pills and the Ice Jade Pearl.

The strange poison in the Wuding River can allow the Mei family to possess an extremely strong appraisal technique. The strength of this ability is completely proportional to the poison in the body.

Xiayun is a poison present in the spiritual Qi, discovered by the Mei family ancestors after years of study wuding river. It plays a crucial role in cultivating the Mei family’s appraisal Divine Art, requiring members to inhale large amounts of it. The ancestors speculated that this poison is the reason why the Mei family has only produced female heirs.

Mei Hong
========

Blood Crow Palace’s Lord, Mei Hong.

Appearance

A black-robed men with a huge blood-red Crow embroidered on their clothes.

Mei Jiu
=======

Appearance

Woman in Palace dress. She had  beautiful eyes, a thin veil on her face and her body was light. Although her face was covered by a light veil, one could still see that she was an absolute beauty. she gave off the aura of a dignified and elegant lady.

Plot

City Lord Manor

As the host of the small trade fair in
Yufeng City
, when Li Yunxiao revealed the Skyshine Que Gold, weighing at least a thousand jin, he was prepared to trade it. However, Aunt Jiu suddenly intervened, expressing her interest in purchasing the item privately.

Plum Valley

She later invited
Li Yunxiao
 and
Li Feiyu
 to the Mei family's home base, Plum Valley, for further negotiations. During their discussion, she explained that she needed ten thumb-sized pieces of Tenshou Metal to forge a supreme weapon. She assured him that the Mei family was willing to offer a satisfactory price, even if it meant spending their entire fortune.

As Yunxiao revealed that he was Mei Dong'er's friend and willingly offered the item to Aunt Jiu in exchange for information about her, Aunt Jiu suddenly realized that Yunxiao was the one who killed
Wang Da
, dragging the Mei family into the conflict. Without listening to Yunxiao’s explanation, dismissing it as mere excuses, she attempted to capture him, eager to test the strength of the man who had forced
Wang Gong
 divine will to retreat.

Hearing this, Yunxiao was furious he had never been questioned like this before. If not for Mei Dong’er, he would have never tolerated such treatment. Overcome with rage, he entered a berserk, demonized state.

Trivia

In Chinese, "Jiu" (九) means "nine" when written as 九. However, "Jiu" (久) can also mean "long" or "lasting", referring to something enduring over time.

Mei Wanbai
==========

History

A decade ago, Wanbai lost the Mei family heirloom—the key to unlocking the gate to their secret river, the Wuding River. As punishment, the Mei family head at the time sentenced her and her husband to execution. Before being thrown into the Wuding River, family members cast a gravity technique, causing them to sink instantly.

However, Wanbai had never actually lost the key. She had secretly stolen it to save her daughter, Mei Dong’er, from an incurable disease, using its power to aid in her recovery.

After a decade had passed, before Grandma Wo passed away, she told Mei Dong’er about her mother’s final wish—to return to the Mei family and bring the key back to Plum Valley. When Mei Dong’er came of age.

Trivia

the reason wanbai wait for Mei Donger entered adulthood to return the key is because Mei Donger body would automatically heal once he entered adulthood.

Mei jiu
=======

Mei Jiu is the renowned and extremely well-known (especially among merchants and traveling Cultivators) “Ninth Aunt” or “Aunt Jiu”, the current leader of the
Mei Family
, the clan of appraisers who wield an incredibly accurate Analysis skill that allows them to perfectly score the quality and Grade of an Object, Artifact, Treasure, or Technique.

The Mei Family enjoys high recognition among organizations as a whole, and Aunt Jiu in particular is often called upon to conduct high-level auctions or exchanges. demonstrating his improvement with the analysis skill by understanding even the quality of materials at the peak of the Ninth Grade delivered by
Li Yunxiao
.

She initially has a difficult relationship with
Mei Dong'er
 and Li Yunxiao, but after some events, they become good friends, and at Li Yunxiao's request, she takes care of Mei Dong'er, treating her as a precious piece of the Mei Family, to the point that in just a few short years (about two or three years), Mei Dong'er reaches the High-Level Martial Supreme Realm with the help of the Mei Family.

Mei kui
=======

Mei Kui one of elder from
Mei Family
, she is in charge one of Mei family restaurant in
Yufeng City
. She had bad relationship with
Mei Dong'er
.

Apearance

Granny kui, using pitch-black walking stick, an old woman with a Hunchback. Her face was twisted and ugly, and her eyes were sharp.

Meng Bai

Chronology

Cultivation

Techniques

Relationships

Appearance

Meng Bai having a child-Appearance, with his yellow-ish Bowl-cut hair and Blue eyes.

His appearance changes throughout the story, but the last time since he was abducted, he would wear anything was a light teal and black pattern of clothes. Seemingly having no sort of pattern but random lines and curves. That fits his blue eyes and happy nature.

Personality

Meng Bai is a kind-hearted and obedient boy who deeply respects and cherishes his older sister,
Meng Wu.
 Despite his young age, he is mature and responsible, fully aware of their family's financial struggles. Rather than burdening his sister, he takes initiative to help, working hard to support her in any way he can.

Plot

Five Cloud Mountain

After his battle with
Huang
,
Wei Qing
 recovered his strength and returned with reinforcements. Among them were thirty to forty powerful warriors like
Qiu Mujie
, who could take on human forms in normal times but revealed their true demon forms in battle.and Meng Bai also showcased his immense power by annihilating Hundred of monsters with a single large-scale attack. Using Dora's Mysterious Water, Meng Bai released the Eight Evils Vermilion Saliva. The poison spread swiftly, causing thousands of demons to flee in pain and screams. In an instant, seven or eight out of ten demons were killed or severely injured, leaving only two to three hundred survivors.

Power

the Eight Evils Vermilion Saliva, one of the Five Great Extinction Poison. which correspond to the Five Elements of Heaven and Earth. The Vermilion Saliva is a water-based poison, known for its terrifying and rapid spread.

Meng Bai

Chronology

Cultivation

Techniques

Relationships

History

Her father was a brave captain who once served the state but died on a mission three years ago. Since then, he and older sister, Meng  Wu, lost their main source of income and had to survive on a meager pension, forcing them to move to the suburbs.

At fourteen, Meng Bai had already opened five chakras, showing greater potential.

However, this year, Meng Bai suddenly became absent-minded, frequently falling into a coma, and his body shifted between hot and cold for unknown reasons.

Meng Ling
=========

Current wielder of the Flame of Underworld, and Supreme figure of the
Holy Region

References

Meng Wu
=======

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Meng Wu

Plot

Blue Jewel Academy

To raise money for her little brother, Meng Wu had agreed to help
Lan Fei
 in his scheme to frame Yunxiao. However, she never expected things to go so disastrously. Not only was Lan Fei expelled, leaving her with nothing, but she had also suffered humiliation when Li Yunxiao groped her in
Maple Grove
.

That night, she wept silently in her bed, vowing over and over again that she would one day kill Li Yunxiao. The memory of what he had done to her burned in her heart, filling her with resentment.

Yet, when she finally saw Yunxiao again this time stepping in to help her against a
Man
 who had tried to take advantage of her she found herself powerless against him. Instead of acting on her hatred, she could do nothing but lash out in anger.

The image of Li Yunxiao descending like a mighty figure from the sky during his duel with
Lan Xuan
 had been deeply imprinted in her mind. No matter how much she hated him, she couldn't deny the lingering impression he had left on her. After all, little girls always admired heroes, and a strong man had the power to stir countless emotions and fantasies within them.

Martial Flame City

After the world-shattering battle between two Martial Sovereigns and the emergence of two Titled Martial Sovereigns in Martial Flame City, Meng Wu and her brother,
Meng Bai
, were taken back to the
Holy Region
 by
Wei Qing
. There, Wei Qing placed them in the Shattered Cloud Sky River to cultivate

Shattered cloud sky River /Broken Clouds River

Later, While searching for the Earth Realm and the Yellow Springs Hellfire with Pan Yi and Zhan Chen, Yunxiao encountered Meng Wu. However, just like Meng Bai, she had been placed under a spell by Wei Qing and had no memory of him.

Meng Wu then formed a seal, creating a flying crystal. Without hesitation, Yunxiao used the
Divine Realm Tablet
 to counter it, but to his shock, even this holy artifact was affected the surface became crystallized, and its power was suppressed.

Realizing the danger, Yunxiao unleashed the Ice Fiend Heart Flame and the Xin Guili Flame, causing a dazzling explosion. The immense energy created a massive vortex in the lake, pulling all three of them in. As they were swept along by the spinning force, Yunxiao's eyes remained fixed on Meng Wu.

<nowiki>As the whirlpool carried them apart, Meng Wu looked at Yunxiao and finally asked for his name. Her figure gradually faded into the distance, like a crystal-blue silhouette, disappearing from sight.

Date

Miao Xuan Sect
==============

Although Miaoxuan Sect is not as dominant as the seven super powers in the entire Tianwu Continent, it is also famous in the North Region, which has the strongest overall strength. Its strength is at least ranked in the top ten in the entire North Region, and they are the most licentious sect in the entire North Region. Basically, no woman that Miaoxuan Sect disciples like can escape. Even several women from the Beiming Xuan Palace have become the forbidden food of Miaoxuan Sect's young master Wang Zhen.

Structure

Leader

Wang Gong

Succesor

Wang Zhen

Wang Da

Min Lei
=======

Appearance

A woman in red Palace robes.

Background

Min Lei was powerful elders of shenxiao Palace. She used to follow qu Hongyan.

Ming Jian
=========

Ming Jian, were enigmatic figures whose origins remained a mystery. Their insights and predictions had shaped many major events in recent years, earning them a reputation as
wise men of unparalleled foresight
. Despite their fame, no one knew where they came from or how they acquired their prophetic abilities. Some speculated that they were connected to the
Duanmu family
, a legendary lineage known for its
power of prophecy
, but no evidence ever confirmed this claim.

Appearance

Ming Jian wore a
billowing green robe.

Plot

As they attempted to flee, Ling Baiyi, furious that they had ruined his plans, struck with his sword, unleashing a deadly purple light. The attack was so swift and precise that they remained standing in the air, seemingly unharmed, until moments later. Their mirror artifact shattered, Blood then erupted from their waists, revealing that they had been sliced clean in half.

Ming Zhen
=========

Ming Zhen were enigmatic figures whose origins remained a mystery. Their insights and predictions had shaped many major events in recent years, earning them a reputation as
wise men of unparalleled foresight
. Despite their fame, no one knew where they came from or how they acquired their prophetic abilities. Some speculated that they were connected to the
Duanmu family
, a legendary lineage known for its
power of prophecy
, but no evidence ever confirmed this claim.

Plot

As they attempted to flee, Ling Baiyi, furious that they had ruined his plans, struck with his sword, unleashing a deadly purple light. The attack was so swift and precise that they remained standing in the air, seemingly unharmed, until moments later. Their mirror artifact shattered, Blood then erupted from their waists, revealing that they had been sliced clean in half.

Mo
==

Mo was The Lord of the blue Demon tribe one of the monster that been sealed at Five Cloud Mountain by Gu Qingqing. Despite his strength and lineage, he has not yet ascended to the throne of the Monster King, indicating that even stronger Monster exist who challenge his claim to power.

Personality

Despite his background, his personality is filled with contradictions he desires power and recognition but often acts out of fear death and self-preservation make him cowardice.

Background

He was powerful Monster with the cultivation of the Void Realm and a direct descendant of the Cang Demon Clan, one of the most terrifying and influential Monster lineages, known for their unique ability to absorb the blood of others especially their own kind to strengthen themselves. This trait allows them to grow rapidly in power as long as they have an endless supply of blood.

History

Tens of thousands of years ago, the ancestor of the Cang Yao tribe, realizing the limitations of their growth due to the lack of god-level warriors, made a drastic decision. After being defeated by
Gu Qingqing
, he collaborated with her to seal the Cang Yao tribe and other powerful "blood-headed" tribes under Five Cloud Mountain. His goal was to let the tribe grow stronger within the seal, absorbing the power of the earth and time.

The ancestor also used his own body as a medium to refine the Blood God Pearl a powerful artifact meant to help future Cang Yao members break through the seal and ascend to godhood. This plan was designed to create a god-level powerhouse once the seal was broken.

Plot

Five Cloud Mountain

He Was Imprisoned Under The Five Cloud Mountain Peak by
Gu Qingqing
. The Five Cloud Mountain, which had sealed Mo for thousands of years, was revealed  to be a profound-level weapon. Its immense power came from the earth itself, formed by mutated earth elements. Gu Qingqing had refined it, shaping it into a mountain. Being an earth-elemental artifact, it was naturally connected to the land, drawing endless strength from the earth to maintain its formidable power.

Later Released

Langya Heaven Big Wheel Island

With the help of the Duanmu siblings’ divination technique, Mo, along with
Gu Qingqing
,
Duanmu Yu
, and
Duanmu Cang
, tracked Yunxiao’s whereabouts and awaited his arrival on Big Wheel Island. When Yunxiao finally appeared, Mo immediately confronted him, demanding the Buddhist Demon Sacred Art, convinced that Yunxiao possessed it.

Yunxiao calmly confirmed that he indeed had the sacred art but refused to hand it over without a fair exchange. Initially, he proposed trading it for Mo’s Bone-Scale Double-Edged Sword, only for Mo to reveal that the weapon had been taken by a mysterious figure whom Yunxiao instantly recognized as
Wu Dacheng
.

Realizing this, Yunxiao swiftly changed his terms To follow and Listen Yunxiao Orderes For 10 Years In Exchange For  Buddhist Sacred Art Created  By The Strongest Monster Tribe but will also Help Mo to step into the void God Realm. Mo agree

Joins The
Heavenly Martial Alliance
 To Fight Againts The Devils Invasion.

Eternal World

In eternal world after he meet
Lin
 the Ten Thousand Demon Empress, sje tell him his cultivation path is flawed,  putting his life at risk. In a moment of desperation, He pleads with Lin to save him. Lin agree to help him he then received holy power from Lin.

Later He Becomes The Monster Emperor Because
Ai
 Loses Her Bet With Yunxiao In A Refining Contest.

Power

The Blood Prohibition Style is the innate magic of the Cang Yao clan, allowing them to extract and absorb energy from blood. Their unique physique enables them to decompose blood and harness its power, similar to how others absorb Yuanshi energy—except their source is blood. In the past, Mo's ancestor used this method to seal himself, refining his power into a Blood God Bead for future generations to inherit.

Mo Douchen
==========

Mo Douchen was a legendary figure in the Mo Clan, extraordinary talent and one in the mo family can cultivate the thousand spirit noble technique to the extreme in his generation. He was regarded as the clan’s greatest hope to reach the pinnacle of martial arts. His contributions to the clan were immense, earning him deep respect and admiration. However, he met an untimely death, leaving behind his only son,
Mo Xiaochuan
.

Trivia

He had met Gu Feiyang several times and even promised to duel him in Black Iron City under the bright moon and rainy sky.

Gu Feiyang wanted to have a fight with him because he saw that his strength was not ordinary And wanted to see Mo family Technique the thousand feet noble art.

Mo Huayuan
==========

He is
Mo Xiaochuan
 cousin. Mo Xiaochuan was adopted by his father after Mo Xiaochuan father died.

Appearance

The man's temperament looked like he was only 30 years old, but the layers of wrinkles on his face revealed his old age, and his eye sockets were slightly sunken.

Background

He is an incredibly talented Alchemist, one of the three core disciples of the Head of the Alchemy Department of the
Holy Region
,
Yuan Gaohan
. After clashing with an individual in the Holy Region and causing a ruckus, Yuan Gaohan expelled him from the Holy Region until he proved that he had improved his personality.

Plot

Hanxuan
, representing
The Purple Cloud Chamber of Commerce
, offers
Mo Huayuan
 a deal help them fight back against a mysterious rival in exchange for the
Heavenly Dancing Rotating Purple-Gold Cauldron
, once owned by his master. The
rival organization
 threatens to crush The Purple Cloud Chamber by copying their products with
better quality and lower prices
.

However, Mo Huayuan
refuses to help
, bound by a promise to the
Thunderwind Commerce Guild
 not to interfere in business affairs. Despite this, he
insists on taking the cauldron
, claiming it as his master’s legacy.

Enraged by his arrogance and hypocrisy,
Yunxiao challenges Mo Huayuan to an alchemy competition.

During an Alchemy competition with
Li Yunxiao
, he admits to having lost after using all his trump cards. Li Yunxiao performed all his greatest techniques to prove that there was a disparity between his techniques and mainly to show how heaven-defying Li Yunxiao powers were, which frightened Mo Huayuan several times and made him go through several mistakes during the refining.

With this, he develops great respect for Li Yunxiao and begins to support him in his arrangements.

Later, at
Song Yueyang City
 he bids farewell to Li Yunxiao and
Mo Xiaochuan
 and returns to the Holy Region.

Mo Wanfeng
==========

Mo Wanfeng Is Grand Elder from
Mo Family
, and the step father of
Mo Xiaochuan
, He has been raising Mo Xiaochuan since his father’s passing.

History

When Mo Xiaochuan repeatedly trespasses into the clan’s forbidden area, facing severe punishment, Mo Wanfeng attempts to take responsibility by offering his own cultivation as atonement. However, the ancestral elder intervenes, preventing his sacrifice. The reeson he deeply devoted to Mo Xiaochuan is due to his gratitude toward Xiaochuan’s late father, Mo Douchen, who once saved his life.

Mo Xiaochuan

Mo Xiaochuan, was one of the
Gu Feiyang
 disciple.

Personality

He has an unconditional trust in his
Master
 and an extremely outstanding willpower.

Background

Among
Gu Feiyang
 disciples he has the worst talent, at most it can be considered mediocre. But due to his strong willpower and hard work he manages to reach the 3 Star Martial Sovereign Realm upon reuniting with
Li Yunxiao
. From this point onwards he mostly cultivates in the World God Monument and helps his
Master
 in fighting enemys.

History

As a child, he passed through the
Mo Family
 forbidden territory. As a trial to become Gu Feiyang disciple, he underwent a torturous and incomparably agonizing process of pain at the hands of his Ancestor spirit, becoming the scabbard of the Demon-Slaying Sword, a Martial Technique with such strong spiritual force that it is considered a Ninth-Grade Xuan Artifact.

After leaving his
Master
, Mo Xiaochuan returned to the
Mo Family
 in Black Iron City, where the
Ancestral Elder
 passed down
the Thousand Cricket Vast Art
 to him. They warned him not to seek revenge until he had fully mastered it. He trained in seclusion for ten years in the forbidden area, persistently requesting to learn the
Thousand Feet Noble Art
, which the ancestral patriarch finally agreed to teach him.

His peaceful cultivation was disrupted when he learned that his sworn brother,
Mo Huayuan
, had been exiled to South Fire City after offending an expert from the
Holy Region
. Defying the elders' wishes, Mo Xiaochuan left seclusion to protect him. During a fierce battle, he killed three Martial Sovereigns but was severely injured and poisoned by the Northern Underworld Cold Yin Qi, a deadly force injected into him by a hidden expert from
Beiming Dark Palace
. Hua Yuan tried to suppress the poison with medicine, but it only delayed its effects.

Four years ago, Hua Yuan sought rare herbs from the Thunderwind Chamber of Commerce, unintentionally exposing Mo Xiaochuan’s condition. He was handed over to
Ying Lin
, who took him into the Maze in hopes of using him to locate a hidden mine. There, Mo Xiaochuan followed an ancient aura to the Suanni’s Soul Altar, where he encountered a mysterious statue. As he struggled against its corrupting energy, an evil spirit invaded his mind, forcing him into servitude.

Ironically, the Northern Underworld Cold Yin Qi inside him helped resist the spirit’s control, allowing brief moments of clarity. However, as the Yin Qi weakened, his consciousness faded more frequently. Now, with the Yin Qi finally expelled, the evil spirit had been fully suppressed, and he was free at last.

Plot

Southern Fire Crystal Gold Mine

Yunxiao encountered Mo Xiaochuan in the Southern Fire Crystal Gold Mine, where his body had been deeply poisoned, causing him to lose his sanity. However, despite being possessed by a fire-elemental evil spirit from the mine, he had not completely lost his mind evidenced by his ability to use the Floating Life Seal.
Yunxiao and his companions attempted to suppress the possessed Mo Xiaochuan, but they could only wound him, forcing him to flee. Determined, Yunxiao pursued him and engaged in battle once more.
With the aid of the Water of the Hundred Rivers, Yunxiao managed to restrain Mo Xiaochuan and pulled him into the Divine Realm Tablet. With the assistance of the Demonic Dragon and Mo Xiaochuan’s own will, the evil spirit was sealed forcibly confined within his aperture, subdued by the power of his own body.

Trivia

He used The heavenly spirit devil-quelling sword, thousand spirit Haoran art It was the most precious treasure of the mo family in black iron City
