Mount Meru
==========

Overview

Spoilers

Mount Meru, one of the four celestial realms of the continent. Is described as an ancient
Taoist sanctum
 where powerful warriors once trained. However, it was later lost to another world and now
floats in the void
. Mount Meru follows a
specific pattern in its appearances
, resurfacing in the
southern region
 every few decades or centuries, making it a rare and mysterious location. The mountain is
rich in spiritual Qi
, hundreds of times denser than in the realm of heavenly martial arts. This makes it an
ideal place for cultivation
, where just a few months of training is equivalent to years elsewhere. For
genius disciples
, the benefits of training in Mount Meru are immeasurable, likely granting them immense power and rapid progress in martial arts.

After the clash between
Di Jia
 and the Martial Sovereign
Lu Daozi
 that descending and take over
Xu Qing
 body, the space of Mount Meru, which had opened above Martial Flame City, collapsed and merged with the city. As a result, Martial Flame City became rich in spiritual Qi, reaching a level comparable to the other major powers in Tianwu.

Sumero Mountain

is one of the Heavenly Martial Continents secret realms

is the only secret realm with an age restriction (entry for Cultivators below 50 years old)

is originally used to suppress the devil essence which turned into
Di Jia

Mount Meru/Spoilers
===================

SPOILER ALERT!

Overview

Spoilers

History (Ch. 287 - 321)

Upon the opening of the Sumeru Mountain Secret Realm above
Martial Flame City
, Yunxiao took control of the arrays, laid out by the experts, which were originally intended to only let people in who obtained or purchased the
quota crystal
.

In order to enter one had to pay a fee to Li Yunxiao to get entry into the secret Realm. After entering the Secret Realm he let
Luo Yunshang
 out of the
Divine Realm Tablet
 and left it behind to absorb the dense spirit qi. Shortly after Yunxiao caught a "
little green demon
" and gave it Luo Yunshang and taught her how to control it (its strong point is high agility).

Shortly after they discover people fighting a
Stone Beast
. While fighting it, the Stone Beast advances from the Martial Grandmaster to the Martial Emperor Realm. Because of that the people decide to run away. While escaping Yunxiao and the others come across a bunch of people who fight for a seven constellation
Dao Fruit
.  Luo Yunshang manages to snatch it with the help of the
little green demon
.

Before people can get agitated about it, the Stone Beast manages to catch up. Sitting in the same boat the people join forces to take it down. After destroying the Stone Beasts physical body its "heart" remains, which allows it to recover its body again. Before that happens Yunxiao manages to subdue it.

After that Wang Qiang, whom Yunxiao saved from the little green demon previously, takes Luo Yunshang hostage in an attempt to get the Dao Fruit. However before Yunxiao can make a move a passage opens and swallows all people present. Yunxiao enters it as well and finds himself in a passage. Wandering in the passage he finds
tadpole-like characters
 on the walls similar to those of his
great expansion divine technique
 and great realm divine technique. He manages to activate those characters which opens up another passage.

Following the passage his Qi greatly increases and he breaks through several stars, furthermore some
mysterious energy
 accumulates in his dantian. At the end of the passageway he finds a jade platform with a
golden sword
 on it. After taking it he arrives inside the so-called Xumi Divine Palace, which gives massive benefits according to legends. Meanwhile the other people who got swallowed by the passage, but didn't activate the characters, arrive outside the Xumi Divine Palace where many other people are also gathered. There Ding Ling'er is also in the crowd and manages to free the hostage taken Luo Yunshang from Wang Qiang.

Ding Ling'er gets into a quarrel with Tang Yuan who tries to pursue her, but Qian Wudi interferes. After that they discover Yunxiao coming out of the Divine Palace, only a barrier separating the two parties. Yunxiao brings the people to humilate Tang Yuang in exchange for opening up the barrier.

After entering the Palace they arrive in a hall. In order to go deeper inside they have to open a sealed stone door. Managing to solve some arrays the door opens up, however without bypassing the dragon pressure one cannot enter. Yunxiao, who obtained
Luo Qingyun
's blood (in previous arcs) can enter together with Ding Ling'er and Luo Yunshang without problems since the blood contains a trace of the dragons bloodline. Arriving in a hall the three meet a
Demon Dragon
 Soul who turns out to be Gu Feiyang's sword spirit.
At that moment Luo Yunshang and Ding Ling'er also learn of Yunxiao's real identity
.

The demon dragon having a grudge with Yunxiao tries to kill the latter. Yunxiao and the two women flee out of the hall, the people still being outside follow up and flee together with Yunxiao. After a short time the Demon Dragon manages to catch up. Yunxiao and the others, forced to fight him, suppress the Dragon Soul and try to capture it. Getting beaten up, the Dragon flees back to the Palace and hides.

Yunxiao who chased the Demon Dragon back to the Palace manages to convice the latter to once again become his sword spirit. Yunxiao learns that the Xumi Divine Palace, he previously was in, only is a "reflection" of the original one. The entrance to the real Palace is at the bottom of the sea of qi nearby. To open the gates to the real palace he uses the
golden sword
, which he previously obtained in the passageway as a key.

Before entering five people appear, who turn out to be disciples from the
seven major forces
.

Yu

Mu Bairong
==========

Plot

Mu Bai Rong was deeply skeptical of Li Yunxiao, believing he had deceived the sect master and elders into overestimating his strength. Furious at the decision to let Yunxiao represent the Mu family in a martial arts competition, he attacked him despite Yunxiao being exhausted from refining a weapon. However, as the fight dragged on, it became clear that Yunxiao was only defending himself while Mu Bai Rong failed to gain the upper hand. Humiliated and enraged, Mu Bai Rong decided to kill Yunxiao to restore his dignity. In a fit of desperation, he unleashed his most powerful and secret technique—Thousand Utility Seal—a move he would normally reserve for life-or-death situations. But at this moment, he had lost all reason, consumed by pride and anger.

Mu Chen
=======

Mu Chen was one of the greatest puppeteers in the history of the Mu family, earning the title "Venerable Puppet Master." He was an extraordinary figure from tens of thousands of years ago, and every disciple of the Mu family knew of his legendary achievements. His knowledge and innovations in puppetry were far beyond his time, and his theories hinted at groundbreaking advancements.

History

One of his most ambitious ideas, recorded in a jade slip, was the concept of developing puppets into an independent race, granting them intelligence equal to that of humans.
Mu Chen was also responsible for crafting the Royal Chariot, which he believed was the pinnacle of puppet craftsmanship, representing a qualitative leap in puppet evolution.
Among his many achievements, he also created the Twelve Dingjia Puppets, each of which was a ninth-rank puppet equipped with unique divine abilities. These puppets were an integral part of the Six Ding Six Jia Formation, which had the potential to set up the legendary Twelve Divine Beings Killing Formation, one of the three great ancient ominous formations.
Despite his remarkable contributions, the Mu family’s renowned Three Great Puppetry Techniques—Transforming Beans into Soldiers, Six Ding Six Jia, and the mysterious number one technique—did not entirely reflect Mu Chen’s ideology. There was speculation that his Royal Chariot(Yu Tianyi]] might have been connected to this unknown first-ranked technique, but no clear records confirmed it.

Mu Family
=========

General Information

One of the
Hidden Families
, Allied to the "
Heaven Alliance
" faction, it specializes in creating and controlling puppets. They live  on Heavenspan Island (Tongtian Island), a massive and meticulously crafted man-made island located deep in the ocean. it is a large puppet and one of the proud creations of the Mu Family.

Background

Mu Family a lot of inherited knowledge and wisdom were buried in history, but these great families with a history of tens of thousands of years had inherited a lot.

Mu Family Secret Technique

The Mu family’s Three Great Puppet Arts comparable to divine skills :

Casting Beans into Soldiers
 (Ranked Third), This technique allows the user to transform small objects (such as beans) into powerful puppet soldiers that can fight in battle. Elder Mu Yijun is highly skilled in this art, as his talent is well-suited for it. Though it is ranked third among the Mu family’s puppet arts, it is still considered a divine skill.

Six Ding Six Jia (Ranked Second),
 This technique involves controlling twelve powerful puppets to form the Twelve Divine Beings Killing Formation. It is inspired by one of the Three Ancient Fearsome Formations, the Twelve Capital Heaven Divine Wraith Formation, a formation with terrifying destructive power. Despite its incredible strength, it is extremely difficult to master.

The Mu Clan’s Greatest Puppet Art (Ranked First), This technique is the Mu family’s ultimate secret, passed down only to the clan leaders of each generation.

Structure

Old Ancestors

Mu Chen

(Dead, all traces of him were lost in the
world
 and what happened was he went to the
Demon Realm
 and lived there for a long time and died. He was a prodigy in the art of Alchemy and Puppetry. He is like a God to the Mu Family, most of the inherited techniques were created by him.)

Mu Xing

(He lives and is the Guardian of one of the Pavilions of the
Eternal World
, he is the younger brother of Mu Chen.)

Mu Wanshan

(Mu Hong's granddaughter, the most prestigious Young Maiden of the family)

Location

Spring Court moon, has the layout of this scenery is ingenious scenery of the Four Seasons: spring flowers, Autumn Moon, summer, and winter snow. only the most important guests of the MU family can live here.

Family Puppet

The mobile mechanical puppet, The Mu Family’s Mobile Machine is a highly advanced mechanical puppet designed for large-scale mobility and teleportation. It represents the pinnacle of the Mu family's puppetry technology and demonstrates their mastery in combining formation arrays with mechanical constructs.

The puppet is large enough to be used as a movable fortress, capable of expanding and extending mechanical limbs at will. Unlike traditional teleportation formations, which are fixed to the ground, this mobile puppet has a teleportation array inscribed on its body. It can locate and access hidden spatial tunnels, allowing it to teleport directly to different locations without the need for external teleportation gates.

Mu Fenghua
==========

Mu Fenghua is a proud genius of the Mu family, someone who once saw himself as standing at the pinnacle of his generation.

Appearance

the men had an extraordinary appearance.

Plot

When he first met Li Yunxiao in Red Moon City, he recognized Yunxiao’s exceptional talent but believed he had an even chance of defeating him. However, for someone as proud as Mu Fenghua, a mere 50-50 chance was unacceptable—it was a humiliation.

After returning to the Mu family, he threw himself into brutal, self-imposed cultivation, determined to crush Li Yunxiao effortlessly the next time they crossed paths. He believed that through this rigorous training, he had elevated himself to the point where he would have a 90% chance of victory in their inevitable rematch.

However, upon witnessing Li Yunxiao effortlessly overpower
Mu Bairong
 one of the formidable Mu family elders—Mu Fenghua’s confidence shattered. He realized that all his suffering and training had been in vain because his current chances of defeating Li Yunxiao were zero.

Mu Jie
======

Mu Jie, the elder of the Mu family. Thad had a friendship with li Yunziao in the Xuanwu Star Palace in Liangjie Mountain. Li Yunxiao's magical power and spiritual eyes were taught by him.

Plot

Mu Jie extended an offer to Yunxiao, inviting him to join the Mu Clan and represent them in the upcoming martial arts competition. In return, he promised to personally craft a pair of false eyes for Yunxiao, allowing him to cultivate the Wondrous Spiritual Eyes. Additionally, Mu Jie offered Yunxiao the chance to learn the Mu Clan’s exclusive divine arts—techniques MU clan’s puppet reserved only for their direct descendants. However, there was a condition: Yunxiao would have to marry into the Mu family.

During a chase at
Wuqing Sect
 that led Li Yunxiao across the North Sea, he finally caught up with the culprit only to find that the culprit was Mu Jie himself. Mu Jie come to
Wuqing Sect
 and killed the their Sect Master and stole the Wuqing Bell.

Martial arts competitions

After leaving the
Snow Country
, Mu Jie once again extended an offer to Li Yunxiao, inviting him to represent the Mu family in the upcoming martial arts contest against other hidden families. As an incentive, the Mu family promised to reward Li Yunxiao handsomely with the legendary True Dragon Sword.

Power

The Wondrous Spiritual Eyes are a divine ability cultivated by God Realm experts, beyond the reach of Nine Heavens Martial Sovereigns. He once failed the first trial, losing his sight to metal spiritual energy. However, he later replaced his eyes with artificial ones and, through perseverance, achieved success. Now, his artificial eyes function just like real ones,

MU clan’s puppet techniques divine arts.

Mu Wanshan
==========

Mu Wan Shan is the most exceptional woman of the Mu family’s younger generation, possessing both unparalleled talent and extraordinary beauty. Her abilities are so rare that she is considered a once-in-a-thousand-years genius within the family.

Appearance

Plot

Mu Wanshan attacked Yunxiao out of rage and misunderstanding. The Mu family had arranged her marriage to him without her consent, leaving her feeling helpless and betrayed. Even her trusted grandfather had agreed, and none of the young disciples who once admired her opposed the decision, making her feel utterly abandoned. Blaming Yunxiao, she tried to kill him, but her attacks were effortlessly deflected. His calm demeanor only frustrated her more. After being easily overpowered, she fell into despair and attempted to take her own life, only to be stopped by Yunxiao, who urged her to seek the true cause of her troubles instead of acting recklessly.

Mu Wenchang
===========

Mu Wenchang, a member of the
Mu Family
, was one of the  experts who arrived alongside
Mu Jie
,
Mu Yurong
, and
Mu Yitong
 to pursue Yunxiao for the
Merciless Bell
.

Plot

Initially dismissing Yunxiao as unworthy, he was shocked to learn he had reached the peak of the nine-star Martial Sovereign realm. However, upon hearing that Yunxiao possessed a great treasure, greed clouded his judgment, and he immediately sought to claim it.

Wielding a massive black saber forged from one of the heaviest materials in the world
Black-moon blade
, Mu Wenchang attacked without hesitation, believing Yunxiao would be unable to withstand its weight and force. To his shock, Yunxiao effortlessly caught the weapon using his divine ability, manifesting three heads and six arms. Overconfidence turned to desperation as he failed to overpower Yunxiao. When faced with a lethal counterattack, he was forced to abandon his prized saber and retreat in humiliation, as Yunxiao mockingly seized the weapon and dismissed it as worthless scrap.

After
Lord Pu
 appeared and slew many experts of the
Corpse Fiend Sect
 and their corpse puppets with a single sword strike, those who witnessed it were left in shock and disbelief. Seizing the chaos, Mu Wenchang and the others attempted to escape. However, despite his valiant efforts, Mu Wenchang was ultimately caught by
Jing Qi
 and poisoned with the Five Great Extinction Poisons. The deadly toxins ravaged his body, sealing his fate. Unable to resist, he succumbed, his life fading away as he ensured his allies had a chance to survive.

Mu Xing
=======

One of the most talented ancestors of the
Mu Family
, creator of the Six Ding and Six Jia. He is the creator of the Heavy Equipment Tower and the Artifacts contained within it, one of the greatest experts in the
Eternal World
.

Personality

Just like others Family member, the MU family’s arrogance had been around since ancient times.

Background

Mu Xing was a master puppet and weapon craftsman from ancient times, renowned for his exceptional skills in artifact refinement. He played a key role in creating the Heavy Equipment Tower, a powerful structure filled with mystical weapons and puppets in
Heaven of Langya
. Tens of thousands of years ago, he entered seclusion in the Eternal World and was entrusted by Gu Qingqing to guard the final seal of the Equipment Tower.

Plot

Heaven of Langya

Mu Xing attempts to block
Gu Qingqing
 and Yunxiao with his companion to break the final seal that would open the Eternal World. As the confrontation unfolds, Mu Xing's true abilities come to light. He is revealed to be the creator of the Heavy Equipment Tower, a structure filled with powerful artifacts and puppets. However, his arrogance and unwillingness to cooperate lead to a fierce battle against Yunxiao and his allies.

Despite his formidable puppet body, Mu Xing is ultimately overpowered, especially when Yunxiao threatens to refine him using The Xin Guili Flame and the Cauldron of Mountain and River.

Realizing his disadvantage, Mu Xing finally surrenders and reluctantly agrees to assist them in opening the Eternal World's seal.

later Yunxiao asking knowledge about powerful puppet techniques
Six Ding and Six Jia puppets
. Mu Xing, despite his pride and skill, admits that his formation was left incomplete due to its extreme difficulty. However, Yunxiao surprises him by revealing that he possesses the
Six Ding and Six Jia puppets
, which are deeply connected to the formation.

Upon examining the puppets, Mu Xing is
shocked
 to discover that someone has
already completed
 the heart-refinement technique of the
Six Ding and Six Jia
, meaning that his life's work had been finished by another.
Mu Chen
, his rival. This realization leaves him deeply frustrated and disheartened. However, Yunxiao reassures him, pointing out that Mu Xing has
outlived Mu Chen
 and still has a chance to
improve upon his creation
.

Regaining his confidence, Mu Xing decides to pass down all of his
formation knowledge
 to Yunxiao, ensuring that his legacy continues. He teaches Yunxiao the
secrets of the Twelve Divine Beings Killing Formation
, setting the stage for Yunxiao to
unlock its true power
 and potentially
surpass
 all previous puppet masters.

Power

the Six Ding and Six Jia, which has been shown to be powerful enough to kill experts, who reached the pinnacle of the
Void Prime Realm
.

Trivia

the person who refined the twelve divine beings killing formation into a heart refined puppet.

The capital Heaven divine Wraith formation was created by mu Xing.

Mu Yijun
========

Mu Yujin was one of the Mu family elder involved in a mission to rescue Guang Yuan in the East Sea, during which Li Yunxiao was not even a high-level Martial Supreme. However, within just two years, Yunxiao’s strength had grown to a level that even Mu Yijun found terrifying.

Background

Mu Yijun were one of the strongest among the elders in terms of reputation and strength he is highly respected elder of the Mu family, known for his expertise in Casting Beans into Soldiers, one of the family's Three Great Puppet Arts. He has a calm and analytical personality, recognizing talent and growth in others.

Mu Yitong
=========

Mu Yitong, one of the four elders sent by
Mu Zhuang
 to assist
Mu Jie
, in capturing Li Yunxiao and reclaiming the Merciless Bell of the
Wuqing Sect
.

Plot

When Yunxiao unleashed the Divine Realm Tablet’s golden chains, Mu Yitong and his allies found themselves bound, unable to break free immediately. As tension mounted, Mu Yitong summoned the
Mountain-Splitting Heavenly Ding
, a massive puppet known for its ability to shift stars and overturn seas. Confident in its might, he commanded it to intercept Yunxiao’s
Tusita Heavenly Peak
, expecting it to counter the attack. However, to his horror, the puppet struggled under the mountain's pressure, its structure collapsing inch by inch.

Despite his best efforts, including reinforcing the puppet with formations, Yunxiao’s devastating lightning-infused hammer strike shattered the
Mountain-Splitting Heavenly Ding
, reducing it to fragments. Realizing the growing danger, Mu Yitong and the others broke free from the golden chains and retreated just as Yunxiao’s mountain struck the sea, causing a cataclysmic upheaval. After regrouping in the rain,  Mu Yitong and the others faced with the reality that capturing Yunxiao would be far more difficult than they had ever imagined.

Power

Kaishan Tianding was the pure power puppet with the strongest structure and the strongest power among all the puppets of the Mu family. It was almost close to the perfect physical body. The mountain splitter is the MU family’s most powerful strength-type puppet. It can easily overturn rivers and seas, shift stars, and even an immortal state warrior would find it hard to destroy it.

Mu Yurong
=========

Appearance

A man in grey robe.

Plot

As chaos erupted following the death of the
Gluttonous Snake
, which caused a black hole, the Sect Master of the Corpse Fiend Sect,
Jing Qi
, arrived with his elite corpse puppets and the rest of the sect’s members. A fierce battle between the two factions immediately broke out.
Amidst the conflict, Mu Yurong, poisoned by the Five Great Extinction Poisons, knew his fate was sealed. Determined to take Jing Qi down with him, he attempted to self-destruct in a final act of defiance. However, Jing Qi easily countered his efforts, using his corpse-controlling techniques to suppress the explosion. Helpless, Mu Yurong’s body stiffened as his energy drained away, and he was gradually transformed into a lifeless corpse puppet.

Mu Zheng
========

Redirect to:
Mu Jie

Mu Zhuang
=========

The leader of the Hidden Mu Family, he is an understanding man who does not judge others quickly based on what they show on the surface. He proves to be a wise expert and a sovereign authority.

Appearance

A man in a black and gold brocade robe, looked like he was only forty years old, but he exuded an air of authority without being angry. The aura of a person who had been in a position of power for a long time was endless. His gaze was extremely penetrating, almost as if it could see through people inside and out.

Murong Pingping
===============

Appearance

An old man with an immortal look was wearing a brocade robe, which was embroidered with white plum blossoms with silver threads. They looked like frost and snow, and matched the old man's silver hair and beard perfectly.

Murong Zhu
==========

The greatest genius of the
Murong Hidden Family
 in thousands of years, and the key to unlocking their ancestral bloodline. However, this very role stripped him of control over his own fate, ultimately leading to the tragedy that befell him.

History

He traveled across the
Continent
 and met
Jiang Churan
,
Ning Keyue
, and
Gu Feiyang
 at Purple Cloud Peak. He became a couple with Ning Keyue, and befriended Jiang Churan and Gu Feiyang. During the opening of the
Heaven and Earth
 Mystic Realm, Gu Feiyang acquired the Moon Pupil and became the target of Tian Si, who attacked Gu Feiyang, but in a moment of desperation, Murong Zhu stepped in front of the attack and gave Gu Feiyang an opening to escape and survive.

Plot

Murong Zhu's body was completely under Yue Tong's control after being possessed by the Moon Eye. Under Yue Tong’s influence, Murong Zhu had slaughtered many people from the Sacred Zone, making it inevitable for them to be surrounded.

Myriad Stars Valley
===================

General Information

One of the
7 major forces
. Located in
Western Region
.

Structure

Sect Master

Tian Xingzi

Young Master

Su Ping

Elders

Yu Zang

Yu Xiu

"General"

(puppet master with 7 puppets)

Che Xuyao

(Martial Sovereign)

Feng Yi

(Martial Sovereign)

Disciples

Lin Mu

Plot

When news of the giant deer, appearing in
Battle Soul Mountain
 spread, Myriad Stars Valley, under Tian Xingzi’s authority, mobilized all its forces to secure the mountain. Despite Battle Soul Mountain being located within the Soul Devouring Sect’s territory, Myriad Stars Valley issued a strict order—no one was allowed near the mountain. They even hired powerful experts to ensure its control. Only later did Tian Xingzi reveal his true purpose. To take the divine purple gold worm, but his ambitions didn’t stop there. His ultimate goal was to subdue the giant deer and make it the guardian beast of Myriad Stars Valley.

Mysterious energy
=================

Spirit Qi

used by experts of the
Ten Directions Divine Realm
.

Mystic Realms
=============

other translation: Wonderlands

The Heavenly Martial Realm is home to five great Mystic Realms, each holding profound secrets and immense power.These Mystic Realms are not always accessible; they open only at specific times. Due to their rarity and the strict conditions for entry, most people go their entire lives without ever stepping foot inside one.

Known Five Mystic Realm

Known Mystic Realms by most Cultivators.

Sumeru Mountain / Mount Meru

(Southern Region)

appears in Southern Region, last appearance above
Yanwu City

Earth and Heaven / Mystical Faerie Realm

(Eastern Region)

appears Eastern Region, in
Crimson Crescent City

Gu Feiyang
 obtained
Moon Pupils
 from there

Smoke and Cloud Ancient Shine

(Western Region)

Heaven of Langya

(Northern Region)

Location: Holy Region

Only few people know about its name and location. that there is a celestial capital above the holy city of lanxue.

Spiritual Flower Wonderland

(Holy Region)

References

Nanfeng Xuan
============

Appearance

A petite woman.

Personality

Nanfeng Xuan is a lively and carefree woman with a playful personality. She often speaks in a lighthearted and humorous manner, even in serious situations. Talking about age was her bottom line.

Background

As the head of the Holy region’s Law Enforcement Division, Nanfeng Xuan’s strength was publicly acknowledged to be the strongest. She was also basically the candidate for the next Governor. Although she usually looked like a little girl, this old woman was already a hundred years old.

Plot

Nanfeng Xuan arrived in
Crimson City
 alongside
Hei Yuhu
 and other
Holy Region higher-ups
 to investigate the strange phenomenon that had appeared. During the investigation, she encountered
Qiu Mujie
 and engaged him in battle, suffering
serious injuries
 in the fight.

Later,
Gongyang Zhengqi'
 entrusted
Nanfeng Xuan
 with the task of
investigating Yuan Gaohan’s whereabouts
 and uncovering the truth behind
Shangchen’s death
.

Nangong Buhai
=============

Nangong Buhai is known as the world’s number one illusionist.

Nanhuo City
===========

Southfire city was quite large. Although it was not as outrageous as the light song woodland, it was still much larger than the upper Sun City of firecrow Empire. the city is somewhat special from other places, because it is located near the Lihuo Golden Crystal Mine, so a large number of martial artists gather here to mine all year round. These martial artists do not belong to any forces, and they are caught between the local forces and the strength of the Chamber of Commerce to survive, so they often form teams and keep each other warm.

Nanqiu Yu
=========

Leader of the
Natural Moat Order
 Occult Sect, Nanquiu is one of the greatest experts in the World and one of the only Prime Voids in the current Era.

Appearance

an old man in a brocade robe, He had a kind face. His eyes were slightly sunken, and his face seemed to have experienced the vicissitudes of life.

Plot

Nanqiu Yu suddenly appeared with
Lu Jianbo
 and saved Huangfu Bi at a critical moment during his battle with Li Yunxiao. His reason for saving Huangfu Bi was not just out of loyalty but also for the opening of the Eternal World in Langya Grotto-Heaven.
Huangfu Bi
’s rare mastery of the soul path and the guidance of the ancient Golden Whisperer made him crucial for breaking the realm’s barriers. Nanqiu Yu knew that without him, their chances of unlocking the Eternal World’s secrets would diminish. Another reason was to prevent
Myriad Star Valley
 and the
Devouring Soul Sect
 from further slaughtering each other.

Narcissus is the daughter of the ocean Emperor, the princess of the four Seas.

Appearance

The woman was in a white dress elegant and refined. Her skin was as white as snow, She had eyebrows like emerald feathers, waist-length hair, and she exuded a rare aura of purity. Her facial features were exquisite and soul-stirring. Her red eyes were like water, but they carried a faint coldness.

Personality

Narcissus is a very naive and simple-minded girl and the daughter of the
Ocean Emperor
, the ruler of the
Four Seas
. Her naivety often brings her and the people around her in trouble.

Power

the royal families of the four Seas once had a contract with the ancestors of the deep-sea Giant beasts. They were willing to listen to the royal family’s orders in times of crisis. Can summoning many deep-sea monsters at once.

The Lotus Platform is a supreme-grade profound weapon, possessing a trace of the Eye of Heaven’s power. It can only be fully wielded by its true owner. When activated with the Heavenly Dao Divine Art, it triggered the Chains of Law, causing a heavenly instrument phenomenon. This immense power drew countless experts to Red Moon City, all seeking to uncover its secrets.

Plot

Natural Moat Order
==================

It is a reclusive organization with unknown goals. Led by
Nanqiu Yu
, this organization is the administrator of the entrance to the
Heaven of Langya
 Mystic Realm.

The Sect is divided into two layers, the inner and outer, only the disciples and inner members have concrete information about the Sect's objectives. The Sect's main territory is the Heavenly Palace, they possess great inheritances and are ranked as the leading Sect of the
Hidden Families
, and not even the
Ao Family
 can oppose his authority.

It is made clear during the battle with Yuan that the Natural Moat Ocean possesses two Void Prime Realm experts, Nanquiu Yu and the Supreme Elder
. Standing out as a force on the level of the
Holy Region
, It can be considered a power above the
Four Seas
 in union with the Ocean Emperor Palace and the
Sea of Soul Formation
.

Natural Water
=============

The Water Element Mutant raw material closest to the Origin of Water. There are two types of Mutant Water Elements shown that have reached such a parameter, the True Dragon Tear given to
Li Yunxiao
 in the True Dragon Pool and Primordial Water of Hundred Rivers which he absorbed in the Black Lake.

The True Dragon Tear was normally used to activate the Thousand Autumn Saber, which reacted to the Elements due to the will of its former wielder.

New Yan city
============

New Yan city was the recently established headquarters of the merchant Union. It was connected to all directions, and there were only a few more teleportation formations than in the Holy region, which could lead to any place on the continent.

Trivia

Most people went to new Yan city to change routes or to deliberately wander around so that people could not figure out their true itinerary.

Nine Abyss
==========

Jin Yuan is the World King of the Hundred Tribulations Realm who chose not to participate in the Demon Sealing War a hundred thousand years ago. He seeks longevity and freedom, trying to reach the Realm of the Lord of the Thousand Worlds.

Background

The Lord of the Ocean Abyss, named Nine Abyss, is a 100,000+ year old expert in the
World King Realm
 who commands the depths of the Sea. Jiu Yuan (Nine Abyss) is the leader of the Abyssal Ocean Creature Race, the first Race of the
Heavenly Martial Realm
 and one of the most powerful.

He first appears in the battle at the
Sea Forest
 and saves
Yin Yu
. He is peaceful and tries not to get into conflict with absolutely anyone, he doesn't care about almost anything and will just act when the world is on the verge of collapse.

He later appears in the
Southern Sea
, explaining some things to Li Yunxiao and his companions and driving away Yuan who became the first
Demon Empress
 in 100,000 years after
Zhuo Kun
 death. He tells of the existence of the Monster Race's Ancestral “Mother”, the
Six Wings
, as a Lord of the Thousand Worlds who injured Yin Yu in the past and caused his Cultivation to decline, After the battle, the Land of Ten Thousand Spirits was separated from the Heavenly Martial Realm and became a separate space, Jiu Yuan also explains the existence of the Realm Wells and leads Li Yunxiao and the others even
Qiu
 and the
Crocodile
.

Jin Yuan says that he had practiced Cultivation in the Realm Well and greatly absorbed the understanding of the Super Mysterious Space. In search of transcending to the Realm of the Lord of a Thousand Worlds.

After this, Jin Yuan agrees to participate in the battle against Six Wings alongside the
Heavenly Martial Alliance
. And during the final battle, Jin Yuan falls into a coma, after being caught in the Six Wings Stellar Jade Explosion attack.

Nine Dragons Soul Absorption Array
==================================

Description

The nine Dragons Soul Absorption Array can collect soul power from all directions and pour it in to
Martial Flame City
. But There aren't Any soul Mountains or treasures trove near Martial Flame city. The Qiyun Mountain range is the only place with soul Power Nearby So, Li Yunxiao modified the array slightly so that it will absorb soul power from the Qiyun Mountain Range with its full force when Activated.

Known User

Li Yunxiao

Nine Yin Nine Yang Pill
=======================

Nine Yin Nine Yang Pill
 Breaking Crisis Pill, a legendary pill rumored to grant godhood upon consumption.

Plot

Li Yunxiao found himself in an unexpected situation. As the alchemy process continued, he realized that the
Nine Yin Nine Yang Pill
 refining process was not just draining the power of those involved but also serving as a means for
Ding Shan to absorb everyone's energy
 to strengthen himself. However, unlike the others, Yunxiao, with his powerful
One Qi of Fortune technique
,
instinctively began absorbing the Yin-Yang energy as well
, countering
Ding Shan
 scheme.
Wan Yuan

collapses first
, his body completely drained, exposing that something is seriously wrong.Others, including
Zhu Qishui
,
Xu Wansen,
 Jing Tian, and Jing Yuan
, realize that their energy is being stolen and
panic as they cannot break free from the formation
.
Ding Shan refuses to stop
, focusing on absorbing the energy, but
he is enraged when he realizes Yunxiao is doing the same
.Yunxiao plays it cool,
mocking Ding Shan
, pretending to just be following his lead.
Jing Shaoyi

and other high-ranking figures panic
, realizing that Ding Shan is betraying them all for his own power.
Luo Gaoyuan’s
Twelve Swords of Lingyun
 subordinates beg him for help
, but everyone is trapped,
unable to escape from the formation’s grip
.

At this moment, Yunxiao is
one of the only people benefiting from this dangerous process
, turning the situation in his favor while Ding Shan struggles to maintain control. The once-secret scheme is now exposed, and
everyone in the hall realizes they are just fuel for Ding Shan’s ambition trying to break through to Divine Transcendence and to dominate the Merchant Union and expand his influence globally. By manipulating and absorbing the power of others, he systematically took control of four major Chambers of Commerce—Tianyuan, Leifeng, Mando, and Tianyi—weakening his rivals like
Wan Yiqian
. The tension rises as the battle for energy absorption continues, with Yunxiao and Ding Shan as the only two still standing strong. Ding Shan made the fatal mistake of underestimating Yunxiao's strength and intelligence. that lead his Failed Full Extraction, because Yunxiao and another expert were not completely drained, the process was not as effective as it could have been.

Trivia

Because Yunxiao's interference,the five pills only have the power of seven Yin and seven yang, and their effects are one-tenth of the real nine Yin and nine yang.

Ning Family
===========

In the Eastern Region, there was only one red Moon City, which was composed of many complicated forces. Among them, the most powerful were the ning family.

Ning Hangfeng
=============

Ning hangfeng, the former commander of the Imperial Army of the Redmoon city, a four-star Martial Emperor.

Ning Kewei
==========

The former City Lord of Crimson Crescent City. Disappeared in the past for unknown reasons.

Appearance

A old man in black robe with muddy eyes, he had a head full of silver hair and his face was full of chiseled marks left by time.

Personality

Ning Kewei was a cautious and strategic individual, always mindful of his position in the grand scheme of power.

Plot

Allowing
Tang Qing
 to take control of Crimson Moon City was only a temporary measure, as he had
Wei Qing
 support. The original plan was to wait for the right moment to restore Chu Ran’s leadership. However,
Jiang Churan
 death left him frustrated, forcing him to seek a new, suitable successor. He eventually set his sights on
Ning Keyue
 who was last seen with the
Murong Zhu
, and entrusted
Ning Keyun
 with finding her

Ning Kewei and Wei Qing engaged in a life-or-death battle, with neither holding back. In a desperate final move, Ning Kewei unleashed the One Qi into Three Pure Ones and Three Pure Ones Return to Origin techniques—sacrificing his own life in an attempt to take Wei Qing down with him.
Though the plan ultimately failed, the sheer power of Ning Kewei’s attack pushed Wei Qing to the brink of death. His body was drenched in blood, his once-imposing Golden Dragon scales completely shattered. His face was pale, and even as he stood on the battleship, his body trembled uncontrollably, barely able to remain upright.

Technique

Universal great teleportation formation is peerless formation hidden in Red Moon City did ning kewei use to teleport all martial expert out of red moon city he wilderness of the Eastern Region.

Zhan Ge (dagger-axe).

Trivia

Ning Kewei's disappearance decades ago was due to the Aegirine entering his body. The mysterious power of the stone forced him into hiding.

Ning Keyue
==========

She is one of the daughters of the former Lord of the
Crimson Crescent
 of
Ning Kewei
 City. She is the most talented expert in Crimson Crescent City in the past two generations of City Lord post, being a
Divine Transcendence
 expert at a particularly young age.

Appearance

The woman was wearing a light yellow long skirt embroidered with blue sea and cloud patterns.

Plot

She became engaged to
Murong Zhu
, a young expert from Purple Cloud Peak, who was killed after the opening of the
Heaven and Earth
 Mystic Realm. This event caused overwhelming desolation and depression for Ning Keyue, who significantly distanced herself from the affairs of Crimson Crescent City and only maintained an open relationship with his disciple
Jiang Ruobing
, daughter of
Jiang Churan
, the City Lord of Crimson Crescent City.

After
Li Yunxiao
 arrived at Crimson Crescent City, he arrived at the cherry blossom garden where Ning Keyue lived, After a little discussion and conversation between the two, Ning Keyue discovers that Li Yunxiao has a relationship with
Gu Feiyang
, and becomes particularly close to him.

After the events of the competition for Jiang Ruobing hand, Ning Keyue helps Li Yunxiao recover with her natural treasures. After the opening of the Heaven and Earth Mystic Realm, Jiang Churan passes the responsibility of taking care of the Sect to his
wife
 and Ning Keyue.

After receiving information about a situation at Purple Cloud Peak, Ning Keyue goes to the location, being dragged into a trap where she fights with
Yang Yuanshu
 who killed all the experts at the Purple Cloud Peak, After subduing Yang Yuanshu, she receives an attack from
Ling Baiyi
 who resented her for humiliating his subordinates and himself when they invaded Crimson Crescent City. But after the coup he leaves.

Thinking that everything was resolved, Ning Keyue finds himself in trouble after one of
Wei Qing
 puppets reveals itself from within the Mountain, which attacks him with Wei Qing Xuan Artifact, thinking that she would die there, Ning Keyue is saved by
Tian Si
, following him after seeing Murong Zhu figure, and later becoming a vessel for Supreme
Gui Xu
.

Ning Keyun
==========

Appearance

A woman in a Palace dress, her long hair was tied into a bun with a few scattered golden flowers. Her whole body exuded a noble aura.

Trivia

She joined Shenxiao Palace out of anger and jealousy, feeling that her father had never praised her and that she could never measure up to her sister. Wanting to escape Hongyue City and sever ties with her father, she chose to leave.

Her father had been killed by Wei Qing, and she hated the people of the Holy region to the bone.

She was born in Red Moon City.

The Northern Heaven Cold Star Sword is a Xuan Artifact refined from Northern Heaven Cold Star Iron. They are strong 9th Tier Xuan Artifacts. Originally fighting with only one sword, Yunxiao later refines more with the help of
Yuan Gaohan
. He uses the swords to form Arrays, which he learned from the
Heavenly Night Palace
.

Upon using 18 Swords Yunxiao starts using a
Sword Case
, a Xuan Artifact also refined by Yuan Gaohan, to better control the sword array and also minimize the energy consumption.

Northern Region
===============

General Information

The North Region is home to the most powerful forces in the Heavenly Martial Arts Realm, largely due to its rich spiritual energy. Unlike the remote South Region, the North is abundant with spiritual mountains and rivers, making it a highly competitive area. This concentration of power is reflected in Songyue City, the headquarters of the Merchant Union, which is also located in the North.
Four Regions
, It's the largest of the four Regions on the Tianwu Continent.

Forces

Beiming Dark Palace

Heavenly Night Palace

Heavenly Draconic Family

Blade Sect

Locations

Yufeng City

Dingtian City

Seawood Town

Golden Zhang City

Xinyan City

Notable People

Four prodigies of the North

Old Lai
=======

Old Lai
 is the
leader
 of the
Golden Edge and Silver Glow
, the elite
personal guards
 of the
Merchant Union’s president
. Unlike the other members, who are frequently assigned to various tasks, Old Lai
never leaves the president's side.

Appearance

Old man with a hunched back.

Plot

When the three
Liuming Mansion elders
—
Jing Yuan, Jing Ming, and Jing Gao
—attempt to kill
Li Yunxiao
, Old Lai recognizes the
potential disaster
 this could bring. He knows that Yunxiao is far more dangerous than they realize, and that an open fight could spiral into
chaos
, threatening the Merchant Union’s plans.

As the battle erupts, Old Lai steps in at the
critical moment
, intercepting an attack at great personal cost. Despite being injured, he immediately
shifts the conflict from violence to negotiation
, using his authority and reputation to force a temporary truce. Appealing to the elders' self-interest and reminding them of
Ding Ling’er’s absence
, he persuades them to hold back—at least for now.

One Qi Creation Technique
=========================

Allows one to breath the Qi in and out. The absorption rate of Qi is tens of times higher than other cultivators, which tremendously increases the Cultivation speed.

Origin Forces
=============

The natural forces that represent the will of a World are special properties and authorities that follow the will of Heaven and Earth. Born with the Celestial Dao of Heaven and Earth that they represent, they can elevate a Cultivator to the highest level of their World's parameters.

Heavenly Martial Realm**

{Purple Zifu Mansion Brahma World-Destroying Divine Thunder}: only Supreme Techniques of the Lightning Attribute or those who carry the Natural Thunder Body can summon Divine Thunder, It is the supreme oppressive force of the Heavenly Martial Realm, being used by
Qing Zhu
 and
Li Yunxiao
 throughout the series. It is said that the
Sky Scorpion Sect
 Thunder Transformation Technique held the ability to summon Purple Divine Thunder, standing out as the greatest Thunder Attribute Technique, in the last Hundred Thousand Years.

{Heavenly Eye}: is the vision of Heaven itself, a sliver of its essence was permeated into Amithaba, the Golden Lotus of Fa Hua, gaining the ability to suppress any entity beyond this Realm and summon the Currents of Heaven.

{Chains of Heaven}: celestial artifacts shaped by Heaven and Earth, can bind and suppress any force beyond the Laws of the Celestial Martial Realm or that does not originate from this World.

Demon Realm**

{Ice Demon Heart Flame}: a force that gathers the Yin and Yang of Heaven and Earth, capable of damaging Saint Artifacts, can be cast by Second-Grade Demon Lords, Demon Commanders or entities beyond these parameters that condensed a Body with a Raw Demon Stone from the Demon Realm.

{Emblem of Realm}: after a World is destroyed, it can be condensed by a
Lord of a Thousand Worlds
, giving shape to a Realm Emblem that carries the Laws, Rules and Forces of this fallen Realm. The Ancient Demon Realm was destroyed and condensed by the
Madman
, forming a Saint Artifact beyond the Thousand Worlds Realm.

Others
======

Redirect to:
Many

Ouyang Qi
=========

He is the Vice-Leader of the
Storm Mercenary Group
 of the
Light Song Forest
 in the
Western Region
 of the
Tianwu Continent
.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

Ouyang Qi, along side with
Chen Chuanjiu
 and
Zheng Yunfeng
, observes
Young Emperor Hao Lian
 in the Demon Plain. Recognizing Hao Lian's deep connection with nature, Chen, and his companions plan a surprise attack. Chen initiates a powerful martial technique, but Hao Lian remains unperturbed, displaying a calm demeanor. Instead of defending himself, Hao Lian approaches a Demon Snake and retrieves a half-eaten Five-Elements Spirit Devouring Rat from its mouth, showing compassion for the creatures.

In a subsequent encounter, Young Emperor Hao Lian protects the Demon Snake and Spirit Rat from harm using a green battle armor, which shatters under Chen Chuanjiu and his companions' combined attack. Believing Hao Lian to be injured or dead, they enter a passage he opens. However, Hao Lian has hidden inside a pit, and when Chen and Zheng Yunfeng enter the passage, he surprises them by reemerging, killing Ouyang Qi, and leaving a warning.

Pan Yi
======

Pan Yi was a unique existence, a spirit born from the remnants of
Xiaofeng Can,
 the former King of the Southern Region. After Xiao Fengcan’s Light Glass Body collapsed upon his death, it transformed into thousands of strange pearls, which solidified over time. These pearls contained a powerful energy and maintained a strong connection with the surrounding phenomena within the cave.

Appearance

He had unkempt hair and a dirty face.

Background

Over countless years, the power of these pearls nurtured Pan Yi into existence. Though he possessed some cultivation, he had never formally trained in martial arts. His knowledge of combat was limited to the unique techniques of the Huowu Empire, likely remnants of Xiao Fengcan’s past.

Pan Yi’s body was incredibly resilient, almost immortal, and no weaker than rare heavenly materials or earthly treasures. His lifespan was nearly infinite, making him an anomaly among living beings. However, despite his powerful physique, he lacked personal ambitions and seemed to accept his existence as something beyond normal human life and death.

Plot

After exchanging a few words about Pan Yi’s origins, Yunxiao invited him to travel together, offering him the chance to witness powerful beings and broaden his horizons. To help Pan Yi break through to the Void Light Realm. Moved by Yunxiao’s offer, Pan Yi decided to follow him. Over time, he not only became Yunxiao’s loyal companion but also learned several martial arts techniques under his guidance.

Power

His cultivation base is not as high as the previous owner of this body.

Trivia

Li Yunxiao
 is the first one to recognize pan Yi body’s previous name.

Pang Yun
========

Pang Yun, The Five Ghosts and the Golden finger, the notorious murderer who loved to kill people and slaughter cities. Pang Yun was the one that Li Yunxiao and others met when they just entered the realm of immortality. He trap Li Yunxiao and the others intended to
capture Feini
 to harness the
Celestial Phoenix Power
 within the Eternal World.

Plot

Eternal World

when he sensed
Fei Ni
, who possessed the Heavenly Phoenix Nirvana Body, in his territory, he attempted to trap Yunxiao and the others by creating a spatial distortion that redirected their path. No matter how they navigated, all compass coordinates always pointed toward his territory. However, Yunxiao, realizing someone was scheming against them, exposed the illusion using his Tusita Heavenly Peak, shattering the deceptive landscape.

To his surprise, Yunxiao and the others launched a joint attack, easily forcing him into a desperate retreat. Unable to escape, he was severely wounded and eventually suppressed. In an attempt to negotiate to spare his life, he offered Yunxiao the coordinates of the True Tail Phoenix Feather. However,
Gu Qingqing
 saw through his deception she realized that Pang Yun deliberately intended to send them to their deaths, as the coordinates pointed north, where an ancient
Monster
 resided.

Trivia

The reason he could sense Feini is that the Eternal World was created by Feng Ling, and all the energy they had absorbed over the years was related to the Heavenly Phoenix. With such a powerful Heavenly Phoenix Power flying over his territory, he naturally sensed it.

Peng Yue
========

He was involved in establishing a research institute
Ghost Asura
 at
Heavenly Draconic Family
 with strong backing from
Yi Hongming
.

Appearance

An old man with a slightly plump figure and a round face.

Plot

Peng Yue suffered a
merciless beating
 at the hands of Yunxiao and
Che You
. After attempting to delay
Fei Ni
 succession as sect master, Yunxiao decided to
forcefully persuade him
 by ensuring he would be bedridden for the exact time he claimed to need for deliberation. Despite the shocking cruelty, no one dared to speak up in Peng Yue’s defense, as he had
colluded with
Wei Qing
 and was widely disliked. In a final, devastating move, Che You
crippled half of Peng Yue’s dantian
, ensuring that even after he recovered, his
cultivation would permanently drop below the Martial Sovereign realm
.

Pu Jinshan
==========

First meets
Li Yunxiao
 before the opening of the
Mystical Faerie realm
 and asks Yunxiao to refine a rank 9 Xuan artifact for him. A little bit after leaving the realm he meets Yunxiao again with another alchemist, and they try to poison him to get his treasures. Ultimately it falls through and Yunxiao traps him in the World God Monument.

After becoming more docile, Yunxiao takes him out occasionally to look at formations and help him.

After establishing the
Heavenly Martial Alliance
, he becomes the head of the city defenses in
Martial Flame city
.

Pu Li
=====

Pu Shu was one of the three overlords of the thirty-three heavens From Sealed Land where
Lord Pu
 was sealed. He, along with the other overlords, attempted to ambush Yunxiao in the fourth layer of the
Sealed Land
 using a powerful formation designed to block divine sense and the
Primordial Chaos Land Tablet
, an ancient Supreme Treasure from 100,000 years ago, unleashed its ability to increase its weight by a hundred thousand times, . They intended to eliminate Yunxiao, perceiving him as a future threat. However, their plan backfired when Yunxiao countered with overwhelming power, leading to unforeseen destruction.

Plot

The moment Yunxiao arrived at 4 Layer, a powerful formation was triggered, suppressing their divine senses and drastically increasing the gravitational force amplifying it by a hundred thousand times. Yunxiao quickly realized that Pu Shu, along with the other overlords, had deliberately led him into this ambush.

Yunnxiao, affected by the intense gravity, unleashed his Tusita Peak. Its weight increased more than tenfold, overwhelming the spatial rules and causing the fourth layer to collapse instantly. The destruction triggered a chain reaction, forcing the third and fifth layers to merge, creating a distinct boundary between the differing densities of demonic Qi.

Pu Li and the other overlords, shocked by the sheer power of the Tusita Peak, Pu Shu hastily offered an alliance to escape the Sealed Land. However, enraged by their earlier betrayal, Yunxiao declared that if they could withstand a single move from him, he might reconsider their offer.

Pu Li, witnessing Yunxiao eliminate two of his allies in just two moves one of them killed attempted to flee. However, as Yunxiao was about to chase him, a mysterious old man suddenly appeared, aiding the other overlords and suppressing their injuries.
After this he follow Yunxio and Xibei to break the formation array and get drag to 1st layerr where the Lord Pu sealed, in there he help to kill the dragon turtle array spirit that guard the array formation but swep by dragon turtle attack with his fate unknown.

Pu Luo
======

Background

Pu Luo is a mysterious being born from the overflowing demonic energy of Demon Lord Pu, He is not a direct incarnation of the Demon Lord but rather a unique existence shaped by the energy that leaked from the powerful seal trapping Demon Lord Pu. Over countless years, this energy gave birth to various demonic creatures, all possessing a mixture of demonic and monstrous traits.

The place where Pu Luo resides is a thirty-three-layered sealed space, an area formed by the powerful world-sealing formation that was originally designed to trap Demon Lord Pu. Over time, the seal began to evolve, creating multiple layers filled with different creatures, with the deeper levels being home to the strongest ones. Pu Luo himself before being exiled to the 32nd level, he ruled the 11th level within this mysterious prison.

Trivia

Because Pu Luo are the direct descendants of Lord Pu, he possesses purer magic energy lead him has a golden blood.

Pu Qi
=====

Pu Qi
 one of high ranked demon, ranked just below the
Three Lords
 in strength within the
Land of the Seal
. where the
Lord Pu
 was sealed. Pu qi is a unique being born from the leaked demonic energy of Demon Lord Pu’s seal, though not his direct incarnation. He along with
Pu Tu
 try to stop Yunxio for getting deeper to array Formation.

Plot

He inform by
Pu Tu
 that
Pu Luo
 brought guide outsider to deeper level. He along Pu Tu try to confront Pu Luo. As both sides clashed, Yunxiao displayed his strength, unleashing a powerful purple thunder that easily defeated Pu Qi’s subordinates, leaving everyone in shock.

Witnessing Yunxiao’s overwhelming power, Pu Qi suddenly turned his anger toward Pu Tu, blaming him for drag him. In a desperate attempt to save himself,  Without hesitation, Pu Qi struck Pu Tu with a single devastating blow, shattering his armor and piercing his heart, killing him instantly.

After Pu Tu’s death, Pu Qi attempted to shift the blame onto him, but Yunxiao remained indifferent. Without wasting any words, he swept through Pu Qi that trying to flee  and the others with his destructive purple thunder, annihilating them all.

Pu Shu
======

Pu Shu was one of the three overlords of the thirty-three heavens From Sealed Land where
Lord Pu
 was sealed. When Pu Shu first met Yunxiao at the fifth layer, he appeared reasonable and even assisted in guiding Yunxiao deeper into the sealed land. However, upon reaching the fourth layer, it became clear that this was all part of a carefully orchestrated trap.

Appearance

A man with two horns on his head, He was taller and stronger than ordinary humans, with bright eyes and extremely high intelligence. His entire body exuded the aura of a superior. Although his expression was calm, the divine light in his eyes contained a pride that was difficult to hide.

Plot

The moment they arrived, a powerful formation was triggered, suppressing their divine senses and drastically increasing the gravitational force amplifying it by a hundred thousand times. Yunxiao quickly realized that Pu Shu, along with the other overlords, had deliberately led him into this ambush.

Their true intention was to eliminate Yunxiao before he could grow stronger. They viewed him as a future threat someone who could one day rival them in the competition for cultivation resources within the sealed land.

unxiao, affected by the intense gravity, unleashed his Tusita Peak. Its weight increased more than tenfold, overwhelming the spatial rules and causing the fourth layer to collapse instantly. The destruction triggered a chain reaction, forcing the third and fifth layers to merge, creating a distinct boundary between the differing densities of demonic Qi.

Pu Shu and the other overlords, shocked by the sheer power of the Tusita Peak, hastily offered an alliance to escape the Sealed Land. However, enraged by their earlier betrayal, Yunxiao declared that if they could withstand a single move from him, he might reconsider their offer.

Yunxiao unleashed the
Destroying Purple Lightning
, instantly shattering Pu Shu’s arms before blasting a hole through his chest. Pu Li and Pu Zai were shocked, their faces turning pale. In just one move, Pu Shu was left crippled if not dead, his strength would still be greatly diminished.

Pu Tu
=====

Pu Tu is a unique being born from the leaked demonic energy of Demon Lord Pu’s seal, though not his direct incarnation. He along with
Pu Qi
 try to stop Yunxio for getting deeper to array Formation.

Background

The place where Pu Tu resides is a thirty-three-layered sealed space, an area formed by the powerful world-sealing formation that was originally designed to trap Demon Lord Pu. Over time, the seal began to evolve, creating multiple layers filled with different creatures, with the deeper levels being home to the strongest ones. Pu Tu himself reside at 11th level. he ruled the 11th level within after
Pu Luo
 been exile to 32 Layer.

Plot

Pu Tu brought along
Pu Qi
to confront
Pu Luo
 for leading an outsider into the deeper levels. As both sides clashed, Yunxiao displayed his strength, unleashing a powerful purple thunder that easily defeated Pu Qi’s subordinates, leaving everyone in shock.

Witnessing Yunxiao’s overwhelming power, Pu Qi suddenly turned his anger toward Pu Tu. In a desperate attempt to save himself, Without hesitation, Pu Qi struck Pu Tu with a single devastating blow, shattering his armor and piercing his heart, killing him instantly.

After Pu Tu’s death, Pu Qi attempted to shift the blame onto him, but Yunxiao remained indifferent. Without wasting any words, he swept through Pu Qi and the others with his destructive purple thunder, annihilating them all.

Pu Zai
======

Pu Zai was one of the three overlords of the thirty-three heavens From Sealed Land where
Lord Pu
 was sealed. He, along with the other overlords
Pu Shu
,
Pu Li.
 Attempted to ambush Yunxiao in the fourth layer of the
Sealed Land
 using a powerful formation designed to block divine sense and the
Primordial Chaos Land Tablet
, an ancient Supreme Treasure from 100,000 years ago, unleashed its ability to increase its weight by a hundred thousand times, . They intended to eliminate Yunxiao, perceiving him as a future threat. However, their plan backfired when Yunxiao countered with overwhelming power, leading to unforeseen destruction in the Sealed Land.

Plot

The moment Yunxiao arrived at 4 Level, a powerful formation was triggered, suppressing their divine senses and drastically increasing the gravitational force amplifying it by a hundred thousand times. Yunxiao quickly realized that
Pu Shu
, along with the other overlords, had deliberately led him into this ambush.

Yunxiao, affected by the intense gravity, unleashed his Tusita Peak. Its weight increased more than tenfold, overwhelming the spatial rules and causing the fourth layer to collapse instantly. The destruction triggered a chain reaction, forcing the third and fifth layers to merge, creating a distinct boundary between the differing densities of demonic Qi.

He and the other overlords, shocked by the sheer power of the Tusita Peak, Pu Shu hastily offered an alliance to escape the Sealed Land. However, enraged by their earlier betrayal, Yunxiao declared that if they could withstand a single move from him, he might reconsider their offer.

After he see Pu shu struck by yunxio purple thunder that instantly shattering Pu Shu’s arms before blasting a hole through his chest. Pu Li and Pu Zai were shocked, their faces turning pale. In just one move, Pu Shu was left crippled if not dead, his strength would still be greatly diminished. Not long after yunxio struck him leave him in dying state, before a mysterious old man suddenly appeared, aiding him and Pu Shu suppressing their injuries.

Pupil Race
==========

The Pupil Race is an ancient lineage akin to the
Human and Monster races
.

While only a small minority possess autonomous physical bodies, the majority rely on parasitic attachment to hosts for sustenance. Consequently, individuals within this race vary significantly from one another.

The Immemorial Heaven Eye serves as the most common form of host within the Pupil clan.In the case of Li Yunxiao's Immemorial Heaven Eye, despite retaining the power of the pupil technique, its original will has long since perished.

The Moon Pupil
, or "Tsutsumi" (Novelhi translation), is the strongest branch of the Pupil race. Like other members of the Pupil clan, the Moon Pupil transcends physical embodiment; instead, it merges directly with the soul of its host, sharing in their life and death. It is this unique attribute that led the Tsutsumi to select an exceptionally powerful being like Gu Feiyang as its host.

Qi Feng
=======

SPOILER ALERT!

He is the Master of the Heaven-Gathering Sect, one of the three great experts of the
Duskflame Empire
. He, along with
Leng Xingbo
 of the Emotion Severing Mountain and
Wang Songhe
 of the Heavenly Jewel Sect, were the symbols of the Duskflame Empire's martial path.

Plot

Martial Flame Crisis

He confronted
Li Yunxiao
, who was refining the Rank Nine Mysterious Artifacts in the
World God Monument
. Qi Feng wanted Li Yunxiao to accompany him to the Sanctuary to explain certain matters, including the destruction of the Constellation Sect's branch in
Qinghai Town
. Li Yunxiao refused and a fierce battle ensued. Despite Li Yunxiao's efforts, he was outmatched by the Martial Supreme Qi Feng, who used powerful martial arts and even summoned a Fleeting Life Seal. However, Li Yunxiao's ancient bell, a Ninth Rank magical artifact, shattered the Fleeting Life Seal, impressing Qi Feng with his strength and luck. Qi Feng eventually chose to leave without further pursuing the matter.

Qi Guang
========

Qi Guang was one of the two Elder of the Holy Fire Temple under
Ye Fan
 Commands. He, along with other high-ranking members, was on a mission to search for and retrieve their ancestral divine artifact.

Plot

Light Song Forest

Ye Fan
,
Tao Guan
,
Feng Zhu
, and Qi Guang confront
Li Yunxiao
 in the Light Song Forest. Li Yunxiao cleverly takes Yi Fan hostage to initiate a negotiation. The Sacred Fire Temple seeks the Yang Key and believes it's linked to Noah's Ark. During the discussion, they tentatively agree to cooperate, aiming to rescue Tang Jie, take Yang Key and locate Noah's Ark. However, an explosion disrupts their conversation, leading to speculation about Tang Jie's rescue and the involvement of various factions.

As they observe the chaos,
Zou Chen
 offers his Time-fixing Plate to assist the crowd in tracking auras. Zou Chen uses the Time-fixing Plate to trace a lead to the east of the Demon Plains, where Noah's Ark might be located. Li Yunxiao's group proposes a plan to intercept the Skeleton Mercenary Group, discovering a teleportation array within their headquarters. They activate it and arrive in the Demon Plain, while other factions continue their pursuit of Noah's Ark.

Demon Origin Plains

After teleporting to the Demon Plain, Li Yunxiao's group discusses their encounter with the Skeleton Mercenary Group. The conversation shifts to
Ye Nantian
's notes about breaking through to the Divine Realm. Li Yunxiao seeks to view the notes, leading to a deal: he helps them obtain Noah's Ark in exchange for access to the notes. Tension arises when
Feng Zhu
 challenges Li Yunxiao's skills. Suddenly, the legendary creature "
Wu
" appears behind Li Yunxiao, leaving the group awestruck. The Wu enters its own body and disappears, a rare and enigmatic event that emphasizes the rarity and significance of the encounter.

Continuing their journey, the group finds a preserved corpse of a powerful Martial Supreme killed by
Young Master Hao Lian
. Concerns about Hao Lian's motives arise. Dark clouds gather, signaling the arrival of forces from other territories. Three formidable warships, two Rank 7 Golden Sun Warships and a Rank 8 Netherworld Warship, appear in the sky.  Amidst the warships,
Xuan Bing
 commands an attack from formidable warships, forcing Li Yunxiao's group to narrowly escape. Amidst the battle, the Imperial Bell emerges, withstanding attacks.
Feng Zhu
 and
Qi Guang
 join, using “Holy Skill” techniques to clash with Xuan Bing. The World God Monument appears and causes a warship to sink, leading to chaos.

Li Yunxiao suppresses the Netherworld Warship using the
World God Monument
, causing it to sink irreparably. Xuan Bing and his forces are left in shock and desperation over the loss of the two warships. Interrogating captives, they learn about involvement from the Feather Frost Sect, led by Martial Sovereign. The group continues its quest cautiously, sensing hostile auras ahead. Investigating the strange death of an eighth-rank Soul-shattering Tapir, the possibility of a Peak Martial Sovereign's presence raises concerns, as their pursuit of Noah's Ark could be threatened. Despite the fear and uncertainty, the members of the Sacred Fire Temple reaffirm their determination to continue their quest for Noah's Ark. They are motivated by their ancestral legacy and the opportunity to restore their sect's glory.

Qi Jingnian
===========

Qi Jingnian is an old and powerful martial expert that invited by
Ding Shan
, He is well-known in the martial world and has a reputation for his strength, making him one of the prominent figures present. Despite his experience, he has a short temper and a strong sense of pride, which leads him to mock Yunxiao for his perceived arrogance. However, when he tries to attack Yunxiao, he is quickly reminded of the agreement with Ding Peng's father, which prevents reckless actions that could disrupt the pill refinement process. Though he withdraws his attack, he still planing to deal with Li yunxiao after done refining the elixir and going to have a good fight with this
Titled Martial Sovereigns.

Appearance

Iron-faced old man with long eyebrows.

Plot

Qi Jingnian hates Li Yunxiao because Yunxiao killed his elder brother, Qi Taisui. Qi Taisui was the master of the Northern Falling Water Stream and practiced an evil cultivation method that involved abducting women, using them as human cauldrons to extract their primordial Yin, and then killing them. When Yunxiao discovered these atrocities, he executed Qi Taisui, believing it to be justified. However, Qi Jingnian, being Qi Taisui’s younger brother, holds a deep grudge against Yunxiao for his brother’s death. Despite the shameful nature of Qi Taisui’s actions,

Qi Jingnian’s anger and desire for revenge against Yunxiao (Gu Feiyang) are clouded by his own contradictions. He claims he was in seclusion cultivating a powerful Divine Art when his brother was killed, but Mao Yingyan exposes a flaw in his story—Qi Jingnian had been freely traveling in the Western Region during that time. This revelation makes it clear that Qi Jingnian did not immediately seek revenge, likely because he either didn't care as much back then or only found it convenient to act now. His flustered response and change of reasoning further undermine his credibility, making him appear more driven by face-saving than true loyalty to his brother.

Qi Zhenzi
=========

.

The old man’s name was Qi Zhenzi, he was the deputy palace master of the Supreme Palace in the Firecrow Empire and He accidentally discovered clue of the treasure in Mount Phoenix from ancient books and records in the Supreme Palace.

Plot

After
Xingyang Huo
 massacred all the members of the
Supreme Palace
, including their lord
Ma Tianhe
, Qi Zhenzi,
Hu Yanming
 and
Yi Xiaoshan
 returned, only to find the palace empty with no one in sight. To their surprise, Li Yunxiao had arrived before them, carrying out his task of absorbing all the Qi Vein to fill the World God Monument.

Yunxiao then issued a challenge if they lost, they must submit to him. With
Duan Yue
 overseeing the Fight and preventing any escape, Yunxiao and Qi Zhenzi exchanged several moves. In the end, Yunxiao crushed Qi Zhenzi to death using the
World God Monument
. Shocked by their comrade’s fate, the remaining two had no choice but to pledge their loyalty to Yunxiao.

Trivia

He was the first victim to fall by the World God Monument.

Qian Duoduo

Chronology

Cultivation

Techniques

Relationships

Plot

Qian Duoduo had been cultivating in
Martial Flame City
, but as the young master of the
Money Sect
, he eventually returned to his clan after breaking through to the Martial Master realm, making a grand display of his power.

When he returned to
Martial Flame City
, he had already reached the peak of Martial Honor, and now, after breaking through to a three-star Martial Emperor, he had become a dominant figure, unrivaled in the Southern Region.

With his return, the
Money Sect
 established a branch in Yanwu City, directly competing with the Tianyuan Chamber of Commerce. Before the Chamber of Commerce underwent major changes, the Li family had aligned with Tianyuan to suppress the
Money Sect
.

Martial Flam City Coup d'état

During the crisis in Martial Flame City, He offer of aid came from the Money Sect, proposing support in exchange for control over north and south sides of the city’s territory. However, Li Chunyang firmly rejected the deal because north and south was most prosperous areas of Yanwu City.

Amidst the turmoil,
Xin Ruyu
, backed by a major force from the Duskflame Empire and supported by one of the Seven Major Powers in Tianwu, took advantage of the chaos to seize control. With Yanwu City's spiritual energy rapidly depleting, he openly declared that the Li family was unfit to rule.

However, he stood in to defend of Martial Flame City effortlessly defeated by Xin Ruyu in a single move, suffering severe injuries.

After Yunxiao stopping Xin Ruyu’s coup, Li Yunxiao formed an alliance between Martial Flame City,
Heavenly Night Palace
, and the
Heavenly Draconic Family
 to counter future threats. Meanwhile, the City Lord’s Mansion merged the
Tianyun Merchant Guild
 and the
Money Sect
 branch into the Yanwu City Chamber of Commerce, with full cooperation from both factions.

With 100,000 years’ worth of sealed spiritual energy soon to be released, Yanwu City was set for massive expansion, becoming a major economic and cultivation hub. Qian Duoduo’s swift actions also cemented the
Money Sect
 influence, securing its place among the continent’s top factions.

Qian Duoduo

Relationships

Qian Sheng
==========

Plot

Eternal World

During a crucial meeting, Qian Sheng proposed that the
Money Sect
 join Li Yunxiao’s alliance, seeing it as a strategic move to secure their future. His offer surprised many, as the Money Sect had remained independent despite pressure from the two major business alliances. However, with the world in turmoil, finding a powerful backer seemed necessary.

Qian Sheng suggested naming the alliance after Yunxiao, calling it the Yun Alliance.
Chen Duantian
 objected, arguing that an alliance of many sects shouldn't be named after one person.

In response, Li Yunxiao playfully exaggerated the name, proposing the Super Tianwu Alliance, a righteous cause that will last for eternity and be invincible throughout the universe. The name amused some, but ultimately,
Heavenly Martial Alliance
 was settled upon.

Qian Wudi
=========

He is the Young Master and the Eldest Son of the Master of the
Money Sect
. He is the Older Brother of
Qian Duoduo
.

Plot

Mount Meru

Qian Wudi was one of the individuals present in the Xumi Temple's inner hall during the confrontation with
Di Jia
, the Black Demon Shadow. When Di Jia attacked, he, along with the others, tried to fight back using their martial techniques and profound armaments, but they were easily defeated by the immense power of the Black Demon Shadow.

During the battle, Qian Wudi revealed that he possessed an eighth-level ancient spiritual talisman, a rare and powerful treasure that could enhance his attacks to the level of a Martial Supreme expert. However, even with the aid of the talisman, his attack was unable to overcome Di Jia's Black Demon Qi, and his weapon was destroyed with ease.

Later, when
Xu Qing
 used the Divine Prayer Technique, the Martial Sovereign
Lu Daozi
 descends to confront Di Jia. Qian Wudi witnessed the struggle between the two powerful forces. After the battle, when the inner hall was on the verge of collapse and the defenses of the Xumi Temple opened, Qian Wudi managed to escape the scene along with Lu Daozi,
Cao Yaxing
, Li Yunxiao and Luo Qingyun.

Demon Origin Plains

At a crucial moment between
Shen Feng
 and
Li Yunxiao
, Qian Wudi, appeared on an artifact and engaged in a verbal exchange with Li Yunxiao. Tensions escalated as the situation became more complex.
Qing Luo
 of the
Tianyi Pavilion
 offered rewards for defeating the enemies, while Qian Wudi offered Li Yunxiao a deal involving a valuable Heavenly Soul Herb.

After Li Yunxiao and Qian Wudi's intense negotiation, Qian Wudi agrees to trade on Heavenly Soul Herb, 1.2 billion mid-grade Primordial Stones, and additional resources for a mysterious item Li Yunxiao possesses. This item turns out to be the Seven Constellations Martial Will Fruit, a potent treasure that Qian Wudi desires to boost his power. The exchange takes place amidst tense confrontations between various factions. Shen Feng, tries to attack Li Yunxiao, but
Zhang Hanzhe
 intervenes, leading to a standoff.

Ultimately, the trade is made, with Li Yunxiao giving Qian Wudi the Seven Constellations Martial Will Fruit in exchange for Heavenly Soul Herb and primordial stones.
Tang Jie
 and his group from the
Four Extremes Sect
 leave the scene, while Qian Wudi and his forces secure the area around Li Yunxiao to ensure his safety as he absorbs the powerful Heavenly Soul Herb. The situation remains tense, with factions watching each other closely, and Qian Wudi retreats to cultivate in seclusion, leaving his subordinates to guard the area.

Song Yueyang City

During Li Yunxiao arrival at Songyue Yang City for the Alliance Merchant Martial Arts and Alchemy Competition,
Tang Xin
 and Qian Wudi chat with Yunxiao in an exchange of information, wanting to find out what exactly occurred during Tang Jie period of stay in the Demon Origin Plains. And especially if it was true that Tang Jie obtained
Noah Ark
, it was also revealed that Tang Xin had unraveled Teng Guang Heaven and Earth Board and could inherit his techniques.

Qianyue Mansion
===============

Trivia

The key to the seal of Wuxia Mountain is the token of the head of Qianyue Mansion, passed down from generation to generation. It was used as a token at the beginning, implying that the heads of Qianyue Mansion in all generations must defend it to the death.

The key was originally given to our ancestors by the Holy Land for safekeeping.*}{r|1975}}

Qiao Luo
========

Qiao Luo , Branch Manager of the Light Song Forest's Ten Thousand Treasures Store.

Qin
===

Redirect to:
Qin Family

Qin Chuan
=========

Qin was the number one talent among the juniors in the Holy region.he was already a nine-star Martial Sovereign at such a young age.

Personality

Qin Chuan is a
loyal, respectful, and thoughtful
 individual who values family ties despite his complicated background. Raised by
Hei Yuhu
, he is well-trained and disciplined, but he still has a strong sense of morality and sentimentality.

Appearance

A young man was dressed in brocade and had a Jade belt. He had an elegant demeanor.

Background

Qin Chuan (Ding Qin Chuan)
 is
Ding Shan’s long-lost son
, who was raised by
Hei Yuhu
, a powerful figure. Though separated from his father for years, he remained loyal to his upbringing and mentor. When reunited with Ding Shan, he showed
respect and acceptance of their relationship
 but chose to
retain his mother’s surname
, honoring her memory.

Plot

In a tense situation,
Han Junting
 was ready to end her own life, preferring death to being humiliated by Yunxiao. But just before she could act, Qin Chuan appeared and stopped her. Despite the dire situation, Han Junting was furious, but Qin Chuan
confessed
 his feelings for her. Han Junting, coldly dismissing him, set a condition: he had to kill Yunxiao to prove his love. She even promised to marry him if he succeeded in killing Yunxiao.

Qin Chuan, although overwhelmed by the situation, responded that he would try his best to save her, despite knowing he wasn't strong enough to defeat Yunxiao. He offered a deal, suggesting that Meng Wu, the sister of Yunxiao’s disciple, Meng Bai, could be used as leverage to save Han Junting. Yunxiao, however, was skeptical of this trade, mocking Qin Chuan’s futile efforts.

Qin Chuan admitted that he didn’t know where Meng Bai was, but that he could bring Meng Wu in exchange for Han Junting's life. Even though this wasn’t enough, he offered his life in exchange for Han Junting’s life, as long as it was within his power. Yunxiao, unimpressed, dismissed the deal as insufficient. Eventually, he sealed Han Junting’s dantian and imprisoned her, still holding the upper hand. He suggested that if Qin Chuan could help bring
Meng Wu
 and
Meng Bai
,
Han Junting
 would be spared.

Holy Region

Later, he reunited with Li Yunxiao in the Holy Region and informed him about the whereabouts of Meng Wu and Meng Bai, as well as their background. He also revealed why Wei Qing had put so much effort into locating them, even going as far as sending
Yao Jinliang
 to assist in the search for the two siblings.

Southern Sea
