Qin Ruxue
=========

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Qin Ruxue
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Qin Ruxue
 is the Princess of The Tianshui Kingdom and one of
Li Yunxiao
's best friends.  The first appearance of
Qin Ruxue
 was she,
Han Bai
 &
Chen Zhen
 trying to protect Li Yunxiao from Du Feng and Luo Jie the two servants of
Lan Fei
.

Background

Qin Ruxue
 is the Princess of The Tianshui Kingdom, she was born with the Five Yins terminated meridians, and could not have lived past the age of five. That year, His Majesty managed to pursue a fifth-tier alchemist with all the resources of the state, who later provided a prescription for Ruxue and said that it would keep her alive for ten years. It has been nine years since then.

Plot

New Li Yunxiao

Qin Ruxue
 came to try to push Du Feng and Luo Jie away and protect Li Yunxiao, after Han Bai confronting Luo Jie, and broke his hand. Anyway, in the end, Li Yunxiao defeated Du Feng and Luo Jie in moments.

the Five Yins terminated meridians

When Li Yunxiao heard about Princess Qin Ruxue’s illness and her worsening condition, he voluntarily offered to help. With Jian Rong’s assistance, he informed Zhang Qingfan about the Golden Needle Acupuncture Method, which could potentially cure the princess.

To avoid any misunderstandings, Li Yunxiao performed the treatment from 15 meters away, using Golden Needles to pierce through the air, separated by a curtain. He feared that if he treated her up close, the king might try to force him into marriage, as the princess would have to undress, exposing her body.

With Meng Wu assisting him, Li Yunxiao completed the treatment in the time it took to drink a cup of tea, leaving everyone shocked at how fast and effective it was.

Qin Yang
 is the First Prince of Tianshui, willing to betray his own kingdom in his pursuit of the throne. To weaken his rivals
Qin Yue
 and his supporter
Li Family
 He collude with Baizhan, allowing them to invade Tianshui territory, leading to the massacre of the Golden Lion Army in Whitehead Town. He believing that chaos would help him ascend the throne.

Tianshui Kingdom

Qin Yue
=======

This page is a

Qin Yue was a standout prince of the Tianshui royal family, known for his
handsome appearance, wisdom, and strategic mind
. Despite being only a year older than
Li Yunxiao
, he carried himself with
nobility and foresight
, displaying the
aura of a ruler in the making
.

However, his path to the throne was
fraught with political danger
, as his older brother,
Prince
Qin Yang
, held the strongest claim. Refusing to submit to fate,
Qin Yue gathered powerful allies
, including the mysterious
Bai Mou
, Li Yunxiao and
Li Family
 to position himself as a serious contender.

His greatest advantage and potential downfall was
the favor of his ailing father, King
Qin Zheng
. With the king’s health deteriorating, time was running out. If Qin Yue did not act soon,
his brother would seize power, and his chance to rule would be lost forever
.

Trivia

His Father give him The
Sanskrit Sea and Cloud Flag
 was a powerful artifact crafted by the legendary master refiner
Yang Di
 for the woman he loved. Its greatest strength lay in its ability to create an impenetrable barrier, capable of withstanding all attacks below the
Martial King
 level. the flag given to
Prince Qin Yue
 was not the original but rather a
defective prototype
 from Yang Di’s first attempt at refining it. While still formidable, this version of the artifact could only last
for one hour
 before its energy was depleted.

Qin Zheng
=========

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Qin Zheng
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

King Qin Zheng, the shrewd and pragmatic ruler of Tianshui, spent decades navigating wars and political intrigues. Despite being over seventy and physically frail, his sharp mind remained focused on maintaining power. Unlike most rulers who prioritized a stable succession, his primary concern was securing his own rule.

Plot

Qin Zheng’s actions in his later years revealed his true nature as a
cunning strategist
 who refused to relinquish control. His eldest son,
Prince Qin Yang
, was once seen as the undisputed heir due to his
military achievements and influence
. However, in a sudden shift, the king began
alienating Qin Yang and gradually stripping him of power
, instead
elevating Prince Qin Yue
 a move that confused the court.

Rather than openly declaring an heir, Qin Zheng
intentionally created a rivalry
 between Qin Yang and Qin Yue. By doing so, he kept both princes preoccupied with each other, preventing them from turning their ambitions toward the throne itself. This tactic allowed him to
maintain absolute authority
, as neither son could act against him without being countered by the other.

Qing Luo
========

She is the superior of
Shen Li
 and the overseer of the
Light Song Forest
's
Empyrean One Pavilion
. She first appeared in the Demon Origin Plains, chasing after
Tang Jie
, the Young Master of the
Four Extremes Sect
.

Appearance

The beautiful woman in the palace dress, she was thirty-four years old. Although she was no longer young, her charm was still there. Her smile had a charming charm.

Personality

She was a person who cared about her face the most.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

Qing Luo confronts
Li Yunxiao
 and his companions in an 8th Rank Underworld Warship representing the
Tianyi Pavilion
. Suspicion arises about Li Yunxiao leaking information about
Noah's Ark
. Li Yunxiao strategically responds, implying he joined the
Rookie Mercenary Group
 for opportunities. The conversation escalates, and
Shen Li
 suspect the identities of the individuals accompanying Li Yunxiao.

Li Yunxiao warns Qing Luo about hasty accusations. The conversation shifts to the Skeleton Mercenary Group's whereabouts. Li Yunxiao audaciously devours Martial Intent Dao Fruits, shocking Qing Luo. She suppresses her anger, needing his help to locate the group. Shen Li warns about Li Yunxiao's tactics.

As the conversation continues, Li Yunxiao's knowledge creates mystery around him. He shifts focus to the Nine Evil Yellow Spring, implying a reward for aiding the Tianyi Pavilion. Qing Luo reluctantly agrees to Li Yunxiao's conditions for assistance in finding the Skeleton Mercenary Group. Li Yunxiao's manipulation and connection to
Li Huachi
 raise questions. They discuss strategy for navigating the Demon Plain and the potential involvement of Li Huachi. Qing Luo extends an olive branch, agreeing to provide materials.

Later, a mysterious and powerful youth dressed in green is discovered within a sphere of lightning energy in the Empty Space by Qing Luo and her group. The mysterious youth absorbs lightning and gazes at Li Yunxiao, uttering the name "Little Wu." His enigmatic behavior leaves Qing Luo and her group baffled and intrigued, adding complexity to the unfolding events in the Demon Plain.







Not long after, Yunxiao and the Empyrean One Pavilion forces come across  the wreckage of a battleship and numerous corpses from the
Mando Chamber of Commerce
, a battle was taking place not far from the scene.
Shang
 and his companions fight
Little Qing
 in the void. Unable to avoid conflict, a fierce battle erupts between both sides, resulting in heavy casualties. Eventually, both groups retreat, unwilling to continue the fight in their weakened state.








With many injured and their strength depleted, the Empyrean One Pavillion decides to withdraw from Demon Land, deeming it too dangerous. However, on their way back,
Shen Li
, Qing Luo along with the Empyrean forces are ambushed by
Zhang Shaotian
 and completely annihilated.

References

Qinghai Town
============

Qinghai Town is a gathering place for more than half of the cultivators in the Heavenscent empire. Although it is called a small town, it is larger than ordinary cities, with a population of at least several tens of millions. It is renowned for its prosperity, ranking at the forefront within its country.

Information

The Tianxiang Empire is adjacent to the Southern Sea, possessing astonishingly abundant marine resources. Near the Southern Sea lies a small town known as Qinghai Town. Although the town is small, it's one of the most bustling places in the entire
Southern Region
 of the
Tianwu Continent
. People from all over are constantly coming and going, engaged in various business activities.

In addition to ordinary merchants, representatives from major powers and commercial alliances also have stations in Qinghai Town. Furthermore, a large number of beast hunters gather from all directions, making a living by hunting sea creatures in exchange for various resources.

Qiu
===

He is the third son of
Yin Yu
 and the most talented of the Nine Sons. Due to the Laws of the Ten Directions disappearing, his Cultivation stagnated at the peak of the Dharma Body Realm, but, he was the one with the greatest chance among the Nine Sons of entering the World King Realm, or rather, attain the legendary
Sacred Body
.

Plot

After the battle against the Ancestral Mother of Monsters,
Six Wings
, in the Yin Yu Dragon Domain which later became the Land of Ten Thousand Spirits, Qiu asked
Bo Mu
, the Sea Goddess, to guard his Dharma Body beneath the Ocean Emperor Palace so that Yin Yu would not come after him in the future to steal his Dragon Essence.

After the
Eternal World
 merged with the
Heavenly Martial Realm
, and some events occurred,
Li Yunxiao
 and
Duanmu Youyu
 felt bad premonitions and deduce that a terrible event would happen in the
Four Seas
. Later they arrive at the Four Seas with some companions and come face to face with an incredibly strong member of a Clan of the Ocean Depths who intervened between the fighting of two Sea Tribes.

After killing the
Divine Transcendence
 expert of the Ocean Depths Clan, they investigated the battle and asked for information, discovering that an individual named Qiu had caused disasters by the ocean. With that,
Bo Long
 called the
Four Sea Kings
 to the Sea Forest as reinforcements, and thus the Four Kings were no longer in their Palaces and territories.

After arriving at the Sea Forest, Li Yunxiao and his team come face to face with the leaders of the largest Clans in the Deep Sea, one of them being
Gu Hong
 Grandfather, who appears alongside his grandson. These more than half a dozen
Void Prime
 experts discuss with Li Yunxiao and his companions, until Qiu shows his face and Bo Long comes out of the palace to welcome him.

After a great battle,
Bo Mu
 takes on an energy form with her consciousness, practically returning to life. She intervenes in the battle, and Li Yunxiao fights with Qiu, until Yin Yu and
Feng Yaoli
 appear.

After a fierce battle between the forces of Qiu, Yin Yu who was supported by Feng Yaoli and Nine Abyss, inside the Sea Goddess Palace, or rather, the Saint Demon Palace,
Fei Ni
 is enraged by the Qiu words about his kind and kills Qiu, who later emerges in his true body, now with a mere shred of consciousness, which later allows the Evil Spirit (Li Yunxiao's companion), take his body.

During the battle, it is revealed that Yin Yu has subjugated the Four Sea Kings and several of the A-Rank and S-Rank Tribes of the Four Seas to fight for him, which results in their deaths at the hands of Li Yunxiao and his comrades during the battle, leaving the Four Seas leaderless. Among those who were subdued by Yin Yu, there was also the Leader of the Dragon Guards of the Land of Rain, the Dragon Head, who attained Divine Transcendence and died becoming food for Yin Yu.

Qiu Mujie
=========

Former Member of the Alchemist Association, wanted by the Sea of Soul Formation.

Appearance

He was old and had a Vulture-like face.

Personality

Qiu Mujie is a ruthless and fanatical alchemist who values his pursuit of the highest art above all else, even at the cost of countless lives. He sees ordinary people as insignificant and believes their sacrifice for his research is an honor. His complete disregard for morality and his obsession with experimentation have earned him the nickname "Mad Jie."

Background

In the study of the human body, there was no one in the world who was better than him.

History

After Qiu Mujie became a wanted man by the Sea of Soul Formation, Wei Qing offered him protection in exchange for his assistance in a grand project. Together, they secretly conducted experiments to create a god. To support this, Wei Qing invested immense resources into Qiu Mujie’s research on Body Fusion.

Meanwhile, Qiu Mujie secretly worked on perfecting his ultimate body, finding ways to overcome its shortcomings and eliminate the backlash of fusion. Though his results were groundbreaking, they were merely a small branch of Wei Qing’s larger experiment—one that Wei Qing remained unaware of.

Eventually, Wei Qing no longer needed Qiu Mujie, having likely mastered the true method of achieving full physical perfection. Seeing no further use for him, he attempted to kill Qiu Mujie, discarding both the scientist and the Countercharge Balancing Technique he once relied on.

Plot

Later, Qiu Mujie was sent by
Wei Qing
 specifically to capture Li Yunxiao. Wei Qing was well aware that Qiu Mujie’s submissiveness was merely an act and that he had long harbored intentions of betrayal. That was why he secretly assigned Xiao Xiao and Huan Mie, two peak nine-star Martial Emperor experts, to monitor him in the shadows.

Qiu Mujie clashed with Li Yunxiao in Fengling City after attempting to seize
Narcissus
. Both sides unleashed their trump cards, with Qiu Mujie even revealing his true form—a half-mermaid beast—pushing Li Yunxiao into a desperate struggle that left him injured and forced back. However, before the battle could reach its conclusion, interference came from multiple sides. Forces from
Crimson Crescent City
, the
Sea of Soul Formation
, and Wei Qing’s subordinates all joined the fray. Even
Yu Shengfeng
 made an appearance, suppressing everyone and ultimately putting an end to the fight.

Technique

Qiu Mujie’s ultimate body was a terrifying fusion of countless supreme traits from various powerful races. His body incorporated the feet of a Truth Listener, the feathers of a Black Swamp bird, the arms of a Golden Ape, the ominous claws, and the thousand Immemorial Heaven’s Eyes—each an extraordinary existence on its own. Yet, his transformation didn’t stop there. He possessed green eyes, a strange horn on his forehead, feelers on his head, a copper nose, the ears of a Silver Eagle, dragon scales covering his body, and the long tail of a Suan Ni,Centaur, mermaid etc. A living assembly of a hundred races, Qiu Mujie had defied the natural order, achieving an unprecedented balance that allowed him to retain his divine sense despite his monstrous form.

Qiu Mujie’s quasi-Sage body possesses a unique trait—he can harness both his sea of Qi and his demonic core simultaneously. Moreover, he has several spare dantian demonic cores stored within the bodies of demonic beasts. This allows him to bypass restrictions placed on his cultivation. If someone attempts to suppress him, he can simply self-destruct his original dantian to break free, just as he did when Yu Shengfeng tried to seal his power—immediately replacing it with one of his spare cores.

He was perhaps the first in history to achieve such an unimaginable transformation without suffering conflict or backlash.

Qiu Mujie’s recovery technique is both bizarre and effective. A ripple forms on his chest, with his belly button as the center, before suddenly expanding into a fist-sized opening. From within, a fish head slowly emerges, absorbing essence pills and instantly converting them into Yuan power. The energy flows through his body, rapidly healing his injuries until he is fully restored within moments. Though undeniably powerful, its strange appearance left Yunxiao both impressed and embarrassed, suggesting that Qiu Mujie find a way to make it more aesthetically acceptableas even he might consider using it if it looked better.

Kurosawa Feather/feather of the dark swamp has an extremely powerful spatial ability combine with his powerful mental energy. With a slight flap of his wings, the runes on his black feathers flashed, and he can instantly teleported away.

The Qi Transformation Vortex is Qiu Mujie's ultimate technique, achieved by self-destructing eleven ninth-tier demonic cores simultaneously. When multiple ninth-tier cores explode at once, the resulting force rivals the attack of a Divine Transcendence expert. He resorted to this technique when pushed to the brink by Nanfeng Xuan,

Trivia

He is from Mount ganbo.

Qiu Mujie has been hiding for so many years all because of Wei Qing’s protection.

Qiu Mujie had countless disciples, but they were all experimental subjects, and only two of them were his true disciples.

His green eyes were plucked from the ancient eye clan's ferocious beast.

The Grudge between
Li Yunxiao
 and Qiu Mujie was that The Purple Cloud Peak had sent yang yuanshu to kill ning keyue and colluded with Wei Qing. It was just that Qiu Mujie did not know about these grudges.

Li Yunxiao
 praise him and have to admit that Qiu Mujie was the most talented Alchemist in the world because his ultimate Body.

Qiu Mujie’s ultimate ambition was to lead his army in a ruthless assault on the Sea of Soul Formation, paving the way for his vision of a supreme nation of alchemists. In his ideal world, all living beings would revere the Dao of magic, and everything would exist solely to serve its pursuit. He believed that to master divine skills, one must be willing to sacrifice everything—body, soul, and will—offering themselves entirely to the path of alchemy.

Qiu Mujie life goal was to sanctify his physical body and had researched for his entire life for it.

Relationships

The palace master of
Heavenly Night Palace
, said to be the number one beauty in the world. She often wears a veil to not attract too much attention. After Gu Feiyang's death she sealed off the Sect from the outside world.

Luo Yunshang is one of her two personal disciples.

Appearance

She is world Number one beauty. She has blue hair and purple eyes. even beauty like her fall in love with Gu feiyang.

Personality

Plot

Land Of No Return

Qu Hongyan is trapped in the land of  No Return, struggling to save Luo Yunshang, who is being consumed by the Rainbow Stone and threatened by Gu Qingqing's lingering consciousness. When Yunxiao and his group arrive to help, Qu Hongyan reveals that the only way to save Yunshang is to break the seal on Five Cloud Mountain. However, doing so would release deadly monsters and plunge the Tianwu Continent into chaos.

Li Yunxiao, upon learning this, decides to prioritize saving Yunshang, even if it means risking the continent. His cold resolve shocks Qu Hongyan, who senses a powerful, familiar aura from him but doesn't realize his true identity.

after
Gu Qingqing
 successfully took over Luo Yunshang’s body she sealed Qu Hongyan within the Land of No Return. However, Qu Hongyan was later released to aid in the war against the monster race.

During this time, she reunited with Yunxiao, who finally learned his true identity.

Plot

SPOILER ALERT!

In order to help
Luo Yunshang
 successfully refine the
Rainbow Stone
, to complete her physique to the extreme Yang Divine Body, she travels with her to the Western Region. In the Western Regions Ancient Martial Empire they enter the "
Land of No Return
", a special training ground used by nearby forces.
 While she guards Yunshang, Yunxiao appears in the Land of No Return. Hongyan doesn't recognize him, but
Li Yunxiao
 expresses his willingness to help Yunshang. Hongyan tells him the Seal on Five Cloud Mountain has to be broken, since it interferes with Yunshangs refinement. Five Cloud Mountain is a place were the Blood Monster Race was sealed by Heavenly Night Palace Ancestor Gu Qingqing. After Yunxiao leaves for the seal she realizes his real identity. During the refinement of the Rainbow Stone Gu Qingqing's soul appears and possesses Yunshangs body, she then proceeds to seal Hongyan under Five Cloud Mountain. Meanwhile a great battle around Five Cloud Mountain broke out between Holy Regions Law Enforcers, Li Yunxiao's companions, Shangs Monster Faction, Huangs Monster Faction and the Blood Monsters Faction who managed to escape. During the battle Yunxiao manages to convince
Gu Qingqing
, who is possessing Yunshangs body, to release Hongyan, who then joins in the battle against the Monster Race.

Qu Zheng
========

Qu Zheng, the president of the thunderwind Chamber of Commerce in Yufeng city, He received a letter from
Ying Lin
, to recive
Li Yunxiao
teleported Yufeng city. take a rest in the Chamber of Commerce because the domain-teleportation formation in Yufeng city was destroyed a few days ago.

Plot

He inform
Li Yunxiao
 the reason the domain-teleportation formation in Yufeng city was destroyed a few days ago because two groups of people fought over the order of use of the teleportation array. As a result, more than half of the array was destroyed. Now, the major forces in Yufeng city are rushing to repair it. The situation is unknown. There are already many Warriors who have been teleported here from all over the world, and the population has increased by nearly half.

They live in...

Hidden Families

They live in...

Mystic Realms

Heavenly Martial Realm
.

True Dragons

It is said that the true ancient dragons are born from heaven and earth, a spirit among all beings, yet they cannot reproduce naturally. They can only marry with other strong races to continue their lineage. This scarcity has led to the dragon race becoming |thinner over time, becoming engulfed in the sands of history, and their lineage on the verge of disappearing. They may be among the demon clan. Humans:or other races. Throughout the history of the
Tianwu continent
, from time to time, powerful dragon bloodline warriors appear. And without exception, the one who have the dragon bloodline will become one of the most powerful people in the world in the upcoming time.

Later it's revealed that only one True Dragon can exist at a time. If the True Dragon dies or is about to die, then another one is born from Heaven and Earth.

Pupil Race

The
pupil race
 is an ancient parasitic intelligent race, created in its likeness by
Gui Xu
, this race parasitizes the soul and lives until the soul dies, the host receives varied ocular powers depending on the sub race.

References

Rain Land
=========

History

Burial place of the eastern seas dragon monarchs for countless centuries. Two sacred treasures "First Dragons body" and "Dragon shaking hammer" are there.

17 Guards

10 out of 17 are 9-star Martial Sovereigns

Guang Quan

others

Rainy Land
==========

The Four Seas royal families, descendants of the dragon race, also hold ties to this land, though their bloodlines have weakened over generations. Among them, the First Dragon, the progenitor of the East China Sea Dragon Clan, remains the most revered, possessing power comparable to the ancient True Spirits.

History

The Rainland of the East China Sea is not just a vast and mysterious region—it is the remnant of an ancient Dragon Domain, once created and ruled by a True Dragon Lord. Over time, this domain shattered, leaving behind a fragment imbued with immense True Dragon power, which later became known as Rainland. Rainland is believed to have evolved into a sacred land for the dragons, a place where their wounds heal rapidly, and their strength is continuously nourished. The land itself carries unique laws of existence, separate from the Tianwu Realm, making it an independent space beyond the normal constraints of time, space, and elemental balance.

At the heart of Rainland lies the legendary World Sword, a divine weapon believed to be in the possession of the Dragon Head, the ruler of the region. Che You, a formidable dragon warrior, desires to reclaim the World Sword and unlock the deeper mysteries hidden within Rainland, believing that its true nature still holds remnants of the Dragon Realm’s original power.

Ramayana
========

Ramayana, the Supreme God of Slaughter, possesses the power to eliminate all existences. Legends say that as long as one harbors enough killing intent, they can summon Ramayana to strike down any obstacle in their path, making them unstoppable.

History

The name "Ramayana" has been passed down since ancient times, symbolizing the ultimate force of destruction. Those who reach a certain level of bloodlust and mastery can even manifest the God of Slaughter’s Finger, channeling its divine power to annihilate their foes.

Ranking Battle
==============

The
Duskflame Empire
 ruled over nine vassal states, ranking them as
upper, middle, or lower states
 based on their power. To rise in rank, a state needed either a
Martial Grandmaster of the Six Directions Realm
 or a
Fourth-Tier Alchemist Lord
. If no vacancy existed, they had to
fight for promotion
 in the brutal
Ranking Battle
.

Victory was determined by
forcing surrender
 or
exhausting the enemy's strength
. Though high-ranking warriors were valuable, deaths were inevitable. Five years ago, Five years ago, the state of
Tianshui
 found itself entangled in such a battle. A seat among the
upper states
 had been left vacant, and three states
Tianshui Kingdom
, Baizhan, and Dongshu
emerged as contenders. Although Dongshu possessed a
Third-Tier Alchemist
, its military strength was weak, leaving Tianshui and Baizhan to battle for supremacy. The conflict erupted in
Kunjin City
, a border region controlled by Baizhan. The battle was devastating—
five commanders of the State Guardians died
, and many survivors were permanently crippled.
Chen Dashen
 suffered grave injuries meant for
Li Chunyang
, while
Xiao Qingwang
 was left with lasting internal wounds. Tianshui had won, but at an unspeakable cost.

At its core, the Ranking Battle was a
fight for resources
. Stronger states received better cultivation materials, while weaker ones fell into decline. In some cases, defeated states were
completely wiped out
.

Red Elder
=========

Great Elder thag spent all their time in seclusion and never made contact with anyone.

Reincarnation Light
===================

alternative name: Samsara Energy

Plot

When
Gu Feiyang
 wanted to save his disciple
Hua Qianshu
, who was infected with Demon Qi by
Ren Ximin
 and
Cangwu Qiong
, he was hit by the Reincarnation Light, which sucked his soul into the heaven and earth reincarnation place.

Shortly before his death he learned the
Godly Evolution Divine Art
, which made it possible for him to reincarnate in Li Yunxiaos 15 year old body.
References

Ren Guanghou
============

Appearance

The old man was in high spirits and was dressed in a brocade robe.

Ren Ximin
=========

Ren Ximin was the master of the Spiritual Flower Wonderland, an independent space within Lanxue Holy City. where on of the
Demon Emperor
 body was sealed.

Personality

Ren Ximin was a cunning, ambitious, and who values his autonomy above all else. While he is technically affiliated with the Holy Land, he refuses to be bound by authority and only follows orders when they align with his own interests.

He was highly knowledgeable, patient, and willing to play the long game, as shown by his decades-long efforts to extract demonic energy. However, his greed blinded him, making him reckless in his pursuit of power.

Despite his intelligence, he underestimated the true nature of the Demon Lord’s will, believing he could control what he absorbed. When faced with pain and defeat, he quickly broke down, revealing a cowardly side—begging for mercy and ultimately surrendering to Dijia.

Plot

Seeking greater power, Ren Ximin discovered a way to pry open the seal of the Demon Lord, allowing him to absorb demonic energy over decades. However, the seal would repair itself, making it increasingly difficult for him to extract more energy. One day, he encountered
Di Jia
, a being filled with immense demonic essence. Believing it was an opportunity to advance his cultivation, Ren Ximin attempted to refine and absorb Dijia, unaware that he was dealing with a Demon Lord's clone. Instead of gaining power, he fell into Dijia’s trap, As a result, not only did Dijia not die, but the demonic energy that had accumulated in his body for decades was devoured, and a demon seed was planted in him that could directly corrode his body

Now overwhelmed by unbearable pain and corruption, Ren Ximin had no choice but to surrender to Dijia. The Demon Lord planted a demon seed in his spiritual consciousness, completely enslaving him. Once a respected cultivator, Ren Ximin was reduced to a demon servant, losing his free will and humanity.

Power

Sea of Soul Formation
=====================

General Information

Headquarters of the Alchemist Association. The Sea of Soul Formation is suspended above the
Tianwu Continent
 in the void, only reachable through teleportation arrays in a few locations or by tearing the space (Martial Sovereigns). Other than that, there are no ways to reach it.

There are two big factions: Pursuers of the alchemy path and the martial path.

The Sea of Soul Formation consists of two large areas, the Inner Sea and the Outer Sea.

Structure

Leader

Seawood town
============

Plot

Seawood town not far from dingtian city, the second wood spirit was born in the sea of spirit lightning fruits, attracting countless experts to fight for it. Even the Thunder Tiger Fire leopard, Chen Fengyuan, and feini, the two young masters of the long family, went. In the end, the Thunder Tiger and fire leopard died, Chen Feng’s cultivation was destroyed, and the second wood spiritualism was finally obtained by li Yunxiao

Sects, Merchant Associations - Terms
====================================

Redirect to:
Terms

Shang
=====

SPOILER ALERT!

He one of the Great Monsters ten thousands years ago, he has a 10th tier Xuan Artifact, the
Armillary Sphere
, which is the treasure of the Monster Race. His friends (
Li
,
Yi
,
Ge
,
Fu
,
Yu
) are very important to him.

History

In order to comprehend the rules of the
Ten Directions Realm
, Shang and his close companions sealed themselves within an array for tens of thousands of years. As a result, their cultivation plummeted—from Shang’s Peak of Perfection and his companions’ possible Divine Transcendence levels—down to the Martial Emperor Realm.
To sustain himself and his companions, Shang relied on the Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere to maintain their lives for millennia. However, the artifact had been pushed to its limits and was now on the verge of collapse.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

In the midst of an intense battle above the Demon Plain,
Yi Qing
 faces off against
Fu
, wielding a mighty 9th Rank Battle-Axe. Despite Yi Qing's efforts, he's overpowered, and Shang and his group watch as the battle escalates. Shang reveals his identity as the possessor of the
Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere
 to
Little Qing
. He seeks Little Qing's assistance in restoring the Artifact's power using the Eternal Evergreen Tree's energy, but Little Qing resists.

As the confrontation intensifies, Little Qing transforms into lightning and traps Shang and his companions. Shang utilizes the power of the Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere to create a celestial barrier, attempting to contain Little Qing.

Later,
Ge
 sacrifices himself to block Little Qing's devastating
Void Jade Azure Violet Palace Brahma World Annihilation Divine Thunder
 attack.
Li Yunxiao
 rushes to save Little Qing. Li Yunxiao injures Shang heavily, and Little Qing leaves a cryptic message before disappearing. The Sacred Fire Temple and Tianyi Chamber of Commerce unite against the monsters,
Qing Luo
 leading against Fu.

Li Yunxiao and
Mister Yu
 engage in a fierce confrontation, with Li Yunxiao gaining the upper hand and breaking Mister Yu's arm. Following the intense clashes, the monsters retreat, leaving behind a tense atmosphere.

Later,
Yu
,
Li
,
Shang
, and others are fighting off Spirit Rats repelled by the sound of war drums. Yu's arm is missing, and the group discusses their dire situation. Tang Jie, suggests they join the Four Extremes Sect. Yu, Shang, and others disagreed and tried to recover and discuss finding someone to repair the damaged Supreme Celestial Armillary Sphere.

After a while, Shang submits Tang Jie could help, and the group eventually agrees to join forces with him. Li helps Tang Jie recover but places the Seven Fiend Seal on him, causing intense pain. After Tang Jie's confrontation with
Dan Yangze
 and the events that followed, Tang Jie and his group refocused their efforts on dealing with Li Yunxiao and his allies.

After Tang Jie's failed attempt to bravely face the attacks, he and the other Great Monsters fled when faced with the
World God Monument
's descending strike by Li Yunxiao.
Fu
, attempted to strike the battleship with a powerful ninth-grade Xuan Artifact called the Xuan Flower Axe. To counter this,
Ye Fan
 revealed a Martial Will Pill that was enhanced with Nine Heavens Sovereign Qi, capable of withstanding the Xuan Artifact's impact.

After a fierce battle between
Mister Yu
 against Li Yunxiao and
Gourd Little King Kong
, Yu and Yunxiao heavily injured. Suddenly
Shen Feng
 came in the back of the Rank Eight Demonic Beast, the Nine-winged Spirit Snake Bird, Yu requested Shen Feng's assistance in eliminating Li Yunxiao, to which Shen Feng agreed. However, at the critical moment, a giant flying artifact, the
Money Chamber of Commerce
, intervened.
Qian Wudi
, appeared on the artifact and engaged in a verbal exchange with Li Yunxiao. After Li Yunxiao and Qian Wudi's intense negotiation, Qian Wudi agrees to trade Tianhun Herb, 1.2 billion mid-grade Primordial Stones, and additional resources for a mysterious item Li Yunxiao possesses.

However, Shen Feng, tries to attack Li Yunxiao again, but
Zhang Hanzhe
 intervenes, leading to a standoff. Ultimately, the trade is made, with Li Yunxiao giving Qian Wudi the Seven Constellations Martial Will Fruit in exchange for Tianhun Herb and primordial stones. Tang Jie and his group from the Four Extremes Sect left the scene.

Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

In a frozen landscape, Li's attempt to break the formation triggers catastrophic consequences, Little Qing, who has been observing, warns that disaster is looming. The formation's instability leads to the sudden rise of an enormous ice mountain that engulfs Li, while the surrounding area experiences chaotic shifts between the four seasons.

The mountain's peak undergoes rapid transformations, with spring, summer, autumn, and winter all manifesting at different levels. The mountain's appearance reflects the four seasons, with spring at the midpoint, peach blossoms, withered trees, and snow at the base. Meanwhile, an immense boundary of the four seasons emerges in the distance, revealing the Immortal Mountain of lord
Throne
.

Four Seasons Immortal Mountain

Shang
 and the other Great Monsters, including
Yu
, appeared in the space where
Li Yunxiao
,
Tang Jie
 and the others were. Tang Jie's eagerness for revenge against Li Yunxiao intensifies. Shang orders an attack against Li Yunxiao and his group, including Zhang Shaotian. However, the unique environment suppresses the use of Primordial Qi and Essence, rendering the attackers powerless. Li Yunxiao's true power becomes apparent as he effortlessly defeats Tang Jie despite the restrictions, leaving the group of Great Monsters stunned.

Five Cloud Mountain

Shang appeared before
Yi
 Die, confronting
Huang
, who had been severely injured by
Wei Qing
. However, Huang revealed that he had already formed an agreement with
Mo
 and his tribe. They had remained silent since the start of the war with the Holy Land, waiting for Shang’s appearance to ambush him once the mountain seal was broken.

But Huang's confidence quickly crumbled when it was revealed that Mo had already sided with Shang, accepting a better offer. Shang, holding Huang's host beast hostage, forced Huang and Mo to join forces against the human army, successfully pushing them to the brink of defeat. However, human reinforcements arrived, turning the tide. Seeing the battle as meaningless, Shang advised retreat, but Huang refused, and huang revealing his true power and accusing Shang of betrayal. Huang then crippled Shang and imprisoned him.

Power

the Huodou Clan's Heaven-Sealing Seal, which directly seals the rules of all laws and the magical powers of the heavens. It's too against the Way of Heaven. If the Heaven-Sealing Seal is used, one's own power will be sealed.

Trivia

He had spent tens of thousands of years to completely refine the armillary sphere.

Shang Chen
==========

Shangchen, the head of the Dark Division.

Plot

After Li Yunxiao drove Shang Chen away, Shang Chen realized that he could not return to the Holy Land without an explanation for his failure. Desperate, he turned to another major faction hostile to
Myriad Stars Valley
 the
Devouring Soul Sect
. There, he sought the aid of Huangfu Bi. Huangfu Bi, in turn, agreed to help Shang Chen eleminate Yuan Gaohan. This was because
Li Yunxiao
 had previously defeated the Golden Speaker, a formidable golden soul, leaving
Huangfu Bi
 in urgent need of a peak-level magic soul to compensate for the loss.

Shang Chen pursued Li Yunxiao, who had entered the earth to collect Golden Spirit Energy. Shang Chen engaged in a fierce battle against Li Yunxiao that has gone into the earth to collect the golden spirit energy, unleashing his ultimate technique. As the battle intensified, the
Divine Purple Gold Bug
 joined the fight, turning it into a three-way clash of immense power. Each combatant pushed their abilities to the limit, shaking the very fabric of space. However, Shang Chen was soon overwhelmed by the combined might of Tushita Peak and the Divine Purple Gold Bug. Trapped with no escape, he struggled in vain as the two forces collided. In an instant, his body was shattered, dissolving into black light and vanishing without a trace. His Qi Tian Sword trembled under the crushing pressure before finally snapping apart, reduced to mere fragments.

Power

The Qitian sword

Sky Splitter, The sword's light surged, and the ancient characters "Qitian Sword" shimmered transparently. A vast power erupted, pressing down with immense force. In that instant, Shang Chen unleashed his full potential, achieving perfect unity with his sword. This was exactly half of the divine skill "Creating the World"—his ultimate technique.

Dark Art, This secret technique seems to be able to devour everything.

Trivia

The
Dark Division
 was one of the two most mysterious departments in the Holy region. Even many people in holy region never heard of the name 'Shang Chen'.

Shangguan Yuyin
===============

Sangguan Yuyin and
Ping Yingyi
, came to
Nanhuo City
 in search of the
North Scorpion Sect’s lost treasure
.

Appearance

woman, wearing a simple palace dress, with some charm, but she always had a cold face and was serious.

Background

She wielded one of famous
Profound Level weapons
, the
Hundred Jade Fan
, which originally belonged to the
North Scorpion Sect
 before its division into the
Big Dipper Sect
 and the
Heavenly Scorpion Sect
. After the split, a small group from the North Scorpion Sect left
Nanhuo City
 and joined the
Divine Wind Sect
 in
Yufeng City
.

Shen Feng
=========

He is the leader of the
Skull Mercenary Group
 of the
Light Song Forest
 in the
Western Region
 of the
Tianwu Continent
. He tamed  the Rank Eight Demonic Beast, the Nine-winged Spirit Snake Bird, during the Noah's Ark Born in the Demon Origin Plains.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

Shen Feng, arrived at the back of his beast and imposed a powerful restraining force on the Netherworld Battleship, trapping its occupants. Shen Feng was aware of
Yu
's presence and approached him, seemingly willing to help. Yu requested Shen Feng's assistance in eliminating
Li Yunxiao
, to which Shen Feng agreed. However, at the crucial moment, a giant flying coin-shaped artifact, the
Money Chamber of Commerce
, intervened.
Qian Wudi
, appeared on the artifact and engaged in a verbal exchange with Li Yunxiao.

After Li Yunxiao and Qian Wudi's intense negotiation, Qian Wudi agrees to trade Tianhun Herb, 1.2 billion mid-grade Primordial Stones, and additional resources for a mysterious item Li Yunxiao possesses. This item turns out to be the Seven Constellations Martial Will Fruit, a potent treasure that Qian Wudi desires to boost his power. The exchange takes place amidst tense confrontations between various factions. Shen Feng, tries to attack Li Yunxiao, but
Zhang Hanzhe
 intervenes, leading to a standoff. Ultimately, the trade is made, with Li Yunxiao giving Qian Wudi the Seven Constellations Martial Will Fruit in exchange for Tianhun Herb and primordial stones. Shen Feng and
Tang Jie
 and his group from the Four Extremes Sect left the scene.

Shen Li
=======

Plot

Demon Plains Noah Ark

Shen Li arrives in Demon Land with her superior
Qing Luo
 and an eighth-tier Netherworld Warships from the
Empyrean One Pavillion
, serving as a guide for Qing Luo. After hearing news of  Noah’s Ship, she encounters Li Yunxiao, who is observing the aftermath of a battle between a mysterious group and
Xuan Bing
 from the Feather Frost Sect.  Qing Luo proposes an alliance with Yunxiao to capture
Tang Jie
 alive, as he possesses the Yang Key, and to assist in the search for Noah’s Ark.

Later, Yunxiao and the Empyrean One Pavilion forces come across
Shang
 and his companions battling
Little Qing
 in the void. Unable to avoid conflict, a fierce battle erupts between both sides, resulting in heavy casualties. Eventually, both groups retreat, unwilling to continue the fight in their weakened state.







With many injured and their strength depleted, the
Empyrean One Pavillion
 decides to withdraw from Demon Land, deeming it too dangerous. However, on their way back, Shen Li,
Qing Luo
 along with the Empyrean forces are ambushed by
Zhang Shaotian
 and completely annihilated.

Shentu Yixiao
=============

Plot

Five Cloud Mountain

Amid the war against the monster race, Shentu Yixiao arrived with his elite Shadow Department, consisting of over thirty high-level Martial Emperors. All were top elites of the Shadow Department.

From the void, Shentu Yixiao observed the battle and seized the opportunity to launch a sneak attack on Ai, who was dueling with Amaterasu. The attack seemed successful, as Ai's head was shattered instantly, appearing to kill him.

However, not long after, Ai reappeared a short distance away, seemingly unharmed.However, not long after, Ai reappeared a short distance away, seemingly unharmed.

Shou Wei
========

Shou Wei,Yunxiao,
Tan Dijun
,
Shangguan Yuyin
 and
Ping Yingyi
 attended the Big Dipper Sect's martial competition as part of the same group. Acting as a guide, Shou Wei provided Yunxiao with valuable information about the sect's history, helping him better understand its traditions and structure.

Appearance

A bearded man wearing a tiger-like monster skin coat.

Background

Shou Wei is an experienced martial artist. Before coming to South Fire City, he was only at the peak of the martial king level. After staying here for more than ten years, he has already broken through to the six-star martial master level. Moreover, he has been stuck at this level for three years, and he is afraid that he will have to stop here for the rest of his life. He also plans to mine for a few more years, and then find a small sect to become an elder and live out his retirement in peace, and train his own descendants.

Plot

He was angered when strangers occupied his assigned place at the
Big Dipper Sect
 . Initially hesitant to cause trouble, Li Yunxiao's sharp words reignited his fighting spirit, helping him break through his long-standing bottleneck and advance from a six-star to a seven-star martial master.

Empowered by this breakthrough, Shou Wei confronted the intruders but was overpowered by a stronger opponent a peak seven-star martial master who locked him with a powerful technique. Seeing Shou Wei at a disadvantage, Li Yunxiao secretly intervened, teleporting two allies
Ping Yingyi
 and
Shangguan Yuyin
 to assist. Surprised by the sudden teleportation, the two quickly reacted, using their techniques to block the enemy’s attack. Realizing others had interfered, Shou Wei's opponent chose to retreat.

Though the conflict seemed settled, Shou Wei and his group were ambushed at midnight by a dozen figures. Outnumbered and severely injured,  but Yunxiao and his demon beast
Dark Thunder
 saved him. Yunxiao healed him with a sixth-grade pill and taught him a powerful technique, offering him a chance to reach the Seventh Constellation Realm within five years. Without revealing his name, Yunxiao left, leaving Shou Wei speechless at his generosity.

Shuai Junwei
============

Shuai Junwei was The current Lord of Long Valley City, the head of the Shuai family.

Personality

Shuai Junwei is a shrewd and cautious leader who prioritizes strategy and long-term benefits over emotions. He carefully weighs risks, understanding that power is fragile and can shift with a single misstep. While pragmatic, he values loyalty and those who contribute to his family's success.

Shuai Minglang
==============

Appearancr

A handsome and elegant man.

Personality

Shuai Minglang is insensible, arrogant and overconfident, relying on his family's power to assert dominance. Though outwardly tough, he is cautious and fearful when facing stronger opponents.

Shui Luoyan
===========

Personality

Shui Luoyan comes across as proud, competitive, and somewhat dismissive, with a strong sense of superiority, especially in martial strength. She is straightforward and blunt in her speech, never hesitating to challenge or question others. However, this also makes her appear arrogant, ignorant, and overconfident, as seen when she openly doubts Yunxiao’s strength after hearing of his victory against
Luo Qingyun
. She underestimates him completely, even going so far as to claim that she could kill him with a single finger.

Said to be one of the two beauties of the Merchant Union aside from
Ding Ling'er
.

Shui Yanluo
===========

Appearance

A young queen, who is beautiful and lifelike.

Si Tingyu
=========

Appearance

Her face was dignified and delicate, and her long hair was tied into a bun. Her figure was in a trance, was peaceful and quiet.

Personality

Si Tingyu
 was a woman of
few words and unwavering composure
. Cold, calculating, and detached, she rarely displayed emotion, making her decisions based purely on logic rather than sentiment. She held a
statue-like presence
, often observing rather than engaging unless necessary.

Plot

Five Cloud Mountain

During the fierce battle at Five Cloud Mountain, Si Tengyu and Cangwu Kong fought bravely against
Shang
, using the Wheel of Reincarnation left
Ghost King
 that she refined. However, they were ultimately overpowered and forced to retreat.

The situation worsened when Shang,
Mo
,
Huang
, and thousands of monster reinforcements joined forces, turning the tide of battle. The human forces were pushed back, retreating to their battleships, only to be surrounded and relentlessly bombarded by the monster army. One by one, their formations fell, and even the mighty Five Star Formation was broken.

Meanwhile, Si Tengyu, surrounded and severely injured, was on the verge of death. At this critical moment,
Wei Wuya
 arrived with forty-nine
Ghost Asura
, managing to temporarily repel the monster forces.

However, the situation remained dire.
Gongyang Zhengqi
 appeared, revealing that he had been watching all along and had sealed the Five Cloud Mountain, trapping any forces from escaping. Upon learning the truth, Si Tengyu, devastated and heartbroken, shattered her own meridians, choosing death over despair.

He was wrapped in a black robe, and his expression could not be seen.

Situ Heng
=========

Situ Heng is a Peak Martial Grandmaster from the
Skull Mercenary Group
, he appeared as he tried with the help Gu Yuesheng, to kill
Hai Lin
 and their caravan.

Plot

Light Song Forest

With the Help of
Gu Yuesheng
, Situ Heng tried to kill
Hai Lin
 and their caravan during their way to the Light Song Forest, and failed in two attempts. So Gu Yuesheng tried to use a secret technique to summon a High-Rank Demonic Beast. But Li Yunxiao successfully traps the beast using his profound artifact, the Heavenly Spirit Ring, and the caravan absorbs the star power to cultivate and make breakthroughs.

Upon entering the Light Song Forest, Li Yunxiao confronts Gu Yuesheng and Situ Heng, Li Yunxiao displays his strength as a fifth-rank Alchemist and engages in a battle of spiritual attacks with Gu Yuesheng. Despite Gu Yuesheng's powerful attack using the
Immemorial Heaven Eye
 and the Pupil Technique — Moon Gap of Gu Feiyang, Li Yunxiao manages to counter it with the
Imperial Bell
, an ancient artifact, and overwhelms him.

During the battle,
Duan Yue
, who was previously thought to be dead, appears to assist Li Yunxiao. Duan Yue reveals himself as a Martial Emperor, Situ Heng recognizes Duan Yue and tries to manipulate him into attacking the rookie mercenary group, but he failed.

Six Ding Six Jia
================

General Information

6 male and 6 female puppets (12 in total). Created by
Mu Xing
 and perfected by
Mu Chen
. They are one of the Mu Family's three great techniques, tho the version
Li Yunxiao
 has is the only one in existence. The Six Ding Six Jia can form one of the Ancient Times Three Great Killing Formations, the Twelve Divine Beings Killing Formation.

They can form an almost inescapable killing formation, each of the puppets is made with lightning refinement and memory origin gold, which allows them to self-recover from any damage. They can absorb the power of heaven and earth and hence almost need no power supply from the user (Li Yunxiao). Each of the Six Ding Six Jia's strength is comparable to that of the one using them. Depending on the Cultivation Realm Li Yunxiao can bring summon one Giant Spirit for each of the puppets, as a
Return to Truth / Divine Transcendence
 the limit is 6 out of 12.

History

Snow Country
============

The Snow Country was once a powerful and mysterious land located in the extreme north, where ice and snow covered everything year-round. It was home to both humans and monsters, who seemingly coexisted under the rule of its monarchs. However, at some point in history, civil strife broke out, leading to its downfall. The last recorded event in the kingdom’s history was the ascension of its final king, after which no further records exist. Now, the once-thriving Snow Country lies in ruins, buried beneath the eternal ice, its history lost to time. Only fragments of murals and legends remain.

Trivia

One of the most significant remnants of the Snow Country is the Cold Sword, Ice Frost
Li Yunxiao sword
, which contains the lingering souls of
Shui Yanluo
 and Huo Dou.

Song Yueyang City
=================

Songyue City, was the world’s number one shopping center. Although the city was large, eight flags were erected in the center of the city, which represented the eight permanent members of the Business Alliance. The roads crisscrossed and extended in all directions, highlighting the endless prosperity of the entire city.

The entire city was a huge intelligence network. Dozens, even hundreds of Chambers of Commerce were gathering all kinds of information. The people working in the intelligence.

Trivia

Songyue City Size about a hundred miles from east to west.

Every citizen songyue citu was a soldier, and songyue city was probably the number one city in the world.

if the entire merchant Union is United, it can even surpass the seven superpowers and become an existence comparable to the sanctuary and the sea of soul formation.

There were a total of four regional teleportation arrays in songyue city. At the same time, there were also four teleportation points. This place was surrounded by people from the ten thousand treasures building, and the other three places were probably no exception.

This south-pointing chariot is a specialty of songyue yang city.

Southern Region Category

Southern fire golden crystal essence
====================================

This Southern Fire golden crystal mine was also a natural treasure. Other than being used for refining weapons, it could also be used as a cultivation energy source for fire-type martial artists. As for the southern Fire golden crystal source, it was formed from the condensation of its essence, and it was similar to the essence core that was above Supreme-grade essence stones!

One had to know that according to the exchange levels based on the vital Qi accumulation, one vital core could be exchanged for 100 Supreme-grade vital stones, 10000 high-grade vital stones, and a million mid-grade vital stones. Yunxiao had spent ten billion mid-grade primordial stones on them, but they were only exchanged for ten thousand essence cores.

Trivia

The southern Fire golden crystal essence can't be formed without tens of thousands of years.

People taht cultivated fire-elemental, they could break through to the martial Supreme realm if they cultivated in it for a few decades.

Spirit Devouring Rat Emperor
============================

She is the the ancient Rat Empress and controller of all the Five Elements Devouring Spirit Rats. She lived for tens of thousand of years with
Little Qing
 in the Demon Origin Plains.

Plot

Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

Little Qing, weary from her transformation, calls upon the ancient Rat Empress ruler of the Five Elements Spirit-Eating Rats. Emerging from the shadows, the Rat King inquires about her condition. Xiao Qing explains her urgent need for assistance. She reveals that the warriors invading the Demon Plain pose a grave threat, as they seek her original body the Eternal Evergreen Tree. This tree has long been the source of balance and survival for both her and Spirit Devouring Rat Clan.

The Rat King acknowledges their symbiotic relationship. For countless years, his children have absorbed spiritual energy from Xiao Qing's body, preventing her from evolving to a destructive extreme, while ensuring their own survival. Yet now, as Xiao Qing undergoes transformation and gains independence from her original form, she fears her body may fall into enemy hands. Though she may survive, the Rat King’s clan would face extinction.

the
Spirit Devouring Rat Emperor
 and Little Qing strategize to counter
Hao Lian
's pursuers. They manipulate the Four Seasons Enchantment to alter the landscape. While the Water Rat King is cornered by
Che Xuyao
 and
Feng Yi
, and Little Qing warns the Rat Emperor against breaking the enchantment.

Little Qing suggests a risky plan to save the rat population and the Rat Emperor agrees, to this strategy, ordering his subordinates to cease their attack on the experts. As the illusionary landscape shifts and changes, the Water Rat King is eventually captured by Che Xuyao and his companion, who attempt to refine the Five Elements Beast Taming Ring with the Five Rat Kings.

Four Seasons Immortal Mountain

Inside the Immortal Mountain, Little Qing and the the ancient Rat Empress discuss the dire situation. Little Qing explains that the revelation of the true formation's core will activate the Immortal Mountain's power, causing the four seasons to rotate and crush all life within the formation, including themselves. To buy time for Young Emperor Hao Lian's breakthrough, Little Qing plans to stall and strengthen himself. He hopes that once he becomes more powerful, he can break open a sealed space below his main body and retrieve Noah's Ark.

Star Constellation Sect
=======================

General Information

The Head of the Star Mansion Sect cultivates the "Surging/Storming Waves Technique," which requires a large number of Sea Demonic Beast cores as supplements. Hence, their demand for sea beasts is extremely high. It's no wonder they attach such importance to
Qinghai Town
.

However, their main power is still concentrated in the
Heavenly Abyss City
 of the Eastern Sea. That's where the most abundant sea beast resources of the
Heavenly Martial Continent
 are found. Moreover, the Sect Leader,
Old Man Xingxiu
, has a peculiar fondness for girls around the age of
thirteen
 or
fourteen
. The Star Sect even specially built a palace to keep these girls for that old eccentric's “enjoyment.”

,

Starlight Soul Refining Technique
=================================

General Information

Producing a clone with ones Soul Power and the Starlight Soul Refining Technique. The Clone consists purely of Soul Power and can absorb the Starlight to increase the Soul Power / Alchemy Realm. After fusing back into the main body ones soul strength gets permanently increased and also receives all the information the clone has collected.

If the clone gets killed, the main body receives a backlash, the severity depends on the strength of the clone. The stronger the clone the greater the backlash after its destruction, which may lead to permanent damage to ones soul. In case of destruction the collected information gets transmitted to the main body.

History

When travelling to the starry sky, Yunxiao met the 8th rank (Soul /Alchemy Rank) Starlight Soul Body of
Yuan Gaohan
. Through tricking the latter that he (Yunxiao) is from the
Soul Devourer Clan
, he manages to extort the Starlight Soul Refining Technique from him.

Stellar Sunder-Sword of Infinite Cosmos
=======================================

The Stellar Sunder-Sword of Infinite Cosmas was created by Li Yunxaio during his fight of .

By combinding all his powerful techniques into one , given the short time.

Involving the Constellation Impaling Sword, Godly Evolution Technique, Godly evolution Divine Scripture, Phoenix True Fire and Unyielding Tyrant physique.

Su Hong
=======

Su Hong, the General Manager of Tianyuan Chamber of Commerce. that acompany
Ding Ling'er
 in
New Yan city
.

Su Lianyi
=========

She is the Chief of
Empyrean One Pavillion
, a peak expert of the Martial Dao who is in charge of one of the
7 Perpetual Chambers
 of Commerce of the
Alliance Merchant
.

Appearance

A woman in blue palace dress, The woman's blue gauze gown was embroidered with flowing clouds and dark patterns, and her face was cool and beautiful, giving people a sense of astonishment, without a trace of emotion.

Plot

After
Ling Baiyi
 Eight Elephants attempted to steal Gu Feiyang's Star Sword during the
Ten Thousand Treasures Store
 Auction,
Wan Yiqian
 and other Perpetual Chambers of Commerce  announced that they would confront Ling Baiyi for such an affront to their honor. This would obviously be a move that would put great pressure on the Ten Thousand Treasures Lodge, which opened the door for Ding Shan and other Perpetual Chambers of Commerce that supported him to plot against Wan Yiqian.

But, the only Chamber of Commerce that remained impartial during this internal instability in the Alliance Merchant was Empyrean One Pavilion, which was suppressed by
Ding Shan
. And after
Li Yunxiao
 identity was leaked, many learned about the fact that he carried a
Saint Artifact
 capable of welcoming people.

Reflecting on the current state of the Alliance Merchant and that with the matter of the battle against Ling Baiyi likely spreading, Empyrean One Pavilion would not be able to hold its reins, Therefore, she searches for Li Yunxiao and tries to test him by plotting a battle between him and Hao Gaoyuan, a peak Martial Sovereign expert who was invited by Ding Shan to refine the Pills “Eight Yin, Eight Yang”.

And Li Yunxiao defeats Hao Gaoyuan after some difficulties, guiding him about Ding Shan's possible plot regarding the true purpose of refining the Pills. After this, Li Yunxiao and Su Lianyi talk and Su Lianyi says that she planned this to test whether Li Yunxiao would be strong enough to protect her Chamber of Commerce in the future, which she can fortunately see easily.

After the battle with Ling Baiyi, the Ten Thousand Treasures Store is temporarily taken out of the Alliance Merchant by Ding Shan and Su Lianyi and her Empyrean One Pavilion leave with Li Yunxiao and become a personal strength under Li Yunxiao's control. Later, Su Lianyi became the chief manager of the logistics affairs of
Yanwu City
 and the
Southern Region
, cultivating under the influence of the Ten Directions Rules and reaching the Ten Directions Realm.

Su Ping
=======

Su Ping is the direct disciple of
Tian Xingzi
 and has been in Myriad Stars Valley for less than ten years. Despite being only twenty years old, he is highly regarded by his master, who seems to be grooming him as a successor.

Appearance

A petite man’s with handsome face. He was actually very young, and his face revealed a calm and steady expression that was rare for his age.

Personality

Su Ping is calm, intelligent, and pragmatic. He prefers to avoid unnecessary conflict but is not afraid to stand his ground when necessary. He speaks with confidence and subtle cunning, often leaving room for negotiation while maintaining control over a situation. Though young, he possesses a sharp mind and a strong sense of strategy.

Power

The Void Wheel of Time and Space is a legendary artifact or technique that manipulates both space and time. It is said to be an imitation of the Wheel of Time and Space, but its power is vastly inferior in comparison. square-shaped profound level weapon. this energy-sensing disc can accurately sense even the most powerful force.

Li Wenshi

Plot

Sun Xiumei  who once loved Li Wenshi but grew to despise him after he used the Toad Fiend Technique, which turned him into a monster. Disgusted by his transformation, she betrayed him without hesitation first kicking him into a thundercloud, then stabbing him through the heart. Taking pleasure in his suffering, she mocked him in his final moments. Cold and ambitious, she felt no remorse, only satisfaction at his death, before escaping to avoid confrontation with

Supreme Six
===========

Known Member

Li Wenshi

Hu Yanming

Qi Zhenzi

Song Chengtian

Sun Xiumei

Yi Xiaoshan

Xu Pinghong

Plot

The clue of this treasure in Mount Phoenix was accidentally discovered by Qi Zhenzi among the ancient books and records in the Supreme Palace. He was skeptical at first, but after carefully studying the clue, he found that it was real. So, he instigated the Supreme Six to help him. In order not to divulge the news, he made an army trap Kunjin, and at the same time, slaughtered all the people in the three towns beneath the mountain.

Sword Decapitating Red
======================

General Information

Yunxiao refined it from a
Origin Neon Rainbow Stone
, which are the raw stone from the Demon World untainted by Demon Qi. Infusing it with Demon Qi allows it to produce the
Ice Fiend Heart Flame
, which can burn everything in existence. Yunxiao named it after
Xiao Hong
, who was called "Little Red", with the intention to take her life with the sword.

History

Taichu Zhen Jue
===============

The Taichu Zhen Jue was an ancient divine technique created to control time, allowing its wielder to manipulate its flow and create time domains. However, over generations, the Taichu lineage misused it to peer into fate, bringing them into conflict with the will of heaven.As one of the Four Great Divine Techniques, it stood equal to the Great Realm Divine Art and Great Evolution Divine Art, rivaling even the Devil Lord’s Ice Fiend Heart Flame. The technique had nine levels, but few ever reached its peak. Duanmu Youyu and Duanmu Cang had only reached the fifth and third levels, while Duanmu Qi stopped at the sixth and Bai Lun Jieyi at the eighth. The final level remained hidden within the Jiuyao Xing Staff, waiting for one destined to unlock it.

Tan Dijun
=========

He is the vice sect leader of
Big Dipper Sect
 and a peak rank 9 martial supreme.

Appearance

He has appearance of a goateed man.

Background

Tan Dijun is the rightful junior brother of the Big Dipper Sect's leader
Zhang Linghua
. after years of hidden and recover his injury, With a determination in his heart, Tan Dijun is not just seeking revenge, but reclaiming the leadership he was once destined to hold. He vows to confront the traitor who stole his place and bring balance and honor back to the Big Dipper Sect.

Plot

Tan Dijun tries to recruit Yunxiao, recognizing his extraordinary talent, but Yunxiao refuses and attempts to flee.

A fierce chase ensues, with Tan Dijun using his domain power and mist technique to trap Yunxiao. However, Yunxiao’s skills allow him to break free temporarily. Tan Dijun is shocked by Yunxiao’s capabilities but remains determined to capture him.

Seeking refuge, Yunxiao finds a group of familiar faces, but his arrival also exposes them to danger. Tan Dijun reveals his identity as the rightful heir to the Big Dipper Sect, returning to reclaim his position and eliminate traitors. The situation intensifies as Yunxiao and his reluctant allies must now deal with a relentless and powerful enemy.

Tan Dijun then confronts
Ping Yingyi
,
Shangguan Yuyin
, and Yunxiao demanding their loyalty. Sensing danger, Ping Yingyi and Shangguan Yuyin quickly submit, but Yunxiao refuses. Enraged, Tan Dijun attempts to crush him using spatial pressure, but Yunxiao unexpectedly withstands the force and even benefits from it.

Frustrated, Tan Dijun escalates his attacks, yet Yunxiao cleverly evades, utilizing teleportation and a newly refined ancient Heaven's Eye technique. Tan Dijun eventually realizes Yunxiao is not an easy opponent and demands to know his true identity. Yunxiao, ever playful, dodges the question and instead proposes they cooperate to uncover a long-lost treasure. Tan Dijun remains skeptical, but the discovery of an ancient map in Ping Yingyi’s possession shifts the group's focus to their common goal.

Ping Yingyi, then show treasure map made from the skin of a ninth-tier fire-type demon beast. Initially skeptical, Tan Dijun tests the map’s authenticity but fails to reveal its secrets. Yunxiao, an alchemist with a powerful flame, successfully burns away the beast skin, revealing a hidden titanium platinum paper containing the real treasure map.

Tan Dijun is shocked to recognize the marked location a forbidden "dead land" near Southfire City, known for its dangerous yet precious Li Fire Golden Crystals. He had once discovered a rare Li Fire Golden Source there in his youth but was deceived into trading it for a meager reward.

Despite Yunxiao’s eagerness to seek the treasure immediately, Tan Dijun insists on delaying the expedition until after the upcoming sect tournament. His priority is to expose Zhang Linghua’s crimes before all the sect’s forces and personally kill him. He reveals that Zhang Linghua, despite claiming to have reached Martial Supreme status, is only a Half-Martial Supreme who relied on external resources to advance. With this knowledge, Tan Dijun is confident in his ability to defeat his enemy and reclaim his rightful position before setting off on the treasure hunt.

As tang Dijun is plotting to assassinate Zhang Linghua, the leader of the Big Dipper Sect, during the sect's top ten competition. He try recruits Yunxiao, with his teleportation abilities, to launch the initial attack using his powerful flame. Tan believes that Yunxiao's attack will either seriously injure Zhang or at least create an opening for his pre-arranged ambush involving six of the sect's elders who secretly oppose Zhang.

Yunxiao, knowing the extreme risk, demands five billion superior-grade primordial stones as payment. Tan reluctantly agrees but secretly plans to let Yunxiao suffer Zhang's retaliation, hoping it will either kill or severely injure him, making him easier to eliminate afterward.

During the Big Dipper Sect’s top ten tournament, Tan Dijun disguises himself as one of the elders that yunxio killed before, waiting for the right moment to strike. In the competition,
Mei Dong'er
 faces Ying, who uses a Demonbeast transformation pill to overwhelm her. Just as Mei Dong'er is about to be killed, Yunxiao intervenes, drawing attention to himself and disrupting Tan Dijun’s assassination plan.

Zhang Linghua moves to suppress Yunxiao, severely injuring him even destroying his demonic armor, which corrodes his organs. However, Yunxiao retaliates, dealing serious damage to Linghua. Seizing the moment, Tan Dijun reveals himself and calls upon his loyal elders to finish off Linghua.

Thinking he has succeeded, Tan Dijun kills what appears to be Linghua only to discover it was the vice leader, who willingly sacrificed himself. The real Zhang Linghua, who had been in disguise from the start, reveals himself, now having reached the realm of a One-Star Martial Sovereign.

Instead of retaliating, Linghua offers Tan Dijun the position of vice leader and pardons the other rebels, choosing unity over conflict. He understands that internal strife would only weaken the sect against external threats. Realizing he has no choice, Tan Dijun accepts.

Meanwhile, Yunxiao, heavily injured, knows he cannot stay. Using his lightning transformation technique, he escapes. Even Zhang Linghua, now a Martial Sovereign, fails to catch him, leaving the entire sect in shock as Yunxiao vanishes without a trace.

After the failed assassination attempt, Yunxiao becomes the most wanted man in Nanhuo City. With Mo's help, he remains hidden while recovering from his injuries.

Meanwhile, Tan Dijun, Mei Dong'er, and other members of the Big Dipper Sect eventually cross paths with Yunxiao again this time at an auction house, where he is accompanied by
Mo Huayuan
 and
Hanxuan
. The auction, hosted by
Thunderwind Commerce Guild
, becomes the perfect setting for another deal.

Once again, they form an alliance, planning to create chaos during the auction while searching for the Scorpion Sect’s hidden treasure in the Land of Death.

Cultivation Technique







Mist Cultivation, That has corrosive power.

the imitation transformation technique is
Big Dipper Sect
 ultimate technique. is a powerful disguise technique that allows the user to take on the appearance of another person with astonishing accuracy. When disguised, the resemblance is so precise that it becomes nearly impossible to distinguish between the impersonator and the original.

Shameless Extortion Technique
 after getting in touch with Yunxiao. He applied this method by demanding an unreasonable compensation of
tens of billions of primeval stones
 from
Ying Lin
, exploiting the fact that Ying Lin had attacked out of anger.

Gallery

Tang Jie
========

He is the Young Master of the
Four Extremes Sect
 and the Son of
Tang Qing
. He is very talented, as he reached the Peak Nine-Star Martial Emperor in his 20s. Furthermore, he wields a 9th-Rank Profound Artifact, the
Vermilion Bird Saber
.

Plot

Light Song Forest

He faces a crisis as outsiders gather outside the sect branch's gates, targeting him due to his actions. He suspects the
Myriad Treasure Tower
's involvement and plans to confront the assailants. Tang Jie and
Elder Yu
 decide to take action but encounter a powerful group led by
Li Yunxiao
. Tang Jie wields a 9th Rank Profound Artifact, the Vermilion Bird Saber, and fights
Bin Jie
, showing his strength. Li Yunxiao deploys the
Imperial Bell
 and the
World God Monument
, surprising Tang Jie. The battle intensifies, and Tang Jie's confidence wavers as Li Yunxiao's strategic prowess becomes evident.

Mr. Yu
 intervenes, neutralizing the attack and causing confusion. Tang Jie's situation changes unexpectedly as attacking Martial Emperors disappear. Mister Yu identifies Li Yunxiao's eye technique as Lunar Imperfection and warns him about its risks. Tang Jie is taken away by Mister Yu, leaving Li Yunxiao intrigued and determined to face him again in the future.

Demon Origin Plains

Later,
Yu
,
Li
,
Shang
, and others are fighting off Spirit Rats repelled by the sound of war drums. Yu's arm is missing, and the group discusses their dire situation. Tang Jie, suggests they join the Four Extremes Sect. Yu, Shang, and others disagreed and tried to recover and discuss finding someone to repair the damaged Supreme Celestial Armillary Sphere.

After a while, Shang submits Tang Jie could help, and the group eventually agrees to join forces with him. Li helps Tang Jie recover but places the Seven Fiend Seal on him, causing intense pain. Shang explains their goals, including obtaining the
Eternal Evergreen Tree
. Tang Jie is tasked with coordinating their efforts through the Four Extremes Sect, to retrieve the tree.

After Tang Jie's confrontation with
Dan Yangze
 and the events that followed, he managed to gain control over the situation with the help of Shang and his monster companions. Dan Yangze, who had opposed him, was subdued and subjected to the effects of the Seven Fiend Seal, rendering him incapacitated. Tang Jie learned that Yin Feiyu had betrayed him and
Tang Xin
 had seemingly allied with the powerful Yu Clan. With the situation still tense and complicated, Tang Jie and his group refocused their efforts on dealing with Li Yunxiao and his allies.

After Tang Jie's failed attempt to bravely face the attacks, he and the other Great Monsters fled when faced with the
World God Monument
's descending strike by Li Yunxiao.
Fu
, attempted to strike the battleship with a powerful ninth-grade Xuan Artifact called the Xuan Flower Axe. To counter this,
Ye Fan
 revealed a Martial Will Pill that was enhanced with Nine Heavens Sovereign Qi, capable of withstanding the Xuan Artifact's impact. The
Tianyi Pavilion
 halted their attacks to regroup and prepare for the second round, while Fu remained poised to strike. However, Shang, suspected that the Tianyi Pavilion might have a countermeasure or trap in place, and the situation remained tense.

After a fierce battle between
Mister Yu
 against Li Yunxiao and
Gourd Little King Kong
, Yu and Yunxiao heavily injured. Suddenly
Shen Feng
 came in the back of the Rank Eight Demonic Beast, the Nine-winged Spirit Snake Bird, Yu requested Shen Feng's assistance in eliminating Li Yunxiao, to which Shen Feng agreed. However, at the crucial moment, a giant flying artifact, the
Money Chamber of Commerce
, intervened.
Qian Wudi
, appeared on the artifact and engaged in a verbal exchange with Li Yunxiao. After Li Yunxiao and Qian Wudi's intense negotiation, Qian Wudi agrees to trade Tianhun Herb, 1.2 billion mid-grade Primordial Stones, and additional resources for a mysterious item Li Yunxiao possesses.

This item turns out to be the Seven Constellations Martial Will Fruit, a potent treasure that Qian Wudi desires to boost his power. The exchange takes place amidst tense confrontations between various factions. Shen Feng, tries to attack Li Yunxiao, but
Zhang Hanzhe
 intervenes, leading to a standoff. Ultimately, the trade is made, with Li Yunxiao giving Qian Wudi the Seven Constellations Martial Will Fruit in exchange for Tianhun Herbs and primordial stones. Tang Jie and his group from the Four Extremes Sect left the scene.

Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

In a frozen landscape,
Li
's attempt to break the formation triggers catastrophic consequences,
Little Qing
, who has been observing, warns that disaster is looming. The formation's instability leads to the sudden rise of an enormous ice mountain that engulfs Li, while the surrounding area experiences chaotic shifts between the four seasons.

The mountain's peak undergoes rapid transformations, with spring, summer, autumn, and winter all manifesting at different levels. The mountain's appearance reflects the four seasons, with spring at the midpoint, peach blossoms, withered trees, and snow at the base. Meanwhile, an immense boundary of the four seasons emerges in the distance, revealing the Immortal Mountain of lord
Throne
. Tang Jie and
Dan Yangze
 discuss the significance of Throne's Immortal Mountain and its potential connection to the Heaven and Earth Chess Game, which Tang Jie hopes to solve for the Throne's inheritance.

Four Seasons Immortal Mountain

As
Zhang Shaotian
's Soul Devouring Gonfalon faces off against Tang Jie's Vermilion Bird Saber, the confrontation creates a stunning clash of power. Tang Jie's profound artifact is a ninth-grade weapon, and its overwhelming strength surprises Zhang Shaotian, making him realize the potential benefits of refining a ninth-grade profound artifact in conjunction with his Soul Devouring Gonfalon. This revelation adds to Zhang Shaotian's determination to capture Tang Jie and take advantage of his connection to the Vermilion Bird Saber.

As the battle unfolds, Tang Jie's fear reaches its peak as he witnesses the horrifying power of the golden soul slave when Zhang Shaotian extract the soul of the living
Dan Yangze
. However,
Shen Feng
 intervenes to save Tang Jie, suppressing the soul slave and briefly turning the tide of the battle. Zhang Shaotian retreats, and a standoff ensues between Shen Feng and Li Yunxiao's group.

Tang Jie seeks to persuade Shen Feng to eliminate their enemies, but Shen Feng hesitates due to the dangerous environment and the potential for wasting his strength. Li Yunxiao engages in a tense verbal exchange with Shen Feng, asserting that he is not afraid and even challenging Shen Feng's strength. Shen Feng eventually decides not to engage in a direct confrontation, opting to leave the situation for later resolution outside the barrier.

Shen Feng shares his findings about the Immortal Mountain's strange environment and the disappearance of Mister Yu and his group. They discover a peculiar cliff that absorbs divine sense and essence upon contact, revealing a hidden space resembling a giant chessboard.
Shang
 and the other Great Monsters, including
Yu
, also appear in this space. Tang Jie's eagerness for revenge against Li Yunxiao intensifies. Shang orders an attack against Li Yunxiao and his group, including Zhang Shaotian. However, the unique environment suppresses the use of Primordial Qi and Essence, rendering the attackers powerless. Li Yunxiao's true power becomes apparent as he effortlessly defeats Tang Jie despite the restrictions, leaving the group of Great Monsters stunned.
