Tang Qing
=========

The master of Red Moon City, Sect Master of Four Extremes Sect. Father of
Tang Xin
 and
Tang Jie
.

Personality

Tang Qing had the strength, courage, means, and was decisive in doing things. He was a very capable person.

Technique

the martial helmet, a battle armor in the air, protecting the vital parts of his body. He grabbed the finger helmet with both hands, with this armor equip his strength been raised to a higher level, and the original tired and weak mental state was swept away.

Tang Xin
========

Tang Xin, A  young master from the
Four Extremes Sect
, hailed as the wisest among the Merchant Union’s younger generation, He rumored to have inherited the array Dao of Martial Sovereign
Teng Guang
.

Plot

Song Yueyang City

Upon Li Yunxiao’s arrival in Song Yueyang City for the Alliance Merchant Martial Arts and Alchemy Competition, he invited Tang Xin and
Qian Wudi
 to discuss valuable information regarding the Heaven and Earth Chess Game and to uncover the truth about Tang Jie’s time in the Demon Origin Plains, particularly whether he had truly obtained Noah’s Ark. In exchange for this information, Li Yunxiao requested their cooperation in helping the
Tianyun Merchant Guild
 survive the impending crisis.

Crimson Crescent City Wedding

After a long period of secluded cultivation, Tang Xin finally broke through to the Martial Emperor realm. However, upon emerging, he was met with urgent news—if he did not appear within three days, the First Master would likely send someone to forcefully retrieve him, or worse, replace him entirely.

The true purpose of the upcoming wedding was clear to all: to solidify an alliance with the Jiang family and cement Tang Qing’s rule. The recent battle with the Sea Race had left the Eastern Region weakened, with Red Moon City suffering heavy losses. Yet, Tang Qing’s power had only grown stronger. With this marriage, his control over Red Moon City would become absolute. To many, this wedding symbolized the end of the old era and the dawn of the Tang family’s dominance.

Technique

throne's array Dao inheritance because the inheritance is engraved outside the sea of soul formation. Anyone who can crack it can get it.

Tang Yu
=======

Appearance

A woman in yellow.

Tang Yuan
=========

Tang Yuan was one of the participants in the
Mount Meru
 expedition. He teased Ding Linger, provoking a fight with her, and even challenged
Qian Wudi
 and
Shui Luoyan
 when they tried to intervene. When Li Yunxiao overheard Tang’s arrogant remarks, he offered the others a chance to earn his favor by beating Tang up in exchange for opening the barrier to the main palace. As a result, Tang was mercilessly beaten half to death by the crowd.

Background

Tang yuan was the direct disciple of the Tang family, the biggest force in the four extremes sect.

Tao Guan
========

Tao Guan was steward of Holy Fire Temple. He is strategist and the brain of the Sacred Fire Temple under
Ye Fan
 Commands. He, along with other high-ranking members, was on a mission to search for and retrieve their ancestral divine artifact.

Plot

Light Song Forest

Ye Fan
, Tao Guan,
Feng Zhu
, and
Qi Guang
 confront
Li Yunxiao
 in the Light Song Forest. Li Yunxiao cleverly takes Yi Fan hostage to initiate a negotiation. The Sacred Fire Temple seeks the Yang Key and believes it's linked to Noah's Ark. During the discussion, they tentatively agree to cooperate, aiming to rescue Tang Jie, take Yang Key and locate Noah's Ark. However, an explosion disrupts their conversation, leading to speculation about Tang Jie's rescue and the involvement of various factions.

As they observe the chaos,
Zou Chen
 offers his Time-fixing Plate to assist the crowd in tracking auras. Zou Chen uses the Time-fixing Plate to trace a lead to the east of the Demon Plains, where Noah's Ark might be located. Li Yunxiao's group proposes a plan to intercept the Skeleton Mercenary Group, discovering a teleportation array within their headquarters. They activate it and arrive in the Demon Plain, while other factions continue their pursuit of Noah's Ark.

Demon Origin Plains

After teleporting to the Demon Plain, Li Yunxiao's group discusses their encounter with the Skeleton Mercenary Group. The conversation shifts to
Ye Nantian
's notes about breaking through to the Divine Realm. Li Yunxiao seeks to view the notes, leading to a deal: he helps them obtain Noah's Ark in exchange for access to the notes. Tension arises when
Feng Zhu
 challenges Li Yunxiao's skills. Suddenly, the legendary creature "
Wu
" appears behind Li Yunxiao, leaving the group awestruck. The Wu enters its own body and disappears, a rare and enigmatic event that emphasizes the rarity and significance of the encounter.

Continuing their journey, the group finds a preserved corpse of a powerful Martial Supreme killed by
Young Master Hao Lian
. Concerns about Hao Lian's motives arise. Dark clouds gather, signaling the arrival of forces from other territories. Three formidable warships, two Rank 7 Golden Sun Warships and a Rank 8 Netherworld Warship, appear in the sky.  Amidst the warships,
Xuan Bing
 commands an attack from formidable warships, forcing Li Yunxiao's group to narrowly escape. Amidst the battle, the Imperial Bell emerges, withstanding attacks.
Feng Zhu
 and
Qi Guang
 join, using “Holy Skill” techniques to clash with Xuan Bing. The World God Monument appears and causes a warship to sink, leading to chaos.

Li Yunxiao suppresses the Netherworld Warship using the
World God Monument
, causing it to sink irreparably. Xuan Bing and his forces are left in shock and desperation over the loss of the two warships. Interrogating captives, they learn about involvement from the Feather Frost Sect, led by Martial Sovereign. The group continues its quest cautiously, sensing hostile auras ahead. Investigating the strange death of an eighth-rank Soul-shattering Tapir, the possibility of a Peak Martial Sovereign's presence raises concerns, as their pursuit of Noah's Ark could be threatened. Despite the fear and uncertainty, the members of the Sacred Fire Temple reaffirm their determination to continue their quest for Noah's Ark. They are motivated by their ancestral legacy and the opportunity to restore their sect's glory.

Ten Thousand Treasure Store
===========================

Redirect to:
Ten Thousand Treasures Store

Ten Thousand Treasures Store
============================

other translations: Myriad Treasures Store

General Information

The strongest among the
Seven Perpetual Chambers
.

History

The
Myriad Treasures Store
 is one of the oldest and most powerful merchant organizations in the world,
founded tens of thousands of years ago
. Its rise to power was not purely based on business acumen but was greatly aided by a
mysterious ancient treasure trove
 discovered by its founder. This treasure contained immense wealth, rare artifacts, and possibly even divine-level inheritances, which allowed the store to rapidly expand and eventually become
the number one Chamber of Commerce
 in the world.

Over time,
Myriad Treasures Store
 became the dominant force within the
Merchant Union
, controlling vast trade routes, precious resources, and rare cultivation techniques.

the

The
Great Bliss Formation
 is one of the
Three Ancient Ominous Formations
, known for its overwhelming and unpredictable power. This formation is so ancient and complex that very few people in the current era understand its true potential. Even with extensive knowledge of formations, only a fraction of its power can be activated—
even 10% of its full power is already devastating
.
Wan Yiqian
 planing to use this as his Ace against
Ling Baiyi
.

the ten thousand word Wang token

With this token, Yunxiao could
mobilize all resources of the Merchant Union at any time
, as seeing the token was equivalent to seeing Wan Yiqian himself. Only
five such tokens existed in the entire world
, making it a priceless asset. Not even the elders have the Royal token of ten thousand words. Only the tower master, the Grand Elder, and a few prominent big shots in the heavenly martial arts realm can have it.

Teng Guang
==========

Teng Guang
 (腾光), the
Throne Martial Sovereign
 (王座武帝), the
Sixth-Ranked Martial Sovereign
 on the
Heaven and Earth Power Chart
.

Appearance

A striking young man in a Guangling brocade robe, with long black hair flowing in the wind and jade-like eyes, warm and clear. His presence was mesmerizing, as if the world revolved around him, making him the undeniable protagonist of the moment.

Background

This creator of the incomplete Go game Teng Guang, and is called the 'Game of Heaven and Earth'. It contains his ultimate insight into the Dao of Arrays. Anyone who knows how to solve it can inherit his eight hundred scrolls of the Dao of Arrays and become a Master of Arrays. The reason he created the Go Game, Because he wanted to take in disciples, but none of those who went to him was gifted enough, which is why he had come out with this idea. Anyone who can fully understand the mystery in the game can become his disciple and inherit his Dao of Arrays.

Plot

Teng Guang was obsessed with pursuing the Heavenly Dao. To achieve this, he created 800 Dao Array Diagrams, trapping countless experts as test subjects for his grand experiment. His ultimate goal was to witness the evolution of a world, a rare opportunity he saw as a divine blessing. In his final pursuit of enlightenment, he was even willing to sacrifice himself, merging into the Great Void to attain the Great Dao.

In the final clash against
Shang
 and the
Ghost King
, both unleashed their ultimate techniques and wielded their profound weapons. However, Teng Guang drew upon the entire illusion's power, draining the martial artists trapped in the 800 Dao Array in an instant. Their strength converged into him, as his Dao Spirit absorbed the First Realm’s power, channeling it directly into his body, The sky shattered, and the earth crumbled, plunging everything into chaos. A terrifying force erupted in all directions, engulfing everyone in a whirlwind of destruction, as if the world itself was ending. The impact triggered a massive explosion, obliterating everything within a thousand miles, His 800-array formation collapsed, sending warriors flying—the weaker ones perishing instantly. At the battlefield’s center, a bottomless chasm split the land, marking the devastation. At this moment, the great illusionary land no longer existed. All the martial artists who were trapped inside and were lucky enough to survive when the illusionary land shattered had all come out.

Despite overwhelming his enemies, Teng Guang paid the price. His body withered, his life force drained, and his Dao Foundation shattered beyond repair. Knowing he wouldn’t survive, he ripped the Dao Fruit from his chest, forcing it into Yunxiao’s hands, urging him to leave. Yunxiao hesitated, knowing he lacked the strength to protect it, but Teng Guang, filled with despair and unwillingness, had already made his final decision.

As the Dao Fruit drifted away, The people around had long disappeared, all of them crazily snatching the Dao fruit fragments. Even beiming Nan and Fei Ni had disappeared in a flash, Teng Guang’s gaze darkened—his lifelong pursuit crumbling before him, leaving behind only emptiness and regret.

Teng Guang, gravely injured and coughing blood, could only bitterly laugh at his fate. Despite his pain, he urged Yunxiao to seize the Dao Fruit Fragment, believing that with Yunxiao’s talent, even a fragment could lead him to the God Realm’s Great Dao. However, Yunxiao refused, instead offering heavenly materials and earthly treasures to heal Teng Guang. Among them was the Nine-Five Supreme Pill, shocking Teng Guang, who questioned its origin. Yet, despite taking the pill, he remained disheartened, knowing his Dao Foundation was destroyed, leaving him with no hope of further advancement.

Yunxiao insisted that as long as one is alive, there is always a chance. With a sigh, Teng Guang reluctantly accepted, beginning his recovery—but his lifeless eyes revealed that his spirit had already crumbled.

Technique

the Great Void Illusory Realm/The great illusionary land
 A true king-level killing array which create his own World and turned illusionary into reality, is a deadly formation that activates when his life is in danger. it ensures that if he perishes, All the living Even those divine transcendence experts can not escapeand  will be buried alongside him.  This is his final, most fearsome life-saving measure.

This Divine Formation Diagram is one of the ten ultimate techniques of Guang. As the light of the formation's first earthly phase intensified, the entire world was engulfed in lightning and demonic Qi. Under its radiance, everything became clear—the formation manifested as a massive cross-shaped vortex of light, spanning several acres. When the spiraling force of light descended, it split the earth for a thousand miles, creating a bottomless, terrifying chasm.

The Heaven and Earth Ruyi Yin Thunder Fire Formation was a devastating technique. Teng Guang’s towering golden figure formed in the sky, commanding billions of Yin Thunder Fire Beads to create a massive array. With a single hand seal, the beads detonated, flattening the land and leaving behind an unfathomably deep sinkhole filled with chilling energy.

World Cage is Teng Guang’s powerful technique that creates a subspace supported by five sky-high pillars. These pillars transform into five massive mountains that descend from above, trapping everything within their crushing domain. Although his World Cage was impregnable, it was still inferior to the Taiwu profound Yin soul slaying formation of the
Crimson Crescent City
.

God-slaying, and it was extremely powerful. It could kill all living beings within the formation light.

the heavenly immortal mountain was not as overbearing as the Tushita heaven, it was full of the power of the rules of the Four Seasons and was a profound level weapon.

seven profound-level weapons—each embodying wind, rain, fire, thunder, frost, snow, and fog—to form a powerful elemental formation. After years of refinement, he merged these forces into a single, majestic domain, with each weapon serving as a core, creating a world of its own. As their energies intertwined, they filled the sky with overwhelming power.

Trivia

Dead Cause - He was blown up with his Thirteen Fatal Formation while attacking Six Wing invasion in realm of Heavenly master arts.

Teng Guang was one of the few people who immediately saw through
Li Yunxiao
 true identity as Gu Feiyang at first glance.

Teng Guang deeply admired and was most impressed by Gu Feiyang, whose bold and unconstrained ideas mirrored his personality. Gu Feiyang’s insights provided great inspiration in Teng Guang’s pursuit of the Heavenly Dao, It was truly an unforgettable time.

There are five titled martial sovereigns that traped by his array in Red Moon City
Duanmu Yuyu
,
Liu Feiyan
,
Yao Jinliang
,
Xuan Hua
, and
Gu Feiyang
.

Terms
=====

Explanation of the different positions/ranks in Sects and Merchant Associations.

Sect Master/President

The head of a Sect/Merchant Association and usually the strongest person.

The 7 Major Forces Sect Master are estimated to be at the
Divine Transcendence Realm
, while the Merchant Associations Leaders are estimated to be peak
9 Star Martial Sovereigns
, with the exception of Ten Thousand Treasure Houses Wan Yiqian, who is at the Divine Transcendence Realm.

Vice Sect Master/Vice President

The second-strongest person in a Sect/Merchant Association or on equal footing with the Sect Leader/President.

Young Palace Master/Young Master

The greatest talent(s) of a Sect/Merchant Association. They are usually the future head of a Sect/Merchant Association. In case of several young masters the future leader gets decided through various means (competition, cultivation, talent).

Elder

There can be several divisions for Elders:

Supreme Elder

The strongest of all Elders. Usually living in seclusion. Cultivation can be equal or higher to the Sect Masters.

Great Elder

The strongest Elder below the Supreme Elder. Leads all the other Elders.

Guardian Elders

In some branches of 2nd/1st-Rate sects and above, they are the strongest cultivators below the Branch Master. Leads all the other Elders.

Elders

The strongest Cultivators of a Sect, most trustworthy people.

Guest Elders

Not an official member of the Sect/Merchant Association, but acts as kind of a supportive force.

Disciples

Core Disciples

Very talented people among the disciples, and the disciples of the Sect Master or Elders.

Inner Disciples

Talented people among the disciples.

Outer Disciples

The ordinary disciples with average cultivation talent.

Old Ancestor / Ancestor

People coming from the
Eternal World
. They are from 100.000 years ago, when the Divine Realm Rules were still present in the
Heavenly Martial Realm
. Some are the founders of sects in
Great Tianwu
 or from
hidden families
, who reside in the
Four Seas
.

The Sky Locust Sect
===================

The Sky Locust Sect is based in the qiyun mountain range. It's just a small sect, But it still has over a thousand years of history.

Background

The Sect Master, Neng Feichen, Is a Nine-Star Martial King. There are two Vice Masters, A Seven-Star Martial King and a Five-Star Martial King. There are also a dozen or so Martial Lords. Those lower than a Martial Lord number in the thousands. The whole sect only cultivated in The Mountains, And never cared about The Outside World.

The star and moon school
========================

The star and moon school a large part of business is selling information.

Background

The star and moon school/Xingyuezhai, rose up in a short time and became one of the seven Chambers of Commerce. Although they had a wide background and resources, they didn’t have a strong foundation, and their main business scope was in the North Region. Although there was a branch of the star and moon school in Yongxiang city, it was very simple and had few people. It couldn’t even be compared to the market of an ordinary Chamber of Commerce. The star and moon school is still an Independent School for the time being. When the divine cloud Palace comes out of seclusion, it will be under the name of the divine cloud Palace.

the
Star and Moon School
 rose to power rapidly due to the
backing of
Ten Thousand Treasures Store
, one of the most influential forces in the world of commerce. Although the
Divine Cloud Palace
 had some influence, they were merely a cover. The true force behind their sudden rise was
Myriad Treasures Store
, which provided them with resources, support, and territory, including taking over the
Four Extremes Sect’s
 business operations and transferring them to the
Star and Moon School
.

Structure

ji Zhengde, The person in charge in Yongxiang branch was not old, about thirty years old, but his body was short and he looked very smart.

Three Directions Ghost Eye Curse Seal
=====================================

Description

It is a seal When used it on someone, It will not only prevent them from absorbing any Yuan Qi to Cultivate, But Will Also Constantly Devour Their Cultivation, Causing it to Slowly Fall. It can be undone Automatically and the method is very simple the individual who is sealed just have to castrate himself. It is an ancient seal Discovered by Gu Feiyang, he than changed the seal a little, leaving the victims with the ability to break the seal on their own. Their is one more method that require caster blood to be undone.

Known Victims

Duan Yue

Ren Bubai

Known Users

Li Yunxiao
 A.K.A Gu Feiyang.

Hua Qianshu

Mo Xiaochuan

Haolian Shaohuang

Three Wises
===========

Yan Jin, Gongsun Rang, and Yu Zixian, known as the Three Wises, were Kong Renyi’s most esteemed disciples, embodying Loyalty (Yan Jin), Righteousness (Gongsun Rang), and Wisdom (Yu Zixian). Though respected for their intellect and morals, they secretly aligned with Qin Yang, the ambitious prince seeking the throne. Instead of using force, they waged ideological warfare, rallying public sentiment and Confucian ideals, and were leading a public outcry against
Li Chunyang
 to undermine  influence
Li Family
.

Tian Si
=======

Appearance

The man held a golden war spear across his shoulders.

Plot

One of the Sanctum’s rulers, Lord Hei Yuhu joined forces with Nangong Buhai, the leader of the Nangong family, and several other top experts to launch an assault on Yue Tong. The Sacred Zone’s attack on the Moon Pupil resulted in heavy casualties, with countless deaths and injuries. Even Lord Hei Yuhu suffered severe wounds in the battle. Despite their combined efforts, Yue Tong also sustained serious injuries. However, after this battle, the Moon Pupil mysteriously vanished from the sight of all major forces, leaving no trace behind.

Five Cloud Mountain

Tian Si and Ning Keyue propose an alliance, offering to help Huang eliminate the human warriors except for Li Yunxiao in exchange for access to the Space of Nothingness.

Tian Xingzi
===========

Plot

He disguised himself as
Su Ping
 and pretended to be the direct disciple of the Sect Master, while the Vice Sect Master
Tian Yue
 disguised himself as Tian Xiangzi. They planned to kill the
Soul Devourer Sect
's Sect Master, which required the disguise as part of their plan. While
Huangfu Bi
, the Sould Devourer Sect's Sect Master kills Tian Yue, thinking he killed Tian Xingzi, the latter disguised as Su Ping ambushes him. After almost succeeding in killing Huangfu Bi,
Nanqiu Yu
 the Master of the
Natural Moat Order
 appears in the
Battle Soul Mountain
 and saves Huangfu Bi in the last moment.

Power

The Soul-Severing Sword is a rare and powerful mystical weapon designed specifically to sever a person’s soul rather than their physical body. Extremely difficult to forge, it is rarely seen and highly coveted for its unique ability to cut through and destroy spiritual essence.

He dies in the Tiandang Mountains in a fight against the devils from the Demon World.

Tian Zhao ZI
============

Trivia

Amaterasu has always been a free-spirited, reclusive cultivator.

Tian Zhao Zi
============

Plot

Five Cloud Mountain

Amid the war against the monster race, He appeared alongside
Si Tingyu
 and
Cangwu Qiong
, bringing reinforcements to support the human forces. He engaged in a duel against
Ai
, the greatest alchemist of the monster race.
During the intense battle between Ai and Amaterasu, their spiritual powers clashed, causing fluctuations in the earth's rhythm. Both were injured, with Amaterasu in worse condition. Recognizing Amaterasu's weakness due to age, Ai suggested ending the battle. Amaterasu, feeling guilty over her loss, agreed.

As they began to withdraw their spiritual powers, a black-robed figure silently approached. Without warning, the figure struck Ai, shattering his head and killing him instantly. The sudden betrayal shocked everyone, especially Amaterasu, who was devastated. The attacker revealed himself as Shentu Yixiao, head of the Shadow Department.

Tiandang Mountains
==================

Collision point of
Demon Realm
 and
Heavenly Martial Realm
.

The Tiandang Mountains are the place where the sky is buried, an extremely dangerous place even for peak Cultivators of the Heavenly Martial Realm. An unparalleled proof regarding this is the fact that Gu Feiyang (
Li Yunxiao
), one of the top three in the Heaven and Earth ranking competition perished in the Tiandang Mountains, making his death a clear indication that this place is dangerous to any existence in the Heavenly Martial Realm.

Force

The Golden Lion Army
 had a history of hundreds of years guarding Whitehead Town, and ahead of them was the Great Python Mountain where demon beasts roamed.

State Guardians

Locations

Capital City
 (Captial of the Tianshui Kingdom)

Martial Flame City

Baitou City (City protected by The General of the Golden Lion Army,
Cang Liqun
)

Kunjin City (City protected by The General of Tianshui Feilong Army,
Li Changfeng
)

Yangpu City (Wu Liantian, was the Lord of the City) Yangpu was the hub that connected the east and west of Tianshui, which made it far more important than other cities. And because of its strategic location, it was also one of the most prosperous cities.

Trivia

In the state of Tianshui, whenever someone was promoted to a first-tier alchemist or stepped into the Three Powers realm and became a Great Martial Master, the king would host a feast at the palace, inviting all the dignitaries to celebrate.

Apart from a limited number of Martial Lords, Great Martial Masters were the strongest forces in the entire state of Tianshui. Even in the State Guardians, the number of Great Martial Masters in each unit was extremely limited.

Ever since Yanwu had become a Holy Land for cultivation, all the countries and sects in the southern region had sent their outstanding disciples there.

Tianwu Continent
================

The majority of humans in the
Heavenly Martial Realm
 lives on the Tianwu Continent.

Four Regions

The Tianwu Continent divided into Four Regions, the Southern Region is the weakest in terms of overall strength and cannot compete with the other three realms.

Northern Region

Eastern Region

Said to have existed for tens of thousands of years on the Tianwu Continent and on equal footing with the Divine Capital of the
Holy Region
.

True Dragon
===========

Background

The real Dragon and the heavenly Phoenix are born by gathering the essence of heaven and earth. They are the embodiment of the true 'Dao' of the heavenly martial realm, just like the Brahm Zifu apocalyptic godly Thunder. They are 'spiritual creatures' to carry out the Dao on behalf of heaven. When the heavenly martial realm is in chaos or crisis, the real Dragon and the heavenly Phoenix will be born.

The inheritance of the true dragon is different from that of the heavenly Phoenix. The true dragon is born from the heaven and earth. After every generation of the true dragon dies, a new Dragon will appear.

Known True Dragon

Che You

Yin Yu

Trivia

It was said that the ancient true dragon was a Blue Dragon/Azure Dragon.

the heavenly Phoenix's true tail feather is the origin of the true dragon.

True Spirit Fire Phoenix
========================

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
True Spirit Fire Phoenix
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Background

the real Dragon and the heavenly Phoenix are born by gathering the essence of heaven and earth. They are the embodiment of the true 'Dao' of the heavenly martial realm, just like the
Brahma Zifu apocalyptic godly Thunder
. They are 'spiritual creatures' to carry out the Dao on behalf of heaven. When the heavenly martial realm is in chaos or crisis, the real Dragon and the heavenly Phoenix will be born.

the inheritance of the celestial Phoenix relies on the power of the bloodline to pass on its inheritance. When the heavenly Dao needs it, someone with the bloodline of the celestial Phoenix will appear and grow into the new generation of the celestial Phoenix. Because of that The heavenly Phoenix bloodline was considered an invisible bloodline. It was extremely rare in the inheritance, and even if it appeared, it was difficult to stimulate its power. However, the inheritor of the bloodline back then was extremely talented, far above feini. However, Qianqian died before she could step into the world King realm and grow into a true Heavenly Phoenix, thats the reason why heavenly Phoenix bloodline appear since 100.000 Thousand Years ago.

Tu Lei
======

Tu Lei, an Enforcer and Elder from the Thousand Crane Pavilion, was one of the top authorities representing the three major forces in the South Domain, along with
Fang De
 and
Huang Xiaolong
.

Plot

During the battle, Tu Lei was present when
Luo Qingyun
 used a powerful mental attack through the mesmerizing sound of the Spirit Heaven Ring to affect
Li Yunxiao
. He witnessed the struggle Li Yunxiao faced in countering the mental attack due to his lower cultivation level. Tu Lei was amused by Luo Qingyun's confidence in his mental attacks and watched as the battle intensified.

As the fight between Li Yunxiao and Luo Qingyun escalated, Tu Lei was among the enforcers who set up a barrier to contain the powerful attacks unleashed by both fighters. He observed the intense clashes, including the use of profound techniques and powerful treasures by Li Yunxiao and the demonification process activated by Luo Qingyun using a mysterious pill.

Later, He was saved Luo Qingyun, by surrendering on his behalf, Li Yunxiao emerged victorious with over a thousand crystal stones. As the remaining 132 crystal stones couldn't be found due to the damaged array, the enforcers decided to end the competition and activate the teleportation array to send everyone back.

Tu Lei was also present when Li Yunxiao announced his plan to auction entry quotas to the Veiled Desolation in Flame Martial City. Although this decision astonished some participants.

Tusita Heaven Peak
==================

General Information

An extremely heavy
Xuan Artifact
. It's refined from mutated earth elements. Due to its high weight it's extremely slow when used in attacks, hence Yunxiao uses it in combination with his
Moon Eyes
, catching the enemy off-guard through illusions. It crushes almost everything in its path and is also used as a shield against strong attacks. Upon obtaining the Tusita Heaven Peak it is three-colored, its perfected form is said to be seven-colored.

History

 Obtained 3 colored Tusita Heaven Peak.

 Refined to 4 colors with mutated earth element from
World God Monument
.

 Refined to 5 colors with filthy Earth Element of the Netherworld.

 Refined to 6 colors with Five Cloud Mountains Mutated Earth Element.

 Refined to 7 colors with Strange and Traceless Land with
Nanqiu Yu
.

Twelve Capital Divine Thunder Array
===================================

Description

An Array that causes lightning to strike. It attracts thunderbolts from the nine heavens based on the strength if the people setting it up, The strengths of the Thunderbolts attracted will differ. If twelve Martial Sovereign used it. It could attract the strongest brahma's periwinkle World Destroying Divine Thunder. It is one of the Three Heavenly supreme arrays of heavenly night palace.

Known user

Li Yunxiao

Heavenly Night Palace

Twelve Swords of Lingyun
========================

The Twelve Swords of Lingyun are an elite assassin organization known for their ruthlessness and ambition. They have risen to prominence after the downfall of the Eight Elephants of Death, positioning themselves as the most feared killer group in the world. Each member is a highly skilled martial artist, with several among them reaching the Nine-Star Martial Sovereign level. They are currently in Xinyan City, preparing to assassinate
Ling Baiyi
, one of the
Conferred Martial Sovereigns
, and aiming to establish themselves as the top assassin organization.

Members

Zu Gaoyuan

(Leader)

Xiang Hefeng

(second brother)

Tang Yu

(third brother)

Two World Mountain
==================

the two world Mountain, which used to be a Holy Land for reclusive cultivators.” The two world Mountain had a great reputation in the area of jinzhang city. Although it was not a sect, it was more famous than a sect. Back then, almost all of the wandering cultivators in the North Region gathered here and made this spiritual mountain and great River their temporary residence for cultivation.

Plot

After 100.000 years The Beiming family discovered an ancient martial arts ruin in Two World Mountain and initially sealed off the area to explore it alone. However, instead of finding treasures, they suffered heavy losses, with powerhouses falling one after another. Even the two high-level Martial Sovereigns overseeing the site perished.

With the beiming family’s nature, they would definitely transfer the risk to someone else. Thus, they opened the seal and spread the news, asking everyone to take the risk and die for them. Along with The Duanmu family use their divination skills The fact that the phenomenon here requires the use of a black-level divine lot is already enough to explain the problem.

Tyrant Body Tempering Art
=========================

The
Tyrant Body Tempering Technique
 is an ancient and powerful
body refinement method
 found within the treasure trove of Myriad Treasures Store. It was a
peerless
 and nearly
godlike technique
, meant to push one’s physical body to near-indestructible levels, making the user akin to a
divine being
 in the mortal realm.

The technique was unique in that it
could not be learned through traditional means
, such as jade slips or written manuals. Instead, it required a
special medium of inheritance
, meaning it could only be
passed down to a destined individual
. Once inherited, it could not be transferred to another person, making it a
one-time-only
 opportunity.

Since reaching the
Immortal State
 had become impossible in the current world, the
Tyrant Body Tempering Technique
 was one of the few remaining methods for a cultivator to achieve
godlike power
 through sheer physical strength.

Wan Yiqian initially intended to pass down the
Tyrant Body Tempering Technique
 to a suitable successor who could help strengthen Myriad Treasures Store. After careful consideration, he approached
the Ao Family
, a
hidden aristocratic clan
 known for their expertise in physical cultivation.

Trivia

Ao Changkong
created the first part
 of the technique to
test
 whether anyone outside the Ao Family could
inherit and cultivate it
. He entrusted it to Myriad Treasures Store, Wan Yiqian, recognizing Gu Feiyang exceptional abilities, was chosen to receive the technique. , in turn, passed it to
Yunxiao
, unknowingly setting him on a path toward
unraveling the full mystery
 of the Tyrant Body Tempering Technique.

=======

Unnamed East Sea

 your

 about

 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

History

Sealed in the East Sea by four peak 9th rank weapons: Daqiao Bugong Sword, Phoenix-feathered purple gold crown, golden chain mail, cloud-walking lotus silk shoes and by the  Supreme Grade weapon Lotus throne of Fa Hua.

His consciousness got destroyed by the sea race people. The
Rainbow Stone
 sealed with it formed its own consciousness and turned into
Xiao Hong
. Its power ended up being absorbed by
Di Ye

Wan Yiqian
==========

A cunning old man, who has a good relationship with
Gu Feiyang
.

Appearance

Wan Yiqian is an elderly man with a dignified and shrewd appearance. He has long, flowing white hair and a neatly kept beard, He carries a Vermillion cane, known as the
Red Dragon Staff
, which enhances his projection ability and allows him to fly even in his non-physical form.

Plot

New Yan City

Wan Yiqian, approached Li Yunxiao, in the
New Yan city
 hoping to enlist his help against
Ling Baiyi
, who had disrespected the merchant alliance. Though normally cautious, Wan admitted this was one of the riskiest moves in his life. He offered Yunxiao a rare merchant token, granting full access to the Union’s resources, showing his sincerity. Yunxiao, however, was uninterested, believing the plan was too dangerous. Wan tried to persuade him, reminding him of their past agreement and his strong martial heart. Despite Yunxiao’s refusal, Wan hinted at deeper secrets, insisting that the Myriad Treasures Tower could offer him great benefits. He invited Yunxiao to discuss further in a safer place, wary of prying eyes. Though still hesitant, Yunxiao accepted the token, knowing its value, and pondered the situation as Wan’s projection vanished.

After the battle in
New Yan City
,
Wan Yiqian
 suffered a devastating blow, both physically and politically. As the head of
Myriad Treasures Store
, the most powerful faction in the
Merchant Union
, he had long been a dominant force in the business world. However,
Ding Shan's betrayal
 and his
expulsion from the Council of the Business Alliance
 shattered his standing overnight.

The shock of being cast out left
Wan Yiqian
 in a furious and desperate state. His rage nearly pushed him to self-destruction—
he attempted to detonate his dantian and the Cosmic Light Plate
 in a last-ditch effort to take
Ding Shan
 down with him. However, his attempt was thwarted by
Cangwu Qiong
, the ruler of the Sanctuary, who effortlessly sealed his divine weapon and stripped him of his chance at vengeance. At that moment,
Wan Yiqian realized that Ding Shan had been backed by the Sanctuary all along
,

Originally part of Ten Thousand Treasure Store's Ancient Treasure Trove, the
Tyrant Body Tempering Art
 was inside a medium of inheritance. Wan Yiqian sold it to the
Ao Family
, one of the
Hidden Families
.

Later, as a token of gratitude they gave Wan Yiqian the first part of the
Tyrant Body Tempering Art
 in a Jade Slip and the promise to owe him a favor.

Wan Yiqian sold Gu Feiyang
Tyrant Body Tempering Art
, but didn't tell him that he only got the first part of that technique. He wanted to see the consequences of only cultivating the first half of that technique.

Power

The cosmic light plate was a profound level weapon. The other half of it was called the universe light plate. The combination of the two was famous even in the ancient times.

Trivia

Wan Yuan
========

Wan Yuan, was one of the expert that invited by
Ding Shan
 to refining the
Nine Yin Nine Yang Pill.

Plot

Wan Yuan suffered a horrifying fate due to the failed alchemy process involving the
Nine Yin Nine Yang Pill
. Initially, he was struggling to maintain his strength, but after consuming
Ding Shan’s secret restoration pill
, he felt an overwhelming surge of power. Encouraged by this sensation, he continued pushing forward in the process. However, something went terribly wrong.

Instead of being replenished,
his body began to rapidly wither
, as if all his energy and life force were being
drained away
. His
eyes sank in, his skin shriveled, and his veins became disturbingly visible
 beneath his pale flesh. In mere moments, he was reduced to
a skeletal husk.

This terrifying scene sent
shockwaves through the group
, as they all began to experience
similar symptoms
—extreme exhaustion, wrinkling skin, and fading vitality. The situation revealed that Ding Shan had orchestrated some kind of sinister energy-draining
alchemy formation
, absorbing the life force of everyone present
except himself and Yunxiao
, who had also begun
absorbing the surrounding yin-yang energy
 to strengthen himself.

As the realization dawned on the group,
panic and chaos erupted
. It became clear that
Ding Shan had betrayed them
, using the alchemy process to
drain their strength for his own benefit
. Even the strongest among them, including leaders of powerful factions, found themselves helpless as their energy was continuously siphoned away. Meanwhile, Yunxiao—realizing what was happening—
followed suit and absorbed energy himself
, drawing Ding Shan’s ire.

Wan Yuan’s fate became a
warning to the others
: if they didn’t find a way to stop this process, they would all end up
drained lifeless like him
.

He is a Third-Tier Alchemist, he is very talented and no one dare to provoke him as he is a direct disciple of the Seventh-Tier Emperor-Grade Alchemist,
Yang Di
.

Plot

The Golden Crow Arena

He attends the banquet and places a significant bet of five million high-grade elemental stones on Li Yunxiao's victory against Zhou Yushan. Despite the potential risk of losing such a large sum of money, Wang Chen showed confidence in
Li Yunxiao
's strength and potential to win the duel. Later,
Cheng Xiaolan
 congratulate for his win.

Wang Da

Miao Xuan Sect
, met his end in
Yufeng City

Mei Dong'er

Wang Feng, was a Teacher from
Blue Jewel Academy
. He help his nephew
Lan Fei
 conspire to eliminate
Li Yunxiao
. As a teacher, Wang Feng cannot act without reason, so he plans to become the chief examiner of the upcoming assessment. If the student fails to display chakra light, he will use academy rules to expel him, making him vulnerable to an ambush before reaching home.

Wang Gong
=========

Wang Gong was the sect master of one of the top ten sects in the
Northern Region
. He was currently cultivating to reach the peak of the Martial Emperor realm with all his might.

Plot

Wang Hong first appeared in the vicinity of
Yufeng City
 when the battle between his son and
Li Yunxiao
 spread, forcing his son to break the Life-Saving Jade which contained a trace of his Divine Sense. He briefly confronted Li Yunxiao but soon retreated, as the spirit technique that allowed him to possess his son's body had limitations.

Wang Mang
=========

This page is a
Stub
.

.
Please help by

 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme

improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

He is the Head of the Wang Great Family of the
Duskflame Empire
. He is one of the High-Ranking members in the Shangyang City and the entire Duskflame Empire.

Plot

During the confrontation between Yunxiao and the Zhou family, Wang Mang was among the onlookers and didn't intervene. UntilYunxiao expressed gratitude towards
Baili Gongjin
,
Wang Chen
,
Cheng Feng
,
Mo Zhai
 for their care and support. This surprised and shocked the onlookers, including Wang Chen, Cheng Feng, Mo Zhai, and
Zhou Changfa
.

Zhou Changfa demanded an explanation from them, Mo Zhai from the Mo family, claiming that Yunxiao was attempting to sow discord among them. Chen Feng  supported him, defended himself against the accusation and denied any planning. While Wang Mang Explained that he did indeed know Li Yunxiao. But he merely had a business transaction with him.

Wang Qiang
==========

He is the son of the
Master of the Heavenly Jewel Sect
. He is one of the most talented persons in the younger generation of the
Duskflame Empire
. As he reached the Martial Grandmaster Realm at such a young age for the
Southern Region
.

Plot

Mount Meru

Initially, He betrayed his fellow companions during a fight with a powerful stone beast. He abandoned them to save his own life, seeking safety on Li Yunxiao's Cyan Wolf Chariot. Later, Wang Qiang tried to rush from Yunxiao's chariot since the 7-Rank stone beast approaching them, when Li Yunxiao saw through his plan, Wang Qiang panicked and offered to share a valuable treasure map in exchange for sparing his life. Li Yunxiao accepted the map.

However, Li Yunxiao, being aware of his treachery, refused to take him with them when they used a short-distance teleportation formation to escape from the stone beast. Instead, Li Yunxiao extorted one billion mid-grade Yuan Stones from Wang Qiang, making him sign an IOU for the amount before leaving him behind to face the stone beast alone.

While escaping, Yunxiao and the others come across a bunch of people who fight for a seven constellation
Dao Fruit
. Luo Yunshang manages to snatch it with the help of the little green demon.

Before people can get agitated about it, the Stone Beast manages to catch up. Sitting in the same boat, the people join forces to take it down. After destroying the Stone Beast's physical body, its "heart" remains, which allows it to recover its body again. Before that happens, Yunxiao manages to subdue it.

After that, Wang Qiang, takes Luo Yunshang hostage in an attempt to get the Dao Fruit. However, before Yunxiao can make a move, a passage opens and swallows all people present.

Wang Songhe
===========

He is the Master of the Heavenly Jewel Sect, one of the three great experts of the
Duskflame Empire
. He, along with
Qi Feng
 of the Heaven-Gathering Sect and
Leng Xingbo
 of the Emotion Severing Mountain, were the symbols of the Duskflame Empire's martial path.

Plot

When Li Yunxiao, demanded the repayment of two billion mid-grade Primordial Stones owed by the sect's young mast
Wang Qiang
, Wang Songhe initially refused to pay, claiming it was a personal matter. Li Yunxiao threatened to take Wang Qiang's life as compensation, but later decided not to kill him and instead, came up with a plan to humiliate him and earn money. Wang Songhe then proposed a deal to Li Yunxiao, offering a
Divine Body
 called the "Bright Moon Divine Physique," which is a rare divine body that can be passed down through their sect's Legacy Land. Li Yunxiao agreed to try the inheritance and surprisingly succeeded in obtaining the Bright Moon Divine Body. As a result, the debt was considered nullified, and Li Yunxiao, along with his companions, used the sect's Inter-district Teleportation Formation to leave the Heavenly Jewel Sect.

Martial Flam City Coup d'état

Under the guise of "acting in the best interest of the Southern Region," Wang Songhe was actually taking advantage of the situation to openly seize control of Yanwu City. Seeing the city's crisis as an opportunity, he challenged the Li family’s rule.

Although Yanwu City had been entrusted to Li Yunxiao by the King of Tianshui, Wang Songhe argued that Tianshui was merely a vassal of the
Duskflame Empire
. Therefore, by his reasoning, his disciple,
Xin Ruyu
, had a greater right to rule the city.

With this, Wang Songhe attempted to rally support with help
Leng Xingbo
,
Yu Zizhen
, and
Fan Long
, using righteous-sounding words to justify his blatant power grab.

Not long after
Li Yunxiao
 suddenly arrived at Martial Flame City, putting an abrupt end to Xin Ruyu's ambitions. In a decisive move, Yunxiao crippled Xin Ruyu. In the face of yunxiao anger Wang Songhe, caught between powerful factions, attempted suicide to protect his family, believing it was his only way out. However, his death was merely an illusion, leaving him unharmed. As he stood in shock, Li Yunxiao coldly reminded him that his fate was not his own to decide, making it clear that he was now entirely at Yunxiao’s mercy.

He along with others that take part in this were given a chance at pardon on the condition that they destroy their own dantians as a form of punishment.

Wang Zhen
=========

Young master of
Miao Xuan Sect
.

Appearance

A man in a sky-blue long robe led the way in with a gloomy expression. His long hair was scattered behind him, and he exuded a cold aura.

Ploy

Wang Zhan led his forces to the Mei family restaurant for revenge but was easily overpowered by Li Yunxiao with the help of
Gourd Little King Kong
. Forced to flee, he used an Ancient Spiritual Escape Talisman, but Yunxiao pursued and cornered him. In desperation, Wang Zhan summoned his father's divine sense to possess his body for battle. However, due to its time limit, his father retreated, leaving the fight unresolved

Water Dragon Roar
=================

Water Dragon Roar is based of a water-based martial techniques, which Li yunxiao was able to freely used.

Every element and techniques were originally one, meaning it is just a transformation of the five elements.

As long there is control and understanding,
Li Yunxiao
 was able to use water techniques, and that's how Water Dragon Roar was 'created'.

Wei Hongfu
==========

Wei Hongfu is the dedicated steward in charge of the
Southern Region
 for
Ten Thousand Treasures Store
, first among the Merchant Alliance Perpetual Chambers.

Plot

Martial Flame City Auction

When
Li Yunxiao
,
Ding Ling'er
, and their group encounter
He Feng
 from
Mando Chamber of Commerce
 and
Shui Luoyan
, Wei Hongfu steps in to maintain order. He shows his strength by effortlessly stopping Hefeng's attack on Li Yunxiao.

Wei Hongfu later reveals that he was sent to the Southern Region by Ten Thousand Treasures Store to oversee and protect their interests during the opening of the Mount Meru. He discusses the importance of safeguarding Ten Thousand Treasures Store's position in the region during this critical time when various forces may attempt to infiltrate the Southern Region.

He initially expresses frustration and incredulity when Li Yunxiao proposes that the Ten Thousand Treasures Store takes a back seat and lets the Alchemist of Alchemists handle the auction affairs during the opening of the Mount Meru. However, Li Yunxiao persuades him by explaining the benefits of the Ten Thousand Treasures Storer's involvement, including an increase in prestige and the Alchemist of Alchemist's contribution of precious elixirs and profound artifacts for bidding.

Wei Hongfu eventually agrees to Li Yunxiao's proposal and decides to support the auction, with the Ten Thousand Treasures Store playing a supporting role. He also shows goodwill towards Li Yunxiao and Ding Ling'er, as he believes Li Yunxiao's connections and abilities are extraordinary, making him a person to be cautious around.

As the Flame Martial City prepares for the opening of the Mount Meru, Wei Hongfu oversees the setup of the prohibitive array and the toll booth for all entering cultivators. He works to maintain the interests and reputation of the Ten Thousand Treasures Store during this critical time, while also respecting Li Yunxiao's suggestions and supporting the auction.

Wei Qing
========

He is one of the Five Rulers of the
Holy Region
, he is an existence that can even make the
Conferred Martial Sovereign
,
Li Huachi
 fell in deep thoughts before even trying to fight him.

Appearance

Wei Qing had a lazy yet dignified presence. His clear eyes held a mysterious charm, and his handsome features, combined with his flowing hair, gave him an effortless elegance like a deity among men.

Personality

Wei Qing is a man of great talent and strategy. His schemes are deep, and his methods are fierce.

Plot

Martial Flame Crisis

Wei Qing, a powerful and mysterious figure, appeared in the sky above Yanwu City accompanied by the Year Burial Beast and
Yao Jinliang
, the Divine Command Martial Sovereign. They demanded the whereabouts of two siblings named
Meng Wu
 and
Meng Bai
. However, they couldn't find them, and Wei Qing used a mental attack to scan the crowd but didn't discover their hiding place in the
World God Monument
.

Wei Qing intended to use a transcendent-grade profound artifact, capable of breaking a realm, to locate the siblings.
Li Huachi
, the
Heavenly Zither Martial Sovereign
, tried to dissuade him due to the potential catastrophic consequences of shattering the realm, but Wei Qing was persistent. Li Huachi finally agreed to cooperate with Wei Qing to find the siblings and requested the Sanctuary to issue an iron law preventing other forces from interfering with
Yanwu City
.

After Li Huachi used his zither to control the crowd and made fell asleep for three days, Wei Qing and the others left, leaving Yanwu City in a state of awe and fear.

Crimson Crescent City

Wei Qing arranged for
Yang Yuanshu
 to attempt to kill
Ning Keyue
 at Purple Cloud Peak in the
Eastern Region
, near
Crimson Crescent City
. Out of concern, Qiu Mujie and he hire Ling Baiyi who felt frustrated and humiliated after his invasion of Crimson Crescent City, but knowing Ling Baiyi personality, he knew that there was a chance that the Conferred Martial Sovereign would not finish the job.

Hiding one of his expressionless puppets inside the Purple Cloud Peak, which results in Ning Keyue near death at the hands of Wei Qing, but, he is stopped by
Murong Zhu
, possessed by
Tian Si
.

Later, he steals Golden Dragon Bones from the Land of Rain and implants them into his body, which allows him to fight and leave
Ning Kewei
 on the brink of death in the disaster that reduced the Crimson Crescent City to a deplorable state.

From this intense and extensive battle between different sides seeking to gain benefits, Wei Qing appears with the intention of replacing the Crimson Crescent City Lord with the exquisite genius
Luo Qingyun
, who was under his orders and guidance. Introducing the Asura Ghosts in combat and the revolutionary and maniacal idea of creating True Spirit Blood.

After countless battles, Luo Qingyun and
Li Yi
 are allocated the position of Lord and Vice-Lord of the Superpower that undergoes drastic changes. After these events, Wei Qing sends the
Shadow Department Leader
 to Wufa, but unfortunately gets into an intrigue with the Rulers after receiving news that the Department Leader died.

Heavenly Dragon Sect

During
Fei Ni
 return to the
Heavenly Dragon Sect
, in the Long Family of the Sky Peak, Wei Qing seeks to intervene in Fei Ni goal of taking the position of Superpower Master, seeking to place his subordinate, the most powerful among the Long Family Elders, in the position. Because, with control over the Heavenly Dragon Sect in hand, Wei Qing could manufacture more Asura Ghosts and advance his research.

After revealing the
Sword of Judgment
 in his short combat with Che You, Wei Qing is convinced by Li Yunxiao and leaves the Sect. Which gives Li Yunxiao and Fei Ni a chance to take the position of Master of the Long Family of the Sky Peak, ensuring the protection of Fei Ni Martial companions.

Five Cloud Mountains

During the war with countless twists and turns in the Five Cloud Mountains, Wei Qing debuts
Meng Bai
 and his abilities, exposing the Phantom Asuras alongside his father and nearly killing
Huang
, the King of Monsters as he displays his skill with the Blade of Judgment, which provokes the wrath of Ruler
Hei Yuhu
.

Eternal World

Entering the
Eternal World
, Wei Qing, along with
Wei Wuya
,
Luo Qingyun
,
Li Yi
 and others... He steals one of the Four Pavilions that open the passage to the Eternal World.
 During the business deals arranged with
Yin Yu
 partner, they momentarily face
Feng Yaoli
, and Li Yunxiao companions. Receiving as a small payment for stopping Feng Yaoli antics, the Yin Yang Bottle, one of
Demon Emperor Di
 three Saint Artifacts.

Unfortunately, during the period in the Eternal World,
Lin
 helps Luo Qingyun break through the barrier of
Divine Transcendence
, causing the young man to reach the
Peak of Perfection
, which creates a distance between Wei Qing and Luo Qingyun, turning the two into Master and Subordinate relationship. And with Ling Baiyi death, Wei Qing suffers even more misfortunes.

Ganbo Mountain

After killing
Cangwu Qiong
, Li Yunxiao goes to Wei Qing hideout, and while fighting a battle with the hundreds of Asura Ghosts who, with the method of overcoming Wei Qing "Genetic Chain" limitation, delivered by Gongyang Zhengqi through a partner, all attained Divine Transcendence.

After a short battle with Wei Wuya and the Asura Ghosts, Li Yunxiao notices that with the aid of the Saint Artifact, Wei Qing has reached the Peak of Perfection, and after a discussion, Li Yunxiao decides to let Wei Qing continue with the new Heaven and Earth Power Chart competition, which was created to attract strong people who could be transformed into Asura Ghosts. This forms a small partnership between the two.

Power

Wei Qing possessed the Daluo Golden Bones, a golden bone banner inscribed with intricate runes. To further enhance himself, Daluo Golden Bones was one of the heaven-defying cultivation techniques that could change the age of bones.
He even utilized Qiu Mujie’s secret art, a technique that allowed him to transplant a powerful true spirit body into his own. This modification enabled him to wield abilities exclusive to those with a dragon bloodline, such as the Golden Dragon Claw and Dragon’s Roar.

References

Wei Wuya
========

Appearance

An old man's  wearing His green robe, he had silver hair and fluttering white beard, and he looked like an immortal.

Plot

Holy Region

Wei Wuya communicated with Wei Qing through the blood-red water mirror, discussing Yuan Gohan’s attempt to enter the Divine Capital to meet Amaterasu. However, Wei Qing had already suppressed the request and was now plotting to eliminate Yuan. He sought Wei Wuya’s help in suppressing Tenshou, Yuan Gohan’s master.

Five Cloud Mountain

Wei Wuya arrived with forty-nine Ghost Asura, briefly repelling the monster forces. Though he held an advantage in his Void Prime State,
Huang
 gradually absorbed his power. Even Wuya's Divine Skill, Sunshine Brilliance, was rendered useless. Exhausted and severely injured, Wei Wuya was forced to retreat.

Trivia

Wei Wuya could only last 20-40 minute in the void extreme realm before got suppressed by the Tianwu rules.

Western Region
==============

General Information

One of the
Four Regions
 of the Tianwu Continent. The Qi concentration is slightly weaker than the
North Region
's and as dense as the
East Region
's.

Major Forces

Yan Shuangfei

Lu Daozi
)

World God Monument
 as it is released. We will fix it.

When the Tianwu Realm was first born, the Heavenly Saint Artifact Realm Divine Monument, which was created by the power of the world,

General Information





World God Monument - Manhua Ch. 61



Li Yunxiao
 found it in the Li family's treasure
. It's a spatial
Xuan Artifact
 and contains a world of its own. He is unable to refine it and only has basic control over it. Later, he learns the
Godly Realm Technique
, which gives him a more thorough control over the World God Monument.

Yunxiao uses it to store his treasures, imprison useful enemies, safekeeping his friends, subordinates, and family as well as means of fighting and cultivating.

Inside the World God Monument are 4 Territorys:

Fire

Wind

Earth

Water

Yunxiao reactivates them with the help of the
Divine Phoenix Flame
,
Immemorial Astral Wind
,
Breathing Earth
 and
Natural Water
 Elements, which are all close to the origin of their respective element.

The World God Monument has an
Artifact Spirit
, which is needed to complete it once again. It disappeared in Ancient Times.











Fire Domain



Usage

Yunxiao uses the power of the four domains to crush or suppress people, battleships, buildings, etc. He later manages to condense the chains of law which are condensed from Realm Power, able to suppress everything, tho due to Yunxiao's low mastery still weak.

Origin

The World God Monument is a heavenly supreme artifact born from the world. It's the symbol of controlling the power of a world. Each world only has one heavenly supreme artifact.

Residents

Friends, Subordinates, Prisoners who reside in Yunxiao's World God Monument.

Permanent

Duan Yue

(originally imprisoned, later became subordinate)

(originally imprisoned, later became subordinate)

Yanwu City
 before Yunxiao enters

Li Yunxiao

(current)

Plot

To become a monument, firstly abandon the flesh, and secondly become a slave to the World God monument. To say good to the guardian of this world. For example, the True Dragon, the nature, are the same as the World God monument. It is born of the boundaries of one world and inherits the will of this world.

But to become a monument, not only to abandon the flesh, but also in the blood will leave the mark of the spirit of the monument. This brand is actually a double-edged sword. In your descendants, because of the blood, you get the favor of the boundary. No matter, in talent, cultivation, and opportunity, it will be far better than ordinary people . But because of this kind of care, your achievements will always be suppressed in the territory of the king, and will be controlled by the boundary forces.

The original messages were recorded in the World God monument, the consciousness left by the kings of the ages. Although it was incomplete and chaotic, but because the information covered was very comprehensive, Li Yunxiao completely digested it, and suddenly grasped the seven eight. In the past, before the World God monument, the World God monument will refine it with great power, or plant it, destroy its body and make it a servant, just boarding in the World God monument. At the same time, the servant is washed by the boundary force to help him reach the World King Realm.

This process, when each generation of World God monument is majored in the peak of the creation, will be automatically triggered. And rare contenders, most of which can only be accepted as a spirit, become a slave to the World God monument. But there are also some extremely powerful existences. Although they are only the peak of the creation, they can compete with the power of the World King, thus maintaining the interdependence and not being refined by the World God monument. But since then it has been suppressed by the World God monument, it is difficult to take a step forward.

If someone rushed to the World King, the World God monument will be helpless and could not control them. What's more, after the revitalization process of the World God monument was triggered, not only was it not refining the World God monument, but it was mainly anti-customer, directly refining the World God monument. But such a presence is rare even in the endless years of Heavenly Martial World.

The ruthless consciousness that Li Yunxiao got was seldom, but it was too long to be recognized.
 After refine the World God monument By Li Yunxiao, The power that comes out of the World God monument at the moment is very different from the previous one. The gap is like the Martial Warrior and the Martial Sovereign. Although only one word is missing, it is a far cry.

The bearer of the World God Monument is Titled as the World God/God of the Universe, capable of controlling the rules of the Realm.

Trivia

the divine realm tablet not only has its own world, but it also involves the realm power of the heavenly martial realm and connected to the realm power of the heavenly martial realm.

References

Wu
==

Wu
 is one of the true spirits of heaven and earth, but whether it's at the Ten Directions Divine Realm or not is unknown.

General Information

Among the many ancient true spirits, this one is the most mysterious. No one has ever witnessed it taking action, and it seems to lack sentience, or its intelligence is nearly nonexistent. Every time it appears, it merely hovers in space before slowly vanishing. Its disappearance isn't a retreat into the void, but rather it devours itself.

Once, a powerful expert attempted to tame a 'Wu' as his own beast companion, trying various methods. Eventually, 'Wu' sustained an injury and began to devour itself slowly. After a long period, when 'Wu' reappeared, it was injured!

Some later scholars specifically researched 'Wu.' After all, ancient true spirits had completely disappeared. To unveil the secrets of the Ten Directions Divine Realm, 'Wu' became the ultimate subject of study. What astonished everyone was that 'Wu' possesses an exceptionally unique spatial aspect within its body, distinctly different from our common understanding of the void. After 'Wu' devours itself, its entire body enters that space. Nobody knows how many long years will pass before it re-emerges.

However, over these many years, few have witnessed 'Wu' appearing, and even if they did, they wouldn't recognize it. It doesn't harm anyone.

Wu Dacheng
==========

Appearance

The young man had delicate features and was fair and tender. He could be considered a handsome man, but he had a bit more of a Rouge-like aura. there’s really some resemblance, with the real
Li Yunxiao
.

Plot

Dacheng impersonated Li Yunxiao in an attempt to marry the two daughters of
Yongxiang city
 City Lord. However, during the grand celebration, the real Yunxiao appeared and exposed his deception. Enraged, Yunxiao mercilessly slapped Dacheng until his face swelled beyond recognition, turning purplish-red like a pig’s head.

After enduring enough of a beating, Dacheng finally confessed his true identity. With no further use for him, Yunxiao handed him over to City Lord Song Guang, who, furious at the deception, subjected him to relentless torture—an ordeal that likely led to his demise.

Power

In fact,  he was quite strong, and with his endless nonsense, he dared to say anything, which was why he could deceive people time and time. But unfortunately, the gap between him and the real li Yunxiao was too great.

Trivia

After all, Yunxiao had fought several times in Red Moon City, and thousands of people had seen him. He had only imitated him after watching from a distance.

Li Yunxiao
 hate him because he impersonate to get a cannon not to commit murder, arson, and robbery.

He is Good at running away and impersonating.

Wa Guang, was son of
Wu Liantian
, the City Lord of Yangpu. When he first appears, he tries to buy both the Gulan Leaves and
Meng Wu
 as if they were mere commodities, when he offends Yunxiao and his group. He is quickly and mercilessly beaten up by them, Even after getting beaten, he still does not learn his lesson and calls for reinforcements. However, he is completely unprepared for Yunxiao’s response. When Yunxiao summons an army of two thousand elite warriors Heaven Core, Wu Guang finally panics and clings to his father for help.

Wu Jinzun
=========

the president of the Luo qu Chamber of Commerce, Wu jinzun was a pragmatic leader in the Merchant Union who prioritized benefits over loyalty. He supported
Tang Xin
 of the Four Extremes Sect, believing her inheritance of Martial Sovereign
Teng Guang
 array Dao made her the strongest of her generation.

Plot

Wu Jinzun faced a coordinated assault from
Li Yunxiao
 and
Mo Xiaochuan
. Yunxiao first disrupted his mental state by using a spiritual attack, catching him off guard. Mo Xiaochuan then followed up with a devastating sword technique. Wu Jinzun attempted to resist with his unique skill, Point Out Ten Directions, Flying Waterfall Meteorites, but it was ultimately overpowered by Mo Xiaochuan’s supreme sword energy.

Despite his formidable strength, Wu Jinzun's defenses crumbled. His armor was destroyed, and his body was severely wounded, rendering him powerless. Yunxiao, maintaining complete control of the situation, coldly declared that the Luoqu Chamber of Commerce had no choice but to submit to
Tianyun Merchant Guild
. Wu Jinzun, heavily injured, collapsed in defeat.

Wu Liantian, the corrupt City Lord of Yangpu, tries to appease Yunxiao after his son,
Wu Guang
, causes trouble. He underestimates Yunxiao, offering a small bribe while secretly hoarding massive wealth. When Yunxiao’s troops seize his mansion and expose his hidden fortune, Wu Liantian panics, revealing ties to Prince
Qin Yang
. Despite his desperate pleas, Yunxiao confiscates the riches and redistributes them, After being humiliated, Wu Liantian sought revenge by calling for General
Cang Liqun
 army, but Yunxiao easily defeated them. In the end, Yunxiao returned and executed Wu Liantian and his son, putting an end to their corrupt rule.

Wuqing Sect
===========

The Wuqing Sect is one of the
Hidden Families
 that has remained hidden from the outside world, residing inside the vast inner space of a
Gluttonous Snake
 an eighth-rank peak-level sea snake, several hundred feet long, This hidden family, residing inside the snake, had concealed themselves so well that no  that very few even know of their existence.

The sect controls access to their hidden domain through a hundred feet high beacon tower, which serves as a sentry post linking the inner and outer worlds. This tower, standing a hundred feet tall, allows only those approved by the sect to pass through.

While the Wuqing Sect is the most dominant force within the hidden space, two other factions exist there as well—the Wuxiang Sect and the Guijia Clan. However, the Wuqing Sect maintains control over all entry and exit points, meaning that members of the other factions require their permission to travel outside.

Merciless Bell can send people directly into the deep water path, but it can’t bring them back. The two spaces will indeed cross each other, but there is a power limit. Those who have grasped the power of rank five rules will not be able to penetrate the barrier between the two spaces.

the deep abyssal water track/deep and secluded water path was wuqing sect’s land of exiles For disciple who has made a grave mistake will be banished there. Once they enter, They can’t come out.

Plot

As Li Yunxiao and his party entered the Wuqing Sect’s territory to borrow their treasured artifact, the Merciless Bell, they quickly realized that something was amiss. Unbeknownst to them, someone had arrived before them and had already caused devastation—killing the Sect Master of Wuqing Sect in the process. Their arrival, unfortunately, coincided with the aftermath of this attack. The remaining members of the Wuqing Sect and two of their all still in shock and angered by their leader’s sudden death, immediately turned their suspicions toward Li Yunxiao and his companions. Believing that their Sect Master's murder was directly linked to Yunxiao's arrival, the Wuqing Sect accused them of orchestrating the attack. Tensions flared, and the sect’s forces prepared for confrontation.

Trivia

The three sects have always been subservient to the
Corpse Fiend Sect
.

Wushang Palace
==============

The Wushang Palace lies within the borders of The Duskflame Empire.

Background

The Palace Lord,
Ma Tianhe
, is a Three-Star Martial Grandmaster. The Vice Palace Lord,
Ma Feibai
, is the Son of The Palace Lord. He became a One - Star Martial Grandmaster. there are Four Martial Grandmasters who are The Palace Lord, Vice Palace Lord, and two elders, Elder
Qi Zhenzi
 is One - Star Martial Grandmaster. The other Elder Is
Yi Baoxin
, He's a Two - Star Martial Grandmaster...There are Six Martial Kings, called the
Six Children of Wushang
. martial artists below Martial Kings amount to several thousand at best, among them, we have over 30 Martial Lords with varying levels of strength.

Force

Six Children of Wushang(Supreme Six)

Xi Yulun
========

Xi Yulun is the deputy leader of the Soul Devouring Sect.

Appearance

Xi Yulun was wearing a loose black robe with countless golden skulls painted on it.

Personality

Xi Yulun is a cunning and ruthless schemer, loyal to the Soul Devouring Sect. Arrogant and manipulative, he twists words to corner his opponents while exploiting any weakness. Sharp and opportunistic, he respects power but doesn’t hesitate to strike when the advantage is his.

Plot

When he encounters
Su Ping
 and his group in Battle Soul Mountain, he immediately accuses them of killing sect members, using it as justification to escalate tensions. However, his true goal is revealed when he acknowledges that Tian Xingzi, the powerful master sitting atop the giant deer monster, is in an abnormal state.

Seizing this opportunity, Xi Yulun confirms the intelligence his sect received—likely from their spy, Youmi—and aims to manipulate the situation for his benefit. His ultimate objective is to weaken Wanxing Valley while asserting the Soul Devouring Sect’s control over Battle Soul Mountain. As tensions rise, he gathers all nine elders of his sect, indicating his willingness to wage an all-out war, regardless of the consequences.

Xia Jiong
=========

Xia Jiong, the young sect master one of the
Hidden Families
 Phaseless sect. finds himself in a fierce dispute with his brother
Xia Qiong
 over the
Narcissus
, a woman who catches their attention. Initially, Xia Jiong sees the water deity as a prize to be claimed, arrogantly believing that he has the right to save her and make her his wife.

Xia Qiong
=========

Xia Qiong the young sect master one of the
Hidden Families
 Phaseless sect. As the oldest, and more powerful of the two brothers, sees his younger sibling's advances on the
Narcissus
 as a direct challenge. He is infuriated by
Xia Jiong
 behavior and feels that his younger brother is overstepping his bounds. As the confrontation intensifies, He views the dispute not just as a fight over the water deity, but as a battle for control and future power within the family.

Xiao Hong
=========

SPOILER ALERT!

She appears as a shy girl, carrying out minor tasks in Thunderwind Chamber of Commerce.

Apearance

A beautiful young girl with a delicate face wore a long white coat embroidered with a bright red flower.

Background

Xiaohong, was the spirit of the rainbow stone who recognized
Li Yunxiao
 as her brother in the East China Sea!

History

She first appeared in Haitian Town as a little girl of 12 years old.

Because of the strange aura
Yunxiao
 felt he took her in his
Divine Realm Tablet
 to further examine her. There she was swallowed by a "
Neon Stone
". At that time, Xiaohong absorbed the neon stone and combined it into a perfect neon body. Later, she was possessed and captured by
Di Ye
, and her whereabouts have been unknown since then.

Hidden Families

Martial arts competitions

Yunxiao Unexpectedly, meets her again in a
Martial arts competitions
 for the
Ancient Treasure Trove
 of
Ten Thousand Treasure Store
. She seemed to have gained back control over her body and suppressed Di Ye. Although her cultivation seemed to be that of a four star Martial Lord her actual combat power was even superior to that of a
Divine Transcendence
 being.

When Yunxiao left the competition, after using a teleportation array, he gets ambushed. It turns out that Xiao Hong personality split due to Di Ye influence. Her 'bad' personality, which was stronger than her 'good' personality, was the leader of the so-called "Heaven Alliance", a force consisting of hidden sects. She tries to kill Yunxiao. During their fierce fight, she can no longer suppress Di Ye and the latter once again gains control over her body. After an earth-shattering battle Yunxiao retreats while Xiao Hongs condition is unknown.

Heaven of Langya

Amidst a fierce battle with Jing Qi and his fiend corpse puppet, Xiao Hong intervenes, now more composed and mature. She urges Yunxiao to stand by her side, insisting that she remains unchanged despite Di Ye’s presence within her.

Yunxiao, however, refuses unless she severs ties with Di Ye. Their rift deepens when Xiao Hong requests the magic stone sword, a weapon of great significance. Viewing it as a threat, Yunxiao flatly rejects her, leading to a brief yet intense clash.

As tensions rise, Xiao Hong reveals the impending opening of the demonic realm, a revelation that unsettles Yunxiao. Despite their lingering bond, they part ways Yunxiao determined to move forward, and Xiao Hong resolute in her path. Though their confrontation ends, the weight of their unresolved conflict remains.

Trivia

She was the second girl after ding Ling'er whom Yunxiao had intimacy(intercourse) and in this case Yunxiao was forced by Xiao Hong to do so .

Xiao Minghui
============

Xiao Minghui, he sect leader of the new moon sect.

Appearance

A middle-aged man in white. He was dressed like a scholar and had the aura of a sect leader.

Personality

Xiao Minghui carried an air of gentleness and elegance in both his actions and speech. However, his words were sharp and carried great depth, reflecting his wisdom and magnanimity.

Xiao Qingwang

Chronology

Cultivation

Techniques

Relationships

Xiao Qingwang is a Martial King and a high-ranking commander of the
Tianshui Kingdom
. Once a powerful and influential figure, his authority has gradually weakened over the years, to the point where he can no longer fully control all five units of the State Guardians. Just like
Chen Dashen
, he was afflicted by extreme cold poison after participating in the ranking battle 5 years ago, which significantly hindered his strength.

Appearance

He had a facial complexion that looked like iron, his air as mighty as mountains and rivers.

Personality

He values honor and loyalty, showing a strong sense of duty to repay kindness. Despite his waning influence, he remains a respected and formidable figure in the kingdom.

Backgroud

Xiao Qingwang was no ordinary general. Unlike those who fought for wealth or titles, he fought for the
state itself
. His loyalty did not lie with a crown but with the very existence of Tianshui. To him, rulers were fleeting, but the land and its people endured. He saw weakness and corruption spreading like a disease, and he did what warriors do best
he cut it down without hesitation
. Even the royal family was not spared from his ruthless justice.

Plot

Since his internal injuries healed, his strength has been continuously improved. In addition, as a senior executive of Yanwu City, he had received great support from the Tianyuan Chamber of Commerce, and his strength has also improved by leaps and bounds. Now he is a two-star martial master.

Trivia

Xiao Qingwang

Chronology

Cultivation

Techniques

Relationships

Plot

Reunion

When he reunites with Chen Dasheng and Li Chunyang, he is shocked to see them alive and even more astonished by Li Chunyang’s advancement to Martial King. After learning about Chen Dasheng’s suffering, he regrets not being able to help earlier. When Yunxiao offers a cure for his cold poison, Xiao Qingwang is deeply grateful and agrees to fulfill three requests in return, as long as they do not put him in an overly difficult position.

124 Generals(the first requests)

When the Central Army, led by
Prince
Qin Yang
, refused to mobilize against the invading
Baizhan Army
, they expected to act without consequence. But Xiao Qingwang did not tolerate defiance. In a display of absolute authority, he summoned the
five elite units of the State Guardians
 and
ordered the capture of all 124 generals
. No negotiation. No mercy. His judgment was swift—
they had disobeyed the imperial edict and would be executed
.
