Xin Pi
======

He is one of the Xin Imperial Family, the great uncle of the
Duskflame
's emperor, and the dean of the Hall of Tributes/Exalts. Xin Pi was almost a god-like existence in Shangyang City, and His words are worth their weight in gold. The emperor managed normal matters. However, Xin Pi was the one who dealt with matters that were beyond the power of the emperor. His seniority was even above the emperor's, and he was almost the True Ruler of Shangyang City.

Plot

The Zhou Great Family Crisis

Xin Pi played a crucial role in mediating the conflict between Yunxiao and the Zhou Great Family. When Yunxiao threatened to activate the self-destruction of the Green Phoenix Floating Battleship and the Six-Universe Star Observation formation, causing panic among the onlookers, Xin Pi stepped in. He pleaded with Yunxiao to stop, fearing the catastrophic consequences that would follow.

Xin Pi recognized the danger posed by Yunxiao's threat and understood that the Zhou family's reputation and the lives of many innocent people were at stake. He urgently appealed to Yunxiao to reconsider and offered to mediate a peaceful resolution between the parties involved. Despite the initial reluctance and defiance from Yunxiao, Xin Pi's persistence and understanding of the gravity of the situation eventually convinced Yunxiao to halt the self-destruction.

Furthermore, during the negotiation process, Xin Pi played a key role in agreeing to Yunxiao's conditions on behalf of the Zhou family. He conceded to Yunxiao's demands for the release of
Qin Ruxue
, the compensation of Five Million Mid-Grade Primordial Stones, a public apology to
Tianshui Kingdom
, and compensation of Fifty Million Mid-Grade Primordial Stones for Yunxiao's losses. Xin Pi's agreement was driven by the understanding that the consequences of refusing Yunxiao's conditions and allowing the self-destruction of the warship would be catastrophic for the Zhou family and the entire Shangyang city.

The Golden Crow Arena

Xin Pi tried to mediate the situation when Li Yunxiao arrived at the arena with a powerful Martial Grandmaster level demonic beast, stunning everyone. The Zhou family accused Li Yunxiao of cheating in the duel and demanded proof of his beast-taming abilities. Li Yunxiao demonstrated his control over the demonic beast, making it obey his commands, silencing the accusers and impressing the crowd. Later, when Li Yunxiao refused to fight without the beast,
Zhou Changfa
 negotiated and compensated him with Sixty Million Mid-Grade Primal Stones to put it away.

During the duel, Li Yunxiao displayed incredible agility and physical strength with his
Heavenly Tyrant Body Tempering Technique
. He neutralized the powerful strike of Martial King
Zhou Yushan
 and counterattacked with exceptional comprehension and skill in his sword technique.
Xin Ruyu
 observed the performance and saw Li Yunxiao as a formidable rival.

Xin Pi observed the duel between Li Yunxiao and Zhou Yushan and noticed Li Yunxiao's use of seals that even surpassed the Floating Life Seal of
Yang Di
. He discussed this with other experts, speculating that Li Yunxiao might be a successor of one of Gu Feiyang's disciples. Xin Pi also witnessed the intense clash between Li Yunxiao's Heaven and Earth Seal and Zhou Yushan's Snow & Frost Bright Sword, resulting in Zhou Yushan's disappearance from the stage. Xin Pi was shocked by Li Yunxiao's strength and calmly assessed the situation, realizing that there was no one in the
Southern Region
 capable of killing him.

After the duel, Li Yunxiao demanded 100 Million middle-grade Spirit Stones from Xin Pi to settle the matter. The Zhou Great Family suffered a significant blow to their reputation due to these events. Zhou Yushan's death and Zhou Yangbiao's punishment.

Later, he brought the stones to Li Yunxiao in the Duskflame's Association of Alchemist, and he was present when Li Yunxiao defeated a three Rank-Four Alchemist and takes the fifth-tier badge. Then he told Li Yunxiao about the competition in Qionghua Island for the younger generation to get spots on the
Mount Meru
 secret realm.

Qionghua Island

He, along with
Chu Yu
 and
Huo Sen
, oversees the proceedings on Qionghua Island to determine who will obtain the slots to enter the secret realm. When
Li Yunxiao
 arrives at the Tiger King Chariot, Xin Pi becomes relieved, as he was worried about Li Yunxiao's absence. He later gets into a confrontation with Chu Yu, another Martial Emperor, but is interrupted by Huo Sen, who urges them to focus on the competition for the slots.

As the competition progresses, Xin Pi remains confident in Li Yunxiao's abilities, particularly after witnessing his performance against a Martial Grandmaster in Shangyang City. Xin Pi also supports Li Yunxiao when Chu Yu tries to provoke him. However, he also becomes wary of potential conflicts escalating into a larger-scale war between Empires.

Additionally, Xin Pi is unaware of the plot involving the Zhou Family, one of the four big families of the Fire Crow Empire, who secretly seeks to have the
Tianxiang Empire
 to kill Li Yunxiao in the competition, he is still aware of
Luo Qingyun
's mysterious background and strength, but he remains confident in Li Yunxiao's abilities and believes he can handle any challenges.
References

Xin Ruyu
========

He is the prince of the
Duskflame Empire
, and one of the most talented persons of the younger generation in the Southern Region. He considered as the most talented person of the younger generation in the Duskflame Empire. Furthermore, he cultivated two heavenly techniques, which are the Heavenly Jewel Sect's Twenty-Four Bridges of Moonlit Night, and the Heavens-Gathering Sect's Void Scripture.

Plot

After The Golden Crow Arena

He, along with his mentor,
Yue Jiulin
, intercepts
Li Yunxiao
 and
Duan Yue
 as they leave Shangyang City. Xin Ruyu tries to intimidate Li Yunxiao into submitting to him, offering him a chance to become his servant and spare his life. Li Yunxiao refuses and attacks Xin Ruyu, displaying impressive speed and power. However, when Yue Jiulin intervenes, Li Yunxiao realizes that he and Duan Yue might not be able to defeat them in a direct confrontation.

Just as the situation becomes tense,
Baili Gongjin
, arrives with a group of men on a majestic Tiger-Shaped War Chariot. He questions Yue Jiulin's intentions for intercepting the Association's alchemist, Li Yunxiao. The situation becomes complicated, leaving Yue Jiulin in a situation he hadn't anticipated.

Li Yunxiao calls out Xin Ruyu for his arrogance and disrespect towards alchemists, revealing that the Alchemist Association has issued a pursuit order against him. This revelation surprises Yue Jiulin, who realizes the gravity of the situation.

As the confrontation intensifies, Baili Gongjin offers Xin Ruyu a way out, advising him to apologize to Li Yunxiao to resolve the matter peacefully. Xin Ruyu becomes angry, but eventually swallows his pride and leaves the scene with Yue Jiulin, heading towards Shangyang City.

The Martial Flame City Crisis

During the Martial Flame City crisis, Xin Ruyu took advantage of the chaos to stir up trouble. With Yanwu City’s spiritual energy depleting, he openly declared his intent to take over, claiming the Li family was unfit to rule. Backed by background as prince of
Duskflame Empire
, his master
Wang Songhe
, major force from
Duskflame Empire
, even one of 7 major power in tianwu
Beiming Dark Palace
 he sought to seize control of the city and its remaining resources.

Xin Ruyu ruthlessly struck down those who opposed him, severely injuring
Qian Duoduo
,
Li Changfeng
, and Xiao Qingwang as they tried to stop his takeover. Determined to eliminate the
Li Family
 influence, he even attempted to kill
Li Chunyang
. However, just as he was about to strike the final blow, Yunxiao suddenly appeared and stopped him.

Yunxiao reveal that Xin Ruyu managed to open 6 Gates of the human body with the help of a Unamed Master. Yunxiao then destroys all his 6 Gates and with that his Cultivation. Later he searches his soul, completely turning him into an idiot, before killing him.

Trivia

Xiaofeng Can/
Pan Yi
  taught Xin ruyu the divine ability in the hopes that he could cultivate it and see if he could improve on his Foundation. Thats why he have stayed in this cave and not out to see the world.

References

Xin Ze
======

He is one of the Xin Imperial Family, the great uncle of the
Duskflame
's emperor, and a Fourth-Tier Alchemist from the
Duskflame Empire
's Alchemist Association. Even if he is not a High-Tier Alchemist, he is still a renowned figure in the Shangyang City duel to his relationship to the current emperor.

Plot

Duskflame's Alchemist Association

Xin Ze is one of the three Rank-Four Alchemist masters present during the confrontation with Li Yunxiao. When
Li Yunxiao
 challenges all three of them to a duel, Xin Ze becomes offended by his arrogance and accepts the challenge. He, along with the other two alchemist masters, show off their most precious treasures to use as gambling stakes.

Xin Ze presents a seventh-tier quality
Cosmic Sun Note Jade
, which greatly enhances an alchemist master's refining abilities. The other two alchemist masters,
Lu Haochu
 and
Ge Xiangqian
, offer a
Heavenly Flame Battle Flag
 and a pair of
Purple Cloud Centipede Wings
, respectively, as their gambling stakes.

To everyone's astonishment, Li Yunxiao claims that someone will bring the 100 million mid-grade primal stones for the gambling bet soon. Xin Ze, initially skeptical, is proven wrong when his brother,
Xin Pi
, arrives and hands over the 100 million mid-grade primal stones as promised.

Despite the disbelief and shock from the other alchemist masters, their confidence in winning the bet is gradually shaken as he observes Li Yunxiao's demeanor, which shows deep certainty of victory against the three of them.

The Alchemy Competition

As the competition begins, Li Yunxiao surprises everyone by suggesting that each of the three alchemist masters will condense one primal stone, while he alone will condense two primal stones simultaneously. This shocks the three alchemist masters, as it increases the difficulty of the competition significantly.

Despite their anger and disbelief, they continue with the competition. Li Yunxiao impresses them with his mastery of the Twelve Forms of Flying Flower and Falling Snow, a set of refining techniques created by the renowned alchemist, Gu Feiyang. Li Yunxiao's use of these advanced techniques and his overall proficiency in alchemy leave the three alchemist masters in awe and shock.

Finally, Ge Xiangqian can no longer hold back and attacks first, using the same method as Li Yunxiao to condense his primal stone. The competition is now underway, and everyone is eager to see who will come out victorious.

Ge Xiangqian managed to raise the primal stone to a low-grade level but exhausted a lot of energy in the process, leaving him visibly fatigued. Next, Lu Haochu took over, using his Yamata Branch Heart Cultivation Mantra to condense the primal stone. His technique was beautiful and dreamy, but he also struggled to match Li Yunxiao's level of refinement.

Li Yunxiao, on the other hand, effortlessly advanced his primal stone to the middle grade, showcasing his superior understanding and control of the Twelve Forms of Flying Flower and Falling Snow. He surprised everyone by using a new and mysterious technique called the Scripture of Rippling Mirage. The technique impressed even Baili Gongjin, a rank six alchemist, who recognized its profoundness and admitted his admiration for Li Yunxiao's mastery.

After Baili Gongjin shared the story of his encounter with Lord Gu Feiyang and his advice, Lu Haochu attempted to condense a primal stone using his powerful soul force. However, his technique lacked finesse and appeared clumsy compared to Li Yunxiao's mastery. He raised the primal stone to a High-grade level but felt fatigued after the effort. In response, Li Yunxiao managed to advance the primal stone to a high-grade level, impressing everyone with his skills and talent.

Now, Xin Ze is attempting to advance the primal stone to the supreme-grade level, while Li Yunxiao is doing the same. Despite Li Yunxiao's exhausted state, he surprises everyone by suddenly revitalizing and displaying incredible control over his soul power and the primordial stone, keeping up with Xin Ze's progress. Xin Ze then revealed a powerful soul refining technique, "Rising Moon Over the Sea," to push his primal stone to a pseudo-supreme grade. In response, Li Yunxiao also utilized an ancient scripture to keep up and maintain a pseudo-supreme grade. The two yuan stones were evenly matched, but Li Yunxiao's yuan stone was slightly larger, indicating a potential advantage.

Just when it seemed like Li Yunxiao was about to win, Xin Ze decided to risk it all and swallowed a valuable rank seven beast soul pellet, "Purple Qi from the East," which significantly boosted his soul power. With renewed strength, he successfully advanced his primal stone to the supreme-grade level, surpassing Li Yunxiao's pseudo-supreme grade. Li Yunxiao, already exhausted and at the end of his energy, borrowed soul power from the sapling of the
Kunwu Divine Tree
, threatening it with the Vast Heaven Universe Metal if it refused to assist him. With the combined power of his main body using the
Great Evolution God Art
, Li Yunxiao managed to infuse even more power into his yuan stone. Pushing it past the supreme-grade and attempting to break through to the Innate Primordial Elixir level.

Li Yunxiao succeeded in forming the Innate Primordial Elixir, a divine object, which amazed all the alchemists present. Even the Supreme-grade primal stone he used to create it transformed into the Inner Core, which symbolized the Innate Primordial Elixir. Witnessing Li Yunxiao's extraordinary skill and calm demeanor, the other alchemists, including Xin Ze, Ge Xiangqian, and Lv Haochu, were deeply impressed. In a show of respect and admiration, the three fourth-grade Alchemists knelt down and expressed their admiration for Li Yunxiao's prowess.

Xingyang Huo
============

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Xingyang Huo
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Xingyang Huo
 was ancestors Xingyang Family and one of the elder of Jutian Sect. He is the last surviving member of the
Xingyang family
, Whichs was wiped out by
Li Yunxiao
. He refined the
Bluelotus Earth Fire
, a rare flame, making his attacks comparable to those of a
Martial Emperor
. Obsessed with revenge and restoring his bloodline, but ultimately falls in battle against
Duan Yue
 and
Yunxiao
, losing both his life and his treasured fire. With the death of
Xingyang Huo
, a thousand-year-old aristocratic family crumbled.

Plot

Xingyang Huo sought out
Supreme Palace
 for revenge after the annihilation of the Xingyang family. As the sole survivor, he was determined to both avenge his fallen kin and ensure the continuation of his bloodline. He mercilessly slaughtered more than half of Supreme Palace’s disciples, and even the Supreme Palace Lord,
Ma Tianhe
, and his son perished after days of torture, despite their ignorance of the truth he sought.

By coincidence,
Li Yi
 was present in Supreme Palace when the incident occurred. When he was interrogated by Xingyang Huo, he shifted the blame for the annihilation of the Xingyang family onto Li Yunxiao. Before heading to
Martial Flame City
 to seek Yunxiao, Xingyang Huo ordered the remaining survivors of Supreme Palace to capture young girls in an attempt to repopulate the Xingyang family.

Later, when Xingyang Huo arrived in
Martial Flame City
, he was shocked to discover that the city was protected by a powerful array hidden within a small, unsightly pagoda. Despite his attacks bolstered by the
Bluelotus Earth Fire
, which was nearly as powerful as a strike from a genuine
Martial Emperor
 the pagoda remained completely unharmed. Just as he was reeling from this,
Yunxiao
 appeared before him.

Even though Xingyang Huo knew that Yunxiao possessed a flame far superior to his own, his pride would not allow him to back down. The moment Yunxiao appeared, the battle between them erupted instantly. Yunxiao unleashed his only wisp of the
True Phoenix Flame
, while Xingyang Huo countered with the
Bluelotus Earth Fire
. Their flames clashed in midair, sending shockwaves across the battlefield. The terrifying force of their exchange left both sides heavily injured, neither able to gain the upper hand.

Despite his injuries, Xingyang Huo refused to retreat. Gritting his teeth, he prepared to launch another assault on Yunxiao. However, just as he was about to strike, a powerful force descended from the sky
Duan Yue
 landed before him, stepping down from the
Bluewolf Chariot
. The unexpected interference sent a wave of shock through Xingyang Huo, the vast gap in cultivation between him and Duan Yue made him wary.

Realizing the seriousness of the situation, Xingyang Huo fought with all his might. However, the difference in strength was insurmountable. With Yunxiao’s
illusion techniques
 weaving through the battle, Xingyang Huo found himself ensnared, unable to distinguish reality from deception. His resistance crumbled under the combined assault. In the end, not only was he slain by Duan Yue, but his
Bluelotus Earth Fire
 was also forcibly seized.

Xingyang Jie
============

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about

.
Please help by

 about

 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Xingyang Jie is the arrogant and entitled heir of the Xingyang Family, from the Firecrow Empire. He is used to wielding his family’s influence to intimidate others and get his way, often assuming that his status alone will make people submit to him. However, his overconfidence proves to be his downfall when he crosses paths with
Li Yunxiao
. Not only is he
humiliated beyond measure
, but he also learns a brutal lesson in the harshest way possible.

Plot

At
Ten Thousand Treasure Tower
,
Xingyang Jie
 and his guards
stole the Hundred Water
 from
Chen Zhen
 and
Han Bai
, then arrogantly
threatened to cut off their fingers
. Enraged,
Li Yunxiao retaliated instantly
, severing
Xingyang Jie’s fingers
 with a lightning-fast strike before his guards could react.

Humiliated and furious
, Xingyang Jie
swore to exterminate Yunxiao’s family
, Yunxiao then realizing that only
one side could survive
, not long after,
Cheng Feizhi
 arrived with his men.  Mocking
Ding Lier
, who tried to mediate the conflict,
Cheng Feizhi
 and his subordinates attempted to overwhelm
Li Yunxiao
, further escalating the situation.

But before
Cheng Fengzi’s
 men could attack,
Yunxiao’s reinforcements arrived thousands Warrior completely turning the tide
. Realizing they were
severely outnumbered
, both
Cheng Feizhi
 and
Xingyang Jie
 were
shocked, finally grasping how badly they had miscalculated
.

Yet, it was too late.
Yunxiao was already determined to kill them both
 not only had they snatch his hundreed water, threatened his friends, but they had also
tried to wipe out his family
. They had pushed their luck
too far
, and now, there was no escape.

Yunxiao
used his Illusion Eye technique
,
forcing Xingyang Jie to stab
Cheng Feizhi
 before
slitting his own throat
. In an instant, both were dead, their arrogance leading to a brutal demise.

Xingyang Kun one of Xingyang Family Elder he was sent to
Martial Flame City
  to kill
Li Yunxiao
 as revenge for the death of his clan’s young master. Upon arrival, he wreaked havoc, nearly killing
Meng Wu
, which enraged Yunxiao. Determined to eliminate him, Yunxiao risked his life in battle, with
Qian Wudi
 aiding in suppressing Xingyang Kun.

Desperate, Xingyang Kun destroyed his
Xuan Artifact
, injuring both himself and Yunxiao, then attempted to flee. However, he was intercepted by
Xiao Qingwang
, a Grandmaster-level expert. Realizing his doom, he tried to self-destruct, but his injuries rendered the attack ineffective. In the end, he was effortlessly slain.

Xu Feng (Xu Family)
===================

Xu Feng was one of the participants in the
Mount Meru
 expedition. He came from the renowned
Xu Family
, known for their mastery of formations. The Xu Family's head was a distinguished disciple of the titled Martial Sovereign,
Teng Guang
. Xu Feng spent hours deciphering the array formation protecting the main palace door. However, just as he succeeded in unlocking it, he was instantly killed by the powerful dragon energy that leaked from within.

Xu Pinghong

Redirect to:
Xu Hongping

Xu Wansen
=========

the president of the Mando Chamber of Commerce.

Plot

Xu Wansen is a respected and influential figure in the business world, known for his intelligence and strategic thinking. He is a leader of one of the major Chambers of Commerce and is well aware of the power struggles between rival factions. Unlike others who may blindly resist, Xu Wansen understands when he is outmatched and prefers to act with dignity rather than suffer humiliation.

When confronted by Ding Shan’s ruthless scheme to use him as a
"medicinal herb"
 to further his own power, Xu Wansen acknowledges defeat with grace. He recognizes
Ding Shan
 ambition but warns that controlling two Chambers of Commerce will not automatically grant him dominance, as other powerful factions—such as the
Ten Thousand Treasures Store
 and
Money Gang
—are always waiting for an opportunity to strike.

In his final act, Xu Wansen chooses to
die on his own terms
, avoiding further disgrace by
taking his own life
 rather than being manipulated or tortured. His insight and composure in his last moments show that he is not only a seasoned businessman but also a man of
principle and honor
.

Xu Yan
======

Xu Yan is the head of the Yuan Division.

Appearance

This man had a beard and white hair.

Personality

Xu Yan is a fair and rational person who judges people based on his own experiences rather than reputation. After meeting Li Yunxiao at the burial site, he formed a positive impression of him, believing that both Li Yunxiao were not evil. Unlike many in the Holy Region, he is unafraid to voice his opinion, even in front of higher authorities, showing his integrity and courage.

Xuan Bing
=========

He is an expert from the Feather Frost Sect of the Western Region.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

After the appearance of the True Spirit, Xuan Bing launched a surprise attack on Yunxiao and his group with three powerful warships two Golden Sun Warships and one Netherworld Warship. The fierce attack forces Yunxiao’s group to struggle for survival. During the battle, the Imperial Bell appears, blocking attacks, while Feng Zhu and Qi Guang join the fight, using Holy Skills against Xuan Bing.

Then, the World God Monument appears, sinking one warship and causing chaos. Taking advantage of the moment, Li Yunxiao uses the
World God Monument
, to trap the Netherworld Warship, burying it deep underground and destroying it. Xuan Bing and his forces are left in shock and desperation over the loss of the two warships.

Despite his narrow escape, Xuan Bing failed to learn his lesson. He later attacked a passing battleship heading in the same direction as him. Just like his previous encounter with Yunxiao, his attacks were easily countered. The opposing group retaliated, destroying his remaining warship. Defeated, Xuan Bing was swiftly captured by Yu.

During his captivity, he suffered humiliation at the hands of
Yuwen Xun
 before ultimately being killed.

Xuan Hua
========

Xuan Hua
 (玄桦), the
Silver Moon Martial Sovereign
 (银月武帝), the
Tenth-Ranked Martial Sovereign
 on the
Heaven and Earth Power Chart
. One of
Gu Feiyang
's good friends,
Lu Congzi
's adopted son, and one of the Elders of
Sea of Soul Formation
.

Appearance

The man’s figure was slender and beautiful, his facial features simple and elegant, and his purple robe gave people a sense of vitality.

Personality

Xuan Hua is carefree and mischievous, often teasing others to the point of irritation. He dislikes overthinking and prefers to go with the flow, which sometimes makes him appear foolish in serious situations. Because of this,
Liu Feiyan
 occasionally calls him an idiot, though Xuan Hua never takes it to heart. His ridiculous antics leave even those around him speechless, making it hard to believe that someone like him holds the title of Martial Sovereign.

Plot

Five Cloud Mountain

Xuan Hua arrived at Five Cloud Mountain alongside
Zhen Yu
, sent by the Sea of Soul Formation after receiving High Priest Ci’s secret message. Initially indifferent to the conflict, Xuan Hua was forced into battle when
Huang
, the Demon Emperor, attacked. Despite his strength, Xuan Hua was quickly overwhelmed, realizing Huang had reached the peak of perfection. Seeing no chance of victory, he and Zhen Yu chose to retreat, watching from a distance.

Power

The Star-Shattering Force—also known as The Golden Crow Avoids the Sun—unleashes a legendary weapon. A massive silver bow, inlaid with yellow accents, descends, enveloped in purple Qi. Countless tiny gemstones, like stars scattered across the night sky, adorn its surface. This divine weapon is the Broken Star Bow, paired with the Cloud-Splitting Arrow, wielded by the formidable Lord Xuan Hua.

Xuan Hua's Cloud Splitting Arrow was also derived from the Star Destruction technique. In this world, aside from Gu Feiyang's mastery of the Star Destroyer Sword Skill, I am the one who truly understands it best.

Trivia

He loved the bow as much as his life.

Xuan Hua and Yao Jinliang were constantly at odds, as Xuan Hua found Yao Jinliang to be an eyesore.

Xuan Ping
=========

Xuan Ping is a teacher at Jialan Academy who claims to be neutral and unaffiliated with any faction. While many teachers secretly support one of the two major powers in Tianshui, Xuan Ping insists that as an academy teacher, it would be inappropriate to intervene in student duels. He emphasizes the need for fairness and justice, refusing to take sides in the fight between Yunxiao and Lan Xuan.

Xuanli Island
=============

Background

Xuanli Island is a mysterious and powerful force in the Tianwu Realm, often shrouded in secrecy. Many of its strongest members were originally from the Holy Land, but due to the passage of time and potential conflicts, the idea of taking over the Holy Land was ultimately abandoned.

Despite its long absence from the world, Xuanli Island still holds significant influence and has maintained a stance of cooperation rather than domination over the Holy Land and other major forces. It seeks to unite various factions in preparation for the coming demonic calamity, rather than upsetting the balance of power in the realm.

The island is also interested in the Yellow Springs Hellfire and the underworld lands, with its members personally investigating these locations. Its relationship with the Tianwu League is one of alliance rather than opposition, as its main goal is to gather all available forces to combat future threats.

History

the Realm of Eternal Life. The island was originally created to prepare for the Demonic Tribulation, a catastrophe prophesied to occur 100,000 years later. However, not everyone believed in this prophecy many warriors sought entry into the Realm of Eternal Life simply to prolong their lifespan, rather than to fight against the impending crisis.

For 100,000 years, Xuanli Island has sought out powerful individuals who enter the Realm of Eternal Life, offering them incentives to join. However. The requirements to join were simple: swear allegiance to Xuanli Island and commit to fighting in the Demonic Tribulation, in exchange for access to its vast resources.

Xue Chenxi
==========

Xue Chenxi Was The Saintess of the Fuyao Holy Palace, and the Goddess,
Li Huachi
 admired for a long time. For years, Li Huachi secluded himself on the Thousand Leaf Island, playing the zither and reading ancient texts, hoping to win Xue's heart. Despite playing a melody for ten years, he could never move Xue Chenxi, who was devoted to mastering the ultimate path of martial arts. Xue Chenxi earned the title of the most cold-hearted woman in the world.

Plot

Five Cloud Mountain

Trivia

its said that li huachi attended the heaven and earth wind and cloud rankings event because df xue chenxi, wanting to obtain the title of the world's number one and win the beauty.

Yan Xing
========

Yan Xing, was member of the Green Colt mercenary group.

Appearance

Short and slender man.

Plot

Yan Xing suddenly launched a sneak attack on Li Yunxiao after sensing the extremely strong mutated water element within his body. Seeing how young Li Yunxiao appeared, Yan Xing assumed he would be an easy target. However, despite using only two moves, Li Yunxiao effortlessly blocked them.

Realizing that his opponent was far stronger than he had anticipated, Yan Xing was overcome with fear. Without hesitation, he attempted to flee back to his headquarters to report what he had discovered. Confident in his advanced stealth techniques, he believed he could escape unnoticed. However, he was unaware that Li Yunxiao was still silently following him.

Yang
====

Background

Mr. Yang was originally just a clone of Mo, born from his blood essence. However, over time, while the real body trapped in a seal, he developed his own consciousness. For years, he secretly devoured the blood essence of other monster races using his innate ability, growing stronger.

He then hid within Qianyue Mansion for years, even learning powerful martial arts that had been passed down for thousands of years techniques that no one else had mastered "
the ten directions divine skill
,
Grand secular world".
 During this time, he also helped guard the Five Cloud Mountain to prevent the seal from breaking.

Plot

Five Cloud Mountain

In the midst of the chaos at Qianyue Mansion Palace, Mr. Yang stole the seal from the sect master and attempted to escape. However, Lu Yunxiao, who had been watching from the void, intercepted him. Yunxiao defeated Mr. Yang and nearly killed him before he managed to escape.

After the seal of Five Cloud Mountain was broken and the war between the two races began, another clone of Mo, severely injured by Yunxiao, confronted Mr. Yang, intending to reclaim his stolen power.

With no other choice, Yang risked his life to perform the Ten Directions Divine Skill: Grand Secular World, using the Five Cloud Mountain Formation he learn from the wandering mortal world scroll was actually a secret technique to power the formation Five Cloud Mountain to restrain the Mo clone. He launched a desperate attack, but the Mo clone, drawing power from his original body, wielded the profound bone-scale double blades.

With a single strike, the clone easily tore through space, turning the tide of battle. The power of the blade cut through the void, splitting Yang in half and defeating him.

Yang Di
=======

This page is a
Stub
.

Yang Di
.

contributing
 your
informations
 and

 about

Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

History

He lived in the
Southern Region
, in the
Tianshui Kingdom
, his homeland, after his Master Gu Feiyang. He created a statue identical to
Gu Feiyang
 appearance which was placed in the Capital Academy.

After the Princess illness incident, he refused to set foot in Tianshui Kingdom again and lived in the
Duskflame Empire
 taking care of his disciple, until he reached the Seventh Grade of Alchemy and was allowed to enter the
Sea of Soul Formation
, where he was welcomed by
Lu Congzi
. According to his own words.

After the events in the Eternal World,
Ye Nantian
,
Li Yunxiao
,
Zhuo Qingfan
 and others go to the Soul Formation Sea to exterminate the Demonic Cultivators, where Lu Congzi reveals that he has made Yang Di his demonic slave. This news left Li Yunxiao helpless, as killing a demon slave's Master would result in the demon slave's death, therefore, there was almost no hope of saving his disciple.

Trivia

The Year 1001 is the year that Yang Di was promoted to third-tier alchemist and became the president of the Tianshui branch.

Yang Di had vowed that he would never step into Tianshui again in his life after the incident of Mo Xuan'er.{{r|}95}

Yang Fangzhou
=============

Yang Fangzhou of the Silver Wing Sect
, who appears during the competition to enter
Mount Meru
. He stands out from the crowd due to his ability to circulate
genuine Qi
 without being restricted by the
Nine Palace Wuchen Formation
, which had suppressed nearly everyone else.

Yang Yuanshu
============

In his first appearance, Yang Yuanshu went to the Purple Cloud Peak in the
Eastern Region
, where he killed all the experts present there.

Ning Keyue
 goes to find out what was happening and finds Yang Yuanshu there, after a hard battle with Yang Yuanshu saying in a lascivious way that he will make her his corpse wife, and even having a small appearance of
Ling Baiyi
 who had been hired by Qiu Mujie to kill Ning Keyue due to his recent humiliation in
Crimson Crescent City
.

He comes out alive after Ning Keyue follows Tian Si away, later
Li Yunxiao
 searches the place and finds clues about the incident. Some time later in the Land of Rain in the
Eastern Sea
, Li Yunxiao encounters an individual there raiding a tomb in search of the legendary Golden Dragon Bones, he follows the individual and steals the corpses in his place, which erupts into a battle, showing that Yang Yuanshu had taken the corpses from the
Holy Garden
.

Soon after hiding from the Dragon Guards, Li Yunxiao subdues Yang Yuanshu and with the help of
Gu Yuesheng
 gathers information before killing him.

Yao Jinliang
============

SPOILER ALERT!

Yao Jinliang
 (姚金良), the
Divine Control Martial Sovereign
 (神控武帝), the
Seventh-Ranked Martial Sovereign
 on the
Heaven and Earth Power Chart
 and he is the only beast tamer among them.

Plot

Martial Flame Crisis

He arrived in Yanwu City with the Year Burial Beast, a formidable creature at the peak of the ninth rank. Alongside the Year Burial Beast, Yao Jinliang confronted
Li Huachi
 and engaged in a tense conversation regarding the whereabouts of the siblings,
Meng Wu
 and
Meng Bai
.

However, they were unable to sense the siblings' auras and suspected that they were hiding in another realm. To ascertain their location, Kun Nu used a technique called the Prayer Technique to summon
Wei Qing
 divine will. Wei Qing probed the surroundings, looking for any traces of the siblings, and eventually discovered their presence in the World God Monument.

However, Li Yunxiao, intervened and set up powerful restrictions to protect the siblings from being detected. Wei Qing's efforts were thwarted, he intended to use a transcendent-grade profound artifact to break through realms and retrieve the siblings.

Li Huachi engaged in a conversation with Yao Jinliang and Wei Qing, discussing their plans and the potential consequences of their actions. Ultimately, Yao Jinliang and Wei Qing left Yanwu City after Li Huachi reluctantly agreed to help find the siblings to prevent the destruction of the southern region. And with one tune he made all the people below to fell asleep for three days.

Heaven of Langya

Yao Jinlian, along with
Wei Qing, Wei Wuya, Li Yi, Luo Qingyun, and Nanfeng Xuan
, arrived at the
Jade Pavilion
 with the intention of seizing its vast knowledge. Their true goal, however, was to find the
True Tail Phoenix Feather
, a legendary that could help them break through to the next level of power.

Technique

The Battle Saint Technique – Night Martial is a fusion technique with the Burying Claude Beast. As man and beast move as one, air currents surge, creating a blinding storm that distorts space. Golden light erupts from Yao Jinliang as he pushes the technique to its limit. With the Ghost Hunter Twist unsealed, an ominous glow fills his eyes. The evil spirit dagger rings out with a sharp clang, transforming into a blade of silver light, slashing down with unstoppable force.

Trivia

In a last attempt to get the True Phoenix Tail Feather he attacks Yunxiao and gets heavily injured. To avoid the humiliation of getting killed by him, who used to be of equal status in the past (Titled Martial Sovereign) he decided to commit suicide.

References

Ye Fan
======

He is the Young Master of the Sacred Fire Temple. He is a descendant of
Ye Nantian
 and the Inheritor of the
Sub-Saint
 artifact “
Heavens Ark
”.

Appearance

A young man with sword-shaped eyebrows and Starry Eyes.

Plot

Light Song Forest

Yi Fan,
Tao Guan
,
Feng Zhu
, and
Qi Guang
 confront
Li Yunxiao
 in the Light Song Forest. Li Yunxiao cleverly takes Yi Fan hostage to initiate a negotiation. The Sacred Fire Temple seeks the Yang Key and believes it's linked to Noah's Ark. During the discussion, they tentatively agree to cooperate, aiming to rescue Tang Jie, take Yang Key and locate Noah's Ark. However, an explosion disrupts their conversation, leading to speculation about Tang Jie's rescue and the involvement of various factions.

As they observe the chaos,
Zou Chen
 offers his Time-fixing Plate to assist the crowd in tracking auras. Zou Chen uses the Time-fixing Plate to trace a lead to the east of the Demon Plains, where Noah's Ark might be located. Li Yunxiao's group proposes a plan to intercept the Skeleton Mercenary Group, discovering a teleportation array within their headquarters. They activate it and arrive in the Demon Plain, while other factions continue their pursuit of Noah's Ark.

Demon Origin Plains

After teleporting to the Demon Plain, Li Yunxiao's group discusses their encounter with the Skeleton Mercenary Group. The conversation shifts to
Ye Nantian
's notes about breaking through to the Divine Realm. Li Yunxiao seeks to view the notes, leading to a deal: he helps them obtain Noah's Ark in exchange for access to the notes. Tension arises when
Feng Zhu
 challenges Li Yunxiao's skills. Suddenly, the legendary creature "
Wu
" appears behind Li Yunxiao, leaving the group awestruck. The Wu enters its own body and disappears, a rare and enigmatic event that emphasizes the rarity and significance of the encounter.

Continuing their journey, the group finds a preserved corpse of a powerful Martial Supreme killed by
Young Master Hao Lian
. Concerns about Hao Lian's motives arise. Dark clouds gather, signaling the arrival of forces from other territories. Three formidable warships, two Rank 7 Golden Sun Warships and a Rank 8 Netherworld Warship, appear in the sky.  Amidst the warships,
Xuan Bing
 commands an attack from formidable warships, forcing Li Yunxiao's group to narrowly escape. Amidst the battle, the Imperial Bell emerges, withstanding attacks.
Feng Zhu
 and
Qi Guang
 join, using “Holy Skill” techniques to clash with Xuan Bing. The World God Monument appears and causes a warship to sink, leading to chaos.

Li Yunxiao suppresses the Netherworld Warship using the
World God Monument
, causing it to sink irreparably. Xuan Bing and his forces are left in shock and desperation over the loss of the two warships. Interrogating captives, they learn about involvement from the Feather Frost Sect, led by Martial Sovereign. The group continues its quest cautiously, sensing hostile auras ahead. Investigating the strange death of an eighth-rank Soul-shattering Tapir, the possibility of a Peak Martial Sovereign's presence raises concerns, as their pursuit of Noah's Ark could be threatened. Despite the fear and uncertainty, the members of the Sacred Fire Temple reaffirm their determination to continue their quest for Noah's Ark. They are motivated by their ancestral legacy and the opportunity to restore their sect's glory.

Later, they found themselves upon another Rank 8 Netherworld Warship leading by
Qing Luo
, they joined them and continued the journey to find
Tang Jie
. However, they ingaged in a fierce battle against the Ancient Great Monsters, leading by
Shang
, the confrontation leads to a collision between the
Universe God Monument
 and the
Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere
, cracking the axis of the Armillary sphere and injuring both fighters. Shang is ultimately defeated and heavily injured by Li Yunxiao's overwhelming palm technique, leading his group to retreat immediately after that.

Later, they catch up with them which leaded to a fierce battle against
Tang Jie
 and Great Monsters, and the
Four Extremes Sect
 members, After Tang Jie's failed attempt to bravely face the attacks, he and the other Great Monsters fled when faced with the
World God Monument
's descending strike by Li Yunxiao.
Fu
, attempted to strike the battleship with a powerful ninth-grade Xuan Artifact called the Xuan Flower Axe. To counter this,
Ye Fan
 revealed a Martial Will Pill that was enhanced with Nine Heavens Sovereign Qi, capable of withstanding the Xuan Artifact's impact, that leaded to heavily injured both of them.

After a fierce battle between
Mister Yu
 against Li Yunxiao and
Gourd Little King Kong
, Yu and Yunxiao heavily injured. Suddenly
Shen Feng
 came in the back of the Rank Eight Demonic Beast, the Nine-winged Spirit Snake Bird, Yu requested Shen Feng's assistance in eliminating Li Yunxiao, to which Shen Feng agreed. However, at the critical moment, a giant flying artifact, the
Money Chamber of Commerce
, intervened.
Qian Wudi
, appeared on the artifact and engaged in a verbal exchange with Li Yunxiao. Shen Feng, tries to attack Li Yunxiao again, but
Zhang Hanzhe
 intervenes, leading to a standoff. Ultimately, the trade is made, with Li Yunxiao giving Qian Wudi the Seven Constellations Martial Will Fruit in exchange for Tianhun Herb and primordial stones. Tang Jie and his group from the Four Extremes Sect left the scene.

Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

Inside the Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror, the group faces intricate illusions structured as barriers within barriers. Zhang Shaotian and his group confront Li Yunxiao, demanding to break the array. Li Yunxiao attacks using Eye Technique and Spring Life Qi, gaining the upper hand briefly. Zhang Shaotian breaks free, vowing to follow.

Li Yunxiao shifts the Tiger King War Chariot to the Summer Boundary, elevating his cultivation remarkably by absorbing earth's rules. After a fierce exchange with
Little Qing
, Li Yunxiao discloses his desire to reach the Ancient Desolate Land, and Little Qing agrees to help due to past debt.

After Little Qing's departure, Li Yunxiao and the Sacred Fire Temple members discuss the significance of Little Qing's response and conclude that Noah's Ark must indeed be present. Suddenly, the surroundings tremble violently, and Li Yunxiao deduces that someone is forcefully breaking the formation. He urges everyone to return to the war chariot and activates, prepares to investigate the other three seasons to understand the situation further.

Later, in another place,
Li
's attempt to break the formation triggers catastrophic consequences, Little Qing, who has been observing, warns that disaster is looming. The formation's instability leads to the sudden rise of an enormous ice mountain that engulfs Li, while the surrounding area experiences chaotic shifts between the four seasons.

The mountain's peak undergoes rapid transformations, with spring, summer, autumn, and winter all manifesting at different levels. The mountain's appearance reflects the four seasons, with spring at the midpoint, peach blossoms, withered trees, and snow at the base. Meanwhile, an immense boundary of the four seasons emerges in the distance, revealing the Immortal Mountain of lord
Throne
.

Li Yunxiao explains that breaking the formation requires either taking and breaking the Immortal Mountain, an almost impossible task, or relying on Little Qing, who is the only one capable of truly controlling the formation. The group's hopes rest on Little Qing's ability to free them from its grasp.

Later, Li Yunxiao successfully defends himself against an ambush by
Zhang Shaotian
 and his fellow Soul Devouring Sect disciples. Utilizing his control over the rule of Autumn, he overpowers one of the disciples and eliminates him. Li Yunxiao proposes a cooperation to escape the barrier and seize Throne's Immortal Mountain. Zhang Shaotian agrees to the plan, with the condition that Li Yunxiao shares the secret method to condense the laws of heaven and earth, which could bolster his strength to contend with the Martial Sovereigns from Myriad Star Valley.

Four Seasons Immortal Mountain

Li Yunxiao
 and his group, including Zhang Shaotian and others, enter the Immortal Mountain and are awed by the profound changes in the surroundings. Li Yunxiao reveals that the Soul Devouring Sect members possess a secret technique for soul-searching, which they can use to locate living and even deceased souls. This technique sparks both intrigue and discomfort among the group. Zhang Shaotian employs his Soul Devouring Sect's soul-searching ability through a golden soul slave to find traces of other individuals within the vast mountain. That leaded to a fight against
Tang Jie
 and his Companions.

As the battle unfolds, Tang Jie's fear reaches its peak as he witnesses the horrifying power of the golden soul slave when Zhang Shaotian extract the soul of the living
Dan Yangze
. However,
Shen Feng
 intervenes to save Tang Jie, suppressing the soul slave and briefly turning the tide of the battle. Zhang Shaotian retreats, and a standoff ensues between Shen Feng and Li Yunxiao's group.

Shen Feng shares his findings about the Immortal Mountain's strange environment and the disappearance of Mister Yu and his group. They discover a peculiar cliff that absorbs divine sense and essence upon contact, revealing a hidden space resembling a giant chessboard.
Shang
 and the other Great Monsters, including
Yu
, also appear in this space. Tang Jie's eagerness for revenge against Li Yunxiao intensifies. Shang orders an attack against Li Yunxiao and his group, including Zhang Shaotian. However, the unique environment suppresses the use of Primordial Qi and Essence, rendering the attackers powerless. Li Yunxiao's true power becomes apparent as he effortlessly defeats Tang Jie despite the restrictions, leaving the group of Great Monsters stunned.

Gallery

Ye Nantian
==========

Ye Nantian was one of the greatest geniuses in Martial Arts and Alchemy that had ever existed since the Primordial Era before the Rules of the Ten Directions disappeared from the
Heavenly Martial Realm
. He understood the structure of all things and created a Xuan Artifact, which due to the lack of the Rules of the Ten Directions reached the pinnacle of the Alchemy Transcendence level, similar to the levels pseudo-divine Martial Arts and Body Tempering. Called
Noah Ark
, this Pseudo-Saint Artifact possesses unparalleled suppression and defense strength, it was sealed by Ye Nantian within the secret space within the
Eternal Evergreen Tree
, left for their descendants to seek in the future.

History

After Ye Nantian entered the
Eternal World
, he became a great expert who lived for 10,000 years with the consumption of the Phoenix Essence energy, which prolonged his longevity. He met his Ancestor
Ye Qingyu
 (King of the
Eastern Region
 from 100,000 years ago and an individual close to the
God the Universe
), and became one of the Four Kings of
Xuanli Island
, the King of Heaven.

He had previously held countless titles, such as one of the Rulers of the
Holy Region
 thousands of years ago.

Plot

Broken Cloud River

Ye Nantian appeared and killed
Zhan Chen
 to prevent him from escaping and to ensure that news of the Huangquan Hellfire did not spread. However, he allowed Li Yunxiao and his companions to leave, as the Lord of the World from Xuanli Island still needed Yunxiao and the Heavenly Martial Alliance for the impending war against the demonic forces.

After discussing and persuading the Misty Rock King, one of the four Kings of Xuanli Island and the greatest genius of the Heavenly Martial Realm in 100,000 years, not to kill
Li Yunxiao
,
Gu Qingqing
 and their companions, he took
Ye Fan
 body to Xuanli Island and took Noah's Ark back.

Demon Invasion

Later in the battle against the Demons and
Lu Congzi
 in the
Sea of Soul Formation
, Lu Congzi managed to trap Ye Nantian, which forced Ye Nantian to self-destruct Noah Ark to escape, After Li Yunxiao and his companions arrive at the hidden space below the Devil's Well, Ye Nantian is pulled into the Devil Realm through the wall of sealed demons.

Trivia

Ye Nantian could last six hours in the void extreme immortal state before got suppressed by the Tianwu rules. No one could surpass him in the past one hundred thousand years, which showed how powerful he was.

Ye Qingyu
=========

SPOILER ALERT!

He is the King of the Easthern Region. He participated in the Ancient Demon Sealing War 100,000 years ago.

History

Ye Qingyu is the King of the Eastern Region and the leader of Xuanli Island, a floating island established within the Realm of Eternal Life.

As a key figure in the Demon Sealing War, Ye Qingyu deeply understood the significance of the Demonic Tribulation. To gather and strengthen the forces of the Tianwu Realm, he established Xuanli Island, accumulating its essence power and recruiting warriors willing to take part in the battle. The requirements to join were simple: swear allegiance to Xuanli Island and commit to fighting in the Demonic Tribulation, in exchange for access to its vast resources.

With his talent and leadership, Ye Qingyu is expected to be one of the leading figures in the coming Demonic Tribulation.

Yellow Elder
============

Great Elder thag spent all their time in seclusion and never made contact with anyone.

Yi
==

SPOILER ALERT!

he is one of the Great Monsters ten thousands years ago, His friends are very important to him.

Past

In order to comprehend the rules of the
Ten Directions Realm
, he and his close ones sealed themselves in an array for tens of thousands of years, which resulted in a massive drop of their cultivation from a Peak Martial Sovereign (estimated even Divine Transcendence for himself and his friends and Peak of Perfection for Shang) down to the Martial Emperor Realm.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

In the midst of an intense battle above the Demon Plain,
Yi Qing
 faces off against
Fu
, wielding a mighty 9th Rank Battle-Axe. Despite Yi Qing's efforts, he's overpowered, and Shang and his group watch as the battle escalates. Shang reveals his identity as the possessor of the
Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere
 to
Little Qing
. He seeks Little Qing's assistance in restoring the Artifact's power using the Eternal Evergreen Tree's energy, but Little Qing resists.

As the confrontation intensifies, Little Qing transforms into lightning and traps Shang and his companions. Shang utilizes the power of the Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere to create a celestial barrier, attempting to contain Little Qing.

Later,
Ge
 sacrifices himself to block Little Qing's devastating
Void Jade Azure Violet Palace Brahma World Annihilation Divine Thunder
 attack.
Li Yunxiao
 rushes to save Little Qing. Li Yunxiao injures Shang heavily, and Little Qing leaves a cryptic message before disappearing. The Sacred Fire Temple and Tianyi Chamber of Commerce unite against the monsters,
Qing Luo
 leading against Fu.

Li Yunxiao and
Mister Yu
 engage in a fierce confrontation, with Li Yunxiao gaining the upper hand and breaking Mister Yu's arm. Following the intense clashes, the monsters retreat, leaving behind a tense atmosphere.

Later,
Yu
,
Li
,
Shang
, and others are fighting off Spirit Rats repelled by the sound of war drums. Yu's arm is missing, and the group discusses their dire situation. Tang Jie, suggests they join the Four Extremes Sect. Yu, Shang, and others disagreed and tried to recover and discuss finding someone to repair the damaged Supreme Celestial Armillary Sphere.

After a while, Shang submits Tang Jie could help, and the group eventually agrees to join forces with him. Li helps Tang Jie recover but places the Seven Fiend Seal on him, causing intense pain. After Tang Jie's confrontation with
Dan Yangze
 and the events that followed, Tang Jie and his group refocused their efforts on dealing with Li Yunxiao and his allies.

After Tang Jie's failed attempt to bravely face the attacks, he and the other Great Monsters fled when faced with the
World God Monument
's descending strike by Li Yunxiao.
Fu
, attempted to strike the battleship with a powerful ninth-grade Xuan Artifact called the Xuan Flower Axe. To counter this,
Ye Fan
 revealed a Martial Will Pill that was enhanced with Nine Heavens Sovereign Qi, capable of withstanding the Xuan Artifact's impact.

After a fierce battle between
Mister Yu
 against Li Yunxiao and
Gourd Little King Kong
, Yu and Yunxiao heavily injured. Suddenly
Shen Feng
 came in the back of the Rank Eight Demonic Beast, the Nine-winged Spirit Snake Bird, Yu requested Shen Feng's assistance in eliminating Li Yunxiao, to which Shen Feng agreed. However, at the critical moment, a giant flying artifact, the
Money Chamber of Commerce
, intervened.
Qian Wudi
, appeared on the artifact and engaged in a verbal exchange with Li Yunxiao. After Li Yunxiao and Qian Wudi's intense negotiation, Qian Wudi agrees to trade Tianhun Herb, 1.2 billion mid-grade Primordial Stones, and additional resources for a mysterious item Li Yunxiao possesses.

However, Shen Feng, tries to attack Li Yunxiao again, but
Zhang Hanzhe
 intervenes, leading to a standoff. Ultimately, the trade is made, with Li Yunxiao giving Qian Wudi the Seven Constellations Martial Will Fruit in exchange for Tianhun Herb and primordial stones. Tang Jie and his group from the Four Extremes Sect left the scene.

Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

In a frozen landscape, Li's attempt to break the formation triggers catastrophic consequences, Little Qing, who has been observing, warns that disaster is looming. The formation's instability leads to the sudden rise of an enormous ice mountain that engulfs Li, while the surrounding area experiences chaotic shifts between the four seasons.

The mountain's peak undergoes rapid transformations, with spring, summer, autumn, and winter all manifesting at different levels. The mountain's appearance reflects the four seasons, with spring at the midpoint, peach blossoms, withered trees, and snow at the base. Meanwhile, an immense boundary of the four seasons emerges in the distance, revealing the Immortal Mountain of lord
Throne
.

Four Seasons Immortal Mountain

Shang
 and the other Great Monsters, including
Yu
, appeared in the space where
Li Yunxiao
,
Tang Jie
 and the others were. Tang Jie's eagerness for revenge against Li Yunxiao intensifies. Shang orders an attack against Li Yunxiao and his group, including Zhang Shaotian. However, the unique environment suppresses the use of Primordial Qi and Essence, rendering the attackers powerless. Li Yunxiao's true power becomes apparent as he effortlessly defeats Tang Jie despite the restrictions, leaving the group of Great Monsters stunned.

Five Cloud Mountain

In the midst of the war between the two forces at Five Cloud Mountain, Yunxiao, along with
Xuan Hua
 and Wei Shishi, worked together to break Ai's formation. As Yunxiao prepared his ultimate attack, Yi attempted to launch a sneak attack but failed. Yunxiao countered with a powerful sword technique combined with the Ice Fiend Heart Flame, burning Yi to ashes shortly after.

Yi Hongming
===========

Yi Hongming is a powerful but ruthless member of the Long family, known for his violent and uncontrollable bloodline. He aligns himself with Wei Qing, aiming to become the next head of the Long family after Long Qianmiao’s death. Believing in sacrifices for power, he fully supports the blood purification experiment to refine true spirit bloodlines. However, he lacks the leader’s token, which is held by Fei Ni, and relies on Wei Qing to help him seize control.

Appearance

An old man with a curly beard.

Power

Yi Hongming possesses the bloodline of Zhuyan, a powerful ancient beast resembling a red-furred ape with a white head, massive feet, and a golden "Yan" character on its chest.

Yi Qing
=======

Yi Qing, commanding an eighth-grade Netherworld Warship, silently observed from the void as the battle unfolded. He watched as the unknown mysterious group effortlessly defeated
Xuan Bing
 and the corpses of the Flying Frost Sect. Their overwhelming strength left a deep impression on him.

Upon hearing that one of the attackers resembled Tang Jie, Yi Qing immediately grasped the gravity of the situation. If Tang Jie was truly involved, then the danger was far greater than he had initially anticipated

After careful deliberation, Yi Qing made a decisive choice to pursue Tang Jie and his mysterious group, Later, during the battle between his side and the mysterious monster group, he and his subordinates were annihilated.

Yi Xi
=====

Appearance

A young man with  ugly face, he about thirty years old.

Personality

Yi Xi is arrogant, cunning, and pragmatic. He is quick to anger when his pride is challenged but can also be calculating when assessing a situation. He is not blindly reckless and knows when to retreat if necessary. He values his own survival and will exploit technicalities or loopholes to his advantage, as seen in his attempt to manipulate Tian Xingzi's promise to protect.

Plot

Yi Xi and
Shang Chen
 had been ordered by Wei Qing to pursue
Yuan Gaohan
main body and capture him. However, their mission took a disastrous turn when they encountered Li Yunxiao and
Tian Xingzi
 at
Battle Soul Mountain,
 A fierce battle broke out, and despite their efforts, Yi Xi and Shang Chen were steadily pushed into a disadvantageous position. Realizing they had no choice but to retreat, they attempted to flee.

As Yi Xi tried to follow Shang Chen in retreat, Li Yunxiao swiftly acted, unleashing the
Thirty-Six Northern Heaven Cold Stars
 to cut off Yi Xi’s path, trapping him in a cage of gleaming starlight. Struggling and desperate, Yi Xi found himself cornered.

At that moment, a chilling voice echoed in the air.
Qiu Mujie
, who had been hiding and silently watching Li Yunxiao’s battle with
Dark Division
, finally revealed himself. Stepping forward, he confronted his traitorous adopted son. Yi Xi’s face turned deathly pale as terror gripped him—he knew there was no escape.

Qiu Mujie wasted no time. Without mercy, he extended his hand and
directly extracted Yi Xi’s soul
, tearing it from his body to search his memories. Yi Xi’s screams of agony were brief, fading as his essence was pulled apart. Once Qiu Mujie had obtained what he needed, he coldly crushed the struggling remnants of Yi Xi’s soul, erasing him from existence.

His betrayal punished, Yi Xi’s life ended in utter helplessness—his final moments spent in overwhelming fear, unable to defy the fate he had brought upon himself.

Power

Yi Xi's technique involves refining the corpses of powerful warriors into corpse puppets using talismans. He summons seven coffins—one dark gold and six dark red—which explode to reveal lifelike, armored corpses. The central figure, a
Warlord
 in a golden crown and battle robe, exudes an imposing presence. Although the power of these corpse puppets was far less than when they were alive, These corpse puppets are highly durable and nearly indestructible, far surpassing ordinary ones due to specialized refinement.

Yi Xiaoshan
===========

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Yi Xiaoshan
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Yi Xiaoshan was a member of the
Supreme Six
, a renowned group from the Supreme Palace
Duskflame Empire
. He was the man who wounded
Xiao Qingwang
 and
Chen Dashen
 in the
Ranking Battle
 five years ago.

Background

He chose to stay in Baizhan, driven by a sense of duty and gratitude toward the emperor who had once shown him great kindness. For the past decade, he had tirelessly worked to elevate Baizhan to an upper-rank vassal state, but his efforts had yet to bear fruit.

With the five-year qualifying match approaching, Yi Xiaoshan saw it as his final opportunity to achieve his goal. He resolved to return to the Supreme Palace after the match, leaving behind worldly affairs to dedicate himself solely to martial arts.

Plot

Supreme Palace

Unaware that the Supreme Palace had been annihilated by
Xingyang Huo
 after he massacred all its members, including their lord
Ma Tianhe
, He along with
Qi Zhenzi
 and
Xu Hongping
 returned, only to find the palace empty and desolate. To their surprise, Li Yunxiao had arrived before them, carrying out his task of absorbing all the Qi veins to fill the World God Monument.

Yunxiao then challenged Qi Zhenzi, declaring that if he lost, they must submit to him. With
Duan Yue
 overseeing the battle and preventing any escape, Yunxiao and Qi Zhenzi exchanged several moves. In the end, Yunxiao crushed Qi Zhenzi to death using the World God Monument. Shocked that Yunxiao could kill Qi Zhenzi so easily, He and
Hu Yanming
 had no choice but to pledge their loyalty to him. They were then placed inside the World God Monument, yunxiao place him at qi soul center square inch mountain to focus on cultivating.

Power

He use The extreme cold energy that was modified from the Beiming Dark Energy, the ultimate cultivation technique of the
Beiming Dark Palace
, who was a super sect in the North.

Yicheng Tribe
=============

They followed an order from the
Guang Family
, the ruler of the Eastern Sea, to besiege a human, the Vanquisher Martial Sovereign – ⁣
Gu Feiyang
. As a result, along with many other Second Warlord-Rate Sea Clans, they suffered heavy losses. It's said that at least a hundred Martial Sovereigns died in that battle.

The Butterfly Bee/Yicheng Clan, in particular, saw all of its Martial Emperors and above perish. This led to a significant decline in their strength, allowing other Sea Clans to rise and seize their territory. The decline was so severe that they had to migrate to the Southern Sea for recuperation. Only through recuperation and breeding did they manage to regain their strength, which eventually led to their migration to the Southern Sea.

Structure

Leader

Da Ming

Elders

Da Le

Several Martial Emperor & Grandmaster Realm Elders.

Yin Hui
=======

Yin Hui, the sect master of the Azure sky sect

Appearance

Plot

Heaven of Langya

At the entrance of Mountain of Langya, he had provoked Yunxiao shortly after his arrival. However, he did not expect Yunxiao to see through him at a glance, instantly putting him on high alert. that he had cultivated the
Arcane Tome of Emptiness
 from the
Ethereal Mystic Book
 a rare inheritance found within the True Dragon’s Secret Treasure. This profound technique had significantly enhanced his strength, making him far more formidable than before.

When the entrance Langya Heaven opened, Yin Hui attempted to enter, but Yunxiao destroyed his token and attacked. Severely wounded, Yin Hui barely escaped using a secret technique from the
Ethereal Mystic Book
. Though he survived, Yunxiao was certain he wouldn’t last long if they met again.

Later, Yin Hui and the
Nanqiu Yu
 group along with holy region faction unexpectedly encountered Li Yunxiao and his companions, who were in the midst of a fierce battle against puppets and insect monsters.

Seizing the moment, Yin Hui noticed Yunxiao was severely injured and launched a sneak attack. Believing he had succeeded in killing him, he burst into wild laughter. However, an eerie silence followed, making him realize something was wrong it was an illusion! Before he could react, Yunxiao struck back, piercing his chest with a flame-infused sword.

The Ice Evil Heart Flame ignited within him, consuming him from the inside out. Overwhelmed by pain and terror, Yin Zhi trembled, unable to resist. With a final scream, he collapsed, his body reduced to ashes.

Yin Nian
========

Yin Nian
 orchestrates events to trap Mei Dong’er, intending to forcefully take her as his woman. He also aligns himself with
Yuan Qiushuang
, using her as an ally in his plans.

Yin Yu
======

He is an extremely selfish person, who disregards others life and death to achieve his goals no matter the cost. He is also very afraid of death.

Background

Yin Yu was a True Dragon, ancient and powerful being. He was born from the very essence of heaven and earth, condensed by the power of the world, and is considered the head of all Ancient True Spirits.

Despite his immense power, Yin Yu is known to be a selfish and elusive individual. He did not directly participate in the Demon Sealing War 100,000 years ago, but his influence still affected its course.

Originally, Yin Yu should have been at the Realm King Realm, but he was beaten down from that peak and eventually exiled himself to the Wasteland of Time. There at the Dragon Shaking Hammer in the East China Sea, with only a remnant soul, his cultivation continued to deteriorate, causing him to fall to one of his lowest points in power. Now, after 100,000 years, he is a shadow of his former self, both pitiful and somewhat ridiculous.

Plot

Martial arts competitions

Li Yunxiao participates in the
Hidden Families

Martial arts competitions
 for the
Ancient Treasure Trove
.  Originally in the possession of the
Ten Thousand Treasure Store
 and now its treasures being part of a competition hosted by the
Natural Moat Order
, alongside the entry quotas for the
Mystic Realm Langya Heaven
. Yunxiao representing the
Mu Family
 appears and is shocked to see
Wu Dacheng
 alive and well.

Wu Dacheng  that representing the
Dragon Tooth Villa
 in the competition. managed to pass several rounds with his movement technique, which seemed close to the Heaven and Earth. The participants were unable to catch up to him.

In the final Battle Royale, in which the ranking is decided through people who destroy the most array nodes, he strangely disappears.

After the end of the competition, when the treasures are about to be distributed, Yunxiao discovers a problem. Of the original 1773 treasures, 500 have been taken away from Wan Yiqian's Ancestor in the past. 32 items of those 1773 were most likely supreme treasures (10th rank Xuan Artifacts). Of those 32 the Ancestor took 20 away. So in theory 12 should be remaining. But only 2 out of 12 were in the treasury.

After those treasures are distributed and everyone leaves, Wu Dacheng appears again. He took away 10 of those 10th grade Xuan Artifacts. Before he can leave tho, he gets obstructed by
Nanqiu Yu
, the Sect Master of
Natural Moat Order
. After a short conversation, Nanqiu Yu decides to let the mysterious Wu Dacheng leave with the Xuan Artifacts.

the True Dragon Horn

Later, he appears in the
Blade Sect
 headquarters, trying to exchange a dragon related item burried in their headquarters under the blade and sword peaks Dragon Horn from the true dragon, with one of his 10th tier Xuan Artifacts. The Sect Master
Chen Duantian
 refuses and tries to take him down just to fail miserably. Yunxiao suddenly shows up and helps to stop Wu Dacheng, which then takes out the Universe Light Plate (another 10th tier Xuan Artifact) and disappears in front of everyone's eyes.

After Yunxiao seemingly left, Yin Yu returned, attempting once again to seize the item. However, contrary to his expectations, Yunxiao had already anticipated his return and was waiting for him. As soon as Yin Yu appeared, Yunxiao stopped him, and a fierce battle erupted. Yin Yu quickly found himself at a disadvantage, surrounded by both the
Blade Sect
 and
Yunxiao.
Qu Hongyan
,
Che You
. Forced into a desperate situation, ultimately leading to the destruction of
the Universe Light Plate
 that triggered a space turbulence like a black hole that swallowed
Li Yunxiao
 along
with him vanished into the chaotic spatial rift, leaving his fate unknown.


Eternal World

Few Day after
Li Yunxiao
 with his group and later
Duanmu Yuyu
 with his sister visit
Bailun Jieyi
 At the stone house.

Yin Yu arrived  at stone house demanding the location of an unknown power. However,
Bailun Jieyi
 had erased her own memory, making it impossible for him to extract the information. Enraged, he prepared to kill her and search her soul, but before he could act,
Feng Yaoli
 appeared.

With the help of
Wei Qing
 and
Wei Wuya
, Feng Yaoli was unable to interfere, and Yin Yu successfully killed Bai Lun Jieyi and searched his soul. Only then did he realize it was all a trap. Bai Lun Jieyi had deliberately left vague information in his sea of consciousness, luring him deeper, and at the most critical moment, he triggered a mechanism that condensed the last of his Primordial Power into a storm, severely damaging his consciousness. Seeing Yin Yu's failure, Feng Yaoli chose to leave.

the True Tail Phoenix Feathers

In the far Northern Region's
Eternal World
 Wu Dacheng that teams up with
Wei Qing
 and
Feng Yaoli
 show up in
Lin
 territory to obtain the true tail Phoenix Feathers.

After meeting the Braham Monster
Lin
, a former World King Realm Master from more than 100,000 years ago, Yunxiao learns that Wu Dacheng, which real name is Yin Yu is one of those legendary existences called
True Dragon
, who are said to be born from Heaven and Earth. Then, Lin proposes a battle between Yunxiao and Yin Yu to determine the ownership of the True Phoenix Feathers.

As the duel's deadline arrived, Yin Yu and Yunxiao clashed in a fierce battle of wits and power. With Lin insight into Yin Yu’s techniques, Yunxiao gained the upper hand. Their battle was intense, leaving both sides heavily injured. In a decisive moment, Yunxiao unleashed his innate Moon Pupil Divine Skill Tianque, delivering a devastating soul attack that severely damaged Yin Yu’s sea of consciousness, leaving him in a wretched state. Just as Yunxiao was about to land the finishing blow,
Feng Yaoli
 intervened, stopping him. Not long after,
Lu Congzi
 and
Bo Yuqing
 infiltrated Lin’s sanctuary and abducted Yin Yu’s weakened body.

After the Demon King "
Man
" possessed the Yin yu body, he fought fiercely against Yunxiao’s group, shattering the
Realm of Eternal Life
 in the process. However, as a consequence, the
Heavenly Martial Realm's
 rules activated, suppressing the Demon King’s power. This gave the Yin Yu a chance to reclaim his body and, in his fury, he killed the other Devil Lord
"Ji "
 to vent his anger.

Seeing the tide turn against him,
Lu Congzi
 wasted no time. Using his
Soul Formation Seal
, he swiftly retreated from the battlefield.

Later in the Ocean Emperors Palcace Yunxiao meets Yin Yu again. It is revealed that Yin Yu is the Ancient True Dragon who has 9 sons in the legends. Also Yin Yu was the one who extracted large amounts of the Divine Phoenix Blood, 100.000 years ago in the Demon War from
Li Zhu
, to extent his own life, causing the death of the phoenix. In the Ocean Emperor Palace he tries to seize his son
Qiu
 true body, which is at the Dharma Body Stage and sealed below the Palace.

It turns out that Yin Yu doesn't care in the slightest for his children and only seeks his own benefit to extent his lifespan, even if that means sacrificing all of his children. In the fights ensuring Qiu's substitute body at the Virtual Light Realm gets destroyed, he then seizes his subordinate
Leng Tong
 body. After that gets destroyed as well Qiu splits his soul into millions of pieces and spreads them in all directions, much to the pity of Yin Yu who was disappointed that he couldn't refine and absorb his son.

It's revealed that because Yin Yu absorbed his sons dragon essence to maintain his cultivation, he attracted their hostility and created the feud between them. It's also because he turned on the evil path that his cultivation has been constantly falling. Yin Yu once again suffers a defeat against Yunxiao and his people. In the end he gets saved by the Lord of the Abyss "
Nine Abyss
" and retreats.

Power

Dark Dragon Seal
, which is specifically used to deal with the five elements spirit body.

Dragon Domain
. Yin Yu's Dragon Domain creates a terrifying black hole that devours all light and consciousness, resembling an endless abyss. As it expands, it transforms into a colossal black rose, This domain not only overwhelms opponents with its sheer power.

Dragon Territory Nebula Technique
 is a terrifying and mysterious power that condenses the vast energy of the nebula into a single, deadly form. When unleashed, a massive vortex emerges, shifting from black to red before rapidly shrinking into a blood-red rose that falls from the sky. the rose carries an immense suppressive force, making even powerful warriors like Li Yunxiao feel helpless. This also allows Yin Yu to manipulate space, reappearing unpredictably. This move is specifically for escaping.

Roar of a
True Dragon
, The ultimate killer move that Yin Yu displayed was the Throat of a True Dragon. This move not only attacked the body, but more seriously bombarded the soul.

Trivia

In Ancient Times, because of injuries due to some battles, his Realm fell from the World King to the Good Fortune Realm.

Back then, when Lin, the Demon Empress, was at her peak, she tried to kill Yinyu but failed.

True Dragon Bodies contain the laws of Heaven and Earth and can display the strongest understanding of speed, strength, defense, and attack at the same time

References

Ying Lin
========

Ying Lin
, the president of the thunderwind Chamber of Commerce's branch in Southfire city, He arrives at the
Big Dipper Sect
 in a massive
Seventh-Tier Golden Sun Battleship
, which is more valuable than an Eighth-Tier Profound Weapon, deliberately causing
intimidation
 and exerting pressure, unsettling both sect disciples and rogue cultivators.

Appearance

A man wearing a purple robe with dragon patterns embroidered on it.

Plot

He pretends to bring the battleship as a
gift
 for the sect’s rising stars, presenting it as a
championship prize
 to create goodwill and openly
mocks
Zhang Linghua
 and the Big Dipper Sect, calling their protective formation a “toy” that wouldn’t matter to his Chamber of Commerce.

Because Zhang linghua has advanced to the rank of a martial Supreme, Ying Lin had no choice but to use his Profound Weapon to ambush everyone that went to Land of Death, "
the mirror of the calm lake
", an eighth-grade profound level weapon treasure was refined by an Alchemist master of my thunderwind Chamber of Commerce for more than half a year, and he spent a lot of money to buy a drop of hundred rivers primordial water to fuse with it. The
Hundred Rivers Primordial Water
 is a colorless and odorless substance, undetectable even by the most powerful spiritual senses. Highly toxic, it is a force that ordinary martial artists cannot withstand. Once it enters a person's body, it gradually erodes their vitality, suppressing their talent and weakening their cultivation base over time. Even the most formidable warriors would find it nearly impossible to advance in their cultivation, their strength slowly diminishing until they could no longer progress.
As a substance close to the very origin of the water element, even a single drop of
Hundred Rivers Primordial Water
 is exceedingly rare and precious. Its potency is unparalleled, making it a terrifying weapon against even the strongest practitioners.

To refine the
Dancing Jade-Like Lake Mirro
r
, the Thunderwind Chamber of Commerce poured the entire spiritual essence of an elemental stone mine into its creation. This profound weapon, was granted to Ying Lin by the Chamber’s headquarters as a testament to his exceptional management of the Southfire City branch.
The
Mirror of the Calm Lake
 became the branch’s most treasured possession.

Yong Tianyun
============

the ninth-tier Alchemist, Yong tianyun, who pointed out the five suspicious points about
Li Yunxiao
 at sky-towering city.

Plot

He and his brother, Luo Tian, arrived in Fengling City alongside the Red Moon Supreme Council, originally intending to assist in capturing Li Yunxiao and Qiu Mujie. However, instead of escalating the conflict, he chose to mediate between them, seeking to resolve past grievances.

Given the strong alliance between the Sea of Soul Formation and Red Moon City, and the fact that Yunxiao was a ninth-tier alchemist with no true life-or-death enmity with Red Moon City, he proposed a peaceful resolution. To avoid further conflict, he offered Yunxiao a position as an elder within the Sea of Soul Formation, ensuring harmony between both sides.

However, Yunxiao outright rejected the offer and instead made a counterproposal. His condition was clear—the marriage between Tang Xin and Jiang Ruobing must be annulled, and the Four Extremes Sect must withdraw from Red Moon City. Only then could the grudges between him and Tang Qing be completely written off. Faced with this unexpected demand, he found himself left with no other choice.

Technique

The nine chains of sun and moon, The nine chains of the sun and moon were originally one, forming a formation and relying on each other to suppress enemy

Spirit God Tyrant Power Fist is a powerful technique unleashed through the Spirit God Battleship summoned a massive half-bodied Giant Spirit, and unleashed a devastating punch, radiating overwhelming force. This technique combined the might of spiritual energy with the precision of formation arts, making it a fearsome weapon in battle.

Yongxiang city
==============

Yongxiang city is not the main city of the Eastern Region, it is still one of the big cities. The teleportation array basically covers more than half of the main cities and some nearby cities

Although Yongxiang city was not the main city of the Eastern Region, it was still one of the major cities. Without a warship, ordinary people might not even be able to reach the city Lord’s mansion in a few days.

This resulted in The Purple Cloud trading company’s wealth and overbearing manner.

The Silver horse Chamber of Commerce is not well-known on the continent, it is quite famous in Yongxiang city and the nearby large cities. Many of its businesses are above that of the seven great Chambers of Commerce.
