You Mi
======

Background

You Mi was once a highly talented disciple of Wanxing Valley, personally brought in by Tian Xingzi due to his exceptional potential. Raised as the adopted son of the sect leader, he was given a prestigious position within the sect. However, his recruitment was never about sentiment—it was purely because of his talent. Deep inside, You Mi harbored resentment, believing that his value to the sect was conditional.

To solidify their influence, Wanxing Valley sent You Mi as an undercover agent into the Soul Devouring Sect, one of their greatest enemies. Over the years, his position rose, eventually becoming Deputy Sect Leader.

However, during his time there, his loyalty wavered. Realizing that the Soul Devouring Sect valued him more than his "adoptive family," he chose to betray Wanxing Valley, siding with Xi Yulun and the Soul Devouring Sect in a devastating betrayal.

Plot

His treachery was revealed when he used Li Yunxiao’s previous attack to weaken the puppet general, allowing him to insert a soul-devouring banner into its body, triggering its destruction. Su Ping, shocked and enraged, confronted You Mi, but the traitor only laughed, declaring that he was never truly one of them. His motivations were clear: power, recognition, and revenge against those who saw him as nothing more than a tool.

Yu
==

SPOILER ALERT!

Yu also known as Mr. Yu is the Grand Priest of the Monster Clan, he is a Martial Emperor and an 8th-Tier Alchemist.

Background

Thousands of years ago, the Monster Clan was forced into the Five Cloud Mountain by the 19th Palace Master of Heavenly Night Palace,
Gu Qingqing
, who single-handedly set up the Reversal Five Elements Grand Sealing Formation. For thousands of years, it was rare to see a powerful Monster Clan in the
Tianwu Continent
. Some of them were fish that had escaped the net. They survived in various corners of the continent and rarely showed their faces.

Plot

Light Song Forest

Master Yu engages in a fierce battle with
Li Yunxiao
, utilizing powerful attacks and recognizing Li Yunxiao's strong
Divine Body
. As the fight escalates, Master Yu displays his strength and wields a Rank Nine Sword. Li Yunxiao struggles to defend and eventually escapes into his
World God Monument
. The conflict intensifies as Li Yunxiao summons
Duan Yue
, a
stone beast
 and employs the True Phoenix Fire, only to be thwarted by Master Yu's resilience.

Later, Master Yu successfully activates a powerful formation known as the Cloudy Sky Crystal Enchantment. He releases three Legendary Monsters, using the energy of the formation, one of the Monsters,
Li
, communicates with him, revealing that their powers are nearly depleted due to being trapped in the formation for an extended period. Li instructs Master Yu on how to break the formation and release them.

With great effort, Master Yu manages to break the Cloudy Sky Crystal Enchantment, releasing the three monsters encased in a transparent sphere. Despite his depletion, Master Yu uses his remaining energy to guide the monsters out of the formation and collapses afterward.

We Met Again!

Later,
Mr. Yu
 intervenes in the battle between Li Yunxiao and his companions against
Tang Jie
, neutralizing the attack and causing confusion. Tang Jie's situation changes unexpectedly as attacking Martial Emperors disappear. Mister Yu identifies Li Yunxiao's eye technique as Lunar Imperfection and warns him about its risks. Tang Jie is taken away by Mister Yu, leaving Li Yunxiao intrigued and determined to face him again in the future.

Luo Yunshang
 battles Mr. Yu. Mr. Yu shackles her attacks and provokes her to unleash her power. Li Yunxiao returns to the city and senses a disturbance. He and his group rush to the Eighth Squad's headquarters. At the headquarters, Mr. Yu faces attacks from warriors but remains resilient. He gives Luo Yunshang a blood-red liquid, promising strength in exchange for aiding his agenda against the
Divine Cloud Palace
.

Li Yunxiao and allies arrive, intensifying the battle. Li Yunxiao counters Mr. Yu's mental powers using the Imperial Bell. The group weakens Mr. Yu's defenses, shaking his confidence. Mr. Yu shifts focus to neutralize Li Yunxiao. Luo Yunshang's Nine Yang Genuine Qi surges due to the blood.
Mu Wu
 intervenes, landing a blow but falling for an illusion created by Mr. Yu. Mr. Yu escapes, leaving Li Yunxiao and his allies to ponder the encounter and Mr. Yu's formidable mental abilities.

Demon Origin Plains

Mr. Yu was with
Shang
 when he reveals his identity to
Little Qing
 and seeks help to restore the
Supreme Palace Armillary Sphere
's power. Little Qing resists, leading to a tense exchange. Little Qing transforms into lightning, trapping Shang and friends.
Ge
 sacrifices himself to block Little Qing's attack, stabilizing the situation.
Li Yunxiao
 rushes to save Little Qing, and injures Shang heavily, and Little Qing leaves a cryptic message before disappearing. Meanwhile, The Sacred Fire Temple and Tianyi Chamber of Commerce unite against the monsters, Qing Luo leading against Fu.

Li Yunxiao and
Mister Yu
 engage in a fierce confrontation, With the assistance of his dragon soul companion
Genryu
, Li Yunxiao gains an advantage over Mister Yu, breaking his arm and overpowering him. The battle's intensity is heightened by the resonating sound of earth-shattering war drums, creating chaos among the combatants.

As the situation escalates, Li Yunxiao utilizes his unique skills to isolate the sound of the war drums, attempting to regain control over the battlefield. Mister Yu, who had previously demonstrated powerful mental abilities and illusions, finds himself at a disadvantage against Li Yunxiao's strategic and relentless attacks. Following the intense clashes, the monsters retreat, leaving behind a tense atmosphere.

Later,
Yu
,
Li
,
Shang
, and others are fighting off Spirit Rats repelled by the sound of war drums. Yu's arm is missing, and the group discusses their dire situation.
Tang Jie
, suggests they join the Four Extremes Sect. Yu, Shang, and others disagreed and tried to recover and discuss finding someone to repair the damaged Supreme Celestial Armillary Sphere.

After a while, Shang submits Tang Jie could help, and the group eventually agrees to join forces with him. Li helps Tang Jie recover but places the Seven Fiend Seal on him, causing intense pain. After Tang Jie's confrontation with
Dan Yangze
 and the events that followed, Tang Jie and his group refocused their efforts on dealing with Li Yunxiao and his allies.

After Tang Jie's failed attempt to bravely face the attacks, he and the other Great Monsters fled when faced with the World God Monument's descending strike by Li Yunxiao. Fu, attempted to strike the battleship with a powerful ninth-grade Xuan Artifact called the Xuan Flower Axe. To counter this, Ye Fan revealed a Martial Will Pill that was enhanced with Nine Heavens Sovereign Qi, capable of withstanding the Xuan Artifact's impact.

After a fierce battle between Mister Yu against
Li Yunxiao
 and
Gourd Little King Kong
, Yu and Yunxiao heavily injured. Suddenly
Shen Feng
 came in the back of the Rank Eight Demonic Beast, the Nine-winged Spirit Snake Bird, Yu requested Shen Feng's assistance in eliminating Li Yunxiao, to which Shen Feng agreed. However, at the critical moment, a giant flying artifact, the Money Chamber of Commerce, intervened.
Qian Wudi
, appeared on the artifact and engaged in a verbal exchange with Li Yunxiao. After Li Yunxiao and Qian Wudi's intense negotiation, Qian Wudi agrees to trade Tianhun Herb, 1.2 billion mid-grade Primordial Stones, and additional resources for a mysterious item Li Yunxiao possesses.

However, Shen Feng, tries to attack Li Yunxiao again, but
Zhang Hanzhe
 intervenes, leading to a standoff. Ultimately, the trade is made, with Li Yunxiao giving Qian Wudi the Seven Constellations Martial Will Fruit in exchange for Tianhun Herb and primordial stones. Tang Jie and his group from the Four Extremes Sect left the scene.

Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

In a frozen landscape, Li's attempt to break the formation triggers catastrophic consequences, Little Qing, who has been observing, warns that disaster is looming. The formation's instability leads to the sudden rise of an enormous ice mountain that engulfs Li, while the surrounding area experiences chaotic shifts between the four seasons.

The mountain's peak undergoes rapid transformations, with spring, summer, autumn, and winter all manifesting at different levels. The mountain's appearance reflects the four seasons, with spring at the midpoint, peach blossoms, withered trees, and snow at the base. Meanwhile, an immense boundary of the four seasons emerges in the distance, revealing the Immortal Mountain of lord
Throne
.

Four Seasons Immortal Mountain

Shang
 and the other Great Monsters, including
Yu
, appeared in the space where
Li Yunxiao
,
Tang Jie
 and the others were. Tang Jie's eagerness for revenge against Li Yunxiao intensifies. Shang orders an attack against Li Yunxiao and his group, including Zhang Shaotian. However, the unique environment suppresses the use of Primordial Qi and Essence, rendering the attackers powerless. Li Yunxiao's true power becomes apparent as he effortlessly defeats Tang Jie despite the restrictions, leaving the group of Great Monsters stunned.

Yu Shengfeng
============

Leader of the Alchemist Association a thousand years ago. Marked as a traitor and thought to be dead. Refined his Ancestor
Yu Yixian
's body and achieved the
dual polarity divine body
.

Background

He was a legendary existence, the master of the current leader of the art Dao.

Plot

Yu Shengfeng suddenly appeared at the Fengling city, blocking Huanmie and Xiao Xiao from escaping into the void. With a swift strike His light wheel cut through the void, relentlessly pursuing its target and severed of Xiao Xiao’s arms.

Sensing an unprecedented crisis, Huanmie and Xiao Xiao immediately joined forces, unleashing the strongest techniques of their lives. However, Yu Shengfeng calmly formed a hand seal, embedding several incantation seals into his sword. A true dragon emerged from its blade, splitting into tens of thousands of swords that rained down from the sky. The phantom swords and the tyrannical blade tore through the sky, converging like rivers into the sea, engulfing everything in their path.

Overwhelmed, Huanmie and Xiao Xiao were left bloodied and in utter despair. In the next moment, Yu Shengfeng struck again, reducing their bodies to lifeless mud. Without hesitation, he turned his attack on Bo Yuqing, Li Yunxiao, and Qiumujie. Tens of thousands of dragon-shaped sword shadows surged through the sky like a mighty river, distorting the heavens.

With just a few moves, Yu Shengfeng had crushed four peak experts. Even Yunxiao, whose strength rivaled theirs, stood among them, facing the overwhelming might of his assault.

Power

After he completely fusing and directly achieving the dual-extreme divine body, turning his physical body into a Saint.

the spirit enslavement seal curse, that contai the Qi of life and death, This spell is the best way to wear down people will. only a few who can survive it.

the Dragon Sword in Yu Yixian’s hands that day in the ruins-ancient dust. It had also been completely refined by Yu Shengfeng. The sword can summon countless even Ten thousand Dragon shadows.

The Heavenly Treasure Ruyi, precious Jade is the life profound artifact.

His lineage was inherited from demonic servants.

Yu Shengjie
===========

Yu Shengjie, one of participant in
Martial arts competitions
, he is completely erased from existence by
Xiao Hong
 with her Ice Fiend Heart Flame.

Plot

Xiao Hong and Yu Shengjie clashed in a battle of fire and water. Confident in his abilities, Yu Shengjie unleashed a water dragon to extinguish Xiao Hong’s flames, but when their attacks collided, a massive explosion erupted, engulfing them both. As the blinding light faded, Xiao Hong stood exhausted but victorious, while Yu Shengjie had been completely erased from existence. The battle ended with Xiao Hong’s decisive win and the shocking annihilation of her opponent.

Yu Yangzhou
===========

He is a renowned Martial Sovereign from the
Ten Thousand Treasures Store
. In his first appearance, he was about to save
Hao Lian
, but he canceled it in the end. Later, he tried to mess up what
Feng Yi
 was doing.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

Yu Yangzhou engages in a playful conversation with
Che Xuyao
 and Feng Yi, frustrates
Feng Yi
 while hindering the Five Elements Beast Taming Ring's refinement. After a tense exchange, Yu Yangzhou's impressive strength shocks
Che Xuyao
 and Feng Yi. Realizing his threat, Che Xuyao advises finishing the ring before dealing with Yu Yangzhou. They teleport to a more secure location, wary of observers. Meanwhile, Yu Yangzhou teleported as well, but he didn't find them, then he continued to explore the illusionary landscape of the Water Moon Flower Mirror, to find its formation core.

Yu Yangzhou, holding a formation plate, believing he's about to break the formation, he discovers that he has actually triggered a rain-summoning trap, the rain overwhelms him, and he fights back with weapons and profound qi. Desperate, he creates a powerful explosion, escaping the rain's effects despite injuries. His escape astounds the observer,
Little Qing
, who realizes Yangzhou triggered the Virtual Eye and Rain Summoning while heavily injured and managed to escape. Little Qing decides to find Yangzhou and eliminate him.

In the Domain of Winter, Yu Yangzhou witnessed the changes in the illusion caused by
Li
, realizing that the mountain is the legendary Four Seasons Immortal Mountain, a Peak 9th Rank Profound Artifact of Lord
Throne
. Despite his excitement, he remains physically weakened and unable to explore further.

Yu Yixian
=========

Plot

Yu Yixian managed to preserve his life through an intricate scheme involving his soul and body. Originally, his body was meant to achieve the Immortal Extreme Yin Body, a powerful and unparalleled physique. However, achieving this required self-sacrifice, meaning he would have had to die in the process, essentially making a "wedding dress" for others—allowing someone else to reap the ultimate benefit.

To avoid this fate, Yu Yixian stopped just short of fully completing the transformation, leaving a tiny imperfection in his Yin Body. This small flaw prevented his complete sacrifice, allowing him to remain alive and hide within the body. At the same time, he sealed a part of his soul within it, biding his time for later generations to arrive.

However, this plan was disrupted by external events—most notably the Ghost King’s intervention, which forced Yu Shengfeng into a desperate situation. This unforeseen conflict prevented Yu Yixian from continuing his slow, careful plan and ultimately led to his downfall. Now, his remnant soul remains, but he is at the mercy of Yu Shengfeng, who intends to use him for his own ends.

Yu Zang
=======

Appearance

A man with  a terrifying scar that ran down from the left side of his forehead, passing through his eyes, nose, and lips, embedding itself several inches deep into his face. The scar wriggled like a centipede.

Personality

Yu Zang is too narrow-minded person.

Plot

He died after Li Yunxiao performed a soul search on him and then crushed his head for attempting to expel Li Yunxiao and his party as they tried to enter the inner Battle Soul Mountain.

Trivia

Cultivators at his level could change their appearance at will, and healing this degree of scar was a piece of cake. However, this person had obviously kept it on purpose, and the meaning was self-evident.

Yuan
====

One of the Eight Demon Commanders who command the Eight Regions of the
Demon Realm
, Yuan is the ruler of the Yuan Region and the only one of the current Demon Commanders to reach the Saint Demon Realm.

After meeting
Zhuo Kun
, the former “Lord of the Earth” (Leader of the Divine Capital of the
Holy Region
), Both Souls fell in love and intertwined their domains, becoming the most powerful pair of Demon Commanders in the Eight Regions. Aiming to follow her husband to the Pinnacle of Cultivation, and reach the Realm of the
Lord of a Thousand Worlds
, Yuan followed him to kill the former
King of the Western Region
, stealing the
Sacred Tree Wheel
 for himself, while her beloved took possession of the link to the
Demonic Weapon of the Six Paths of Reincarnation
.

In the Land of Ten Thousand Spirits, both confront the Three Sons of Yin Yu, In the
Land of Ten Thousand Spirits
, both confront the Three Sons of
Yin Yu
,
Li Yunxiao
 and his companions.

After Li Yunxiao kills her husband, Yuan absorbs his body at Zhuo Kun request after numerous refusals on his part, reaching the Holy Demon Realm and gaining possession of the link with the Six Paths Demon Weapons. After entering the headquarters of the
Natural Moat Order
 where the
Heavenly Martial Alliance
 awaited her, Yuan uses his overwhelming power and frightens everyone present, forcing the
King of Light
 of the
Mysterious Island of Separation
 to blow himself up to break the protective layer of the Sacred Tree Wheel, who protected Yuan from suffering the wrath of Heaven as a demonic creature from outside the
Heavenly Martial Realm
.

With the destruction of the Sacred Tree Wheel's shell, Yuan becomes susceptible to the Heavenly Martial Realm's senses and is attacked by an Almighty Dragon formed by the legendary Brahma Divine Purple Thunder Destroyer of Worlds, unexpectedly, Yuan does not suffer any damage, after all, the Laws of the Ten Directions have recently returned and the World is barely capable of leading the formation of a
Hundred Tribulations World King
.

After being forced to return to the Demon Realm due to the instability of her Realm, and the threat that
Jin Yuan
, the Lord of the Oceanic Abyss, posed, Yuan ends up confronting
Lord Pu
. After defeating Lord Pu with serious aftereffects, Yuan finds herself surrounded by the Demon Commanders commanded by
Six Wings
, but, after getting help from Li Yunxiao, he manages to resist severely, until Six Wings enters Yuan territory and confronts Lord Pu by absorbing
Li Yi
, reaching the Pinnacle of the Holy Demon Realm and opening a
Fissure
 in the Demon Realm.

Yuan De
=======

Subordinate of
Lu Congzi
, Yuan De is the former vice president of the
Sea of Soul Formation
, he is a powerful Martial Artist who reached Divine Transcendence shortly before Gu Feiyang's death, and after his reunion with
Li Yunxiao
 at the
Devil's Well
, the two confront each other and Yuan De demonstrates that he has adopted the Demonic Cultivation system implemented by Lu Congzi to the Soul Formation Sea, which helped him reach the Peak of Perfection.

He feels indignant and ashamed for being defeated by Li Yunxiao and
Yu Shengfeng
 just after reaching the Peak of Perfection, as he imagined that he would be at the peak of the World, but was repeatedly suppressed. In the secret space beneath the Devil's Well, he fights Yu Shengfeng and Li Yunxiao by letting a Demon Lord inhabit his body to defeat them, but the Demon Lord tries to escape with his body, to the Demon Realm and forcing his body inside, which disintegrated him and killed him in the process.

Yuan Gaohan
===========

SPOILER ALERT!

He is a 9th tier Alchemist from the
Sea of Soul Formation
 and the Director of the
Holy Region
's Alchemy Department. Furthermore, He practices the Starlight Soul Refining technique. He met Li Yunxiao as Gu Feiyang, who fought in an Alchemy Competition against
Ai
.

Plot

When Yunxiao travelled to the Outer Space, he met the Starlight Soul Body of Yuan Gaohan. The former abducted him in his
Divine Realm Tablet
 and accompanied Yunxiao on his journey, while refining artifacts for him and doing other labor.

Upon reaching the Peak of 9th tier with his soul, Yuan Gaohan planned to merge his body in
Wufatian
 in
Devouring Soul Sect
 territory, this land saturated with the Five Elements of Earth for a long time. This place, considered a Feng Shui treasure, was ideal for cultivating the Starlight Soul Body. With Li Yunxiao's party guarding him, he focused on his refinement. If the Starlight Soul Body reached its peak, the fusion of his two souls could elevate him to the pinnacle of magic, potentially stepping into the realm of a Magic God. Later he decided to further stay in the Divine Realm Tablet to learn from the Ancient Master
Ling Mudi
, which Yunxiao met on his travels.

Technique

The Purple Heart Origin Pill Art is a divine technique from the Holy Region, designed to strengthen the dantian’s sea of Qi, making it as solid as an impregnable fortress. It serves as the foundation for all techniques, enhancing a martial artist’s ability to endure immense energy. By mastering this art, one's dantian becomes over a hundred times stronger, eliminating the risk of energy overload and allowing unrestricted absorption of vital Qi. As a result, cultivation speed increases significantly. Yuan teach this to to help
Li Yunxiao
  to help him break the restrictive spell placed on him by
Yu Shengfeng
, However, in the end, he came to regret his decision.

The Golden Crow Arena

  harbors deep jealousy and resentment toward

Yin Nian
 in his vile schemes.

Background

Yuan Qiushuang is a disciple of the
Big Dipper Sect
, known for her jealousy, scheming nature, and cruelty. She holds a deep grudge against her junior sister,
Mei Dong'er
, who is more talented, beautiful, and well-liked than her. Yuan Qiushuang sees Mei Dong'er as a rival and goes to great lengths to suppress and humiliate her whenever possible.

Plot







Power

six-star Martial Grandmaster
, possessing powerful frosty cold Qi, which allows her to weaken and slow down her opponents by freezing their meridians. She is also skilled with a
short sword.

Yue Jiulin
==========

Plot

After The Golden Crow Arena

He intercepts
Li Yunxiao
 and
Duan Yue
, along with the Crown Prince of the Duskflame Empire,
Xin Ruyu
, with the intention of subduing Li Yunxiao and making him the Crown Prince's servant.

Li Yunxiao stands his ground and refuses to submit, leading to a confrontation with Yue Jiulin. However, their encounter is interrupted by the arrival of
Baili Gongjin
, the President of the Alchemist Association, and several others.

Baili Gongjin's presence startles Yue Jiulin, as he realizes that the Alchemist Association might issue a pursuit order against him if he continues to antagonize Li Yunxiao, who is a highly valued alchemist. The pursuit order could lead to dire consequences, and Yue Jiulin becomes anxious.

Li Yunxiao seizes the opportunity and exposes Yue Jiulin's intention to capture him, claiming it to be an attack on the dignity of alchemists. He urges Baili Gongjin to take action to restore the dignity of their alchemist lineage.

Baili Gongjin advises the Crown Prince, Xin Ruyu, to apologize to Li Yunxiao to defuse the situation and prevent further conflicts. Though Xin Ruyu is angered, he decides to leave to avoid more trouble and promises to settle their grievances later. Yue Jiulin, realizing the precarious situation, follows Xin Ruyu and departs.

Qionghua Island

He confronted Li Yunxiao as he was flying towards Qionghua Island. Yue Jiulin demanded that Li Yunxiao hand over the demonic beast and the Wu Luring Frost. However, Li Yunxiao refused, stating that he needed the demonic beast's help to secure a slot for the Fire Crow Empire. Yue Jiulin warned him to cooperate or face consequences.

In a tense exchange, Li Yunxiao used a mental attack to momentarily distract Yue Jiulin, who believed he saw the Sect Leader of the Heavens-Gathering Sect,
Qi Feng
, behind him. While Yue Jiulin turned around, Li Yunxiao approached him and trapped him in a golden light, sealing his soul consciousness and preventing him from escaping. Li Yunxiao then transported Yue Jiulin into the
Universe God Monument
, a mysterious place with intense heat and a red sky.

There, he used the power of the Universe God Monument to create a formidable Heaven Flame Formation to trap Yue Jiulin. Despite Yue Jiulin's attempts to resist and use his lightning power, the formation proved to be too powerful, and he was captured and imprisoned within the Monument. With Yue Jiulin secured, Li Yunxiao continued his journey towards Qionghua Island.

Moon Pupil

Yue Tong (Moon Pupil)

The moon pupil is part of the so-called
Pupil Race
.

Gu Feiyang originally obtained the moon pupil on
Mystical Faerie Realm
. Right after optaining it, Gu Feiyang became incapable of fully controlling it, causing him to became berserk in his emotions and actions.

Time later Gu Feiyang found a secret technique within the
Great Library
, allowing him to finally gain full control over the moon pupil

Trivia

Gu Feiyang was considered to have the strongest soul attack power thanks to him owning the moon pupil.

Once in full control, the moon pupil gifted Gu Feiyang powerful soul abilities that ultimately allow him to claim the 3rd place on the Heaven and Earth ranking and become a Titled Martial Sovereign.

Yufeng City
===========

Yufeng city was already part of the North region’s territory, and rain Summit city’s scale and complexity far exceeded Southfire city’s. it’s also a fortress that connects all the major cities in the North.

Plot

Li Yunxiao, accompanied by
Mo Xiaochuan
,
Mo Huayuan
 and
Mei Dong'er
 traveled from South Fire City to Yufeng City as a transit point on their way to Songyue City. However, upon arrival, he learned that the domain-teleportation formation in Yufeng City had been destroyed just a few days earlier. With no other option, he was forced to wait until the teleportation array was repaired.

Trivia

Although Yufeng city was large, it could not accommodate so many sects. Many forces had built their manors in the surrounding spiritual mountains and rivers.

Geng Xing
 is the lord of Yufeng City.

Yuwen Xun
=========

Yuwen Xun, was member of
Death God Palace
 that given task to assassinating Li Yunxiao.

Personalities

He is a transvestite and a pervert especially to those handsome men.

History

Over the years, Yuwen Xun has abducted countless alchemists, forcing them to research gender transformation. Despite thousands of experiments, all attempts have ended in failure.

Plot

Tasked with assassinating Li Yunxiao on behalf of his brother, Yuwen Xun unexpectedly encounters him in the southern part of Qingge Forest. However, instead of carrying out the mission, he is instantly drawn to Li Yunxiao that claim to be
Gu Yuesheng
 the Disciple of Mad Alchemist.

Believing Yunxiao to be a disciple of Mad Alchemist
Qiu Mujie
, Yuwen Xun offers him anything within his power in exchange for Yunxiao helping him change his gender.

Later, Yuwen Xun was captured by
Yu
 group, along with
Mu Wu
 and
Tang Jie
. Due to his unique half-monster bloodline, Yu drained his blood for its powerful properties.

Eventually, Li Yi, who is disguised as
Tang Jie
. Under the pretense of intimacy,
Li Yi
 uses the Yang Yang Art of Creation to drain Yuwen Xun’s life force, leaving him powerless and horrified. As Yuwen Xun realizes the truth that Li Yi is not only an enemy but has also already killed his brother he succumbs to his fate, unable to resist.

Cultivation

Peak 3 star martial emperor.

Zhan Chen
=========

Zhan Chen first appeared when he encountered Yunxiao and Pan Yi shortly after entering the Sky Shattering Realm in search of the Yellow Springs Hellfire. He proposed an alliance with them, but later, he and Yunxiao were intercepted by Ben Tingfeng, leading to a battle. Overwhelmed, Zhan Chen attempted to escape, but he was stopped by
Ye Nantian
, who killed him to prevent any news about the Yellow Springs Hellfire River from leaking out.

Appearance

The black-robed man had a thin face, a slightly pointed jaw, a pale face, and his eyes were almost sunken. he looked so skinny as if he had not seen the sun for many years. He was most likely a person who had escaped from the eternal world.

Background

He came from the realm of immortality and almost opened the door to the earthly realm, but unfortunately he failed in the end.

Zhang Haosi
===========

Yi Hongming
 in his political maneuvering.

Appearance

an old man in gray.

Plot

During Fei Ni's attack on Yi Hongming, Zhang Haosi intervenes to block her divine fire with a protective barrier, demonstrating his considerable martial prowess. However, he quickly finds himself overwhelmed, struggling to maintain his defense as the divine fire drains his energy. Despite his composed outward demeanor, he is visibly shaken by Fei Ni's strength.

Zhang Linghua
=============

Appearance

A white-bearded old man with an extraordinary appearance, with his eyes closed and his expression lazy.

Background

Zhang Linghua, the Martial Sovereign of the Nine Heavens realm, is the esteemed leader of the Big Dipper Sect. He ascended to the Martial Supreme stage only four to five years ago.

History

Zhang Linghua betrayed his sect by killing his own master and seizing the position of sect master of the Big Dipper Sect. In his greed for a ninth-tier medicinal pill, he also launched a sneak attack on
Tan Dijun
, gravely injuring him.

 about

improve
 the

.

Zhang Qingfan, was the Chief Alchemist of the Tianshui Kingdom, entrusted by the King of Tianshui to care for and monitor Qin Ruxue’s worsening condition.

Plot

As the princess's
Qin Ruxue
 condition worsened, he heard from
Jia Rong
 that Li Yunxiao might be able to cure her illness. At first, he was skeptical—how could a young boy possibly know a method that even he, a Three-Tier Alchemist, did not?

However, after learning that Li Yunxiao might be Yang Di’s disciple, his doubt turned into urgency. With Li Yunxiao missing, he mobilized all the power the Alchemist Association could muster to track down his whereabouts.

Zhang Shaotian
==============

He is a Nine-Star Martial Supreme and an Elite Disciple from of the
Western Region
's
Major Forces
, the
Devouring Soul Sect
. As the most of the sect's disciples, he cultivated the Profound Artifact known as Soul Devouring Banner, used to imprison the souls of humans, monsters, and other living beings.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

Zhang Shaotian and his four junior members, arrive on the scene, revealing their sinister nature and the terrifying power of their sect. They unveil a black banner bearing a frightening image, representing the Devouring Soul Sect's brutal reputation for extracting souls. This sight instills fear and recognition among the gathered warriors, including
Zou Chen
 and
Kang Wu
.

Kang Wu, once defiant and confident, is reduced to submission before the Devouring Soul Sect, showing the sect's fearsome influence. Despite the warriors' initial resistance, they find themselves trapped in a desperate battle against the Soul Devouring Banner wielded by the Devouring Soul Sect members. The sect employs soul-extracting techniques to immobilize and capture some of the warriors, subjecting them to the horrifying process of soul extraction.

Zhang Shaotian's junior members display cruel delight in the martial artists' suffering, likening it to their enjoyment of extracting souls from demonic beasts. The horrifying power of the Soul Devouring Banner is demonstrated as the martial artists' souls are consumed, leaving behind lifeless bodies. This nightmarish scene of despair showcases the callous and ruthless cultivation methods of the Devouring Soul Sect.

As the Devouring Soul Sect members continue to extract souls, an unexpected turn of events unfolds. A horde of Five Elements Spirit Devouring Rats, possessing wings and the ability to fly, emerges from the ground. These rats overwhelm the sect members, forcing them to flee in the face of this unexpected threat.

Later, he killed two juniors of the four who were with him, which leaded his Soul Devouring Barrier to reach the 9th Rank. Just as they continued their journey they encounter
Qing Luo
 and her companions from the
Empyrean One Pavillion
, eventually, they killed her and all her companions and continued their journey.

Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

Inside the Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror, Zhang Shaotian and his juniors confront
Li Yunxiao
,
Ye Fan
 and their companions. They demand information on how to break the array and offers to spare Li Yunxiao's life if he complies. Li Yunxiao initiates an attack against Zhang Shaotian and his group. Li Yunxiao employs his Eye Technique and Spring Life Qi to confound and suppress Zhang Shaotian, temporarily gaining the upper hand. However, Zhang Shaotian manages to counteract the attack and escapes the restraints. The Soul Devouring Clan members vow to follow the Sacred Fire Temple group through the illusion. Li Yunxiao successfully uses his array skills to shift the Tiger King War Chariot into the Summer Boundary, the next layer of the Four Seasons Boundary.

Later, in another place,
Li
's attempt to break the formation triggers catastrophic consequences, Little Qing, who has been observing, warns that disaster is looming. The formation's instability leads to the sudden rise of an enormous ice mountain that engulfs Li, while the surrounding area experiences chaotic shifts between the four seasons.

The mountain's peak undergoes rapid transformations, with spring, summer, autumn, and winter all manifesting at different levels. The mountain's appearance reflects the four seasons, with spring at the midpoint, peach blossoms, withered trees, and snow at the base. Meanwhile, an immense boundary of the four seasons emerges in the distance, revealing the Immortal Mountain of lord
Throne
.

Li Yunxiao successfully defends himself against an ambush by Zhang Shaotian and his fellow Soul Devouring Sect disciples. Utilizing his control over the rule of Autumn, he overpowers one of the disciples and eliminates him. Zhang Shaotian is taken aback by Li Yunxiao's ability to wield the power of rules and realizes the threat he poses.

Li Yunxiao proposes a cooperation to escape the barrier and seize Throne's Immortal Mountain. Zhang Shaotian is intrigued by the potential of obtaining the Immortal Mountain and agrees to the plan, with the condition that Li Yunxiao shares the secret method to condense the laws of heaven and earth, which could bolster his strength to contend with the Martial Sovereigns from Myriad Star Valley.

With Zhang Shaotian's brute force, they retrieve a powerful artifact, a long gray banner, from the body of a deceased junior disciple of the Soul Devouring Sect. The banner's main soul has been extracted, and its power diminished, but the artifact still holds a malevolent aura.

Four Seasons Immortal Mountain

Li Yunxiao
 and his group, including Zhang Shaotian and others, enter the Immortal Mountain and are awed by the profound changes in the surroundings. Li Yunxiao reveals that the Soul Devouring Sect members possess a secret technique for soul-searching, which they can use to locate living and even deceased souls. This technique sparks both intrigue and discomfort among the group. Zhang Shaotian employs his Soul Devouring Sect's soul-searching ability through a golden soul slave to find traces of other individuals within the vast mountain. That leaded to a fight against
Tang Jie
 and his Companions.

As Zhang Shaotian's Soul Devouring Gonfalon faces off against Tang Jie's Vermilion Bird Saber, the confrontation creates a stunning clash of power. Tang Jie's profound artifact is a ninth-grade weapon, and its overwhelming strength surprises Zhang Shaotian, making him realize the potential benefits of refining a ninth-grade profound artifact in conjunction with his Soul Devouring Gonfalon. This revelation adds to Zhang Shaotian's determination to capture Tang Jie and take advantage of his connection to the Vermilion Bird Saber.

As the battle unfolds, Tang Jie's fear reaches its peak as he witnesses the horrifying power of the golden soul slave when Zhang Shaotian extract the soul of the living
Dan Yangze
. However,
Shen Feng
 intervenes to save Tang Jie, suppressing the soul slave and briefly turning the tide of the battle. Zhang Shaotian retreats, and a standoff ensues between Shen Feng and Li Yunxiao's group.

Tang Jie seeks to persuade Shen Feng to eliminate their enemies, but Shen Feng hesitates due to the dangerous environment and the potential for wasting his strength. Li Yunxiao engages in a tense verbal exchange with Shen Feng, asserting that he is not afraid and even challenging Shen Feng's strength. Shen Feng eventually decides not to engage in a direct confrontation, opting to leave the situation for later resolution outside the barrier.

Shen Feng shares his findings about the Immortal Mountain's strange environment and the disappearance of Mister Yu and his group. They discover a peculiar cliff that absorbs divine sense and essence upon contact, revealing a hidden space resembling a giant chessboard.
Shang
 and the other Great Monsters, including
Yu
, also appear in this space. Tang Jie's eagerness for revenge against Li Yunxiao intensifies. Shang orders an attack against Li Yunxiao and his group, including Zhang Shaotian. However, the unique environment suppresses the use of Primordial Qi and Essence, rendering the attackers powerless. Li Yunxiao's true power becomes apparent as he effortlessly defeats Tang Jie despite the restrictions, leaving the group of Great Monsters stunned.

Zhe
===

Zhe was Military Advisor of monster clan under
Huang
.

Plot

After Yaozhe pursued the monster that stole the key, he discovered Yunxiao battling Mr. Yang. Confronting Yunxiao, Yaozhe was quickly overwhelmed by Yunxiao's powerful sword techniques and suffered severe injuries. Forced to retreat into the void, he barely escaped with his life. Not long after, the Monster Emperor and Ai arrived in the Qianyue Mansion territory and rescued him.

In the mids of war Zhe successfully set up the Thousand Machine Array within a hundred-mile range to seal off the space, preventing human forces from escaping Five Cloud Mountain and ensuring their complete annihilation. He brought ten thousand monster reinforcements under Huang's command. Entrusted by Huang, Zhe used a profound artifact a mirror as the formation's core to control and maintain the array.

Zhen Deyou
==========

Zhen deyou, Elder
Big Dipper Sect
 a third-tier martial honor, the one who was angry at Yunxiao at the auction.

Zhen Yu
=======

He was an elder of
Sea of Soul Formation
 who practiced both magic and martial arts.

Appearance

He was dressed in gray, his hair was white, and he was covered in wrinkles, but his eyes were bright and full of spirit.

Plot

Zhen Yu arrived at Five Cloud Mountain alongside
Xuan Hua
, sent by the Sea of Soul Formation after receiving High Priest
Ci
 secret message. Initially indifferent to the conflict, Xuan Hua was forced into battle when
Huang
, the Demon Emperor, attacked. Despite his strength, Xuan Hua was quickly overwhelmed, realizing Huang had reached the peak of perfection. Seeing no chance of victory, he and Xuan Hua chose to retreat, watching from a distance.

Zheng
=====

Zheng is one of the one of the 8 known demon sovereigns on the
central continent
. He appears in front of Yunxiao and Xiao hong in the devil realm, where the battle between
Yue
's and
Xing
's clans is occurring. He reveals that he's been watching the two of them since they entered the Devil crack and advices them not to join Yue and fight off
Xing
. After battling Yunxiao for awhile, Yunxiao hides and Zheng proposes a deal, if Yunxiao can survive one of his attacks he would leave and not target the Yue clan again. Yunxiao accepts and only threatens the aura of the sword, "Sword That Will Rise and Fall" and Zheng is frightened away.

Zheng Yunfeng
=============

He is the Vice-Leader of the
Storm Mercenary Group
 of the
Light Song Forest
 in the
Western Region
 of the
Tianwu Continent
.

Plot

Demon Origin Plains

Zheng Yunfeng, along side with
Chen Chuanjiu
 and
Ouyang Qi
, observes
Young Emperor Hao Lian
 in the Demon Plain. Recognizing Hao Lian's deep connection with nature, Chen, and his companions plan a surprise attack. Chen initiates a powerful martial technique, but Hao Lian remains unperturbed, displaying a calm demeanor. Instead of defending himself, Hao Lian approaches a Demon Snake and retrieves a half-eaten Five-Elements Spirit Devouring Rat from its mouth, showing compassion for the creatures.

In a subsequent encounter, Young Emperor Hao Lian protects the Demon Snake and Spirit Rat from harm using a green battle armor, which shatters under Chen Chuanjiu and his companions' combined attack. Believing Hao Lian to be injured or dead, they enter a passage he opens. However, Hao Lian has hidden inside a pit, and when Chen and Zheng Yunfeng enter the passage, he surprises them by reemerging, killing Ouyang Qi, and leaving a warning.

Chen Chuanjiu and Zheng Yunfeng face attacks from a swarm of Five Elements Spirit Devouring Rats summoned by Hao Lian. After defeating the rats, they discover Hao Lian has escaped again. Tracking the thickening Spiritual Qi, they attempt to pursue him.

Meanwhile, a lavishly dressed man contemplates whether to save Young Emperor Hao Lian using a flower-petal counting method. Ultimately, he decides against it, leaving a trail of intriguing thoughts as he departs.

Illusionary Realm of the Water Moon Flower Mirror

Amidst the illusionary landscape,
Young Emperor Hao Lian
 and his pursuers, Chen Chuanjiu and
Zheng Yunfeng
, find themselves trapped and disoriented. The environment shifts between scenes of a tranquil green mountain and clear waters and a deadly ambush of flying squirrels. Despite realizing the illusion, Hao Lian is intrigued by its authenticity and presses on, while Chen Chuanjiu uses his formidable power to break through.

Young Emperor Hao Lian, while trying to comprehend the Power of Rules within a unique space, encounters
Zheng Yunfeng
, unleashes purplish-gray miasma to attack him. However, Hao Lian successfully resists the attack using his spring-themed powers and a new technique he learned, fusing the four seasons into his fist.
Chen Chuanjiu
, intervenes with a massive sword strike aimed at defeating Hao Lian and taking the Immortal Mountain for himself.

The confrontation results in a cataclysmic clash of powers that shatters the space, creates a devouring black hole, and ultimately triggers the activation of the Immortal Mountain's power ahead of schedule. As the Immortal Mountain's power activates, the entire Four Seasons Boundary, which is connected to
Xiao Qing
's body, starts to change, and the four seasons begin to rotate.

Zhong Hong
==========

Zhong Hong of the broken Mountain Valley, One of the ten great sects of the North Region.

Plot

Zhong Hong approached Wan Yiqian under the guise of offering him refuge in
Broken Valley
, citing their long-standing business ties with
Ten Thousand Treasures Tower
. Despite his polite invitation, Wan Yiqian saw through the act, mocking Zhong Hong for not intervening earlier when his life was in danger. Zhong Hong, unfazed, maintained that
Broken Valley
 remained a formidable force and could still offer protection. However, his reluctance to confront
Shenxiao Palace
 directly revealed his cautious and self-serving nature.

As the conversation unfolded, Yunxiao sensed hidden presences nearby, suspecting the use of
Clarity Invisibility Talismans
—a rare and highly secretive artifact. Zhong Hong admitted to purchasing them from
Tianyuan Trading Company
 for an exorbitant price, along with a
Jade Slip
 detailing ancient treasures linked to Wan Yiqian. This confirmed that Zhong Hong’s true objective was not just protection but control—securing Wan Yiqian and his hidden treasures for Broken Valley’s benefit. revealing that information about Wan Yiqian’s hidden treasures had already spread across the North Region, making it impossible for him to monopolize the wealth alone.

Ultimately, Zhong Hong’s plot was simple—he wanted to exploit the situation, manipulate Wan Yiqian into seeking refuge with Broken Valley, and, in return, demand a share of his ancient secret treasures, particularly powerful artifacts like the Cosmic Light Plate.

Zhong Lishan
============

This page is a
Stub
.
The page desperately needs your informations about
Zhong Lishan
.
Please help by
contributing
 your
informations
 and
knowledge
 about
The Ultimate of All Ages/The Eternal Supreme
 to help us
improve
 the
Eternal Supreme Wiki
.

Zhong Lishan, dean of
Blue Jewel Academy
, one of two Martial Kings in the state of Tianshui who had stepped into the Five Elements realm. who claimed to be the strongest man in the state of Tianshui.

History

In
Tianshui Kingdom
 sixty years ago was one of the most critical moments in the state's history. At that time,
King Tianshui’s
 rule was shaken when a
massive rebellion erupted in the south
. The rebel forces, stronger and more organized than expected, quickly overwhelmed the
state army
, routing them in multiple battles. The situation became so dire that the rebels
marched directly to the gates of the capital
, threatening to overthrow the royal family entirely.

With the
official military in disarray
 and no reinforcements arriving in time, the fate of Tianshui seemed sealed. At this critical moment, Zhong Lishan
the then-dean of Jialan Academy
 took a bold step he
rallied the academy’s students
 to form a makeshift
student army
. These young warriors, though lacking experience, fought with extraordinary bravery, using unconventional tactics to
stall the rebels
 and turn the tide of battle.

Not only did they successfully
defend the capital
, but they also
pushed the rebel forces back south
 and eventually
eradicated them entirely
. This decisive victory saved
Prince
Qin Zheng
 (the current king), who was still a young prince at the time, and cemented the
loyalty of Jialan Academy to the royal family
.

In recognition of their heroism, the former king
granted these students the title of "Guardians of the State."
 This marked the birth of the elite
Guardians of the State
, a group that would go on to serve as the kingdom’s strongest defenders.

Plot

Li Yunxiao
 Vs
Lan Xuan

Zhong Lishan attempted to intervene and stop Li Yunxiao from crippling Lan Xuan, but he was powerless to do so. Yunxiao's determination was absolute, and not even the dean of Jialan Academy could save Lan Xuan from his fate.







When Zhong Lishan tried to assert his dominance by unleashing his aura as Martial King, Yunxiao, already in a foul mood, responded with defiance. Without hesitation, he took an
Origin Blasting Pill
 and prepared to unleash another ultimate technique the
Great Wind and Cloud Palm
. The sight of this immediately sent a chill down Zhong Lishan’s spine, forcing him to withdraw his aura.

Reluctantly, he chose to back down. his figure flickered and vanished from the arena, unwilling to linger any longer in frustration.

Zhong Tai deceitful alchemy apprentice who falsely claims an association with  Master
Jia Rong
 of the Alchemist Association. In truth, he has no direct connection to Jia Rong, only claiming that he frequently discusses alchemy with
Shi Yuan
, one of Jia Rong’s actual disciples. Jia Rong, who is actually present, is furious at Zhong Tai for using his name deceitfully and personally beats him up.

Zhou Changfa
============

He is a Supreme Elder in the Zhou Great Family of the Duskflame Empire. He is the strongest person in the Zhou Clan. It is said that his strength has reached the heavens, and he no longer cares about the clan's matters.
And he made the worst decision in his entire life.

Plot

The Zhou Great Family Crisis

In the confrontation between Zhou Changfa and Yunxiao, Zhou Changfa, the leader of the elders in the Zhou clan, demanded that Yunxiao surrender the Green Phoenix Floating Battleship and kneel for punishment. However, Yunxiao, confident in the warship's power, refused and threatened to self-destruct the warship, causing massive destruction. The situation escalated as the Green Phoenix Floating Battleship descended, and panic spread among the onlookers, including
Ding Ling'er
, who remained fascinated by Yunxiao's audacity. As chaos ensued,
Xin Pi
 and others intervened, urging Yunxiao to stop the impending disaster and offering to mediate a peaceful resolution. Reluctantly, Yunxiao agreed, temporarily halting the warship. However, in a surprising turn, Zhou Changfa launched a powerful attack on Yunxiao, intending to kill him.

Zhou Changfa's attack was temporarily stopped by the talisman Yunxiao used as a defense. However, Yunxiao survived the attack and managed to land on the Green Phoenix Floating Battleship. Yunxiao threatened to self-destruct the warship, prompting panic among the onlookers. As the situation escalated, Xin Pi and others desperately pleaded for him to stop, as the self-destruction of the warship would result in widespread destruction. Finally, Yunxiao halted the warship's descent and engaged in discussions with Xin Pi and Zhou Changfa to resolve the conflict.

Again, Yunxiao threatened to activate the self-destruction of the Green Phoenix Floating Battleship and the six-universe Star Observation formation, causing panic among the onlookers. However, another time, Xin Pi and others pleaded with Yunxiao to stop. After some negotiation, Yunxiao agreed to halt the self-destruction, but he presented his conditions. He demanded the release of
Qin Ruxue
, the compensation of Five Million Mid-Grade Primordial Stones, and a public apology to
Tianshui Kingdom
. Additionally, he requested compensation of Fifty Million Mid-Grade Primordial Stones for his losses. Reluctantly, Xin Pi agreed to the conditions, and Qin Ruxue was released.
 As the situation settled, Yunxiao and Qin Ruxue left on the Green Phoenix Floating Battleship, leaving behind a tense atmosphere and disgruntled Zhou family members. Later,
Baili Gongjin
,
Wang Chen
,
Cheng Feng
, and
Mo Zhai
 were mentioned, leading to suspicions and confrontations between Zhou Changfa and Baili Gongjin, as well as the involvement of Mo Zhai from the Mo family.

The Golden Crow Arena

Xin Pi tried to mediate the situation when Li Yunxiao arrived at the arena with a powerful Martial Grandmaster level demonic beast, stunning everyone. The Zhou family accused Li Yunxiao of cheating in the duel and demanded proof of his beast-taming abilities. Li Yunxiao demonstrated his control over the demonic beast, making it obey his commands, silencing the accusers and impressing the crowd. Later, when Li Yunxiao refused to fight without the beast,
Zhou Changfa
 negotiated and compensated him with Sixty Million Mid-Grade Primal Stones to put it away.

During the duel, Li Yunxiao displayed incredible agility and physical strength with his
Heavenly Tyrant Body Tempering Technique
. He neutralized the powerful strike of Martial King
Zhou Yushan
 and counterattacked with exceptional comprehension and skill in his sword technique.
Xin Ruyu
 observed the performance and saw Li Yunxiao as a formidable rival.

Xin Pi observed the duel between Li Yunxiao and Zhou Yushan and noticed Li Yunxiao's use of a Seal that even surpassed the Floating Life Seal of
Yang Di
. He discussed this with other experts, speculating that Li Yunxiao might be a successor of one of Gu Feiyang's disciples. Zhou Changfa also witnessed the intense clash between Li Yunxiao's Heaven and Earth Seal and Zhou Yushan's Snow & Frost Bright Sword, resulting in Zhou Yushan's disappearance from the stage. The onlookers were shocked by Li Yunxiao's strength and calmly assessed the situation, realizing that there was no one in the
Southern Region
 capable of killing him. After the duel, the Zhou Great Family suffered a significant blow to their reputation due to these events, Zhou Yushan's death and
Zhou Yangbiao
's punishment.
References

Zhou Chu
========

Plot

Zhou Chu told his master,
Cangwu Qiong
, that
Li Yunxiao
 was arrogant but incredibly strong. When he hesitantly asked if Li Yunxiao was really Gu Feiyang, Cangwu Qiong confirmed it with certainty, expressing his surprise.
Recalling his past conflict with Li Yunxiao in Xinyan City, Zhou Chu grew nervous, fearing retaliation. Meanwhile, Cangwu Qiong decided to visit
Ren Ximin
 in Linghua Wonderland before making any moves.

Zhou Xiang
==========

He is the Vice-Captain of the Rookie Mercenary Group's 8th Team, he is a Five-Star Martial Emperor, but his personality doesn't appear that way.

Zhou Yangbiao
=============

He is the Head of the Zhou Great Family of the
Duskflame Empire
. He is one of the High-Ranking members in the Shangyang City and the entire Duskflame Empire.

Zhou Yushan
===========

He is the eldest son of the Zhou Great Family, and one of the most talented persons in the younger generation in the Southern Region. He cultivated the Forgotten Love Heavenly Book, which is the heavenly scripture of the Emotion-Severing Mountain.

General Information

He is always compared with the
Prince of the Empire
, and they say that he may have more talent than him. The rumors multiplied even more when he, with the help of two elders from the Emotion-Severing Mountain, broke through from a Five-Star Martial Lord to a Three-Star Martial King in 2–4 Months.

Plot

Declaration of Accession

When he arrives in
Tianshui Kingdom
, he assumes authority, attempting to dictate the appointment of the crown prince, favoring
Qin Yang
. However, when
Qin Zheng
 defies him and names Qin Yue as the rightful heir, Zhou Yushan is enraged, openly threatening the newly appointed crown prince’s life.

Zhou Yushan showed no respect for Qin Zheng, the ruler of Tianshui, acting as if his word was absolute. When Yunxiao mocked him for his arrogance, tensions flared, and a battle broke out between Zhou Yushan and Yunxiao's party. After exchanging a few blows, Yunxiao, unwilling to escalate the situation further, agreed to a life and death duel in three months.

Confident of his victory, Zhou Yushan openly declared that if he won, he would take Luo Yunshang as his woman. To further ensure his control over the duel, he to abduct
Qin Ruxue
, planning to use her as leverage against Yunxiao, intending to make her his twenty-third concubine . Enraged, Yunxiao intervened, unleashing his power in an attempt to stop him. However,
Leng Hongling
, Zhou Yushan’s fiancée, suddenly stepped in, blocking Yunxiao and forcing him back. With that, Zhou Yushan vanished beyond the horizon, taking Qin Ruxue with him.

The Golden Crow Arena

In the duel,
Li Yunxiao
 displays incredible agility and physical strength, surprising everyone with his Heavenly Tyrant Body Tempering Technique. He neutralizes Zhou Yushan's powerful strike and counterattacks with his own sword technique, asserting his dominance in the battle. Li Yunxiao also delivers a humiliating slap to Zhou Yushan's face, further impressing the spectators with his prowess.

Zhou Yushan activates the Fifth Layer of the Forgotten Love Heavenly Book, wielding the Snow & Frost Bright Sword, a powerful Sixth-Tier Xuan Artifact. He releases moonlight that threatens to crush Li Yunxiao, but Li Yunxiao remains calm and appreciates the Snow & Frost Bright Sword's craftsmanship. He skillfully controls the Tiger Tooth Sword, which is eventually shattered by the Wugou Frost. Despite the significant power difference, Li Yunxiao showcases remarkable skill and control, handling the dangerous situation with ease, leaving everyone astonished by his abilities and calm demeanor.

Later, Li Yunxiao effortlessly neutralizes Zhou Yushan's powerful strike using his "One-Finger Flower Pinch" technique. He then subdues Zhou Yushan, defeating him without killing him, and challenges anyone who dares to provoke him in the future. However,
Jiang Wuji
, a Two-Star Martial Grandmaster, interferes and tries to attack Li Yunxiao. Li Yunxiao uses a soul attack to make Jiang Wuji kneel before him, astonishing everyone present. Later, Yunxiao killed Jiang Wuji and Zhou Yushan with The
World God Monument
.

Zhu Lei
=======

He is Left Commander of
Hai Lin
 the son of the Vice-Leader of the
Rookie Mercenary Group
,
Hai Beifei
.

Plot

Light Song Forest

He is initially wary of Li Yunxiao and his group but becomes more receptive when he learns that Li Yunxiao is an Alchemist.
Hai Lin
 offers to guide them to the Gentle Song Forest, their intended destination, but Zhu Lei remains guarded, especially towards
Ding Ling'er
, whom he finds suspicious.

Throughout their journey together, Zhu Lei maintains a cautious attitude but also expresses his gratitude for Li Yunxiao's help. He has a significant responsibility in leading the caravan through the dangerous Demon Origin Plain, and he takes his role seriously. Despite some tension and challenges, Zhu Lei proves to be a competent and dedicated leader. He also reveals his loyalty and trust in Hai Lin, believing that he will lead the Light Song Forest to a new future as the true King of Mercenaries.

As they approach the Light Song Forest, they encounter a powerful Seven-Rank Demonic Beast summoned by
Gu Yuesheng
. Li Yunxiao successfully traps the beast using his profound artifact, the Heavenly Spirit Ring, and the caravan absorbs the star power to cultivate and make breakthroughs. Li Yunxiao and others experience significant improvements in their strength.

Upon entering the Light Song Forest, Li Yunxiao confronts Gu Yuesheng and
Situ Heng
, displaying his strength as an Alchemist.
Duan Yue
 also appears to help Li Yunxiao, revealing his true strength as a Martial Emperor. The Li Yunxiao successfully rescues rookie mercenary group from the lava swamp and escapes to safety, and they entered the city successfully.

Zhu Qishui
==========

the president of the thunderwind Chamber of Commerce.

Plot

when faced with Ding Shan’s ruthless ambition, he found himself powerless to resist. Initially, Zhu Qishui
cursed Ding Shan
, proclaiming that he would die without descendants. However, Ding Shan, unfazed and even
amused
, revealed that he already had a son who would carry on his legacy. This revelation sent a chilling message—not only was Ding Shan not concerned about the consequences, but he had also planned far ahead.

Realizing the
hopelessness of his situation
, Zhu Qishui's defiance
turned to fear
. Knowing that he was doomed, he
knelt and begged for mercy
, hoping to at least
protect his family
. However, his fate was sealed. Rather than face further humiliation or execution at Ding Shan’s hands, he
took his own life
, smashing his head against the ground so violently that his skull shattered.

Zhuo Kun
========

Interconnected with the
Heavenly Martial Realm
 is the Earth Realm, a place that is attached to the known world and is also affected by the Rules and Laws of the Heavenly Martial Realm. The Underworld Flame is a natural force similar to the World-Destroying Divine Purple Lightning of the Heavenly Martial Realm, but slightly inferior, the individual who obtains the Underworld Fire is called Lord of the Earth, 100,000 years ago, 4 World Kings appeared, one of them was the current Earth Lord,
Zhuo Kun
.

He wandered the
Tianwu Continent
 with the other World Kings until his body was destroyed in the battle with the
Demon Emperor
 and his Soul was thrown into the
Demon Realm
, whereupon he adapted to the Laws of the Demon Realm and became a Demon, after tens of thousands of years he managed to reach the peak of a Demon Sovereign, appearing alongside his wife Yuan after the battle of the specialists of the
Heavenly Martial Alliance
,
Holy Region
 and
Xuanli Island
 against the Demons in
Crimson Crescent City
, and suppressing
Di Jia
 during a battle and killing him, and while they were fighting, for Di Jia to summon the Demonic Weapons of the Six Paths of Reincarnation, Zhuo Kun who learned the True Demon Dharma Technique took possession of Di Jia's connection with the
Heavenly Supreme Artifacts
, After this he arrives with his wife Yuan where
Yin Yu
 three sons and
Li Yunxiao
 team were fighting when the Land of Ten Thousand Spirits returned to the Heavenly Martial Realm.

Later during the battle, Zhuo Kun,
Xiao Hong
 and Li Yunxiao each use one of the Six Paths Demonic Weapons, which triggers the Supreme Celestial Artifact space, Li Yunxiao uses the Sword that Will Rise and Fall, leaving Zhuo and Yuan on the brink of death. After much hesitation, Zhuo Kun transfers his remaining energies to Yuan, giving her the Underworld Fire, the connection of the Supreme Heavenly Weapon, and its adaptation to the Laws of the Heavenly Martial Realm, which makes her practically immune to the suppression of the Realm and makes her a Holy Demon
, the first Demon Emperor in a Hundred Thousand Years.

Zhuo Qingfan
============

Zhuo Qingfan
 (卓清凡),
Void Martial Sovereign
 (虚空武帝), the
Second-Ranked Martial Sovereign
 on the
Heaven and Earth Power Chart
 renowned for his mastery of
Spatial Techniques
 (空间), rumored to be on the verge of reaching the
Ten Directions Divine Realm
.

Appearance

Unrestrained figure wearing a blue-patterned and gold-threaded robe.

Background

He is the most powerful expert in spatial techniques, capable of effortlessly moving between multiple spaces. His true body remains a mystery, as he can appear in several places simultaneously, with each manifestation being real. No one truly knows where he actually is at any given moment. Because of his ability
Zhuo qingfan
’s whereabouts are the most elusive of the
Ten Great Martial Sovereigns
.

Personality

Zhuo Qingfan has a carefree and mischievous personality, often appearing relaxed and unbothered even in the most intense situations. He carries a lighthearted demeanor, frequently making jokes and teasing others, which contrasts sharply with the serious and high-stakes battles around him. However, beneath his playful exterior lies a keen intellect and sharp instincts. He enjoys provoking reactions from others, as seen when he taunts
Wan Yiqian
 with a casual offer of tea after ruining his carefully laid plans. His sense of humor can sometimes be infuriating to those who take themselves too seriously, but it also highlights his confidence and ability to navigate dangerous encounters with ease. He doesn't seem to care much about authority or rigid formalities, preferring to do things his own way.

Plot

After news broke that one of the fragments of a great demon was sealed in the Boneyard, experts from the Sacred Region were tasked with sending information about the true face of the Dragon Seal. After certain conflicts, Zhuo Qingfan was notified of the situation to the point where the information sending formation was set up, and given the mission to subdue the great demon, Zhuo Qingfan, who was participating in a chess match with a friend, traversed the Void in an instant to arrive at the scene and save the envoys of the Sacred Region.

After developing his attack on the chess pieces after thinking of a counterattack against his friend during the game, Zhuo Qingfan returns for a few minutes to attribute his move, which results in the death of three people during the period of time. After being reminded by his Friend of his mission, Zhuo Qingfan returns to battle, demonstrating his playful personality, Drawing his Halberd and fervently confronting the great demon Di Ye, Zhuo Qingfan makes use of the True Dragon Cradle and the Dragon Breath contained within it to suppress and collapse the personal World of the Battlefield of the Ancient Gods, a Saint Artifact that was in Di Ye's hands at the time of the battle. This resulted in the environment being deformed, as well as the Boneyard's huge Spiritual Energy decline. And after suppressing Di Ye and forcing him to a critical point, Zhuo Qingfan loses sight of Di Ye and leaves.

Power

Cang Hai Ru Chen - hus the halberd.

Zi Ling
=======

Personality

Known for her gentle and kind nature, she was well-liked by many within the association.

Background

Zi Ling was once just a humble maidservant, but fate took a dramatic turn when she saved a gravely injured man in Long Valley City. That man, a figure of great power and influence, never forgot her kindness. Before leaving, he entrusted the Shuai family with ensuring her well-being. She later was elevated to the status of a goddaughter within the Ink Feather Merchant Association. However, her arranged marriage took an unexpected turn when she was suddenly demoted to the position of a second wife to Shuai Minglang, the rising successor of the powerful Shuai family in Long Valley City.

This decision sparked outrage within the Ink Feather Merchant Association, as she was originally promised the status of a first wife. Yet, given the Shuai family's growing influence and their recent alliance with the Du family of Earth Dragon City, resistance was futile. Despite the frustration of those who cared for her, Zi Ling had little choice but to accept her fate. Her marriage was no longer just a personal matter but a strategic move in the ever-shifting power struggles of the merchant world.

After Li Yunxiao arrived at the
Shuai Junwei
 Mansion and intervened in the Shuai family's marriage arrangement between Zi Ling and
Du Xianghan
 tensions escalated. Yunxiao openly threatened to wipe out the Shuai family, forcing Marshal Junwei into a difficult position. Realizing the gravity of the situation, Junwei ultimately agreed to break off the engagement with the Du family. To solidify his decision, he swore that his son,
Shuai Minglang
, and Miss Zi Ling were truly in love and that there would be no third party involved in their union.

Zi Xiao Ji
==========

Zi Xiao Ji,
 the head of the Holy region's finance department.

Appearance

Zi Xiao Ji,was filled with the aura of wealth, his face was filled with fortune.

Personality

He was an extremely smart person and knew not to care about things that he shouldn’t care about and not to ask things that he shouldn’t ask. Otherwise, he wouldn’t be in charge of a rich place like the finance department of the sacred zone

Zou Chen
========

He is a Low-Rank Martial Supreme from the Southern Region's Sword Training Sect. He is unparalleled in his Realm's Star.

Plot

Light Song Forest

Zou Chen, proposes cooperation among the warriors to search for clues related to a rumored treasure. He offers his Time-fixing Plate, a unique artifact, to aid in the search. Despite skepticism about his reputation and intentions, Zou Chen's artifact reveals a lead pointing to the east, igniting hope among the gathered warriors.
Kang Wu
, associated with the Thunder Fire Palace, adds skepticism, implying the treasure's uncertainty and potential involvement of various factions.

The warriors share a gruesome tale of the Skull Mercenary Group's actions, intensifying their resolve. Zou Chen and Kang Wu engage in banter, reflecting discord between them. Zou Chen's lead prompts determination to pursue the Skeleton Mercenary Group. The warriors, led by Zou Chen and Kang Wu, set off on a mission to confront the perpetrators.

Demon Origin Plains

At the site, warriors from across the Demon Plain gather. Zou Chen and Kang Wu discuss the emergence of a formidable power and its link to Noah's Ark. Zou Chen expresses intent to withdraw due to the power's magnitude, while Kang Wu remains resolute. Tensions rise as a Martial Supreme offers a choice to continue or withdraw. The crowd divides, reflecting the uncertain atmosphere.

A chilling voice urges warriors to contribute for the potential appearance of Noah's Ark. Five mysterious figures arrive, leading by
Zhang Shaotian
, startling Zou Chen and Kang Wu. The strangers address Kang Wu by name, revealing his fear. The strangers demand assistance, sparking indignation and suspicion among the warriors. Facing the
Devouring Soul Sect
's might, Zou Chen sacrifices himself to prevent soul extraction.

Zuo Cheng
=========

Zhuo Cheng, Was Leader Green Colt mercenary group.

Personality

Zuo Cheng is a cautious and pragmatic leader, prioritizing safety over pride. Shrewd and perceptive, he quickly assesses threats and adapts, knowing when to retreat or negotiate.
